Coat potatoes evenly with oil and spices. Place in single layer on baking sheet. Bake for 15 minutes. Turn over and bake another 10-15 minutes. Serve with mayo or ketchup for dipping. ; name: sweet potato patties ; ingredients: water, sea salt, brown rice, sweet potato, onion, flour, olive oil ; preparation:Be sure to have your rice cooked & cooled before you begin. This can happen at dinner the night before, at breakfast, or an hour before dinner. As long as the rice has cooled, it will be sticky enough to make into a patty. Stir together the rice, sweet potato, onion and salt in a large bowl. Allow it to sit for a few minutes, so that the salt can draw the moisture out of the potato & onion. Stir in enough flour to make the batter sticky, adding a spoonful or two of water if necessary. Form the mixture into tight balls, and squish slightly into a patty form. Heat a pan on medium, then add enough oil to coat the underside of each patty. Allow them to cook for 7-10 minutes, then flip. Cook another 5-7 minutes, and serve. These sweet potato brown rice patties can be served on their own, garnished with salsa and lettuce, on a bun as a burger, or many other ways. In the photo, i served them alongside some steamed kale, dressed with tamari and sesame seeds. ; name: not sweet sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, light italian dressing, onion, sour cream, brown sugar ; preparation:Cook sweet potatoes in boiling water 10 minutes or until tender. Drain sweet potatoes, set aside. Heat italian dressing in pan, med-high. Add onion cook & stir 5 minutes. Add sweet potatoes, mash lightly. Add brown sugar, sour cream. Stir until heated through. ; name: japanese soy glazed sweet potato ; ingredients: brown sugar, low sodium soy sauce, mirin, dark sesame oil, garlic cloves, sweet potatoes, toasted sesame seeds, nori ; preparation:

name: spanish style clams ; ingredients: olive oil, sweet onions, green bell peppers, red bell peppers, garlic cloves, bay leaves, crushed tomatoes in puree, dry white wine, littleneck clams, hot pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil in heavy large pot over medium high heat. Add sliced sweet onions, green and red bell peppers, minced garlic, and bay leaves and saute until onions are golden about 10 minutes. Stir in crushed tomatoes and wine. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Bring mixture to boil and add claims, cover and cook until clams open about 8 minutes, stir in hot pepper sauce and serve. ; name: clams with white wine ; ingredients: clams, garlic, onion, parsley, breadcrumbs, white wine, water, limes, olive oil, salt ; preparation:Scrub the clams under running water and soak them in salt water for 15 minutes. Drain. Heat the olive oil and add the onion, garlic and clams. Fry for about 10 minutes, stirring often to open the clams. Add the lime juice, wine, parsley, water and bread crumbs. Cook for 10 minutes more. Discard any unopened clams. Add salt to taste and serve. ; name: clams in garlic white wine ; ingredients: prosciutto ham, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, italian parsley, hot pepper flakes, dry white wine, littleneck clams ; preparation:Cut prosciutto into strips. In a large frypan, heat oil over medium heat. Fry prosciutto until crisp, about 2 minutes. Remove to paper towel to drain. To the pan, add garlic, half of the parsley and the hot pepper flakes. Fry for 1 minute. Add wine. Bring to boil over medium high heat, add clams, cover and steam until clams open, about 5 minutes. Discard any clams that do not open. Sprinkle with prosciutto and remaining parsley. Ladle clams into small bowls and offer plenty of crusty bread to soak up the delicious broth. ; name: clams with garlic and almonds tapas ; ingredients: littleneck clams, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, sliced almonds, dry white wine, lemons, juice and zest of, scallions, parsley ; preparation:Scrub and drain cockles and set aside. In a 12-inch to 14-inch saute pan, heat oil until smoking. Add garlic and almonds and saute until golden brown. Add clams, wine and lemon juice and zest and bring to a boil. Cover and cook until clams open, about 3 to 4 minutes. Uncover, add scallions and parsley and serve. ; name: clams with jalapeno lemon and basil ; ingredients: butter, garlic cloves, jalapeno, tomato sauce, dry white wine, fresh lemon juice, littleneck clams, fresh basil, lemon peel ; preparation:Melt butter in very large pot over medium-high heat. Add minced garlic and jalapeo. Stir until garlic is golden, about 2 minutes. Add tomato sauce, wine, and lemon juice and bring to boil. Add clams. Cover and boil until clams open, about 9 minutes. Add basil and lemon peel. Season with pepper. Transfer clams and sauce to large bowl and serve. ; name: clams with red bell pepper garlic ; ingredients: littleneck clams, cornmeal, kosher salt, dry white wine, red bell peppers, butter, olive oil, garlic cloves, lemon peel, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Place clams in a large bowl. Add enough cold water to cover. Sprinkle with cornmeal and salt. Let stand 1 hour. Drain clams and rinse well. Combine wine, bell peppers, butter, oil, garlic and lemon peel in a large pot. Bring to a simmer over medium heat. Cover and cook 2 minutes. Increase heat to high and add all clams and chopped cilantro. Cover pot and cook until clams open, about 8 minutes. Discard any clams that do not open. Ladle clams and broth into bowls and serve. ; name: the best clams in the world with a delicious creamy sauce ; ingredients: clams, shallots, garlic cloves, tomatoes, white wine, heavy cream, basil leaves, salt and pepper, bread ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large pot over high heat. Stir in shallots and garlic and cook until tender. Stir in tomato and keep cooking for about 5 minutes. Add white wine and reduce by half. Add the cream and bring to a simmer. Stir in clams and half of the basil and season with salt and pepper. Cover the pan until the clams are open. Stir in the rest of the basil. Serve in large bowls with grilled bread. ; name: clams with cherry tomatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, cherry tomatoes, dry white wine, littleneck clams, garlic cloves, lemon, fresh parsley, french bread ; preparation:

name: baked chicken ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, paprika, pepper, fryer chickens ; preparation:In a large roasting pan, in a 425 oven, melt the butter or margarine. Mix flour, salt, paprika and pepper in a heavy-duty plastic bag. Shake chicken pieces in the bag, a few at a time, until evenly coated. In the pan, place the chicken, skin side down, in the melted butter. Bake 30 minutes. Turn chicken pieces and bake 15 minutes more until pieces are fork-tender. I usually make gravy from the de-greased pan juices, using some or all of the leftover flour and some chicken stock. ; name: lazy oven fried chicken ; ingredients: chicken pieces, flour, seasoning salt, garlic powder, paprika, ground red pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Spray a 9x13 inch metal pan with no stick spray. Rinse chicken and drain but do not dry. Put flour and seasonings in a paper or plastic bag and shake to blend. Put 2-3 pieces of chicken in bag and shake. Arrange chicken in pan. Bake 30 min then turn chicken over for another 20 minute. If using white meat reduce cooking time to not over cook and dry out. ; name: baked fried chicken ; ingredients: flour, seasoned bread crumbs, old bay seasoning, salt, pepper, frying chicken, oil ; preparation:Heat oil on medium high heat in large skillet or frying pan. Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Combine dry ingredients. Moisten chicken pieces with water. Dredge chicken in flour and crumb mixture. Quickly fry chicken on all sides until browned and crisp. Place in covered baking dish and bake at 300 degrees for 30 minutes. Remove cover and bake additional 20-30 minutes to re-crisp chicken, serve. ; name: crunchy coating happy family fried chicken ; ingredients: vegetable oil, egg, milk, salt, pepper, chicken pieces, yellow cornmeal, flour, italian salad dressing mix, ground cayenne pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in large skillet over medium high heat. Combine chicken pieces, egg, salt, pepper, and milk in large ziploc bag. Shake to combine, and set aside. In another large ziplock bag combine cornmeal, flour, italian dressing mix, and cayenne pepper. Shake to combine. 1-3 pieces at a time, remove chicken pieces from egg mix and place chicken pieces in the cormeal mix and shake to completely cover all chicken pieces. Take out coated chicken pieces, put into hot oil, and repeat process 3 at a time until all pieces have been coated. Fry chicken pieces turning once each side is browned until chicken is cooked through and juices run clear. Drain on paper towels. ; name: easy and crispy oven fried chicken ; ingredients: chicken breasts, flour, salt, paprika, pepper, liquid shortening ; preparation:Wash and semi dry chicken breasts. Roll or shake chicken in flour, salt, paprika and pepper mixture. Pour small amount of oil in shallow baking dish. Lay chicken breasts, boney side up. Bake 30 minutes at 375. Remove from oven, turn over, return to oven and continue baking for 30 minutes at 375. Remove from oven and serve. ; name: crusty herb fried chicken baked ; ingredients: chicken, thyme, marjoram, flour, fat, rosemary, parsley, salt, pepper, water ; preparation:Sprinkle chicken with thyme and marjoram. Let stand for 30 minute to 1 hour. Roll in flour and fry in hot fat or salad oil just long enough to brown on both sides. Remove and place in baking pan. Sprinkle with rosemary, parsley, salt and pepper. Pour water into frying pan and stir thoroughly scraping bits from bottom of pan. Pour liquid over chicken. Bake at 375 degrees for 40 to 45 minutes. Prep time includes stand time. ; name: easy tasty baked chicken ; ingredients: chicken, garlic powder, seasoning salt, pepper, paprika, green bell pepper, onion, olive oil ; preparation:In a baking dish arrange chicken pieces. Sprinkle both sides of chicken with seasonings. Top with peppers and onion. Drizzle with oil. Bake uncovered for one hour at 325 degrees after one hour turn temperature to 400 and bake 15-30 minutes longer. ; name: crusty fried chicken ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, garlic salt, salt, celery salt, pepper, paprika, chicken pieces, canola oil ; preparation:

name: baked vanilla pears ; ingredients: pears, vanilla extract, raisins, amaretto, vanilla powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Peel, core & halve pears. Mix vanilla, raisins and amaretto together. Set pears, rounded side down, in a pan with 2 inch sides. Pour liquid mixture over pears. Cover with tinfoil and bake 30 minutes. Serve warm with a sprinkle of vanilla powder. ; name: baked pears with maple nut sauce ; ingredients: pears, water, maple syrup, dark brown sugar, maple flavoring, butter, pecans ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400 degrees. Cut the pears in half lengthwise and core. Place the pears, cut side up, in a casserole dish. Combine the water, maple-flavored syrup, sugar, maple flavoring, and butter. Pour over the pears. Cover and bake for 40 minutes, or until the pears are tender. Place in individual dishes, drizzle the sauce over the pears and sprinkle pecans on top. ; name: baked fruit ; ingredients: fruit, pears, cinnamon sticks, orange, juice of, honey, brown sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200c. Place fruit in a baking tray with the cinnamon, orange juice. Cover with honey and sprinkle brown sugar. Bake for 20 minutes or until golden brown. Serve with yoghurt, ice cream or custard. ; name: pears with easy chocolate sauce ; ingredients: pears, water, sugar, cocoa powder, vanilla extract ; preparation:Divide pears among 4 individual dessert dishes& set aside. Combine water& sugar in a small saucepan and bring to a boil over high heat. Stir in cocoa& return to a boil. Boil, stirring constantly, for 1 minute. Remove from heat, stir in vanilla& drizzle sauce over pears. Serve at once. ; name: swiss pears ; ingredients: whipping cream, sugar, pears in heavy syrup, german cooking chocolate ; preparation:Whip cream until thick, add sugar and continue to whip until thick. Drain pears well. Melt chocolate with reserved syrup. Put pears in a large bowl, a glass bowl makes a nice presentation. Cover pears with whipped cream. Cool chocolate mixture, then pour or spoon chocolate carefully over whipped cream. Chill well. ; name: pears helene ; ingredients: pear halves in syrup, vanilla extract, vanilla ice cream, hot fudge, toasted almonds ; preparation:Combine pears and pear syrup with vanilla. Cover and refrigerate 3 to 4 hours. At serving time, disregard syrup. Arrange pears with a scoop of vanilla ice cream in each of 2 stemmed dessert dishes. Pour hot fudge sauce over. Garnish with toasted almonds. ; name: maple grilled pears with brown sugar and cinnamon ; ingredients: pears, lemon juice, brown sugar, cinnamon, maple syrup ; preparation:In a large bowl spoon lemon juice over pears. In another bowl, combine brown sugar and cinnamon. Sprinkle brown sugar cinnamon combo over the pear slices. Set indoor grill on high and grill for 4-5 minutes or until golden. To serve, evenly distribute pear slices on to 4 serving dishes and drizzle with maple syrup. ; name: baked pears with raisins ; ingredients: pears, raisins, maple syrup, butter, vanilla extract, cinnamon ; preparation:

name: garlic carrots ; ingredients: baby carrots, garlic cloves, olive oil, hot water, salt, dried thyme, pepper ; preparation:In a skillet, saute carrots and garlic in oil for 5 minutes. Add water, salt, thyme and pepper. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and cook for 8-12 minutes or until carrots are tender. ; name: carrotty carrots ; ingredients: carrot, olive oil, garlic clove, salt and pepper ; preparation:Slice carrot in to rounds. Steam carrots till tender. While steaming, mince garlic and tops. Saut tops and garlic in oil. Add carrots to tops saut, season with salt and pepper. ; name: simple carrots ; ingredients: carrots, caster sugar, garlic cloves, butter ; preparation:Add the carrots to a pan of cold water. Add all other ingredients. Bring to a boil and simmer for 8-10 minutes. I like my carrots to still have a little bite, if you like them softer you might have to increase the cooking time a little. Remove the garlic cloves and serve. ; name: delicious carrots ; ingredients: butter, onion, baby carrots, ground nutmeg, salt & pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add onions and cook, stirring often, until soft and transparent. If butter begins to brown, reduce heat to medium-low. Add carrots and cook, stirring often, until tender, about 5 minutes for crisp-tender. Season with a dash of nutmeg and salt & pepper to taste. ; name: roasted potatoes and baby carrots with garlic ; ingredients: red potatoes, baby carrots, garlic cloves, olive oil, coarse salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Dry the veggies well with a paper towel and place in a large bowl. Prepare a large non-stick baking sheet, you can line with foil and spray the foil liberally with cooking spray. In a small bowl combine olive oil, chopped garlic, coarse salt and black pepper. Mix well to combine. Pour over the veggies and toss to coat with a wooden spoon or clean hands. Set oven to 400 degrees f. Roast in oven for about 30 minutes or until the potatoes are fork-tender, tossing occasionally with a spatula. ; name: roasted spiced carrots ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, sugar, ground cumin, kosher salt, ground cinnamon, carrots, white raisins, lemon, juice of, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well. ; name: basil carrots ; ingredients: carrots, butter, salt, basil ; preparation:Slice carrots. Simmer, covered, in salted water until tender, about 10 to 15 minutes. Drain. Combine remaining ingredients. Toss with carrots. ; name: mashed garlic carrots ; ingredients: carrots, garlic, vegetable stock, dried thyme, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: cream cheese cheddar biscuits ; ingredients: unbleached all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, sharp cheddar cheese, butter, cream cheese, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Measure dry ingredients into food processor and pulse until well combined. Add cheese and cut butter and cream cheese into small chunks and distribute throughout processor bowl. Hit pulse about 10 times for 1-2 seconds each pulse until course crumbs develop. Pour milk through feed tube in a slow stream while pulsing until cohesive but crumbly dough forms. Turn dough onto floured surface and gently squeeze it into a ball. Flatten and gently shape into an 8 by 8 inch square. Cut into 16 even squares. Place on ungreased baking sheet and bake 15-18 minutes until lightly browned. ; name: cream cheese cookie cups ; ingredients: sugar-free chocolate chip cookie dough, low-fat cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, egg, vanilla extract ; preparation:Place one piece of dough into the bottom of 12 ungreased muffin cups. Bake at 325 for 8-10 minutes or until lightly browned. Using the end of a wooden spoon handle, reshape the puffed cookie cups. Beat cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, egg and vanilla extract in medium bowl until smooth. Pour about 3 tablespoons cream cheese mixture over each cookie in cup. Bake for an additional 15 to 18 minutes or until set. Cool completely in pan on wire rack. Top with pie filling. Refrigerate for 1 hour. ; name: kissey face cream cheese cookies ; ingredients: butter, cream cheese, granulated sugar, all-purpose flour, egg, vanilla extract, hershey chocolate kisses ; preparation:Cream butter and cream cheese. Gradually add sugar, beating until light and fluffy. Add flour. Beat well. Stir in egg and vanilla. Shape dough into 1-inch balls. Place 2 inches apart a lightly greased cookie sheet. Bake at 375 f for 8 minutes. Remove the cookies from the oven and place one unwrapped hershey kiss in the middle of each cookie. Return to oven and bake 5 minutes. Cool 2-3 minutes on cookie sheets before removing to a wire rack to cool completely. ; name: cream cheese pancakes ; ingredients: eggs, all-purpose flour, sugar, butter, cream cheese ; preparation:Lightly beat eggs in large bowl. Add softened cream cheese, flour, sugar and butter. Mix until well combined. Spray a preheated 275f electric griddle with vegetable cooking spray and ladle batter by teaspoonfuls onto griddle. Cook pancakes until golden, about 3 minutes. Turn and brown other side about 2 minutes more. Sprinkle pancakes with confectioners sugar and garnish with lemon wedges. Serve with fresh berries, warm applesauce, or maple syrup. ; name: orange cream cheese stuffed french toast ; ingredients: french bread, cream cheese, orange marmalade, eggs, milk, vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 300f. Place baking sheet in oven. Cut a 4-inch long by 2-inch deep pocket through the top crust of each slice of bread. Mix cream cheese and marmalade together. Spoon 1 generous tablespoon of cream cheese mixture into each bread pocket. Whisk eggs, milk, vanilla extract, cinnamon, and nutmeg together in a pie plate. Dip 4 stuffed bread slices into egg mixture, thoroughly coating them. Over medium heat, melt 1 tablespoon butter in large, nonstick skillet, then add the 4 bread slices. Cook until golden brown, about 2 minutes per side. Place on baking sheet, and keep in oven until ready to serve. Repeat procedure for the remaining 4 slices. Serve with orange syrup. ; name: cream cheese muffin puffs ; ingredients: sugar, almond extract, vanilla, cinnamon, margarine, cream cheese, refrigerated biscuits ; preparation:Heat oven to 375. Melt margarine in a bowl. Cut cream cheese into 10 cubes. In a second small bowl, combine sugar, cinnamon and extract. Dip cheese cube in sugar mixture, then place in the center of a biscuit. Fold dough over cheese, pinching to seal. Roll dough into ball, dip the doughball into margarine and then the sugar mixture again. Place seam side down in an ungreased muffin tin. Repeat with the remaining 9 biscuits and cheese cubes. Bake for 12-18 minutes at 375 or until golden brown. ; name: banana cream cheese bread ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, butter, banana, eggs, flour, baking powder, baking soda, walnuts ; preparation:Mix together cream cheese, sugar and butter until smooth. Add eggs and bananas and mix well. Combine dry ingredients and add to wet and mix until blended. Fold in nuts. Pour into greased and floured 9x5 loaf pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour and 10 minutes. Cool in pan for 10 minutes before moving to cooling rack. Serve warm or cool. ; name: cream cheese dessert wedges ; ingredients: refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, cream cheese, sugar, egg, all-purpose flour, ground cinnamon ; preparation:

name: taco salad low carb ; ingredients: ground beef, taco seasoning, iceberg lettuce, tomatoes, avocado, cheddar cheese, salsa, sour cream, ranch dressing ; preparation:Brown the hamburger. Drain off the fat. Stir in the seasoning mix. Allow to cool. Place lettuce, tomato, avocado and cheese in a large bowl. Blend the salsa and sour cream together. Add ground beef to the bowl. Toss salad with desired amount of dressing and serve. ; name: taco mashed potato casserole ; ingredients: mashed potatoes, cheddar cheese, egg, lean ground meat, onion, cream-style corn, taco seasoning mix ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Combine potato, cheese and egg and set aside. Place beef and onion in a skillet over mediun high heat, cook, stirring to break up beef, until beef is browned. Pour off excess fat, add corn and taco mix, and stir to combine. Place beef mixture in a 8x8 inch baking dish, top with potato mixture and bake 25-30 minutes. ; name: mexican taco bake ; ingredients: ground beef, taco seasoning, whole kernel corn, tomatoes and green chilies, black beans, green pepper, red pepper, french-fried onions, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook and drain ground beef. Stir in taco seasoning, corn, black beans, tomatoes, peppers, cheese and 1 can french fried onions. Pour into 2 quart casserole dish. Bake uncovered at 400 for 20 minutes. Top with remaining french fried onions. Bake uncovered for about 1 minute until onions are golden brown. ; name: cheap easy taco bake ; ingredients: ground beef, taco seasoning, baking mix, refried beans, green chilies, water, salsa, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Prepare the ground beef and taco seasoning mix according to package directions. While meat is browning, mix baking mix, beans, green chilies and water. Spread bean mixture in the bottom of a 2-quart casserole dish. Top with meat, salsa, then cheese. Bake for 25 minutes. ; name: slow cooked carnitas tacos ; ingredients: country-style pork ribs, salt, ground black pepper, dried oregano, onion, avocado, fresh cilantro stem, red bell pepper, corn tortilla, tomatillo salsa ; preparation:Toss pork in bowl of slow cooker with salt, black pepper, and dried oregano to coat. Placed onion atop pork. Cover slow cooker and cook pork on low setting until meat is very tender and falling apart, about 6 hours. Using slotted spoon, transfer pork to cutting board. Discard onion pieces. Using fingers or fork, shred pork. Transfer carnitas to platter. Place avocado slices, cilantro sprigs, and sliced red bell pepper, if desired, alongside. Wrap corn tortillas in damp kitchen towel. Microwave until warm, about one minute. Serve carnitas with warm tortillas and tomatillo salsa. ; name: easy taco casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, salsa, taco seasoning, salad dressing, nacho cheese flavored tortilla chips, colby-monterey jack cheese, tomatoes, lettuce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Brown ground beef. Drain. Mix ground beef with salsa, taco seasoning, and salad dressing. Mix well. In a 2-quart baking dish, layer half of the meat mixture, 1 cup of cheese and 1 cup of the tortilla chips. Repeat the layers. Bake, covered, for 30-40 minutes or until heated through and bubbly. Take off cover the last 10 minutes of baking. Top with lettuce and tomato before serving. ; name: bean chicken baked taco filling ; ingredients: refried beans, taco seasoning mix, monterey jack cheese, cheddar cheese, black beans, grilled chicken breasts, green onions, black olives, salsa, corn tortillas ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix taco seasoning and refried beans together. Put all the ingredients in a greased baking pan. Stir slightly and bake for 25 to 30 minutes. Serve with flour and corn tortillas and all the sides you want. Cook time does not include grilling chicken. ; name: low carb taco potatoes ; ingredients: aluminum foil, onion, red potatoes, taco seasoning, olive oil, mexican blend cheese ; preparation:

name: breakfast oatmeal ; ingredients: rolled oats, water, banana, peach, raisins, flax seeds, rice milk, cinnamon ; preparation:Put the water and rolled oats in a pot and set on high. Bring to a boil, then stir, turn the heat to the lowest setting, and cook until thickened. Meanwhile, dice up the banana and peach. Put the banana, peach, and raisins in the pot and stir. Add cinnamon and flaxseed to taste. Splash of rice milk to taste. ; name: crunchy baked bananas ; ingredients: bananas, orange juice, honey, sultanas, walnuts, cinnamon, yoghurt ; preparation:Slice bananas in half lengthways. Place in baking dish. Cut side up. Pour over juice, drizzle honey. Sprinkle on nuts, cinnamon and sultanas. Bake 200 c for 15 minutes. Serve with yoghurt. ; name: oat crunchies ; ingredients: butter, golden syrup, brown sugar, coconut, rolled oats, flour ; preparation:Melt butter, syrup and brown sugar in a saucepan large enough to mix all the ingredients. Mix in coconut, oats and flour until combined. Using a measuring spoon, roll tablespoonsful into balls. Place on a greased oven tray allowing room for spreading. Flatten with a spoon. Bake at 180c degrees for 10 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool on a rack. ; name: crunchy banana cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, egg, vanilla extract, banana, cinnamon, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, granola cereal ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f degrees. In large bowl, cream butter and sugar, with mixer on medium, until light and fluffy. Add the egg, vanilla, and bananas, beating until well mixed. Add the next 4 ingredients and stir until well blended. Stir in granola. Drop by spoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto greased cookie sheets. Bake for 12 minutes or until set. Remove from cookie sheets and place on wire rack to cool. ; name: banana berry oatmeal ; ingredients: nonfat milk, banana, berries, oatmeal, toasted wheat germ, honey ; preparation:In a small pan, heat milk until simmering. Add banana and berries, stir, then add oatmeal and wheat germ. Simmer for 2 minutes, stirring occasionally, until milk is absorbed. Let stand 2 minutes. Sweeten with honey. ; name: oatmeal banana muffins ; ingredients: flour, rolled oats, baking powder, baking soda, egg, white sugar, butter, mashed bananas, raisins ; preparation:Mix all together well. Place in muffin liners. This recipes is very easily doubled and tripled. You can add nuts or chocolate chips too for a change. Mix all together, place in x-large muffin liners. Bake for 20-25 minutes at 325. Makes 12 big muffins. ; name: applesauce oat crunch ; ingredients: brown sugar, flour, ground cinnamon, nutmeg, applesauce, lemon juice, old fashioned oats, sugar, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Grease an 8x8 baking dish and set aside. Combine brown sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg and applesauce. Spread in the prepared dish, and sprinkle with lemon juice. Stir together oats, sugar and butter, and spread over applesauce mixture. Bake for 30 minutes or until lightly browned. ; name: crunchy banana cinnamon oatmeal ; ingredients: oatmeal, milk, cinnamon, banana, cereal ; preparation:

name: easy beef and bean chili ; ingredients: ground beef, onions, kidney beans, chili beans, cumin, salt, celery salt, chili powder, brown sugar, tomato soup ; preparation:In a large skillet brown ground beef and onions. Break up ground beef as it cooks. When ground beef and onions are cooked. Remove from heat and drain all liquids. In a large stockpot add all ingredients, including beef and onions. Simmer on medium low heat for 30 minutes. Serve with sour cream cheddar cheese and your favorite corn bread. ; name: basic spicy chili ; ingredients: ground beef, onions, tomato juice, whole tomatoes, kidney beans, chili powder, hot sauce, baking soda, water ; preparation:In a large skillet, saute beef and onions together until beef is browned. Drain beef and add to a large soup pot. Add tomato juice and simmer over medium heat. Add tomatoes, crushing between fingers to break apart. Add kidney beans, chili powder, and optional hot sauce. After mixture comes to a simmer, add baking soda. Simmer for about 20-30 minutes, adding water if necessary to thin out the chili. Taste for seasoning. ; name: fast and easy southwest chicken chili ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic, great northern beans, chili beans, white chicken meat, green chilies, chicken broth, chili powder, cumin ; preparation:Heat oil in large saucepan over medium heat until hot. Add onions and garlic. Cook 3 to 4 minutes or until crisp tender. Stir in remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Simmer 10 minutes or until hot and slightly thickened. ; name: not hot chili ; ingredients: ground beef, chili beans, crushed tomatoes in puree, green pepper, onions, celery, garlic cloves, chili powder, cumin ; preparation:Brown beef in skillet. In another skillet, saute peppers, onion, celery and garlic. Mix veggies with beef, put into crockpot. Add beans, tomatoes, chili powder and cumin. Cook on low 6 hrs or high 4 hours. ; name: 15 minute chili ; ingredients: ground turkey, onion, pinto beans, kidney beans, stewed tomatoes, chili powder, cumin, salt, salsa ; preparation:In a large pot, brown meat with chopped onion. Drain grease, if necessary. Add beans, tomatoes, garlic, chili powder, cumin, salt and salsa to meat mixture. Cook until heated through. Serve with cornbread, cooked pasta, cooked rice, or on top of a baked potato. Sprinkle with cheese if desired. ; name: chicken chilies ; ingredients: chilies, chicken, butter, peanut oil, onion, chicken broth, nutmeg, salt, pepper, tomatoes ; preparation:Melt butter and oil and brown chicken and set aside, cover with foil to keep warm. Saut onion until soft. Add broth, nutmeg, salt, pepper and chilies-bring to a boil. Add chicken back to the pot, cover and reduce heat to a simmer until done-45 minutes or so. When chicken is done sprinkle chopped tomato on top and serve or cover with lid of pan to heat tomato through--however you would like it. Enjoy. ; name: fast simple and delicious vegetarian chili ; ingredients: onions, kidney beans, textured vegetable protein, tomato sauce, stewed tomatoes, chili powder, garlic, tabasco sauce ; preparation:Coat iron pan with nonstick spray and place on medium heat. Add onion and soy meat to pan. Once onion is brown or wilted add beans, sauce, tomatoes, and chili powder. Bring to a boil, then let simmer over med-low heat for 15 minutes to let thicken. Add garlic and stir. Add tobasco to taste. Turn off heat and let sit for 2-5 minutes. ; name: world s easiest chili ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, ground turkey, cumin seed, tomatoes, kidney beans, red chili powder, black pepper, sazon goya, salt ; preparation:

name: cheese and sour cream potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, cheddar cheese, butter, onions, salt, ground black pepper, corn flakes ; preparation:In a 4-quart dutch oven cook potatoes in enough boiling water to cover for 20 to 25 minues or until just tender. Drain. Cool slightly. Peel and coarsely shred or finely chop potatoes. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl stir together sour cream, soup, cheese, melted butter, onion, salt and pepper. Gently stir in potatoes. Transfer to greased 3-quart rectangular baking dish. Sprinkle with cornflakes. Bake, covered, for 40 minutes. Uncover, bake about 15 minutes more until golden. ; name: cheddar potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, onions, fresh chives, milk, cheddar cheese, salt ; preparation:Preheat grill. Place potatoes and onions on large square of heavy foil. Top with remaining ingredients and toss gently. Carefully seal packet with double fold. Place packet, seam side up on grill over medium heat. Cook 35 minutes or until tender, turning several times. ; name: crispy cheese topped potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, cheddar cheese, salt, corn flakes, paprika ; preparation:Mix potato slices with butter. Place slightly overlapping in foil-lined baking sheet. Sprinkle lightly with salt. Bake 375 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove from oven, sprinkle with cheese. Top with cornflake crumbs and sprinkle lightly with paprika. Return to oven and bake 25-30 minutes or until potaotes are tender. ; name: chive mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, cream cheese, milk, fresh chives, salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:Boil potatoes for 10-12 minutes or until fork-tender. Drain. Return potatoes to pan. Mash potatoes, adding cream cheese until it is blended. Stir in milk, chives, and seasonings. Heat on medium heat until just warmed through, then serve at once. ; name: crispy potato bites ; ingredients: potatoes, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, butter, olive oil, salt & pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 220c. Dice potatoes into bite size pieces. Pour olive oil& melted butter into ovenproof dish. Toss diced potatoes in oil& butter. Season to taste. Sprinkle cheese& breadcrumbs over potatoes. Toss mixture til potatoes are covered in cheese& bread crumbs. Cook in oven for approx 30 mins turning once half way thru. Secrets to success, make sure oven is hot& adding the olive oil stops the butter from burning. ; name: three cheese potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, parmesan cheese, chives, seasoning salt, pepper, butter, bacon, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the first six ingredients. Transfer to a double thickness of greased heavy-duty foil. Dot with butter. Fold foil around potatoe mixture and seal tightly. Grill, covered, over medium heat for 30-35 minutes or until potatoes are tender, turning once. Carefully open foil. Sprinkle bacon and mozzarella and cheddar cheeses over potato mixture. Grill 3-5 minutes longer or until cheese is melted. ; name: mashed white sweet potato bake ; ingredients: white potatoes, sweet potatoes, chive & onion cream cheese, sour cream, salt, black pepper, parmesan cheese, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f place white and sweet potatoes in separate bowls. Add half each of the cream cheese and sour cream to the potatoes in each bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Mash with potato masher or fork until creamy. Stir half of the parmesan into the bowl of white potato mix. Mix half of the cheddar cheese into the bowl of sweet potatoes. Alternately layer half each of the white potato mixture and sweet potato mixture in a 2 qt clear glass casserole dish. Repeat layers. Bake 15 minutes. Sprinkle with remaining cheeses and continue baking 5 minutes or until cheeses are melted. ; name: crunchy cheese potatoes ; ingredients: sour cream, milk, chives, salt, pepper, potatoes, sharp cheddar cheese, corn flakes ; preparation:

name: warm lentil salad with onion peppers and spinach ; ingredients: brown lentils, fresh parsley, red bell peppers, vegetable stock, fresh spinach, yellow onion, bay leaf, olive oil, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Heat oil in small pan and cook onion until just starting to brown. Add lentils and bay leaf. Stir to coat in oil. Add vegetable stock and stir. Bring to a boil, reduce heat, cover, and simmer 40 minutes or until liquid is absorbed and lentils are tender, but not mushy. When lentils are cooked, remove from heat and discard bay leaf. Stir in spinach and red pepper. Season to taste and serve with fresh parsley, olive oil, and balsamic vinegar. ; name: lentil salad italiano ; ingredients: lentils, water, bay leaf, oil, wine vinegar, onion, carrot, pimientos, dried basil, garlic powder ; preparation:Bring lentils, water, and bay leaf to boil in med saucepan. Reduce heat to low and simmer, covered, for 25 min or until lentils are just beginning to soften. Drain and remove bay leaf. Combine with remaining ingredients. Mix well. Chill several hrs or overnight. Stir well. ; name: green lentil salad azifa ; ingredients: green lentil, tomatoes, red onion, green chili pepper, fresh lemon juice, olive oil, prepared mustard, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Place the lentils in a saucepan, cover with water and bring to a boil. Simmer for 45 minutes until soft, drain, then turn into a bowl and mash lightly with a potato masher. Add the remaining ingredients and mix well. Adjust seasonings to taste. Chill before serving as an accompaniment to a meat or fish dish. ; name: easy warm lentil salad ; ingredients: lentils, artichoke hearts, scallions, sweet red pepper, carrot, balsamic vinaigrette ; preparation:Cook lentils according to package directions, 20-25 minute or until tender. Drain. Stir together lentils, artichokes, scallions, red pepper, and carrot in medium sized bowl. Drizzle vinagrette over top and stir until well blended. Serve immediately. ; name: spicy lentils ; ingredients: canola oil, onion, ground ginger, ground cumin, dried red lentils, water, salt, cilantro, lemon juice ; preparation:Saut onion in oil until tender. Stir in ginger and cumin, saut for 30 seconds. Add lentils, water and salt. Heat to a boil, reduce heat to low and simmer, partially covered for 15 minutes. If the lentils are soft, uncover and gently boil until most of the liquid evaporates. If the lentils are not yet tender, continue to cook, partially covered, testing every 10 minutes or so. Remove from heat and stir in cilantro and lemon juice. Serve warm with brown rice. ; name: lentils with onion and garlic ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, dried red chili, green lentil, water ; preparation:Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onion until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top. ; name: curried red lentil soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, curry powder, chicken stock, potatoes, red lentil, carrots, bay leaf, salt ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan. Add onion & garlic and saute until onion is soft, about 5-6 minutes. Add curry powder and stir fry 30 seconds to blend. Add stock, potatoes, lentils, carrots and bay leaf. Cover, and bring to boil over medium heat. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, stirring occasionally, until the lentils are tender, about 20 minutes. Remove and discard bay leaf. Season with salt to taste. ; name: fakes salata lentil salad ; ingredients: french lentils, bay leaves, olive oil, oranges, salt, fresh ground black pepper, red onion, orange ; preparation:

name: peanut butter chip chocolate cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, cocoa, baking soda, salt, peanut butter chips ; preparation:Cream butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla. Add flour, cocoa, baking soda, and salt. Mix well. Stir in peanut butter chips. Bake at 350 degrees for 8 - 10 minutes. ; name: banana chip bars ; ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, egg, vanilla, bananas, flour, baking powder, salt, milk chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Spray 9x13 pan with cooking spray. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar. Add egg and vanilla and mix well. Stir in mashed bananas. Add flour, baking powder, and salt. Mix well. Stir in chocolate chips. Pour into prepared 9x13 pan. Bake for 25 minutes. Let cool and cut into bars. ; name: chocolate chip and peanut cookies ; ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, egg, vanilla, all-purpose flour, salt, baking soda, semisweet chocolate piece, peanuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Cream butter and sugars. Add egg, vanilla, and beat until light and fluffy. Sift together flour, salt and baking soda. Stir into creamed mixture. Blend well. Add chocolate pieces and peanuts and stir by hand. Drop from teaspoon about 2 inches apart on a greased cookie sheet. Bake in 375f oven for 12 minutes. Remove from sheet immediately. ; name: favorite chocolate chip and fruit bars ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, butter, sugar, eggs, raisins, dates, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Spray an 11 x 17-inch pan with pam non stick cooking spray. Combine flour and baking soda in bowl and set aside. Cream butter with sugar. Add eggs one at a time. Alternately stir in raisins and flour mixture. Fold in remaining ingredients. Spread evenly in prepared pan. Bake for 30 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool and then cut into bars. ; name: peanut butter and milk chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, salt, butter, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, peanut butter and milk chocolate chips, nuts ; preparation:Combine flour, baking soda and salt. Beat butter, sugar, brown sugar and vanilla until creamy. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Gradually beat in flour mixture. Stir in chips and nuts. Drop by rounded tablespoon onto ungreased baking sheets. Bake at 375 degrees for 9 to 11 minutes. Cool on baking sheets for 2 minutes. Remove to wire racks to cool completely. ; name: chewy peanut butter bars ; ingredients: butter, creamy peanut butter, sugar, all-purpose flour, eggs, vanilla ; preparation:In a large saucepan, melt the butter and peanut butter. Remove from the heat. Add sugar and flour. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Spread into a greased 13-in. X 9-in x 2-in baking pan. Bake at 350 for 28-32 minutes or until lightly browned and edges start to pull away from sides of pan. ; name: golden peanut butter bars ; ingredients: flour, light brown sugar, egg, butter, peanuts, sweetened condensed milk, peanut butter, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In large mixing bowl, combine flour, brown sugar and egg. Cut in cold butter until crumbly. Stir in peanuts. Resurve 2 cups crumb mixture. Press remaining mixture on bottom of 13x9 inch baking pan. Bake 15 minutes or until lightly browned. Meanwhile, in another large mixing bowl, beat milk, peanut butter and vanilla. Spread over prepared crust. Top with reserved crumb mixture. Bake an additional 25 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool and cut. ; name: peanut butter and chocolate chip bars ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, walnuts, chocolate chips, peanut butter ; preparation:

name: quick easy enchilada casserole ; ingredients: corn tortillas, chili with beans, mozzarella cheese, onion ; preparation:In a 10 inch square casserole dish spread one can of the chili. Microwave tortillas until soft. Put 2 tablespoons mozzarella cheese on top of each tortilla and roll up. Place rolled up tortillas on top of chili in casserole. Pour the other can of chili on top of tortillas. Bake in 350 oven for 45 minutes. Serve with chopped onions on top. ; name: easiest beef enchiladas ever ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, cheddar cheese, enchilada sauce, flour tortillas ; preparation:Brown meat and onions in large skillet. Add 1 cup enchilada sauce and 1 cup cheese. Mix well. Put filling along center of each tortilla. Roll up and place seam side down in a 9x13 pan. Pour remaining sauce over. Sprinkle remaining cheese over. Bake at 350f degrees for about 30 minutes till cheese is bubbly. ; name: 1 2 3 enchiladas ; ingredients: chili without beans, corn tortillas, diced onion, ground turkey, cheddar cheese, tomato sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Warm the tortillas in the microwave for about 15-20 seconds. Cook the ground turkey, if you are adding it to the enchiladas. Put 2 spoonfuls of the turkey in the middle of each tortilla and top with shredded cheese. Roll the tortillas and place in a baking pan seam side down. Mix tomato sauce and chili. Spoon the chili mixture over the enchiladas and top with lots of shredded cheese. Bake at 350f degrees for about 10-15 minutes until cheese is nice and melted. Watch carefully as if you over cook, the tortillas will become hard. I sometimes add diced chilies on the top along with the cheese if it is for a party. ; name: easy beef enchiladas ; ingredients: ground beef, taco seasoning mix, refried beans, condensed cheddar cheese soup, onion, cooked long-grain rice, flour tortillas, enchilada sauce, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat the oven to 350f cook the beef in a 10-inch skillet over medium-high heat until well browned, stirring often to separate meat. Pour off any fat. Stir the seasoning mix, beans, soup, onion and rice, if desired, in the skillet. Divide the beef mixture among the tortillas. Roll up the tortillas and place seam-side down into a 3-quart shallow baking dish. Pour the enchilada sauce over the filled tortillas and sprinkle with the cheese. Bake for 20 minutes or until the enchiladas are hot and bubbling. ; name: easy spicy chicken enchiladas ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salsa, cheese sauce, sour cream, flour tortillas, cayenne pepper, paprika, adobo seasoning, tomato sauce, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:Boil chicken breasts in water and two packets of sasson. Sasson is a packet of mexican spices that come in an orange box. Remove and drain chicken, then let cool. Shred chicken with a fork. Add chicken, sour cream and queso to a bowl and mix together. Add mixture to tortillas and sprinkle cheese on top before rolling into small burritos. When pan is full mix the salsa, cyan pepper, paprika, adobo, and tomato sauce together and pour over the enchiladas. Top with shredded cheese. Bake at 350 degrees until top is lightly browned. ; name: skillet chicken cheese enchiladas ; ingredients: corn tortilla, cooked chicken, enchilada sauce, monterey jack and cheddar cheese blend ; preparation:Spray a large skillet with cooking spray. Heat tortillas and chicken over medium-high heat for 7 minutes. Pour sauce in skillet and stir to blend. Sprinkle with cheese and cover. Heat until cheese is melted and sauce is hot. ; name: enchilada casserole ; ingredients: refried beans, scallion, chili powder, cumin, garlic, corn tortillas, corn, green chilies, tomatoes, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Line a baking dish with 4 tortilla halves. Mix the beans with scallions, chili powder, cumin, and minced garlic. Place half the bean mixture on top of the tortilla halves. Top with 4 more tortilla halves. Spoon corn over top. Sprinkle half the cheese and all the green chilies on top. Top with the remaining tortilla halves, then bean mixture. Top with canned tomatoes and the rest of the cheese. Bake 40 minutes at 350. ; name: super easy cheese enchiladas ; ingredients: extra-sharp cheddar cheese, corn tortillas, vegetable oil, onion, enchilada sauce, chili without beans ; preparation:

name: chicken in foil ; ingredients: chicken pieces, potato, onion, cream of mushroom soup, cream, flour, salt, pepper ; preparation:Season chicken with salt and pepper. Dredge in flour. Brown in skillet. Place a piece of chicken on large square of foil. Place slice of potatoe and slice of onion on top of chicken. Pour a little mushroom soup and 1 tbs. Cream over each chicken bundle. Pull corners of foil up and twist lightly on top. You will have 4 bundles. Bake at 350 for 1 hour. ; name: camping burgers in foil ; ingredients: ground beef, aluminum foil, carrots, canned sliced potatoes, green bell peppers, dried onion flakes, worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper ; preparation:Separate meat into 4 patties. Place each patty in the center of a square of foil. Top with equal portions of sliced carrots, potatoes and peppers. Season with dehydrated onions, worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper. Seal foil. Check for leaks. Place on hot coals for 12 to 15 minutes. Turn and cook an additional 10-15 minutes. ; name: easy foil bbq potatoes ; ingredients: potato, spanish onion, butter, olive oil, salt & fresh ground pepper, aluminum foil ; preparation:Scrub potato and make 4 slits almost through to bottom. Slice onion into 4 slices to fit into slits in potato. Dot with butter or margarine. Sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Drizzle olive oil over all. Wrap tightly in foil, as if to freeze. Place package on rack in bbq and close the lid. In a hot bbq they should be done within an hour, depends on what else you are bbqing. Open packages, adjust seasoning, serve in opened foil. Repeat process for as many potatoes as needed. ; name: savory grilled potatoes in foil ; ingredients: miracle whip, garlic cloves, paprika, salt, black pepper, baking potatoes, onion ; preparation:Mix salad dressing and seasonings in bowl until well blended. Add potatoes and onion, toss to coat. Divide potato mixture evenly among 6 square pieces of foil. Seal each to form packet. Place on grill. Grill covered, 25- 30 minutes or until tender. ; name: garlicky chicken foil packets ; ingredients: aluminum foil, carrot, onion, fresh basil, mayonnaise, garlic cloves, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Cut 4 12x12 sheets of foil. Place carrots and onion in centre of foil square. Place chicken on top of vegetables. Combine basil, mayonnaise, garlic and pepper and spread on chicken. Fold foil over chicken and seal. Place on baking sheet and bake 25-30 minutes or done. ; name: foil chicken casserole for 1 ; ingredients: parmesan cheese, garlic salt, boneless skinless chicken breast half, olive oil, zucchini, red potatoes, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees- or if using grill, heat to medium high heat. Combine cheese and garlic salt. Rub chicken on both sides with olive oil, then press chicken into cheese mixture to cover both sides. Place chicken on 12-inch square aluminum foil. Place zucchini and potatoes on either side of the chicken. Drizzle remaining oil over chicken. Sprinkle vegetables with salt and pepper or your favorite seasoning. Seal foil tightly, slide it onto a cookie sheet and bake for 25 minutes. Open packet carefully and bake 5 minutes longer. ; name: foil steamed spring veggies ; ingredients: white pearl onion, baby carrots, asparagus, water, butter, bay leaf, salt, white pepper ; preparation:In a large pot of boiling water, blanch pearl onions for 2 minutes, drain. Cut off root end and gently squeeze to remove skin. In another large pot of boiling water, blanch carrots for 2 minutes, drain and rinse under cold running water, drain again. Snap tough ends from asparagus. On large piece of heavy duty foil, arrange veggies in a single layer. Sprinkle with water, dot with butter and add bay leaf, salt and pepper. Fold foil over veggies and seal. Bake in 375 oven for 20 to 30 minutes or until veggies are tender. ; name: boy scout foil dinner ; ingredients: hamburger, lipton onion soup mix, onions, red potatoes, baby carrots, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: cheddar and chive omelet ; ingredients: eggs, fresh chives, salt, fresh ground black pepper, butter, extra-sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Whisk eggs, chives, salt, and pepper together in medium bowl. Heat butter in large non-stick skillet. Pour in egg mixture and cook over medium heat until almost set, lifting sides to let uncooked egg run under. Sprinkle omelet with cheddar cheese. Run omelet under hot broiler just until cheese is melted, bubbling, and just beginning to brown. Cut into 4-6 servings and serve immediately. ; name: cheesy baked supper omelets ; ingredients: butter, red bell peppers, onion, eggs, sour cream, salt, ground black pepper, monterey jack and cheddar cheese blend ; preparation:Heat oven to 375 degrees f. Spray 12x8-inch glass baking dish with cooking spray. In 8-inch skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add bell pepper and onion. Cook 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until tender. In large bowl, beat eggs, sour cream, salt and pepper with wire whisk until well blended. Stir in bell pepper mixture and cheese. Pour into baking dish. Bake uncovered 20-25 minutes or until eggs are set. Cut omelet into squares to serve. ; name: easy oven omelette ; ingredients: butter, eggs, reduced-fat sour cream, low-fat milk, dijon mustard, scallion, swiss cheese, salt, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Brush the 1 tbsp melted butter into a square baking dish. Beat the eggs, sour cream, milk and mustard together until well blended. Stir in the scallions, swiss cheese, salt and paprika. Pour into the buttered baking dish. Bake at 325 for about 30-35 minutes or until eggs are set but still moist. ; name: oven omelette ; ingredients: eggs, milk, salt, pepper, frozen hash browns, ham, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Beat eggs in a bowl. Add milk salt and pepper. Stir in remaining ingredients till everything is moistened. Pour into greased 9x9-inch baking dish. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes or until set. Serve hot. ; name: oven baked omelet ; ingredients: eggs, milk, all-purpose flour, salt, ground pepper, cheese ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 450f. Mix eggs, milk, flour, salt and pepper until smooth. Pour half of the egg mixture into a greased 9x13-inch pan. Place cheese on top of egg. Pour the rest of the egg mixture over the filling. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until eggs begin to turn golden brown around the edges. Use a knife to loosen the omelet from the pan before slicing. If you want, sprinkle some additional cheese on top. Slice and serve. To save a step, combine most of the cheese with the egg mixture before pouring rather than putting them in the pan separately. ; name: easy baked omelets ; ingredients: egg, green pepper, tomatoes, onion, sausage, cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Spray muffin tin with non-stick cooking spray. Add one cracked egg to each tin and whisk the yolk. Add your toppings, saving the cheese for last. Bake 30 minutes or until eggs are completely cooked. Cool and serve. ; name: chili jack oven omelet ; ingredients: eggs, water, nonfat dry milk powder, salt, mexican seasoning, monterey jack cheese, green chili peppers ; preparation:Beat eggs with whisk until fluffy. Stir in water, powdered milk, salt, seasonings, cheese and peppers. Pour into a lightly buttered 9-inch pie pan. Bake at 350f for 35 minutes or until puffed and golden brown. Cut into wedges. Serve immediately. ; name: extra sharp cheddar oven omelet ; ingredients: bacon, green onions, eggs, light cream, seasoning salt, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, sweet onion ; preparation:

name: milk brownies ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, margarine, eggs, sugar, vanilla, self-rising flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. In small saucepan, melt chips and margarine over low heat, stirring until well blended. Cool slightly. In a large bowl, beat eggs with whisk until foamy and light yellow in color. Beat in sugar, vanilla, and chip mixture. Add flour, mixing well. Pour into a lightly greased 13x 9-inch pan. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until brownies pull away from pan or until set in center. Cool completely before cutting into squares. ; name: light double chocolate chip brownies ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, sugar, unsweetened applesauce, margarine, egg whites, flour, baking soda, salt, vanilla extract, nuts ; preparation:Heat 1 cup chips, sugar, applesauce and margarine in a heavy saucepan over low heat. Stir until smooth. Remove from heat and cool slightly. Stir in egg whites. Combine flour, baking soda and salt and stir into chocolate mixture. Stir in vanilla and remaining morsels and nuts. Spread into greased 13 x 9 inch pan. Bake at 375 degrees for 16- 20 minutes or until just set. Cool in pan on a wire rack and cut into bars. ; name: deep dish chocolate brownies ; ingredients: margarine, white sugar, vanilla, eggs, flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking powder, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. Spray a 9x13 glass pan. Cream margarine, sugar and vanilla in a large bowl until fluffy. Beat in eggs 1 at a time. Combine flour, cocoa, baking powder and salt in a separate bowl. Blend in flour mix a little at a time using mixer. Add chocolate chips. Spread evenly in pan and bake for 35-40 minutes. Let cool and slice into squares. ; name: dark chocolate butterscotch brownies ; ingredients: unsweetened chocolate, butter, sugar, egg whites, vanilla, flour, bittersweet chocolate chips, butterscotch chips ; preparation:Melt together butter and unsweetend chocolate in microwave, stir until smooth, then cool slightly. In a large bowl, combine sugar and chocolate mixture. Stir in egg whites and vanilla. Stir in flour. Stir in the chips. Spread into greased 13 x 9 inch pan. Bake at 350 for 25-30 minutes. Melt together chips and butter, stir until smooth. Spread over warm brownies. Cool completely before cutting. ; name: sugar brownies with chocolate chips ; ingredients: milk, french vanilla liquid coffee creamer, baking powder, butter, sugar, vanilla extract, flour, egg, chocolate chips ; preparation:Pour ingredients into a mixing bowl. Mix until slightly lumpy. Add chocolate chips. Pour onto cookie sheet and spread. Heat the oven to 400f and bake for 20-25 minutes. ; name: 1 2 way brownies ; ingredients: margarine, shortening, sugar, chocolate chips, egg, vanilla, flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking powder ; preparation:Over low heat, in small saucepan, melt the margarine, shortening, sugar, and chocolate chips. Remove from heat, add egg and vanilla. Stir in flour, cocoa powder, and baking powder. Grease an 8x8 inch pan with nonstick cooking spray and pour in batter. Bake at 325 degrees for 12-15 minutes. ; name: chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, cornstarch, salt, baking soda, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f degrees. In a large bowl, cream margarine and brown sugar together. Beat in eggs one at a time. Add vanilla. Sift dry ingredients together. Add to wet mixture. Stir in chocolate chips. Do not overmix. Drop onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes. ; name: white chocolate chip brownies ; ingredients: margarine, sugar, eggs, flour, cocoa powder, white chocolate chips ; preparation:

name: country pasta ; ingredients: yellow onion, garlic, olive oil, fresh mushrooms, tomato sauce, black olives, crushed red pepper flakes, penne pasta, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In large skillet, saute the onion and garlic in the olive oil until soft. Add the mushrooms and tomato sauce, stirring to combine. Cook about 10 minutes, or until heated thoroughly and mushrooms are softened. Add the olives and crushed red pepper, cooking for a few more minutes. In serving bowl, toss the cooked pasta with the sauce, and sprinkle with the parmesan cheese. ; name: pasta with beans basil corn ; ingredients: fresh corn, pasta, great northern beans, fresh basil, salt, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, red pepper, yellow pepper ; preparation:Cut the kernels off the uncooked cobs and set aside. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions for al dente. Add the corn kernels to the pot for the last 30 seconds. Drain pasta. And corn in a colander and transfer to a large bowl. Add the beans, basil, salt, olive oil, vinegar and peppers and gently toss. Until blended. This can be served warm or at room temperature. Sprinkle with additional. Fresh chopped basil for an extra color and flavor splash. ; name: delicious pasta bake ; ingredients: pasta, red pepper sauce, plain yogurt, canned tuna, red pepper, green pepper, red onion, black pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat the oven to gas mark 4. Add pasta to a saucepan of boiling water and allow simmer for about 9 minutes. While the pasta is cooking, chop the red onion and peppers into small pieces and then fry in a little olive oil in a large saucepan. After about 5 minutes, add the red pepper sauce and heat through for another 5 minutes. Remove the saucepan from the heat and add the yoghurt tuna and black pepper. Blend the mixture thorougly. Lay half the pasta at the bottom of a large dish, spread half the pepper mixture over the top. Repeat with the other half over the pasta and sauce, making sure the pasta is covered well. Cook in the oven for about 20 minutes. Delicious served hot with green salad and crusty bread. ; name: quick pasta pick me up ; ingredients: pasta, diced tomatoes, cannellini beans, fresh broccoli florets, mushrooms, ranch dressing, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to directions. Rinse in cool water to remove extra startch. Place tomatoes, vegetables, beans and dressing into a large skillet. Bring to boil then reduce heat to medium. Add in cooked pasta and stir into sauce. Continue to simmer for 10 more minutes or until vegetables are crisp tender. Place pasta in a serving bowl and top with grated parmesan cheese. ; name: pesto pasta ; ingredients: pasta, pesto sauce, cream, sun-dried tomatoes, feta cheese, kalamata olives ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. While pasta is cooking, combine pesto, cream and sun-dried tomatoes in a saucepan. Bring almost to a boil, then lower to a gentle simmer. Add the feta cheese and olives after 3-5 minutes. Keep sauce warm until pasta is ready. Drain pasta when it is al dente. Combine the pasta and sauce. Stir well and serve. ; name: anne marie s pasta with beans ; ingredients: olive oil, mushrooms, diced tomatoes, black beans, dry basil, salt and pepper, ziti pasta, lemon juice, parmesan cheese, scallions ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and set aside in large serving bowl. While pasta water is heating and pasta is cooking, heat oil over medium-high heat in large non-stick skillet. Add mushrooms and saute til lightly browned. Add undrained tomatoes, beans, basil, salt and pepper. Mix gently. Cover and simmer until pasta is done cooking. Pour tomato and bean mixture over pasta in serving dish. Top with scallions, lemon juice and parmesan cheese. ; name: mexican pasta vegetable bake ; ingredients: rotini pasta, salsa, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, nonfat cottage cheese, black beans, frozen corn, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Cook rotini as directed on package. Combine rotini, salsa, 1 c cheese, cottage cheese, beans, and corn. Spoon into a sprayed 13 x 9 baking pan. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Bake for 20 minutes or until heated thoroughly. Sprinkle with cilantro before serving. ; name: chef boy i be illinois ligurian pasta ; ingredients: pasta, french style green beans, potatoes, pesto sauce ; preparation:

name: macaroni pie ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, water, mozzarella cheese, eggs, tuna fish, fine salt, milk, ground mustard, paprika, capsicums ; preparation:Boil water in saucepan. Add macaroni and cook until it is a little soft. Drain and rinse. Grease 20cm pie dish and spread a layer of macaroni on it. Sprinkle flaked tuna followed by cheese and capsicum. Repeat step 2 except for the greasing part. Beat eggs with the rest of the ingredients. Drizzle it over the macaroni. Bake in pre-heated oven of 180 c for 25 minutes. ; name: macaroni pie from trinidad ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, eggs, cheese, evaporated milk, salt, white pepper ; preparation:Boil macaroni in salted water until tender and drain. Beat eggs until fluffy. Combine macaroni, eggs, cheese, milk, salt and pepper. Pour into a greased baking dish and bake at 350 degrees f. Until firm, about 30 minutes. ; name: mama s macaroni pie ; ingredients: mild cheddar cheese, elbow macaroni, eggs, butter, paprika, evaporated milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cut one block of cheese into small chunks. In a round casserole dish, mix the macaroni, eggs, butter, small chunks of cheese, and a few shakes of paprika together. Add the evaporated milk. The mixture should be thick, but not slushy. Cut the second block of cheese into strips, and place on top of the casserole. Sprinkle a little more paprika on top. Place some pieces of butter on top. Bake for 20 minutes until the top bubbles and becomes golden brown. Let it cool before cutting with a spatula into wedges, like a piece of pie. ; name: mac n cheese pie ; ingredients: macaroni & cheese dinner mix, broccoli florets, eggs, ham, monterey jack and cheddar cheese blend, cooking spray ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Spray pie plate with cooking spray. Cook pasta in boiling water until tender, adding broccoli during last 2 minutes of cooking time. Drain. Beat eggs in bowl. Stir in cheese sauce from the macaroni and cheese mix and ham until well blended. Pour mixture over pasta. Stir to combine. Place all into pie pan. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 30 minutes or until set and golden brown. ; name: crusty macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: butter, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, american cheese, elbow macaroni, cayenne, salt, whole milk ; preparation:Heat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Use one tablespoon butter to thickly grease a 9-by-13-inch baking dish. Combine grated cheeses and set aside two heaping cups for topping. In a large bowl, toss together the cooked pasta, cheeses, cayenne and salt to taste. Place mixture in prepared pan and evenly pour milk over surface. Sprinkle reserved cheese on top. Dot with remaining butter. Bake, uncovered, for 45 minutes. Raise heat to 400 degrees fahrenheit and bake 15 to 20 minutes more, until crusty on top and bottom. ; name: buttermilk macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: eggs, cheddar cheese, buttermilk, butter, salt, elbow macaroni ; preparation:In a large bowl, beat the eggs. Stir in the cheese, buttermilk, butter and salt. Add macaroni. Mix well. Pour into a greased 13 x 9 x 2 inch baking dish. Bake, uncovered at 350f for 45 to 50 minutes or until a thermometer reads 160f. ; name: macaroni cheese ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, milk, velveeta cheese, elbow macaroni ; preparation:Bring 6 cups water to boil in large pot. Add macaroni and boil 6-8 minutes. Drain. In annother pot, over medium heat, slowly melt the butter. Remove from heat. Stir flour and salt into melted butter until mixture is smooth. Slowly add milk, stirring to avoid lumps. Return pan to heat. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly until thick and bubbly. Add cheese. Cook until cheese melts. Add macaroni and stir. ; name: southern macaroni pie ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, egg, flour, salt, milk, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: ground beef vegetable soup ; ingredients: ground beef, stewed tomatoes, mixed vegetables, beef broth, ketchup, green pepper, onion ; preparation:Brown hamburger, onions and pepper. Drain off grease. Add stewed tomatoes, mixed vegetables, beef broth and ketchup. Simmer for three hours. If you like a sweeter tasting broth, add some sugar to taste. ; name: delicious vegetable beef soup ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, garlic, dried italian herb seasoning, stewed tomatoes, beef broth, frozen mixed vegetables, conchiglie, parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a soup pot or large saucepan, cook the ground beef, onion, and garlic over medium heat, stirring often, for about 8 minutes. Add the dried herb seasoning and continue to cook for 1 minute. Place the tomatoes in a blender and break them into smaller chunks and then add to the pot. Add the water-mixed beef broth or beef cube and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer, partially covered for 15 minutes so the flavors can blend. Add the vegetables and conchiglie. Simmer uncovered over medium heat until they are tender, maybe 10 minutes. Season the soup with salt and pepper and stir in the parsley. ; name: beef bean and tomato soup ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, green pepper, onion soup mix, kidney beans, tomatoes, parsley, basil, pasta, water ; preparation:Brown the ground beef in a dutch oven or heavy stock pot, season with salt and pepper. Add the chopped onion and green pepper, and saute for 5 to 10 minutes. Add the kidney beans, tomatoes, onion soup mix, parsley, basil, water. Bring to a boil, add the pasta. Reduce heat and simmer for 10- 20 minutes, until pasta is cooked. Add salt and pepper to taste. ; name: vegetable beef with rice soup ; ingredients: ground beef, oil, rice, diced tomatoes, beef broth, water, frozen mixed vegetables, salt and pepper ; preparation:Brown ground beef in oil. Stir frequently to break up large pieces. Drain off fat. Add rice, tomatoes, beef broth and water. Bring to a boil, then cover and lower to simmer for 10 minutes. Add mixed vegetables and cook 10 minutes longer. Add salt and pepper to taste. ; name: beef n onion soup ; ingredients: onions, butter, kitchen bouquet, ground beef, flour, celery salt, pepper, garlic powder, beef broth, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook onions in large saucepan over low heat in butter 30 minutes or more stirring occasionally. Add kitchen bouquet and beef. Stir to break up meat, cover and cook 15 minutes. Stir in flour and seasonings. Add beef broth and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes. Serve sprinkled with parmesan cheese. ; name: quick vegetable beef soup ; ingredients: beef stock, red potatoes, diced tomatoes, frozen mixed vegetables, roast, water ; preparation:Place 1 cup beef stock and 1 cup water in sauce pan. Add diced potato and bring to a boil. Cook until potatoes are easily pierced with a fork, about 10 minutes. While the potatoes are boiling, cook the frozen vegetables, according to the package, in the microwave. When the potatoes are tender, reduce heat to medium and add the remaining ingredients except water. Use an additional cup of stock if you desire a stronger flavored broth. Add enough water to cover the meat and veggies with broth. Stir to combine. Allow to simmer for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until heated thoroughly. ; name: spicy beef and vegetable soup ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, spaghetti sauce, beef broth, water, sugar, salt, pepper, ro-tel tomatoes, frozen mixed vegetables ; preparation:In large dutch oven over medium heat, brown beef. Add onion and garlic until tender. Add rest of ingredients. Cover and simmer until ready to eat. Serve with crackers or cornbread. ; name: ground beef soup ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, carrots, potatoes, corn, tomato paste, water, beef bouillon, garlic ; preparation:

name: red beans and rice ; ingredients: dried red kidney beans, water, onion, andouille sausage, cajun seasoning, garlic powder, salt ; preparation:Rinse and clean beans good. Put into a large soup pot. Add water. Slice onion and sausage into beans. Add cajun seasoning and garlic powder. Bring to a boil and let boil 15 minutes. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 2-3 hours, until beans are tender. Salt to taste. Serve over hot cooked rice. ; name: coconut red beans and rice ; ingredients: dried red beans, onion, garlic cloves, dried red chili, coconut milk, chicken broth, long-grain white rice, salt ; preparation:Pick and debris from beans then rinse and drain them. In a 6 quart pot combine beans, onion, garlic, chili, coconut milk, and broth. Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer, covered, until beans are almost completely soft when pressed, 75-90 minutes. Stir in rice, cover and cook over low heat until rice is tender and most of the liquid is absorbed, about 30 minutes. Discard chili. Add salt to taste. ; name: mexican red beans and rice ; ingredients: brown rice, olive oil, onions, chili powder, red kidney beans, salsa, hot water, sour cream ; preparation:Cook rice according to package directions. To prepare the beans, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add onions and saute until tender. Sprinkle on chili powder and cook 1 minute, stirring frequently. Add beans, salsa, and water and cook about 5 minutes. Serve beans over rice, with sour cream on top. ; name: new orleans red beans rice ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, green bell pepper, garlic cloves, ham steak, red kidney beans, old bay seasoning, low sodium chicken broth ; preparation:Heat oil in skillet. Add onion, bell pepper, and garlic. Cook until tender. Add ham and cook about 4-5 minutes. Add beans, seasoning and broth. Continue to cook over a low heat for about 10 minutes. Serve over prepared rice. ; name: rice and peas beans ; ingredients: canola oil, onion, fresh ginger, long-grain white rice, kidney beans, scotch bonnet pepper, unsweetened coconut milk, water, kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper, scallions ; preparation:In a large saucepan, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the onion and ginger and cook over med. Heat, stirring, until softened, about 5 minutes. Add the rice and cook, stirring, until coated with the oil. Stir in the kidney beans and scotch bonnet, then stir in the coconut milk and water. Season with salt and pepper and bring to a boil. Cover and cook over low heat until the rice is tender and the liquid is absorbed, 18 minutes. Remove the rice from the heat and let stand, covered, for 5 minutes. Fluff with a fork. Stir in the scallions and season with salt and pepper. Discard the scotch bonnet and serve. ; name: super easy red beans and rice ; ingredients: smoked link sausage, onion, green pepper, garlic clove, kidney beans, whole tomatoes, dried oregano, black pepper, cooked rice ; preparation:Cook sausage 5-8 minutes over low heat. Add onion, green pepper, and garlic. Cook until tender. Drain. Add beans, tomatoes, and seasonings. Simmer uncovered 20 minutes. Serve over rice. ; name: red kidney bean dip ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, kidney beans, tomato paste, ground cumin, ground coriander, ground cinnamon, salt & freshly ground black pepper, lime, juice and zest of ; preparation:Heat the oil and cook the onion and garlic until soft and golden. Add the kidney beans and their liquid and stir in the tomato paste and spices and cook for a few minutes. Add the lime juice to the kidney bean mixture. Take the pan off the heat and when it has cooled a little, process the mixture until it is a bumpy puree. When it is cool, arrange in small bowls and sprinkle over the reserved lime zest. ; name: red beans rice with tvp ; ingredients: dried kidney beans, onion, fresh garlic cloves, boiling water, brown rice, textured vegetable protein, chili powder, ground cumin, sea salt ; preparation:

name: creamy spaghetti with peas and bacon ; ingredients: spaghetti, frozen peas, olive oil, onions, minced garlic clove, cooked bacon, cream cheese, milk, red pepper flakes ; preparation:Cook pasta according to directions adding peas to cooking pasta during last four minutes. Drain and rinse with hot water. While pasta is cooking, fry chopped onion, garlic and bacon pieces in olive oil over medium heat until onion is translucent. Add cream cheese and milk to onion, garlic and bacon mixture and stir until creamy and bubbling. Remove from heat. Add red pepper flakes. Stir in pasta and peas. Garnish with parmesan cheese if you like. ; name: cheesy spaghetti squash ; ingredients: spaghetti squash, parmesan cheese, reduced-fat mozzarella cheese, pimientos, fresh parsley, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Pierce the spaghetti squash several times with a fork or sharp knife to allow steam to escape. Place in microwave and cook on high 5 minutes. Turn over and continue cooking for for another 5 minutes or just until soft. Remove squash from microwave and allow to stand for 5 minutes. Cut squash in half. Remove and discard seeds. Using a fork, scrape the insides of the squash to form strands. Reserving one squash shell. Toss squash with remaining ingredients adding salt and pepper to taste. Scoop back into the reserved squash shell and serve. ; name: garden spaghetti ; ingredients: garlic cloves, green onions, canola oil, swiss chard, vegetable broth, fresh black pepper, kosher salt, spaghetti ; preparation:Heat oil on medium heat using a large skillet. Add garlic & onions. Stir-fry about 2 minutes. Add swiss chard, broth, salt and pepper and cook until greens are wilted. Stir frequently. Remove from heat & set aside. Cook spaghetti until al dente. Drain. Toss all together and serve at once. Can subsitute spinach for swiss chard. ; name: spaghetti with garlic hot pepper and parsley ; ingredients: spaghetti, virgin olive oil, garlic, hot pepper flakes, salt, chicken broth, flat leaf parsley, romano cheese ; preparation:Cook spaghetti and drain. Heat the olive oil in a heavy skillet along with the garlic, hot pepper flakes and salt. When the garlic just starts to change color add the chicken broth. Cook the broth for about 5 minutes, or until it is reduced by half. Stir in the cooked spaghetti, parsley and cheese. Toss the spaghetti until thoroughly coated. Serve hot or cold. ; name: bacon cheeseburger spaghetti ; ingredients: spaghetti, lean ground beef, onion, bacon, ketchup, dill pickle, barbecue sauce, prepared mustard, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook spaghetti according to package directions. Meanwhile, in a large skillet, cook beef and onion over medium heat until meat is no longer pink. Drain. Stir in the bacon, ketchup, pickles, barbecue sauce and mustard. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes. Drain spaghetti. Stir into meat mixture. Sprinkle with cheese. Remove from the heat. Cover and let stand until cheese is melted. ; name: spaghetti with fresh tomato and basil sauce ; ingredients: spaghetti, butter, garlic cloves, tomatoes, fresh basil leaf, balsamic vinegar, parmesan cheese, hot pepper flakes, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook pasta according to directions. Melt butter over medium high heat until foamy. Add garlic and cook and stir for 2 minutes. Stir in tomatoes and bring mixture to a boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in basil and vinegar. Add salt and pepper to taste. Drain pasta and return to pot. Pour tomato mixture mixture over pasta. Toss to combine. Sprinkle with parmesan and hot pepper flakes, if desired. Enjoy. ; name: cheddar chicken spaghetti ; ingredients: spaghetti, cooked chicken, sharp cheddar cheese, condensed cream of chicken soup, milk, parsley flakes, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cook spaghetti according to package directions. Meanwhile, in a bowl, combine the chicken, 1 cup cheese, soup, milk, parsley, salt and pepper. Drain spaghetti, add to the chicken mixture and toss to coat. Transfer to a greased 13 x 9 x 2 baking dish and sprinkle with the remaining cheese. Bake, uncovered at 350 for 20-25 minutes or until heated through. ; name: cheesy spaghetti with bacon and peas ; ingredients: spaghetti, frozen peas, olive oil, onion, bacon, garlic cloves, ricotta cheese, light cream, parmesan cheese, flat leaf parsley ; preparation:

name: honey mustard roasted chicken ; ingredients: potato, chicken, carrots, olive oil, honey, mustard, rosemary, garlic, salt and pepper ; preparation:Toss potatoes and carrols with oil, salt and pepper in a shallow baking dish. Place peeled garlic cloves among the veggies. Sprinkle rosemary over veggies. Place chicken on top of veggies. Bake uncovered in oven at 425 degrees for 30 minutes.
