Stir in the sugar substitute. Add in the instant pudding, and mix well. Stir out the lumps either by hand or place in blender. It is important that all lump are out and batter is smooth. Pour in pie crust and refrigerate for an hour or until firm. ; name: low calorie cheesecake ; ingredients: crushed pineapple with juice, orange juice, sugar, orange zest, unflavored gelatin, eggs, vanilla extract, neufchatel cheese, 9 inch pie shell ; preparation:

name: just like the restaurant crab rangoon ; ingredients: cream cheese, soy sauce, garlic powder, green onions, crabmeat, wonton wrappers, oil ; preparation:Cream the cheese, soy sauce, garlic powder, and green onions. Stir in crab meat. Place 1 teaspoon filling just below center of each won ton wrapper. Roll up wrapper, leaving top half unrolled. Moisten the right and left corners with water. Bring them over filling and press firmly to seal. Fry a few at a time in oil heated to 375 degrees 2-3 mins., or until golden brown. Drain on paper towel. ; name: crab puffs ; ingredients: wonton skins, cream cheese, crabmeat, breadcrumbs, sesame oil ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except wanton skins. Fill wanton squares with 1 teaspoon of mixture. Fold over making triangles. Moisten to seal the edges. Use water or egg. Fry in oil for 3 minutes or until browned and puffed. Turn once. Serve with chinese mustard. ; name: baked crab rangoon ; ingredients: crabmeat, cream cheese spread, green onion, miracle whip, wonton wrappers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f mix crabmeat, cream cheese spread, onions and dressing. Spray 12 muffin cups with cooking spray. Gently place 1 won ton wrapper in each cup, allowing edges of wrappers to extend above sides of cups. Fill evenly with crabmeat mixture. Bake 18 to 20 minute or until edges are golden brown and filling is heated through. Serve warm. Garnish with chopped green onions, if desired. ; name: crabmeat and cream cheese bake ; ingredients: cream cheese, green onion, dried dill weed, pillsbury refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, imitation crabmeat ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a medium bowl combine cream cheese, green onions and dill weed. Unroll crescent roll dough onto a greased baking sheet, being careful not to separate dough into pieces. Press dough into an 8x11 inch rectangle. Spoon crabmeat lengthwise along center of dough. Spoon cream cheese mixture over crabmeat. Fold long edges of dough over cream cheese mixture, slightly overlapping edges. Pinch edges together to seal. Place seam side down on baking sheet. Cut slits in top of dough. Bake 20 minutes. ; name: crab spread or dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, imitation crabmeat, celery, green bell pepper, garlic clove, cracker ; preparation:Microwave cream cheese on high for 30 seconds until softened. Add mayonnaise and whisk until smooth. Add crabmeat, green pepper and celery. Add pressed garlic and mix well. Cover and refrigerate 2 hours so that the flavors will blend together. Serve on crackers. ; name: crab bites ; ingredients: crabmeat, butter, kraft old english cheese spread, mayonnaise, garlic salt, seasoning salt, english muffins ; preparation:Soften butter and cheese spread at room temperature. Mix together well in mixer with seasonings. Fold in crab meat and spread on english muffin halves. Cut with a sharp knife into four sections and freeze. Flash freeze individually on a cookie sheet until frozen. Package in freezer bags and store in the freezer. Preheat oven to 400f degrees. Heat in oven 10 to 15 minutes until hot and bubbly. ; name: crabbetizers ; ingredients: cream cheese, crabmeat, green onion, garlic, egg roll wraps, egg, sweet and sour sauce ; preparation:Combine cream cheese, crabmeat, onions and garlic. Mix well. Spoon 1 tablespoon of the mixture onto center of each egg roll quarter. Brush edges of each quarter with egg. Bring opposite corners of each quarter to center. Twist top and press edges to seal. Deep fry for 2 minutes in hot oil, or until golden brown, turning over. Drain on paper towels. Serve with sweet and sour sauce, if desired. ; name: cream cheese and crab wontons ; ingredients: cream cheese, imitation crabmeat, garlic powder, pepper, onion, wonton wrappers, butter, vegetable oil, sweet and sour sauce ; preparation:

name: fat free cheesecake ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, fat-free cream cheese, sugar, flour, fat free sour cream, egg whites, vanilla extract, strawberries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spray a 9 inch pie plate with non stick vegetable spray. Add graham crumbs and shake the plate to coat the entire surface. Set aside. In a separate bowl, combine cream cheese, sugar and flour. Beat on medium speed until thoroughly mixed and creamy. Beat in sour cream, egg whites and vanilla. Pour mixture into graham crust and place in center of preheated oven. Bake 40 minutes. Remove from oven and cool on a rack. Refrigerate at least 3 hours before serving. Top with strawberries if desired. ; name: creamy banana cheesecake ; ingredients: low-fat graham cracker crust, fat free cream cheese, vanilla, splenda granular, light whipped topping, bananas, milk, instant banana pudding mix ; preparation:Combine cream cheese, vanilla and sugar and mix well. Stir in 1 cup whipped topping. Place 1 cup sliced bananas at the bottom of the piecrust. Spread cream cheese mixture over the bananas. Place remainder of bananas on top of the cream cheese mixture. Combine milk and pudding mix and stir until smooth. Add 1 cup whipped topping and mix well. Place this mixture over the bananas and chill for several hours before serving. ; name: tiny cheesecakes ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, butter, granulated sugar, vanilla extract, cream cheese, eggs ; preparation:Line tea-cake pans with paper cups. Combine graham cracker crumbs, butter, 6 tablespoons sugar, and 2 teaspoon vanilla together to make crust. Place 1 tablespoon crumb mixture in each cup, pressing down firmly. Mix together remaining ingredients to make filling in mixer or food processor. Place 2 tablespoons cream cheese mixture in each cup. Bake at 370 degrees for 8-10 minutes. Cool. Drizzle melted chocolate on top of each cheesecake, or use 1 can pie filling before serving. ; name: lynne s cheesecake ; ingredients: cream cheese, marshmallow creme, eggs, flour, graham cracker crust ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 f degrees. Beat cream cheese, marshmallow creme, eggs, and flour until smooth. Pour into graham cracker pie shell. Bake for 45 minutes or until edges are brown. Turn oven off and let cheesecake cool in oven for 1 hour. Remove to wire rack to cool. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving. ; name: strawberry no bake cheesecake bars ; ingredients: cinnamon graham cracker crumbs, butter, sugar, powdered sugar, cream cheese, strawberry jam, strawberries, cool whip ; preparation:Mix the graham cracker crumbs, melted butter or margarine and sugar together. Press firmly into a 13x9 inch pan and refridg while making the filling. Beat the cream cheese till smooth. Slowly add the powdered sugar. Add the jam and mix well. Stir in the strawberries and then fold in the cool whip. Spoon over the crust, cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours to set up enough to cut cleanly. ; name: junior s original cheesecake ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, sugar, cornstarch, cream cheese, egg, heavy cream, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Generously butter the bottom and sides of an 8-inch springform pan. Lightly coat the bottom of the pan with the graham cracker crumbs and refrigerate pan. In large bowl, combine the sugar and cornstarch. Beat in cream cheese, then beat in egg. Slowly drizzle in the heavy cream, beating constantly. Add vanilla and stir well. Pour the mixture into prepared pan and bake until top is golden, 40-45 minutes. Cool in pan on a wire rack for 3 hours. ; name: easy no bake cheesecake ; ingredients: graham cracker pie crust, cream cheese, sugar, sour cream, vanilla extract, cool whip, fresh strawberries, strawberry glaze ; preparation:Put the cream cheese in a bowl and heat for 30 secs in a microwave. Stir in sour cream, sugar, and vanilla extract. Fold in the cool whip. Cut strawberries and line the bottom of the pie crust. Then add a thin layer of strawberry glaze over the top. Then put the cheesecake mixture in the pie crust. Put in fridge until ready to serve. ; name: splenda creamy cheesecake ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, butter, splenda granular, cream cheese, fat free cream cheese, lime juice, salt, eggs ; preparation:

name: chicken and wild rice casserole ; ingredients: chicken breasts, wild rice, french style green bean, butter, onion, flour, chicken stock, cream, parmesan cheese, slivered almonds ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a buttered casserole dish, combine chicken, cooked rice and beans. In a saucepan melt butter over medium high heat. Stir in onions and cook for one minute. Stir in flour and cook for 1 minute. Whisk in chicken stock and bring to a simmer. Whisk in cream or milk and return to a simmer. When the sauce has thickened pour over the mixture in casserole dish. Sprinkle with parmesan and almonds and bake for 30 minutes. ; name: wild rice and chicken casserole ; ingredients: long grain and wild rice blend, green onion, sliced mushrooms, butter, hollandaise sauce mix, water, cooked chicken, frozen broccoli ; preparation:Prepare rice following directions. Cook onions and mushrooms in butter in a small saucepan. Add sauce mix and water. Cook, stirring, until thickened. Combine rice, chicken and broccoli in a greased 2 qt. Casserole. Spoon on sauce. Bake, covered, at 350 for 35 minutes. ; name: home style creamed corn casserole ; ingredients: cream-style corn, minute rice, egg, salt, pepper ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Mix well. Pour into greased 9 inch square baking dish. Bake uncovered at 375 degrees for 25 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. To microwave this recipe, do the same as above but cover and cook at high for 15 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. ; name: golden corn casserole ; ingredients: whole kernel corn, butter, sugar, flour, salt, evaporated milk, eggs, parsley, baking powder ; preparation:Melt butter in medium saucepan. Add sugar, mix well. Stir in flour and salt until well blended. Remove from heat. Gradually add milk and stir in eggs, blending well. Add parsley and baking powder, mixing quickly. Fold in corn. Pour into a lightly buttered 1 quart casserole. Bake at 350 degrees for 35-40 minutes. ; name: wild rice and turkey casserole ; ingredients: cooked white rice, cooked wild rice, cooked turkey breast, lowfat mozzarella cheese, fat-free evaporated milk, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, eggs, black pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Spray 11x7 inch baking dish with cooking spray. In baking dish, mix white and wild rice. Spread evenly over bottom. In a large bowl, mix turkey, cheese, milk, eggs, bell peppers and black pepper. Spoon over rice. Bake 45 to 55 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean and top is lightly browned. Sprnkle with parsley. ; name: sausage and wild rice casserole ; ingredients: wild rice, sausage links, onion, celery salt, mushrooms, water, cream of mushroom soup, salt and pepper ; preparation:Grease a 2-quart casserole dish. Soften your wild rice the night before. If using some white grain rice cook that the day you make this. Cut sausage links into bite size pieces and fry until done. Salt and pepper to taste. Mix all ingredients together and put into the casserole dish. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. ; name: wild rice with pumpkin seeds ; ingredients: pumpkin seeds, wild rice, butter, onions, carrots, celery ribs, yellow bell pepper, salt, black pepper ; preparation:In a small skillet, grill pumpkin seeds at medium heat for 8 minutes or until they begin to smell. Meanwhile, in a big casserole with boiling salted water, cook rice covered for about 1 hour or until tender and grains begin to open. Drain and set aside. In the same casserole, melt the butter at medium heat. Add onions, carrots, celery, bell pepper, salt and pepper and cook, stirring often, for 7 minutes. Add the reserved rice. Reheat. Add grilled pumpkin seeds and stir. ; name: pioneer woman fresh corn and wild rice casserole ; ingredients: cooked wild rice, fresh corn kernels, eggs, heavy cream, kosher salt, cayenne pepper, butter, milk ; preparation:

name: mixed pepper salad ; ingredients: green bell peppers, yellow bell peppers, red bell peppers, olive oil, garlic clove, pepperoncini peppers ; preparation:Preheat the broiler. Place peppers on a broiler pan and place under the broiler, turning occasionally, until the skins become blackened. Remove from the oven and place in a paper bag or cover with foil until cool enough to handle. Using a sharp knife, peel off and dispose of the charred skins. Core and seed the peppers. Cut each pepper into 8-10 long strip. Place in a bowl. In a small bowl stir together the oil and garlic. Seed and stem the pepperocinis, slice into thin rounds and stir into the oil. Pour oil mixture over the peppers, toss, cover and refrigerate until chilled. Refreshing with grilled or broiled meats. ; name: roasted red bell peppers ; ingredients: red peppers, garlic cloves, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, capers, fresh basil leaves ; preparation:Char peppers in broiler or on grill until black and blistered. Seal peppers in a baggie or container to steam for about 15 minutes. Wash peppers, removing char, remove seeds and slice in strips. Add all other ingredients. Refrigerate for 1 hour. ; name: red bell pepper couscous ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, red bell peppers, dried thyme, salt, fresh black pepper, vegetable broth, couscous ; preparation:In a small saucepan, heat oil at medium heat. Add onion, bell pepper, thyme, salt and pepper and cook, stirring often, for 5 minutes or until veggies have softened. Pour the vegetable broth in the saucepan and bring to boil. Add couscous and stir. Cover and remove from the heat. Let rest 5 minutes. Fluff with a fork. ; name: roasted bell peppers grilled ; ingredients: garlic cloves, yellow bell peppers, olive oil, red wine vinegar, salt, pepper, fresh rosemary ; preparation:Grill peppers over high heat turning as it browns about 20 minutes, or until the skins darken and blister. Remove the peppers from the grill, and place them in a paper bag. Close the bag by folding over twice. Set the peppers aside to cool. The steaming helps to loosen the skin. Place the garlic, oil, salt, pepper, rosemary and vinegar in a jar and shake the mixture. Pour into a small bowl. Take the peppers from the bag and remove the skins, stems, and seeds. If necessary, rinse the peppers to make peeling easier. Reserve any juice from inside the peppers to mix in the dressing. Toss the peppers into the dressing and serve. ; name: pepper coulis ; ingredients: red bell pepper, water, olive oil, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Rinse 1 red or yellow bell pepper. Pat dry. Set pepper in a 9-inch pie or cake pan and broil 3 to 4 inches from heat, turning as needed, until charred on all sides, about 15 minutes total. Let cool. With a small, sharp knife, remove and discard skin, stem, and seeds. Coarsely chop pepper and place in a blender or food processor. Add 1 tablespoon water and 1 teaspoon olive oil. Whirl until smooth. Add salt and cayenne to taste. If coulis is thicker than desired, thin with 1 to 2 more tablespoons water. ; name: christmas sauteed bell peppers ; ingredients: red bell peppers, green bell peppers, olive oil, garlic cloves, yellow onion, dried oregano, dried rosemary, dry red wine, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat oil in large frying pan and add the onion and garlic. Saute a few minutes until the onion begins to collapse. Add the bell peppers, oregano, and rosemary, and saute 5 minutes. Add the wine and continue cooking until the peppers are tender. Add salt and pepper to taste and parsley and toss together. ; name: sausages bell peppers ; ingredients: sausages, olive oil, onions, red peppers, green peppers, garlic cloves, tomatoes, tomato sauce, salt and pepper ; preparation:Prick sausages in several spots& simmer in a skillet of boiling salted water for 10 minutes. Drain& slice lengthwise in half. Heat olive oil in skillet, brown sausages& finish cooking, remove from skillet& keep warm. Add onions, peppers& garlic to skillet. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 10 minutes. Stir in tomatoes& cook, stirring occasionally, for another 5 minutes or until veggies are cooked to your liking. Stir in tomato sauce, return sausages to skillet, season to taste& cook for an additional 5 minutes. ; name: green bell pepper rings ; ingredients: green peppers, olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh ground black pepper, sea salt ; preparation:

name: sweet cabbage salad ; ingredients: cabbage, carrot, green bell pepper, red onion, sugar, white wine vinegar, olive oil, dry mustard, celery seed, salt ; preparation:Combine first 4 ingredients in a large bowl. Toss well. Combine sugar and remaining ingredients in a small bowl, stirring with a whisk. Pour vinegar mixture over cabbage mixture, tossing gently to combine. Cover. Chill 1 hour. ; name: thai style cabbage salad ; ingredients: fish sauce, lime, zest of, lime juice, coconut milk, vegetable oil, red chilies, garlic, shallots, cabbage ; preparation:To make the dressing, whisk the fish sauce, lime zest, lime juice, and coconut milk. Heat the oil in a wok or frying pan. Stir-fry the chiles, garlic, and shallots until the shallots are brown and crisp. Bring a saucepan of lightly salted water to a boil. Add the cabbage and blanch for about 2 minutes. Drain thoroughly, then place the cabbage in a bowl. Stir the dressing into the cabbage, toss and mix well. Sprinkle with the fried shallot mixture. Serve. ; name: spicy cabbage salad ; ingredients: fresh lemon juice, chili, extra virgin olive oil, salt & freshly ground black pepper, napa cabbage, green onions, fresh cilantro ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine lemon and oil. Slowly whisk in olive oil until emulsified, season with salt and pepper. Toss cabbage, onion, and cilantro together in another bowl. Just before serving, drizzle cabbage mixture with the dressing. Toss, season with additional salt and pepper, if needed. ; name: rotkrautsalat red cabbage salad ; ingredients: bacon, vegetable oil, sugar, salt, vinegar, pepper, red wine, caraway seed, red cabbage ; preparation:Fry bacon in medium-size fry pan until crisp. Remove and reserve bacon. Add sugar, vinegar, and wine to bacon fat. Stir and cook until sugar is dissolved. Pour this hot mixture over the cabbage. Toss with vegetable oil, salt, pepper, and caraway seeds. Sprinkle crumbled bacon over mixture. Serve at room temperature. ; name: southern cabbage salad with sweet onion and peppers ; ingredients: cabbage, bell peppers, carrot, onion, lemon, juice and zest of, apple cider vinegar, sugar, salt, fresh ground black pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Mix vegetables in a large bowl. Thoroughly combine lemon zest, lemon juice, vinegar, sugar, salt, and pepper. Whisk in oil. Fold into vegetables. Season to taste with salt. Store up to 12 hours in the refrigerator to marry flavors. Return to room temperature before serving. ; name: sweet sour red cabbage salad ; ingredients: bacon, onions, brown sugar, cornstarch, salt, vinegar, water, red cabbage ; preparation:Cook bacon until crips. Crumble. Measure 3 teaspoons of bacon fat into skillet. Stir in remaining ingredients, leaving out cabbage. Cook mixture over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is smooth and clear. Cool to room temperature. Put cabbage into salad bowl. Pour cooled dressing over it. Add crumbled bacon. Chill. ; name: lettuce and egg salad ; ingredients: red leaf lettuce, hard-boiled eggs, olive oil, fresh lemon juice, onions, dill, salt, pepper ; preparation:Clean any yellow leaves from the lettuce. Wash the lettuce very well and cut in pieces. Drain well. Chop the onion and dill. Peel the eggs and cut in medium size pieces, cutting 1 egg in round slices. Mix the lettuce, eggs, onion and dill in a glass bowl. Lay the egg slices on top. Whisk together oil and lemon juice. Drizzle over salad. Salt and pepper to taste. ; name: colorful red cabbage salad ; ingredients: red cabbage, orange bell pepper, canola oil, whole cumin seed, chili powder, celery seed, balsamic vinegar, white sugar, mayonnaise, peanuts ; preparation:

name: salmon and potato salad with lemon poppy seed dressing ; ingredients: potatoes, snow peas, smoked salmon, yellow pepper, plain yogurt, lemon juice, lemon rind, poppy seeds, spring onions, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Boil the potatoes until just tender. When potatoes are just tender add the snowpeas to saucepan and cook for just 1 minute and immediatley drain under cold running water. Allow to mix to cool. Halve the potatoes and arrange in a serving bowl with snowpeas, salmon and capsicum. Combine yoghurt, lemon juice, rind and poppy seeds, season to taste and drizzle over salad. Garnish with spring onions. ; name: pomegranate and poppy seed salad ; ingredients: romaine lettuce, red onion, pomegranate seeds, mayonnaise, sugar, milk, white vinegar, poppy seeds ; preparation:In a large bowl, mix the romaine, onion and pomegranate seeds. In a small bowl, mix the remaining ingredients until well blended. Pour over salad. Toss to coat. Serve immediately. ; name: rainwater dressing ; ingredients: sugar, salt, onions, dry mustard, minced garlic clove, cider vinegar, light olive oil, poppy seed ; preparation:In a mixing bowl, combine first 6 ingredients and beat with electric mixer for about 4 minutes to dissolve sugar. Add the oil and poppy seeds and continue beating for about 10 minutes more. Pour dressing into a pitcher or large jar. Will keep for several days in refrigerator. Just stir well to serve. ; name: grapefruit poppy seed dressing ; ingredients: honey, grapefruit peel, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, poppy seeds ; preparation:In a mixing bowl stir together the honey, grapefruit peel, grapefruit juice, salt, and nutmeg. Gradually beat in salad oil. Stir in poppy seed. Transfer to a screw-top jar. Cover and chill until serving time. Shake well before using. Serve over fruit or tossed salads. ; name: fruited spinach salad with honey mustard dressing ; ingredients: vinegar, honey, oil, poppy seed, dry mustard, fresh spinach, papayas, grapes ; preparation:In a screw top jar combine vinegar, oil, honey, poppy seed, and dry mustard cover. Shake well to mix. Combine spinach, papaya or pears, and grapes. Shake dressing again and pour over salad. Toss to coat. Serve immediately. ; name: paprika salad dressing ; ingredients: salad oil, sugar, vinegar, onions, dry mustard, paprika, celery seeds, salt, pepper ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in the top of a double boiler. Carefully cook over medium-low heat until just barely hot. Remove from heat and beat until thick. Store in refrigerator. Stir before using. ; name: green company salad dressing ; ingredients: salt, garlic clove, dry mustard, ground pepper, white wine vinegar, olive oil, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:Place salt in bowl and rub hard with the fresh garlic until the garlic disappears. Add mustard, pepper, and oil. Mix well. Add vinegar and lemon. Pour over lettuce or place in fridge. ; name: anne s poppy seed dressing for fruit salad ; ingredients: sugar, dry mustard, salt, cider vinegar, onion juice, canola oil, poppy seeds ; preparation:

name: peach pie ; ingredients: pastry for double-crust pie, brown sugar, white sugar, cornstarch, ginger, cinnamon, vanilla, peaches, lemon juice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400-degrees f. Prepare pastry or use pre-packages pastry and put bottom crust in a 9-inch pie pan. In a large skillet combine sugars, cornstarch, ginger, cinnamon and vanilla. Fold in peaches and simmer for 5 minutes or until filling thickens slightly. Remove from heat and stir in lemon juice. Spoon filling into prepared pie pan. Fit top crust on top of filling. Crimp and seal edges. Cut slits in dough on top of pie. Place pie on baking sheet and cover loosely with foil. Bake for 15 minutes, remove foil and bake for 45 more minutes or until crust is brown and filling is bubbly. ; name: fresh peach pie easy ; ingredients: pie crust, peaches, sugar, cornstarch, water, peach jell-o ; preparation:Slice peaches into baked pie crust. Boil together sugar, cornstarch and water. Add the jelly powder. Cook until thick and pour gently over sliced peaches. Chill at least 2 hours, serve with whipped cream. ; name: peach crisp pie ; ingredients: peaches, unbaked pie shells, sugar, flour, cinnamon, butter, eggs, vanilla, salt ; preparation:Place peach slices in pie shell. Combine sugar, flour and cinnamon in bowl. Cut in butter until mixture is crumbly. Spoon mixture over peaches. Combine eggs, salt and vanilla in small bowl. Pour evenly over pie. Bake at 400 for 15 minute. Reduce heat to 325 and bake 40 min moe or until set and browned. ; name: old fashioned fresh peach pie ; ingredients: pastry for double-crust pie, sugar, flour, nutmeg, fresh peaches, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Line 9-inch pie plate with pastry. Combine sugar, flour, spice and salt. Add to peaches and mix lightly. Fill pie shell with peach mixture. Dot with butter. Place top crust and crimp edges. Bake for 40-45 minutes or until done. ; name: apple peach pies ; ingredients: apple pie filling, peach slices in syrup, caster sugar, olive oil flavored cooking spray, shortcrust pastry, egg, double cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200c combine the apple, peach and 2 tablespoons of sugar in a medium bowl. Spray four 185ml capacity ramekins or ovenproof dishes with olive oil spray to lightly grease. Divide the apple mixture evenly among the prepared ramekins. Use a 9cm-diameter round pastry cutter to cut 4 discs from the pastry. Place a pastry disc on top of each ramekin and gently press the edges to seal. Use a fork to prick the pastry of each pie. Brush the pies with egg and sprinkle over the remaining sugar. Place the pies on a baking tray and bake in oven for 20-25 minutes or until the pastry is golden brown. Serve the pies immediately with cream. ; name: prize winning peach pie ; ingredients: pastry for a double-crust 9-inch pie, sugar, flour, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, salt, peaches, egg, heavy cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. On a lightly floured board, roll out bottom crust and fit into the bottom of a 9-inch pie pan. In a large bowl, combine sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg and salt. Add peaches and stir until they are coated. Spoon peaches into lined pie pan. Mix together egg and cream and pour over peaches. Roll the remaining pie pastry to cover pie and place over the peaches. Round edges to seal. Prick top of pastry to let steam escape. Bake for 15 minutes at 425, then reduce oven temperature to 350 and bake until crust is golden, about 30 minutes. Serve warm. ; name: simple peach pie ; ingredients: pastry for a double-crust 9-inch pie, fresh peaches, sugar, all-purpose flour, cinnamon, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Stir together flour, 1 cup sugar, and cinnamon and set aside. Wash, peel, and slice fresh peaches. Mix together peaches with the combined dry ingredients. Turn into pastry-lined pie pan and dot with butter. Cover with top crust, cut slits in it, seal the edges. Sprinkle top with 2 tablespoons of sugar. Cover the edges with foil to prevent over browning. Remove foil for the last 15 minutes of baking. Bake 35 to 45 minutes or until crust is brown and juice begins to bubble through the slits in the crust. Pie may be frozen for future use. ; name: southern peach pie ; ingredients: refrigerated pie crusts, sugar, cornstarch, apple pie spice, peaches ; preparation:

name: mexican chilli and cheese dip ; ingredients: fresh chili peppers, vegetable oil, red onion, monterey jack cheese, creme fraiche, double cream, tomatoes, tortilla chips ; preparation:Place the chilies in a dry frying pan over a moderate heat, turning them frequently until the skin blisters and darkens. Place the chilies in a strong plastic bag and tie the top to keep the steam inches set aside for 20 minutes, and then carefully peel off the skins. Slit the chilies and scrape out the seeds, then cut the flesh into thin strips, then cut these in half lengthways. Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the onion for 5 minutes until it starts to soften. Add the cheese, creme fraiche and cream. Stir over a low heat until the cheese melts and the mixture becomes a rich, creamy sauce. Stir in the chile strips. Peel the tomatoes by cutting a cross in the base and covering them with boiling water. Plunge them into cold water and the skin should peel off easily. Cut the tomatoes in half and scrape out the seeds. Cut the flesh into 1 cm pieces and stir them into the sauce. Serve warm with tortilla chips. ; name: chile con queso dip ; ingredients: garlic, tomatoes, butter, flour, light cream, salt, chili peppers, monterey jack cheese ; preparation:Melt cheese. Peel tomatoes and chop coarsely. In frying pan melt butter and saut garlic. Add tomatoes and peppers saut briefly. Add flour, cream and salt. Cook 2-3 minutes. Add melted cheese and mix well. Best to keep it warm while eating. ; name: hot chile cheese corn dip ; ingredients: corn, black olives, green chilies, jalapeno pepper, chopped pimiento, parmesan cheese, monterey jack cheese, mayonnaise, ground cumin ; preparation:Pre heat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl combine all ingredients until well combined. Spoon into a 1 quart glass casserole dish. Bake for 28-32 minutes until dip is hot bubbly and slightly browning on the top. Serve warm with chips. ; name: hot beef and cheese dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, sour cream, milk, dried beef, green onions, green peppers, chopped pimiento, pepper, pecans ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Combine cream cheese, sour cream and milk, blend well. Add dried beef, green onions, green pepper, pimiento and pepper, mix well. Put in oven safe dish, sprinkle with pecans. Bake 15 to 20 minutes, or until hot and bubbly. This is great served with crusty bread. ; name: chile con queso melted cheese dip ; ingredients: tortilla chips, salad oil, onion, diced green chilies, heavy cream, cheddar cheese, green bell peppers ; preparation:In a 3-4 quart pan, combine oil and onion. Cook, stirring, over medium heat until onion is soft. Add chilies and cream. Cook, stirring, until hot. Reduce heat to low and add cheese, stirring until melted. Pour into a chafing or fondue dish over a low flame or into a dish on an electric warming tray. Offer with bell pepper strips and tortilla chips. ; name: dynamite chili dip ; ingredients: chili, sour cream, sharp cheddar cheese, chopped tomato, green onion, black olives ; preparation:Place chili in a medium saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and slowly stir in sour cream and cheese. When cheese is melted, stir in tomatoes and onion. Place in a serving dish and garnish with black olive slices, if desired. Serve warm with tortilla chips. ; name: chile con queso chile cheese dip ; ingredients: onion, butter, tomatoes, green chili peppers, salt, cheddar cheese, milk, tortilla chips ; preparation:In a medium skillet, cook onion in butter until tender but not brown. Stir in tomatoes, chili peppers and salt. Simmer, uncovered for 10 minutes. Add cheese a little at a time, stirring until cheese melts. Stir in a little milk if mixture becomes too thick. Serve immediately with chips. Keep warm in a fondue pot over low heat. ; name: mexican green chile dip ; ingredients: cooked chicken, green chilies, cream of chicken soup, cream cheese, cumin, garlic, pepper, colby-monterey jack cheese ; preparation:

name: spinach and ricotta with shells ; ingredients: small shell pasta, olive oil, onion, garlic clove, baby spinach, ricotta cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta. While it is cooking, heat olive oil in a large skillet, add onion and garlic and cook until onion is softened, about 5 minutes. Add spinach and cook until wilted, 3-4 minutes. Stir spinach mixture, ricotta cheese, and parmesan cheese into warm pasta. Serve immediately with more parmesan cheese to sprinkle over the top. ; name: spinach and ricotta pasta bake ; ingredients: pasta, ricotta cheese, frozen spinach, nutmeg, crushed tomatoes, garlic salt, chili pepper flakes, dried basil, dried oregano, dried rosemary ; preparation:Tomato sauce - combine the tomatoes, garlic salt, chili flakes, basil, oregano and rosemary. Combine the cooked pasta with spinach, ricotta and nutmeg. Place the pasta in a dish and top with tomato sauce. Bake in oven at 350f for 15-20 minutes. Serve with fresh ground black pepper and parmasan. ; name: spinach ricotta frittata ; ingredients: baby spinach leaves, green onions, button mushrooms, roasted red pepper, fresh basil, butter, eggs, ricotta cheese, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Spray a non-stick 9 or 10 inch omelet pan with cooking spray. Place over medium high heat, add butter. When butter is melted add the prepared vegetables and basil. Cook stirring often just until spinach is wilted. Whisk together the eggs and ricotta cheese. Pour egg mixture over cooked vegetables, cook until almost set, lifting edges frequently to allow uncooked portions to run to bottom of pan. When almost set, reduce heat, cover and allow to cook covered for 1 to 2 minutes. Invert onto a large plate and slip back into pan to finish cooking, top with grated parmesan cheese. Cut in half and serve on warmed plates. ; name: spinach parmesan stuffed mushrooms ; ingredients: baby spinach, parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs, extra virgin olive oil, garlic powder, salt and pepper, baby portabella mushrooms ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Wilt fresh spinach on the stove top. Drain. Add wilted spinach and other ingredients into food processor, mix together until well blended,. Remove mixture with a spoon and put into a cleaned mushroom cap. Continue until no more mixture and mushroom caps. Put mushrooms onto a baking sheet that is drizzled with a little extra virgin olive oil. Bake in oven for about 6-8 minutes, until mushrooms have softened. ; name: ricotta spinach chicken stuffed pasta shells ; ingredients: jumbo pasta shells, skinless chicken breasts, spinach, ricotta cheese, cottage cheese, pasta sauce, vegetable stock, parmesan cheese, basil leaves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180f. Par-cook the pasta in boiling water for 3 minutes. Drain and cool slightly. Brush a shallow 8 cup ovenproof baking dish or ramekins, with oil. Microwave the spinach until just wilted. Then drain and chop finely, squeezing out excess liquid. Combine spinach, ricotta and cottage cheese annd spoon or pipe into the pasta shells. Combine the pasta sauce and stock and pour into the prepared dish or ramekins. Place the shells on top and scatter pieces of skinless chicken around. Sprinkle grated parmesan over all. Bake covered for about 1 hour and scatter torn basil leaves on top to serve. ; name: spinach stuffed chicken breasts ; ingredients: frozen chopped spinach, low-fat ricotta cheese, part-skim mozzarella cheese, tarragon, boneless chicken breast halves, reduced fat margarine ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Combine spinach, cheeses, and seasonings. Lift up skin of each chicken breast and divide mixture evenly among them. Be careful not to tear skins. Smooth skin over stuffing. Tuck skin edges underneath to form a neat package. Brush chicken with melted margarine. Place in 2-quart baking dish. Bake uncovered for 45-50 minutes. Remove skin before serving. ; name: spinach stuffed eggs ; ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, cream cheese, parmesan cheese, sour cream, green onions, seasoning salt, cayenne pepper, frozen chopped spinach, fresh chives ; preparation:Cut eggs in half lengthwise. Remove yolks and reserve. Blend together cream cheese, parmesan cheese, sour cream, green onions, reserved yolks, seasoned salt and pepper. Stir in spinach and mix well. Spoon or pipe into egg white halves and garnish with chives. Cover and refrigerate until firm, about 1 hour. Serve cold. ; name: spinach and ricotta pillows ; ingredients: baby spinach, low-fat ricotta cheese, parmesan cheese, cracked black pepper, wonton wrappers, cooking spray ; preparation:

name: blackened salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillets, paprika, seasoning, onion powder, ground black pepper, coarse black pepper, butter ; preparation:In a small bowl combine seasons. Mix well. Pat salmon fillets on both sides with seasoning. Heat skillet on high. Melt butter. Add salmon and cook 3-4 min on each side until blackened. ; name: blackened salmon with broccoli ; ingredients: salmon fillets, cajun seasoning, broccoli, water, olive oil, shallots, kosher salt, golden raisin, lemon ; preparation:Over medium heat heat a skillet. Coat both sides of salmon with seasoning and then place in skillet and cook for 3-5 minutes on each side or until done and blackened. In another skillet cook broccoli and water in a skillet, bring to a boil and simmer until tender. Drain. Wipe out skillet and heat oil over medium heat. Stir in shallots and salt and cook for 3-5 minutes or until softened. Stir in broccoli and raisins. Serve broccoli with salmon and lemon wedges. ; name: baked salmon fillets ; ingredients: salmon fillets, olive oil, garlic powder, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, lemon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Pour 1 tbsp of olive oil evenly in the bottom of a 9x9-inch glass baking dish. Place the fillets in the bottom of the baking dish. Pour the remaining olive oil over the fillets. Sprinkle half of the garlic over the fillets. Sprinkle the bread crumbs over the fillets. Sprinkle the cheese over the fillets. Bake for approximately 18 to 20 minutes making sure not to over bake. Squeeze the juice of a lemon quarter over each fillet. ; name: salmon fillets ; ingredients: salmon fillet, lemon, fresh dill, mayonnaise, salt, white pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Place the filets skin-side down in a baking dish. Squeeze the lemon over and lightly sprinkle with salt and white pepper, then sprinkle the dill over the filets and let set for fifteen minutes. Spread the mayonnaise evenly over the entire surface. Place on a high shelf in the oven, just under the broiler element, and bake for 10 to 15 minutes for each inch of thickness. Turn on the broiler for a few minutes, just until the mayonnaise starts to brown. ; name: balsamic glazed salmon fillets ; ingredients: salmon fillets, garlic cloves, white wine, honey, balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard, salt, ground black pepper, fresh oregano ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f line a baking sheet with aluminum foil, and spray with non-stick cooking spray. Coat a small saucepan with non-stick cooking spray. Over medium heat, cook and stir garlic until soft, about 3 minutes. Mix in white wine, honey, balsamic vinegar, mustard, and salt and pepper. Simmer, uncovered, for about 3 minutes, or until slightly thickened. Arrange salmon fillets on foil-lined baking sheet. Brush fillets with balsamic glaze, and sprinkle with oregano. Bake in preheated oven for 10 to 14 minutes, or until flesh flakes easily with a fork. Brush fillets with remaining glaze, and season with salt and pepper. Use a spatula to transfer fillets to serving platter, leaving the skin behind on the foil. ; name: seared salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillets, salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, cooking oil, lemon ; preparation:Pat salmon dry and generously season both sides with salt and pepper. Heat oil in a 12 inch nonstick skillet until hot but not smoking. Carefully add salmon filets and sear until well browned, about 4 minutes. Turn salmon over and sear other side until cooked through, about 3 to 4 minutes more. Serve with lemon wedges. ; name: salt roasted salmon ; ingredients: olive oil, salmon fillets, coarse salt, fresh ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, lemon ; preparation:Heat the oven to 400 degrees f. Heat 1 t oil in a ovenproof skillet until it just shimmers. Add the salmon skin side down and cook until the skin begins to crisp, about 2-3 minutes. Mound the salt around and over each piece, trying to get it to really make a cohesive crust on each one. Roast in oven for 5 minutes per inch of thickness. Remove the salmon from the oven and let sit for 2 minutes in the crust. Carefully brush away the salt. Transfer to a clean work surface and finish removing salt with a pastry brush. Season with a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil, fresh ground black pepper, and serve with a little lemon. The salmon will seem a little dry but will not be overcooked. This really brings out the flavor of the salmon. ; name: blackened country french salmon fillets ; ingredients: salmon fillets, french dressing, lemon, garlic, salt, paprika, capers ; preparation:

name: roasted chicken with vegetables ; ingredients: roasting chickens, olive oil, rosemary sprigs, fresh sage leaves, garlic, salt & freshly ground black pepper, lemon, potato, carrots, red bell peppers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Put chicken in a large roasting pan. Coat it with oil and rub it inside and out with rosemary, sage and garlic. Season with salt and black pepper. Place one half of lemon inside the chicken caviety and squeeze the other half over chicken. Roast 30-40 minutes, basting several times with pan juices. Add potatoes, carrots and peppers. Bake, basting chicken occasionally, 30-40 minutes longer or until juices from the thigh run clear when thigh is pierced with a fork. ; name: lemon roasted chicken ; ingredients: roasting chickens, lemons, olive oil, salt, pepper ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 180 degrees celsius. Place the lemon halves into the chicken cavity and secure the legs with kitchen string. Brush the chicken with olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Place on a wire rack in a roasting dish and cook for 65 minutes or until cooked thru and golden skinned. Stand 10 minutes after removing from the oven before serving. The lemon juice may run from the chicken- so either remove the lemons first or use a carving dish with a lip to catch the juice. ; name: portuguese style roast chicken ; ingredients: whole chickens, lemons, olive oil, garlic cloves, dried oregano, sweet paprika, cayenne pepper, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200c or 180c fan. Using kitchen scissors or poultry shears, cut down either side of the backbones of chickens and discard. Open out chickens and flatten, pressing with the heel of your hand. Rub chicken skin with cut lemon. Reserve lemons. Combine oil, garlic, oregano, paprika, cayenne and salt, and rub into skin. Arrange chickens skin side up in a large baking dish and add reserved lemons. Roast for 45 minutes, until golden brown and cooked through. Set aside to rest for 10 minutes, then carve into pieces. Drizzle with reserved pan juices to serve. ; name: perfect roast chicken ; ingredients: lemon, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, whole chickens, coarse salt, pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Heat oven to 450 degrees. Rinse and dry chicken and sprinkle with salt and pepper inside the cavity as much as you like. Place the lemon and ginger slices and garlic cloves inside the cavity. Place in a shallow roasting pan and rub on some olive oil. Season the outside with more salt and pepper. Roast 15 minutes then decrease heat to 375 degrees. Roast an additional 65 minutes. Do not open the door during this process. Remove from oven and let rest 10 minutes. ; name: low fat lemon herb roasted chicken ; ingredients: garlic, lemon, zest of, herbes de provence, salt and pepper, chicken breast halves, navel oranges, white grape juice ; preparation:Mix first four ingredients. Gently loosen skin of the chicken without removing it. Under the skin of each breast, rub the berb mixture and tuck in two pieces of orange. Place chicken in an oven proof glass dish. Pour the juice or win over it and allow to marinate for 20 minutes in the refrigerator. Roast the chicken at 400 degrees for 15 minutes, skin side down. Turn over and continue roasting for another 15 minutes. Let set for a few minutes before serving. ; name: zesty roasted chicken ; ingredients: chili powder, dried oregano, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, juice of, salt, pepper, roasting chickens, kosher salt ; preparation:Combine first 6 ingredients. Lift up the skin and slide your fingers between the breasts and skin all the way up to the legs. Pat the chili mixture on the breasts under the skin. Rub remaining mixture on the outer skin. Tuck the wings under, tie the legs together and place bird in a bed of kosher salt in a roasting pan. Roast 15 minutes at 500 degree f. Then lower the heat to 450 degees f. And cook for another 30 minutes, or until the juices run clear when pierced. Let sit 10 minutes to rest. ; name: basic roasted chicken ; ingredients: free-range chicken, lemon, garlic cloves, sea salt, cracked black pepper, canola oil, yellow onion ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Allow chicken to come to room temperature. Rinse chicken inside and out, removing giblets. Pat dry with paper towels, tie wing. Layer onions in the bottom of shallow roasting pan. Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper inside and out. Stuff lemon and garlic inside the cavity. Massage canola oil or butter on top of chicken. Roast in middle rack of oven 75-90 mins, until golden brown and internal temp is 180 or above. Let rest for 30 mins before cutting into. Shred meat with 2 forks and set aside. ; name: mini roast chicken ; ingredients: chicken breast, potato, red onion, tomatoes, lemon juice, lemon zest, olives, garlic cloves, olive oil ; preparation:

name: black beans with cumin and garlic ; ingredients: black beans, garlic, ground cumin, olive oil, chicken broth, sea salt, cilantro ; preparation:Drain and rinse black beans. In a medium saucepan, heat olive oil over medium heat and saute garlic and cumin until fragrant. Add black beans, broth and salt. Reduce heat to medium-low, stirring frequently until beans are heated through. Or, after sauteeing the garlic and cumin, you can place everything in a crockpot on low heat for a couple of hours. If desired, stir in the cilantro just prior to serving. ; name: spicy black beans ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, garlic clove, ground cumin, black beans, red pepper flakes ; preparation:In a saucepan over medium heat, add the oil, onion, and garlic. Sweat the onions for about 2 minutes. Add the cumin and beans. Stir and add the red pepper flakes. Simmer for about 5 minutes. ; name: pinto beans with bacon ; ingredients: dried pinto bean, oil, onions, bacon, garlic cloves, green serrano chilies, cumin powder, water, salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:Soak the pinto beans in water overnight in a large mixing bowl. Drain the beans and set aside. In a dutch oven or other large vessel put the oil, onions, bacon, garlic and green chilies and cook over medium or medium-high heat until the onions are transparent and the edges of the onion have very lightly browned. Stir in the cumin powder. Add the beans and 6 cups water. Increase heat to high, bring liquid to a boil, decrease heat to medium or medium-low and cook until the beans are very tender, adding more water as needed. Add salt and black pepper to taste. I like to serve these beans in ramekins. They make a nice side dish to any mexican meal. ; name: black beans and tomatoes hot and spicy ; ingredients: vegetable oil cooking spray, olive oil, garlic cloves, whole tomatoes, black beans, cayenne pepper, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Coat a large nonstick skillet with veggie spray. Add olive oil, and place over medium high heat until hot. Add garlic, saut until tender. Add chopped tomatoes, reduce heat and cook uncovered 6 minutes or until mixture is slightly thickened. Stir in beans, cayenne pepper and cilantro, cover and cook 5 minutes or until thoroughly heated. Garnish with fresh cilantro if desired. ; name: quick black beans ; ingredients: olive oil, yellow onion, ground cumin, dried oregano, hot sauce, garlic clove, black beans, salt ; preparation:Pour a bit of olive oil into a medium saucepan, and warm it over medium heat. Add the onion, increase the heat to medium-high and cook until the onion is is pale yellow, stirring occasionally. Add the cumin and oregano, and stir well. Add the hot sauce, and stir well again. Add the garlic, followed by the beans. Reduce the heat to medium-low, and cook until the beans are soft and warmed through. Add salt to taste. ; name: black bean dip n schmear ; ingredients: black beans, low-fat sour cream, lemon juice, garlic clove, cumin, red onion, cilantro ; preparation:Place beans in a medium bowl. Mash with fork until almost smooth. Add low-fat sour cream, lemon juice, garlic, and cumin. Blend well. Mix in minced onion and cilantro. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Transfer to a small bowl and let stand at least 30 minutes to enhance flavor. Can be kept refrigerated for 48 hours. ; name: quick and easy seasoned black beans ; ingredients: black beans, garlic, onion, jalapeno chiles, mexican oregano, ground cumin, extra virgin olive oil, fresh cilantro, fresh lime juice, salt and black pepper ; preparation:In saut pan heat garlic in oil on medium heat. Add onion and jalapeo as oil begins to warm. Add oregano and cumin and saut, stirring frequently, until vegetables are tender, adding a few drops of water if they begin to stick. Add contents of cans of black beans and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 20-25 minutes, to allow flavors to blend. Add chopped cilantro and lime juice and stir. Serve. ; name: bacon and black bean smash ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, bacon, onion, garlic cloves, black beans, salt and pepper, ground cumin, hot sauce, sour cream ; preparation:

name: tex mex chicken pot pie ; ingredients: chicken breasts, frozen corn, black beans, cheddar cheese, monterey jack pepper cheese, salsa, pie crusts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Mix all ingredients together except pie crusts. Line pie plate with first crust, deep dish is best. Add chicken mixture. Top with second pie crust. Cut slits into top crust. Bake for 45-50 minutes, until golden. Serve with sour cream and guacamole. ; name: tex mex pie ; ingredients: black beans, frozen corn, frozen peas, ground cumin, salt, pepper, green chilies, beer, mozzarella cheese, tortillas ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large skillet cook beans, corn, peas, chilies, cumin, cumin, salt, pepper and beer for 15 minutes over medium heat. Drain mixture. Place tortilla in the bottom of a round cake pan. Layer bean mixture, cheese, and tortillas. Top with tortilla then cheese, trim edges of tortilla to fit pan. Bake for 30 minutes until cheese is golden brown. ; name: tex mex cheeseburgers ; ingredients: egg, chunky salsa, mexican seasoning, lean ground beef, monterey jack cheese, fine breadcrumbs ; preparation:In medium sized bowl whisk egg. Add salsa and seasoning. Mix in cheese, meat and bread crumbs. Shape into 4 patties. Grill over medium heat until done- about 15 minutes. ; name: tex mex breakfast ; ingredients: smoked sausage, eggs, ranch dressing, salsa, cheddar cheese, refried beans, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a medium sized cast iron skillet, brown the sausages. Pour the beaten eggs over the browned sausage, salt and pepper the eggs, and cover. Turn heat to low and let slowly cook until the eggs are set. Break the can of refried beans into small chunks and place around on top of set eggs. Cover and let heat up for about 3 minutes. With a spatula, spread the refried beans over the eggs until even. Mix together the dressing and salsa and pour over the refried beans. Sprinkle cheese over all and put in the oven on 375 until the cheese melts. ; name: tex mex egg burritos ; ingredients: pork sausage, eggs, green chilies, picante sauce, cheddar cheese, 8-inch flour tortillas ; preparation:Brown sausage in a large skillet, stirring to crumble. Drain and return to skillet. Add eggs and chilies to sausage. Cook, stirring gently, until eggs are thickened, but still moist. Do not stir constantly. Microwave tortillas about 10 seconds each until soft. Spoon egg mixture down centers of warm tortillas. Top each with picante sauce and cheese. Fold opposite sides over filling. Serve immediately. ; name: tex mex meatloaf ; ingredients: ground beef, eggs, salt, quick oats, chunky salsa, ketchup, cumin, chili powder, bell pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. In a small bowl mix ketchup, cumin, and chilli powder. Set aside. Next, mix beef, salt, oats, salsa, and eggs. Place mixture in a large glass baking dish. Form into a loaf. Spread ketchup mixture on top of meatloaf. Bake on middle rack for 45 minutes. Remove from oven and place pepper rings on top. Return to oven and cook for 15 minutes more. Let rest for 5 minutes. Makes great sandwiches. ; name: tex mex pasta bake ; ingredients: penne, ground beef, onion, chili powder, diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, salsa, diced green chilies, cheddar cheese, tabasco sauce ; preparation:Cook penne according to directions and drain. Cook ground beef and onion in a large skillet. Drain off fat, then add chili powder, diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, salsa and chilies, and cook for about 5 minutes. Toss pasta and sauce together and spoon into a 13x9-in. Baking dish. Top with the cheese and bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes, then serve. ; name: tex mex pot pie ; ingredients: lean ground beef, red beans, salsa, prepared polenta, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: mashed yukon gold potatoes with garlic ; ingredients: yukon gold potatoes, garlic, skim milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cut potatoes into pieces. Place potatoes and garlic in a large saucepan. Bring to a boil. Cook on medium heat for 15 minutes, or until potatoes are tender. Drain, but do not discard garlic. Add remaining ingredients, and mash with a potato masher until smooth. Add additional milk if necessary. If desired, season with additional salt and pepper. ; name: creamy mashed potatoes with chives ; ingredients: yukon gold potatoes, nonfat milk, salt, light cream cheese with chives and onions ; preparation:Place potatoes in a dutch oven, and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer for 10 minutes or until tender. Drain. Return potatoes to pan. Add the milk and salt. Mash the potato mixture with a potato masher to desired consistency. Add the cheese, and stir just until blended. ; name: cheddar sage golden mashed potatoes ; ingredients: yukon gold potatoes, milk, dried sage, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large pot, bring potatoes, with enough cold water to cover, to a boil. Boil 15 minutes, or until tender. Drain potatoes. Return to pot. Add milk and sage. Mash over low heat until potatoes are smooth and creamy. Stir in cheese until melted. Mound mashed potatoes on serving plates. ; name: parmesan mashed potatoes ; ingredients: yukon gold potatoes, low-fat buttermilk, skim milk, parmesan cheese, salt, butter ; preparation:Place potatoes in a large saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and cook until tender, about 10 minutes. While potatoes are cooking, place buttermilk and milk in a small saucepan and cook over very low heat until just warm. Be careful not to boil. Drain the potatoes, add the warmed milk and mash together to desried consistency. Stir in cheese and salt. Top with butter. ; name: mashed potato skins ; ingredients: bacon, yukon gold potatoes, buttermilk, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh chives, extra-sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees f. Arrange the bacon on a sheet pan and bake for 12 to15 minutes until crisp. Cool and chop. Put potatoes in a medium sauce pot and cover with cold water. Bring the water to a boil and season with salt. Cook until tender, about 15 minutes. Drain and mash potatoes with buttermilk and season with salt and pepper. Stir in the chives, cheddar cheese and fold in bacon. ; name: goat cheese mashed potatoes ; ingredients: russet potatoes, whole milk, onion, butter, soft fresh goat cheese ; preparation:Cook potatoes in large pot of boiling salted water until tender, about 30 minutes. Meanwhile, bring milk, onion and butter to boil in small saucepan over medium-high heat. Remove from heat. Drain potatoes and return to pot. Add hot milk mixture and mash. Add goat cheese and mash until blended. Season to taste with salt and pepper. ; name: sneaky chef parmesan mashed potatoes ; ingredients: yukon gold potatoes, parmesan cheese, puree, low-fat plain yogurt, margarine, salt, fresh ground pepper, chives ; preparation:Place the potatoes in a large pot of cold, salted water and bring to a boil. Lower the heat, cover, and simmer for 25 to 35 minutes, until the potatoes are completely tender. Drain the potatoes into a colander, then return them to the pot. Add the parmesan, the white puree, the yogurt, margarine, salt, and pepper. Mash with a potato masher until well combined. Add a bit more margaine, if needed. Garnish with the chives, if using. Serve immediately, or keep the mashed potatoes hot on the stovetop in a metal bowl set over simmering water. ; name: mashed yukon gold potatoes with goat cheese and basil ; ingredients: yukon gold potatoes, soft fresh goat cheese, butter, half-and-half, fresh basil, garlic ; preparation:

name: carpetbagger steak ; ingredients: oyster, fresh mushrooms, fresh parsley, butter, bacon, blue cheese, dry white wine, rib eye ; preparation:Saut oysters, mushrooms, and parsley in the butter until the mushrooms are tender. Drain off butter. Stir in the bacon, cheese, and wine. Set aside. Make a pocket in the side of the steak. Stuff pocket with the oyster mixture. Secure with wooded picks. Broil steaks about 6 inches from heat for about 8-10 minutes on each side or until desired doneness. Top steaks with any leftover oyster stuffing. ; name: pan seared strip steaks ; ingredients: new york strip steaks, vegetable oil, salt, pepper, all-purpose flour, beef broth, shallots, dried basil, dried thyme ; preparation:Coat steaks with vegetable oil, but shaking in plastic bag. Season steaks with salt and pepper. Place steaks in hot, large skillet. Sear steaks, 3 minutes per side, then reduce heat to medium. Cook steaks until desired doneness, about 5 minutes for per side for medium. Put steaks on serving platter and keep warm. Stir flour into dripping left in pan and stir in beef broth. Stirring continuously, cook until slightly thickened. Stir in remaining ingrediets, then drizzle sauce over the steaks. ; name: new york steaks with red wine marinade ; ingredients: new york strip steaks, dry red wine, extra virgin olive oil, garlic, bay leaves, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Arrange the steaks in a shallow glass or ceramic dish. In a medium bowl, whisk together the red wine, olive oil, garlic, bay leaves, and salt and pepper to taste. Pour the mixture over the steaks and turn the steaks over to coat them with the marinade. Cover and refrigerate for at lease 1 hour or up to 4 hours to grill the steaks. Preheat the grill to medium hot or preheat the broiler. Pour off the marinade from the meat and discard. Pat the steaks dry with paper towles. Lightly brush the steaks on both sides with some olive oil. Place them directly over the hot coals and grill for 18-22 minutes for medium-rare, or until done to your taste. Turn them once and brush with additional olive oil. Ifyou are broiling, place the steaks on the rack of a broiler pan and broil 4 inches from the heat source for 8-10 minutes for medium rare, 12-14 to medium, etc. Season with salt and pepper and serve immediately on a warm platter. ; name: new york steak with garlic cheese sauce ; ingredients: new york strip steaks, vegetable oil, green onion, red wine, half-and-half cream, boursin cheese, parsley ; preparation:Sear steaks in hot oil, until cooked to your preference. Remove steaks, cover and keep warm. In same pan saute onions for 2 minutes, add wine and cook over high heat until reduced to 1 tbsp. Add half and half cream. Boil until reduced by half. Stir in boursin cheese or garlic cream cheese until thick and hot. Pour sauce over hot steaks, garnish with parsley. ; name: steak strips ; ingredients: round steaks, butter, egg, water, fine dry breadcrumb, parmesan cheese, salt, onion salt, flour ; preparation:In 400f oven melt butter in 9x13-inch pan. Mix egg and water. Mix bread cheese salt and onion salt. Dip steak in flour then egg and water then bread crumbs. Cook 15-20 minutes and then turn and cook an additional 15-20 minutes. ; name: hickory smoked new york steaks ; ingredients: new york strip steaks, chili powder, brown sugar, garlic, olive oil ; preparation:Combine chili powder, sugar and garlic in a bowl. Add olive oil and combine to paste-like consistency. Rub chili powder mixture into both sides of each steak. Heat one side of the grill and add hickory chips. When coals are hot, place steaks on grill so they are away from fire and not directly over heat. Grill for 8 minutes, turning once. Place hickory chips to the side. Or heat other side of grill, omitting hickory chips. Finish by grilling steaks for another 4 minutes each side directly over flame, without hickory chips. ; name: peppered new york strip steak ; ingredients: new york strip steaks, black peppercorns, lime pepper, kosher salt ; preparation:Place pepper corns in mortar and pestle, coarsely crush until most of the corns are broken. Cover one side of steaks with crushed pepper and press in firmly, sprinkle with lime pepper seasoning and salt. Turn steaks over and repeat the same process. Place in refrigerator for 3 hours, uncovered. Heat grill, brush grate with vegetable or olive oil and place steaks over hottest part of fire for 3 minutes, turn the steaks over for another 3 minutes. Move the steaks to a cooler part of grill and continue to cook until done to your liking. Serve with steak sauce and lots of beer. This is not as hot as it sounds. The peppers season the steaks just right. ; name: carpetbag steak ; ingredients: new york strip steaks, oysters, teriyaki sauce, olive oil ; preparation:

name: maple splurge ice cream sauce ; ingredients: maple syrup, brown sugar, water, butter, kahlua, heavy whipping cream, vanilla, pecans ; preparation:First, fill a glass with ice water and place close to stove. Combine syrup, brown sugar, water, butter and kahlua in a medium sauce pan and bring to a boil over medium high heat, stirring occasionally. Turn down heat to medium and stir constantly for 6-7 minutes while mixture boils and until it begins to get thick. Place a drop or two of the mixture into the cup of ice water and then pick it up with your fingers. It should be able to be shaped into a soft ball. Remove from heat. Cool slightly, about 5 minutes, and then whisk in the whip cream, vanilla, and pecans until they are well blended. For a thicker sauce use slightly less whipping cream. Pour into a container, a glass jar is best, and refrigerate until serving, preferably overnight. For a more boozy version, add kahlua with the whip cream, vanilla, and pecans. ; name: maple walnut brownies ; ingredients: brown sugar, butter, maple flavoring, eggs, flour, baking powder, walnuts ; preparation:In bowl, combine brown sugar, butter and maple flavoring. Beat in the eggs one at a time. Combine flour and baking powder and add to egg mixture. Stir in walnuts. Pour into greased 9 inch square baking pan. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes or until brownies test done. Cool. ; name: maple walnut pie ; ingredients: pie crust, eggs, real maple syrup, lemon juice, cinnamon, butter, pure vanilla extract, salt, walnut pieces ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Prepasre pie crust and line a pie plate. Set aside. In a large bowl combine the eggs, maple syrup, lemon juice, cinnamon, butter, vanilla and salt. Beat until well combined. Stir in nuts and bake for 30-40 minutes or until center is set. ; name: the new basics maple cranberry sauce ; ingredients: fresh cranberries, maple syrup, cranberry-raspberry juice, orange, zest of, walnut halves ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except the walnuts in a heavy saucepan and bring to a boil. Cook over medium heat for about 10 minutes until the cranberries pop open. Skim off the foam and stir in the walnuts. Allow to cool. Keep covered in the refrigerator for up to 4 days. ; name: brown sugar syrup with walnuts ; ingredients: brown sugar, granulated sugar, light corn syrup, water, unsalted butter, walnuts ; preparation:Bring sugars, corn syrup and water to boil in a saucepan. Reduce heat. Simmer until thickened, 10 to 12 minutes. Stir in butter and nuts. Cool slightly. Serve. ; name: espresso rum and walnut ice cream ; ingredients: water, sugar, instant espresso powder, cream, milk, rum, vanilla extract, walnuts ; preparation:Place water, sugar and coffee powder in pan. Stir over low heat without boiling until sugar and coffee are both dissolved. Remove from heat and cool. Combine cooled mixture, cream, milk, rum and vanilla extract. Mix well. Pour into an ice cream maker and follow manufacturers instructions. When ice cream is starting to thicken, add walnuts and continue churning until done. ; name: banana walnut syrup ; ingredients: butter, walnuts, bananas, maple syrup ; preparation:In small saucepan over medium heat, melt butter. Saute walnuts in butter until they just begin to brown. Add bananas. Stir to coat with butter mixture. Stir in syrup, reduce heat to low. Serve warm. ; name: maple walnut ice cream sauce ; ingredients: maple syrup, brown sugar, butter, water, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, walnuts ; preparation:

name: fancy fruit salad ; ingredients: watermelon, cantaloupe, honeydews, green grape, red grapes, sugar, lemon juice, lime juice, orange juice ; preparation:Combine the fruit in lg bowl. Mix sugar and juices. Pour over fruit and toss to coat well. Cover and chill. Serve with a slotted spoon. ; name: melon and green grape salad ; ingredients: cantaloupe, honeydew melon, watermelon, green seedless grape, fresh mint leaves, lime, juice of, honey, red leaf lettuce, mint sprig ; preparation:In a mixing bowl, combine the first 3 ingredients. In a small bowl, mix together the chopped mint leaves, lime juice, and honey. Pour over fruit. Toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate several hours. In a large glass serving bowl, line lettuce leaves along the bottom and sides of bowl. Spoon melon mixture into the center of bowl. Garnish with mint sprigs. ; name: sunny fruit salad ; ingredients: orange marmalade, mandarin orange segments, almond extract, kiwi fruits, peaches, strawberry, red seedless grapes, cantaloupe, honeydew melon ; preparation:Combine the orange marmalade, reserved mandarin orange syrup and almond or vanilla extract in a small bowl. Set aside. Arrange kiwi slices and mandarin orange segments around bottom and lower sides of a 1 quart glass serving bowl. Arrange the sliced peaches, strawberries, grapes and melon chunks in the bowl. Drizzle the marmalade mixture over the fruit. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate at least 30 minutes, or until ready to serve. ; name: apple pear salad ; ingredients: red apple, pear, red grapes, lemon juice, mayonnaise, honey, cinnamon ; preparation:In a medium bowl, combine all salad ingredients. Sprinkle with lemon juice and toss lightly. In a small bowl, combine all dressings ingredients and blend well. Pour over fruit, tossing lightly to coat. Refrigerate to blend flavors. ; name: fruit salad of the ancient greeks ; ingredients: honeydew melon, peaches, pears, red seedless grapes, almonds, grapes, dry red wine, honey ; preparation:Cut the melon in half and remove the flesh carefully so as to leave the rind intact allowing it to be used as a pair of bowls. Cut the removed melon flesh into 1-inch pieces. In a large bowl mix the fruit and the almonds. Divide the mixture between the two melon rinds. In a small pan mix the honey and wine and heat over a low flame stirring until the honey is dissolved. Pour the honeyed wine over the fruit in the two melon halves. Refrigerate the whole for about an hour prior to serving. ; name: fruit salad with pepper yes pepper dressing ; ingredients: mint leaves, sugar, balsamic vinegar, pepper, cornstarch, honeydew, cantaloupe, peaches, strawberries, raspberries ; preparation:In a small saucepan, combine 1 cup water, half of the mint leaves, the sugar, vinegar and pepper. Bring to a boil, then lower the heat and simmer for 5 minutes. In a small bowl, stir together the cornstarch and 4 t. Water. Stir into the saucepan and bring to a boil. Remove from the heat and let cool for 10 minutes. Strain. In a large bowl, toss the dressing with the fruit. To with remaining mint leaves. ; name: rum and honey fruit salad ; ingredients: honey, dark rum, angostura bitters, orange, golden delicious apple, pear, banana, seedless grapes, strawberry, raspberries ; preparation:Whisk honey and rum in large bowl to blend. Cut away peel and pith from orange. Working over same bowl, cut between membranes to release orange segments and juice into bowl. Mix in remaining fruit. Chill at least 30 minutes and up to 4 hours. ; name: salad with lemonade honey dressing ; ingredients: frozen lemonade concentrate, honey, poppy seed, red seedless grapes, watermelon, nectarines, pears ; preparation:

name: choc chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, caster sugar, brown sugar, egg, vanilla essence, self-rising flour, chocolate chips ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 180 celsius. Line flat oven trays with baking paper. Beat butter until soft. Add castor and brown sugars and beat until mixture is light and fluffy. Gradually add the egg and vanilla essence, beating until well combined. Sift the flour and fold into the mixture. Add the chocolate and stir well. Pinch off teaspoonfulls of the mixture and roll into small balls. Place evenly on trays, allowing for spreading. Bake for 15mins. ; name: white choc chip cookies ; ingredients: brown sugar, white sugar, butter, egg yolk, vanilla essence, self-raising flour, white chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 c. Grease or line cookie tray. Mix together sugar and butter. Add egg yolk and vanilla, mix well. Stir in flour and choc chips. Place teaspoonfuls onto tray and bake for 12 minutes. ; name: chunky chewy choc chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, caster sugar, self raising flour, plain flour, macadamias, egg, egg yolk, vanilla essence, dark chocolate ; preparation:Melt butter and cool. Meanwhile combine sugars, sifted flours and macadamias in a large bowl. Add combined butter, egg, egg yolk and essence. Mix to a soft dough. Stir in chocolate. Place level scoops of biscuit dough about 6cm apart on lightly greased oven trays. Bake in moderate oven 180 degrees for about 18 minutes or until browned lightly. Cool on trays. ; name: chewy choco chip cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, brown sugar, granulated sugar, egg, egg yolk, vanilla extract, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. Line two cookie sheets with parchment paper. Place flour, baking soda and salt in a mixing bowl. Whisk to combine. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl, beat butter and sugars, mixing until thoroughly blended. Beat in egg, egg yolk and vanilla extract. Add dry ingredients and beat at low speed with electric mixer just until combined. Stir in chocolate chips. Bake for 10 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: cafe choc chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, caster sugar, sweetened condensed milk, self raising flour, dark chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 180c grease and line a biscuit tray. Place the butter and sugar in a mixing bowl and, with an electric mixer, beat until light and creamy. Beat in the condensed milk. Add the flour and mix on low speed until smooth. Stir in the choc bits until well combined. Roll about 2 teaspoonfuls of the mixture into balls and place on the lined tray. Press each ball gently with a floured fork. Bake for 12-15 minutes or until lightly golden. Remove from the oven and allow to cool on the trays. Store in air-tight containers. ; name: oatmeal choco chip cookies ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, salt, shortening, egg, vanilla, sugar, brown sugar, oatmeal, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Combine flour, baking soda and salt. Set aside. Combine shortening, egg, vanilla and both sugars. Beat with electric mixer till creamy. Beat in the flour mixture. Stir in the oats and chocolate chips. Using a teaspoon, drop cookies 2 inches apart on lightly greased cookie sheet. Bake at 375 in a preheated oven for 8 to 10 minutes or till lightly browned. ; name: my choc chip cookies ; ingredients: plain flour, egg, bicarbonate of soda, vanilla essence, butter, chocolate chips, brown sugar, white sugar ; preparation:Set oven to 180c. Sift flour& soda together, set aside. Cream butter& sugars together until light& fluffy. Add egg& vanilla, beat well. Stir in sifted dry ingredients& choc chips, until well blended. Form into small balls& place on greased baking trays- leaving room for spreading. Bake in oven for 12- 15 minutes, until light& golden brown. Cool on a wire rack& store in an airtight container. ; name: triple choc cookies ; ingredients: plain flour, self raising flour, cocoa, brown sugar, dark chocolate, unsalted butter, eggs, milk chocolate chips, white chocolate chips ; preparation:

name: oven baked tasty country fries ; ingredients: egg whites, flour, dry breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, onion salt, cajun seasoning, paprika, pepper, potatoes, ranch salad dressing ; preparation:In a shallow bowl beat egg whites until foamy. In another shallow bowl combine the flour, bread crumbs, parmesan cheese and seasonings. Cut each potato into wedges. Dip potatoes into egg whites, then coat with crumb mixture. Place in a single layer on a baking sheet coated with non stick cooking spray. Bake uncovered at 375 for 40-45 minutes. Serve with lighthouse ranch dressing or ranch dressing of your choice & fresh parmesan cheese. ; name: oven fries ; ingredients: baking potatoes, oil, salt, ground black pepper, sugar, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f. Shake all ingredients in a plastic bag. Spread onto a baking sheet. Bake for 30 minutes or until potatoes are tender and. Completely cooked. ; name: baked cajun fries ; ingredients: potatoes, olive oil, paprika, cumin, oregano, thyme, cayenne, sea salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Lightly grease a baking sheet. In mixing bowl toss the potatoes with the olive oil to coat them. Mix the spices and salt together and toss with the potatoes until evenly covered. Arrange potatoes in a single layer on baking sheet and bake for 20 minutes. Use tongs to flip the fries and bake another 12-15 minutes. They should be golden brown. Serve with ketchup. ; name: baked chipotle sweet potato fries ; ingredients: sweet potato, olive oil, sea salt, chili, garlic powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. In a medium bowl, toss sweet potatoes with olive oil, salt, garlic powder and chipotle chile powder. Spread potatoes on a baking sheet. Avoid crowding so potatoes get crisp. Bake 15 minutes. Turn and bake an additional 10-15 minutes. Ovens may vary so keep an eye on them and be sure to cut all the potatoes the same size to ensure even cooking. ; name: diner style baked potato home fries ; ingredients: baking potatoes, onion, butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:Thoroughly wash potatoes and pierce with a fork. Microwave at baked potato setting until done. Slice potatoes as thinly as possible. Put onions and butter in large skillet on medium heat and cook until onions are translucent. Add potatoes and continue frying until the potatoes are browned around the edges. I like some of my potatoes to be on the crispy side. Season with salt and pepper. This is also a great way to use up left over baked potatoes. You could also add some chopped green pepper to the potatoes. If you are going to add green peppers, cook these with the onions before adding the potatoes. ; name: spicy oven fries ; ingredients: baking potatoes, oil, flour, onion powder, garlic powder, paprika, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Put oil in 9x13 pan, swirl around. Scrub potatoes. Cut each lengthwise into 8 wedges. Combine flour and seasonings in a bowl or baggie. Add potato wedges and shake or toss to coat. Arrange skin-side-down in oiled pan. Bake 35-40 minutes. ; name: old bay steak fries ; ingredients: baking potatoes, oil, old bay seasoning, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Coat baking sheet with cooking spray. In a large bowl, combine potato wedges with oil, seasoning, and salt. Toss to coat well. Spread potatoes in a single layer on the baking sheet. Bake without turning until tender and browned, about 40-45 minutes. ; name: skinny fries ; ingredients: baking potatoes, oil, cajun seasoning, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: artichoke and chicken bake ; ingredients: water-packed artichoke hearts, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, garlic powder, boneless skinless chicken breast halves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Spray an 11x7 inch baking dish with pam. Salt and pepper the chicken breast halves and place in the dish. In a bowl, combine the artichoke hearts, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise and garlic powder. Mix well. Spread artichoke mixture over chicken breasts. Bake, uncovered, 30-35 minutes or until chicken juices run clear. ; name: lemon chicken and rice with artichokes ; ingredients: boneless chicken breast, onions, red bell pepper, instant rice, lemon juice, salt, black pepper, chicken broth, artichoke hearts, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat dutch oven and coat with cooking spray. Add chicken, onion, and red pepper. Saute 5 minutes. Stir in rice, lemon juice, salt, black pepper and broth. Bring to a boil. Cover and reduce heat. Simmer 15 minutes until rice is tender. Stir in artichokes and cook 1 minute until throughly heated. Sprinkle with cheese. ; name: artichoke parmesan dip ; ingredients: water-packed artichoke hearts, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, salt, white pepper, parsley ; preparation:Drain the artichoke hearts. Cut them into halves. Combine mayo, cheese, garlic powder, salt, and pepper in a large bowl until thoroughly mixed together. Add artichoke hearts to this mixture. Transfer to a desired dish or bowl and garnish with parsley if desired. Refrigerate at least 1 hour before serving. Best if served cold on melba toast or crackers. ; name: artichoke heart dip ; ingredients: mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, water-packed artichoke hearts, garlic powder, paprika ; preparation:Cut artichoke hearts into small pieces. Mix all ingredients together except paprika. Put into baking dish and sprinkle paprika on top for color. Bake at 350 degrees f for 20 minutes or until bubbly. Serve with crackers or baguette thins. ; name: chicken and artichokes ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, seasoned bread crumbs, olive oil, marinated artichoke hearts, garlic cloves, roasted red pepper, black pepper ; preparation:Wash chicken and cut into 2 inch pieces. Dip in seasoned bread crumbs, frying lightly in olive oil over medium high heat. Place chicken in a 9 x 13 inch pan. Drizzle marinated artichokes over the top, including all marinade in jars.
