Arrange the cooked potatoes over this, and top with the rest of the soup mixture. Brown the pork chops on both sides in oil. Then arrange them on top of the potatoes. Sprinkle meat with salt and pepper. Cover the pan with foil and bake 45 minutes at 350 degrees. Take dish from oven, remove the foil, sprinkle onions over the top, and return the pan, uncovered, to bake another 5 minutes. ; name: pork chop cabbage potato casserole ; ingredients: pork chops, onion, salt, pepper, garlic powder, oil, cream of celery soup, milk, cabbage, potatoes ; preparation:Brown pork chops, onions, and seasonings in oil. Take chops out of pan and set aside. Add celery soup and milk to the same pan with the onions and simmer until heated through. Put one half of the sliced potatoes in a sprayed casserole pan. Place one half of the cabbage over potatoes. Pour one half of soup mixture over that. Repeat. Place browned pork chops on top. Cover and bake at 350f for 1 hour or until potatoes are tender. Remove cover last 20 minutes. ; name: pork chops dinner ; ingredients: pork loin chops, onion, vegetable oil, red potatoes, carrot, sliced mushrooms, low-fat cream of celery soup, water, salt, dried thyme ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook pork and onion in oil until meat is browned, drain. Top with potatoes, carrots, and mushrooms. Combine the soup, water, salt if desired and thyme. Pour over vegetables. Bring to a boil, reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 25-30 minutes or until vegetables are tender. ; name: onion baked pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, egg, plain breadcrumbs, dry onion soup mix ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. In small bowl, combine soup mix and bread crumbs. Dip chops in egg, then bread crumb mixture until evenly coated. Arrange in lightly greased 13 x 9 pan. Bake uncovered 20 minutes or until done, turning once. ; name: pork chops and rice ; ingredients: pork chops, rice, beef consomme, water, onion ; preparation:Place uncooked rice in bottom of a greased dish. Cover rice with sliced onion. Lay pork chops over onion and rice. Salt and pepper. Pour beef consomme and water over all. Bake in covered dish for 1 hour at 450 degrees f. I always decrease the rice it calls for because, we are not big rice eaters. ; name: pork chop onion and rice casserole ; ingredients: pork chops, oil, dry onion soup mix, frozen mixed vegetables, uncooked rice, beef broth ; preparation:

name: baked mushrooms ; ingredients: mushrooms, butter, onion, garlic clove, breadcrumbs, cream, eggs, thyme, salt ; preparation:Wash and slice mushrooms. Melt butter, saute onion and garlic. Add mushrooms, toss lightly, but do not cook. Add bread crumbs, toss again. Remove from heat. Mix eggs, cream and seasoning, and add to mushrooms. Pour into a buttered baking dish. Bake 45-60 minutes in a 350 degree oven or until set. ; name: mushroomelettes ; ingredients: mushroom, lemon juice, unsalted butter, onion, salt, parsley, eggs ; preparation:Clean and cut the mushrooms into inch dice, and sprinkle them with lemon juice. Melt 1 ounce of the butter in a small saucepan and soften the onion for several minutes without letting it brown. Stir in the mushrooms and let them stew gently for 5 minutes, covered. Season with salt and stir in the chopped parsley. Keep the mixture hot. Break the eggs into a bowl and season with a little salt. Beat briefly with a fork until well mixed but do not over-beat as this will make the omelet tough. Heat half of the remaining butter in an omelet pan. At the moment when it starts to brown, pour in half the eggs, let them fry, moving them around briskly with a fork for a minute and lifting the edges to allow the uncooked mixture to run underneath. When just set put half the mushrooms across the middle and slide the omelet onto a heated plate, folding it over to make a half-moon shape as you do so. Fry the second omelet in the same way. ; name: grilled mushroom sandwiches ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, portabella mushroom caps, french bread, mayonnaise, lettuce leaf, tomatoes ; preparation:Combine oil and garlic and brush onto mushroom slices. For charcoal grills. Grill the mushroom slices on the rack of the uncovered grill directly over medium coals for 8-10 minutes or until tender, turning once. For gas grills. Preheat the grill then reduce heat to medium. Place the mushroom slices on rack over heat, cover and grill. Spread 4 slices of bread, or bun bottoms, with mayonnaise and top with lettuce and tomato. Add mushrooms and bread or bun tops. If your grill grids are too wide, brush whole mushrooms with the oil mixture and grill, then slice before serving. ; name: garlic butter mushrooms ; ingredients: mushrooms, butter, garlic cloves, shallots, parsley, lemon, juice of, salt, pepper ; preparation:Clean mushrooms, removing stem. Combine butter, shallots, garlic and parsley in a blender or food processor. Process. Add lemon juice, salt and pepper. Blend briefly. Place mushrooms in a shallow baking dish. Fill each mushroom with a dollop of garlic butter mixture. Bake at 400 degrees for 10 to 12 minutes. ; name: garlic and mushroom burgers ; ingredients: field mushrooms, sunflower oil, gruyere, garlic clove, butter, hamburger buns, lettuce ; preparation:Heat grill to high, rub mushrooms with oil. Grill for 3 minutes each side or till cooked but still firm. Mix cheese, garlic, butter, salt and pepper together in a bowl. Spoon mixture into mushrooms. Grill until cheese melts. Place in toasted buns with salad. This could also be done in the oven. ; name: caramelized mushroom and onion dip ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onions, mushrooms, garlic, fresh parsley, salt, pepper, light sour cream, light mayonnaise, fresh chives ; preparation:In nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium heat. Add onions and cook, stirring occasionally, until softened, about 10 minutes. Reduce heat to medium-low and cook, stirring often, until evenly golden, about 30 minutes. Meanwhile, in food processor or using knife, finely chop mushrooms. Add to pan along with garlic, parsley, salt and pepper. Increase heat to medium-high. Saut until no liquid remains, 8 to 10 minutes. Scrape into bowl. Let cool. Stir in sour cream, mayonnaise and half of the chives. Transfer to serving bowl. Sprinkle with remaining chives. ; name: little grilled mushroom bites ; ingredients: mushrooms, extra virgin olive oil, sea salt & fresh black pepper, garlic cloves, fresh herbs, fresh breadcrumb, cheese, sherry wine ; preparation:Prepare a medium-hot fire in the grill with a vegetable grill in place. Remove stems from mushrooms and hollow out the caps. Brush both sides of mushroom caps with olive and sprinkle inside of caps with salt and pepper. Grill mushrooms, hollow side down, until partially cooked and set aside. Combine reserved mushroom stems and trimmings with remaining olive oil and garlic and toss to coat well. Grill, tossing frequently, until lightly cooked. Finely chop the mushroom pieces and garlic, either by hand or with a food processor. Combine in medium-sized bowl with the breadcrumbs, cheese, sherry and herbs. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Stuff into the mushroom caps, mounding up the filling and pressing with your fingers to pack tightly. Grill stuffed mushrooms, stuffing side up, until the mushrooms are completely cooked and the cheese is melted. Serve hot or warm. ; name: mushrooms for the bbq ; ingredients: oil, butter, mushrooms, garlic, chives, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: sahlab ; ingredients: cornstarch, water, milk, vanilla, sugar, cinnamon, shredded coconut ; preparation:Combine cornstarch and water in a small cup and stir to blend thoroughly. Put milk in a heavy soup pan or dutch oven over medium heat. Before milk warms, stir in cornstarch mixture. Add vanilla and sugar, tasting to achieve preferred sweetness. Raise heat. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Boil for 2 minutes, continuing to stir. Pour into dessert bowls or demitasse cups. Top with cinnamon and coconut. ; name: sa kahlua ; ingredients: water, sugar, instant coffee, vodka, vanilla ; preparation:Simmer the water, sugar and coffee for at least 2 hours. Stir occasionaly. It will be a runny syrup. Allow to cool. Add 2 cups vodka. Add vanilla. It is good now but will be better in about 2 weeks. ; name: sauerkraut candy ; ingredients: cocoa powder, evaporated milk, sauerkraut, semisweet chocolate, sugar, vanilla, miniature marshmallows ; preparation:Boil sugar, cocoa and evaporated milk to soft boil stage. Add chocolate chips and vanilla and stir till chips are melted. Beat in marshmallows and kraut. Beat till thoroughly combined. And pour into buttered pans to set. Cool and cut into squares. ; name: homemade kahlua ; ingredients: sugar, water, instant coffee powder, vanilla extract, grain alcohol ; preparation:Bring sugar and water to a boil. Stir until sugar is completely dissolved. Add coffee. Let cool to room temperature. Add vanilla and grain alcohol. Bottle and let set for at least one week, and preferably a month or longer, before serving. ; name: sweet and sour sauerkraut ; ingredients: bacon, onion, sauerkraut, diced tomatoes, brown sugar ; preparation:In a large skillet cook the bacon until crisp. Remove to paper towels and saute the onion in the drippings. Stir in the sauerkraut, tomatoes, brown sugar and the bacon. Bring to a boil. Transfer to a greased casserole dish. Bake, uncovered at 350 for 30-35 minutes or until bubbly. ; name: killer kahlua ; ingredients: water, sugar, instant coffee, pure vanilla extract, monarch 151 rum ; preparation:Bring to boil water and sugar. Remove from heat and add instant. Coffee. Bring to boil again. Remove from heat and add vanilla extract. Cool before adding rum. Put in bottles and cork. Makes about 3 fifths. ; name: thai tea ; ingredients: water, thai tea, sugar, evaporated milk ; preparation:Bring the water to a boil in a large saucepan. Add the tea and remove the pan from heat. Stir to submerge all the tea leaves in the water. Steep for about 5 minutes. Pour the brew through a coffee filter or a fine-mesh strainer into a large pitcher. Add the sugar to the hot tea and stir to dissolve. Cool to room temperature. Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve. Fill tall glasses with crushed ice. Add enough of the tea to fill the glasses to within 1 inch from the top. Then float 3 to 4 tablespoons of evaporated milk over the ice in each glass. ; name: sahlep salep sahlab ; ingredients: instant tea, sugar, cinnamon, milk ; preparation:

name: maharaja curry ; ingredients: vegetable oil, cumin seed, onions, ground turmeric, cayenne pepper, garam masala, garlic clove, ginger, chopped tomatoes, boneless chicken breast ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Stir in cumin seed and cook until they start to pop, 20 to 45 seconds. Stir in onion, and cook until golden brown, about 5 minutes. Season with turmeric, cayenne, garam masala, garlic, and ginger. Cook for 1 to 2 minutes until fragrant. Puree the mixture with the tomatoes in a blender until smooth. Return the puree to the saucepan, and add the chicken. Simmer gently until the chicken has cooked, about 20 minutes. Add water as needed while cooking to maintain desired consistency. ; name: african curry ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, bay leaf, whole canned tomatoes, curry powder, salt, roasting chickens, unsweetened coconut milk, lemon, juice of ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large, heavy skillet over medium heat. Stir in the onion, garlic, and bay leaf, and saute until onion is lightly browned. Mix tomatoes, curry powder, and salt into the skillet, and continue cooking about 5 minutes. Mix in the chicken, and cook 15 to 20 minutes, until no longer pink and juices run clear. Reduce skillet heat to low. Stirring constantly, gradually blend in the coconut milk over a period of about 10 minutes. Mix in lemon juice just before serving. ; name: basic curry ; ingredients: onions, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, tofu, curry powder, lemon, coconut milk, vegetable stock, vegetable bouillon cube ; preparation:Saute the onions for a few minutes until lightly browned. Add the garlic and ginger and fry for a few more minutes. Add the curry powder. Add the lemon juice with the stock and coconut milk. Add the tofu. Bring to the boil and then simmer gently uncovered for about 30 minutes or until the sauce has thickened. Serve over basmati rice. ; name: dry and spicy curry ; ingredients: ghee, onion, curry powder, red chili powder, cooked beef, salt, water ; preparation:Heat the ghee or oil in a pan and stir-fry the onion over moderate heat until crisp and light brown. Do not burn. Add the curry powder, chili, and the cooked meat or fish and mix well. Add the salt and water and cook for 5 minutes as a rich, brown sauce develops. Serve warm with rice. ; name: keema style curry ; ingredients: oil, green pepper, onion, salt, ground black pepper, ground cumin, garam masala, ground cinnamon, ground beef, tomatoes ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large pan and lightly fry the peppers for 1 min, remove them from the pan. Fry the onions till golden, add the salt, pepper and all of the spices, stir and fry for 2 minutes. Add the meat to the pan and cook for 15 minutes. Stir in the peppers and cook for 10 minutes. Serve with the tomatoes as a garnish. ; name: basic garam masala indian spice ; ingredients: cinnamon, bay leaves, cumin seeds, coriander seeds, green cardamom seeds, black peppercorns, cloves, ground mace ; preparation:Break the cinnamon sticks into pieces. Crumble the bay leaves. Heat a heavy frying pan and after 2-3 minutes put in the whole spices. Dry roast over a medium heat until the color darkens, stirring or shaking the pan frequently to prevent burning. Leave to cool, then grind and blend with the mace. In an airtight container, the mixture will keep for 3-4 months. To make a mild and subtle moghul masala, use only green cardamoms, cinnamon, black peppercorns, mace and a few cloves. For a hot gujerati masala, add sesame seeds, fennel seeds, ajowan seeds and chiles. For a mildish kashmiri masala, use black cumin seeds, green cardamoms, black peppercorns, cloves, cinnamon, mace, and add a little grated nutmeg. For a hot parsi dhansak masala, add fenugreek seeds, mustard seeds, chiles and ground turmeric, and double the amount of coriander seeds. ; name: african chicken curry ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, bay leaf, whole canned tomatoes, curry powder, salt, chicken, unsweetened coconut milk, lemon ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large, heavy skillet over medium heat. Stir in the onion, garlic, and bay leaf, and saute until onion is lightly browned. Mix tomatoes, curry powder, and salt into the skillet, and continue cooking about 5 minutes. Mix in the chicken, and cook 15 to 20 minutes, until no longer pink and juices run clear. Reduce skillet heat to low. Stirring constantly, gradually blend in the coconut milk over a period of about 10 minutes. Mix in lemon juice just before serving. ; name: curry massalla gravy ; ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, passata, turmeric powder, garam masala powder, green cardamom seeds, vegetable oil, water, salt ; preparation:

name: hungarian paprika potatoes paprikas krumpli ; ingredients: butter, olive oil, onion, hungarian paprika, potatoes, green pepper, tomatoes, salt and pepper, water ; preparation:In a large saucepan, melt butter and olive oil. Saut the onions for 5 minutes. Put all of the rest of the ingredients into the pot, just barely covering the potatoes with water. Bring to a boil, then reduce to a simmer. Avoid stirring as much as you can to keep the potatoes from breaking apart. Cook for 30 minutes or until tender. ; name: golden brown paprika potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, salt, butter, paprika ; preparation:Cover potatoes with water in saucepan, add salt, and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook until potatoes are done,. Drain well. Heat butter in skillet. Add potatoes and cook and turn until browned. Sprinkle with paprika and toss. ; name: fast and easy paprika potatoes ; ingredients: canned diced potatoes, butter, paprika, salt, pepper ; preparation:Melt the butter in a small frying pan. Add the spices to the butter and stir. Drain the liquid from the canned potatoes and add the potatoes to the pan. Stir with a wooden spoon to coat all the sides of the potatoes. Cook on medium heat for 5 to 7 minutes. ; name: paprika potato wedges ; ingredients: baking potatoes, vegetable oil, paprika, salt ; preparation:Heat the oven to 425. Scrub the potatoes, rinse, and pat dry. Cut each potato length ways into 8 wedges. Put the wedges in a roasting tin, drizzle over the oil and toss well to coat the potatoes. Sprinkle with the paprika and salt. Roast potatoes for 35-40 minutes, spooning the oil over them 2-3 times. Remove from oven and sprinkle with a pinch of salt. ; name: country potatoes ; ingredients: butter, vegetable oil, russet potatoes, red onion, green onions, coarse salt, fresh ground pepper, paprika ; preparation:In a large skillet over med-high heat, melt the butter with 1 tablespoon oil. Add in potatoes. Cook, stirring occasionally, about 10 minutes, until lightly browned. Decrease heat to medium. Add in red and green onions, salt, pepper, and paprika to taste. Cook until potatoes are tender, about 10 minutes. Add more oil if needed. Serve immediately. ; name: pan fried potatoes with paprika and lemon ; ingredients: olive oil, russet potatoes, onion, hungarian paprika, fresh lemon juice, italian parsley ; preparation:Heat oil in heavy large pot over high heat. Add potatoes and saute until beginning to brown, about 12 minutes. Reduce heat to medium. Add onion. Saute until onion is just tender, about 4 minutes. Mix in paprika. Cook until potatoes are tender, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes. Sprinkle potato mixture with lemon juice and parsley. Season with salt and pepper. ; name: potatoes extraodinaire ; ingredients: potatoes, cream cheese, sour cream, butter, onion salt, salt, pepper, paprika ; preparation:Cook potatoes as usual, in salted water until tender. Drain and mash well. Add cream cheese and add next 5 ingredients, beat until smooth and fluffy. Scrape into casserole. Place dabs of butter on top and sprinkle with paprika. Cover and heat in 350 degree oven until heated throughly. ; name: potatoes paprika ; ingredients: butter, shallot, hungarian paprika, tomatoes, salt and pepper, sour cream, potatoes, chicken stock ; preparation:

name: chicken burritos ; ingredients: chicken, taco seasoning mix, refried beans, flour tortillas, cheddar cheese, plum tomatoes, onion, salsa ; preparation:Remove chicken from bones, discarding skin and bones. Chop chicken. Place chicken and seasoning mix in a large zip-top bag. Seal and shake to coat. Spread beans evenly down center of tortillas. Top with chicken, cheese, tomato, and onion. Roll up burrito style. Wrap each burrito in foil. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Serve with salsa. ; name: chicken burrito bundles ; ingredients: chicken breasts, taco seasoning, refried beans, flour tortillas, cheddar cheese, roma tomatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place chicken and taco seasoning in a large zip lock bag and shake to coat chicken. Place a tortilla on flata surface and spread beans down center of tortilla. Top with chicken, cheese, onions, and tomatoes. Roll up and wrap in foil. Repeat for each tortilla. Bake packets for 15 minutes. Serve with sour cream, guacamole, and salsa. ; name: burritos simple plain easy ; ingredients: flour tortillas, fat-free refried beans, onion, green olives, kalamata olives, salsa, cheese, sour cream ; preparation:Place tortilla on microwavable plate. Spread refried beans across one end. Add onions, olives, and salsa. Grate cheese on other half of tortilla. Microwave 66 seconds on high. Top with sour cream. Fold up, and eat. ; name: cheese and bean burritos ; ingredients: flour tortillas, vegetarian refried beans, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Prepare filling by mixing refried beans, chilies, cumin and garlic together in a bowl. Spoon approximately 4 ounces bean filling into the center of each tortilla and top with about one tablespoon of cheese. Fold in ends and then sides. Place burritos seam side down on baking sheets that have been sprayed with vegetable oil spray. Bake for 2025 minutes until golden brown. ; name: enchilada casserole ; ingredients: refried beans, scallion, chili powder, cumin, garlic, corn tortillas, corn, green chilies, tomatoes, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Line a baking dish with 4 tortilla halves. Mix the beans with scallions, chili powder, cumin, and minced garlic. Place half the bean mixture on top of the tortilla halves. Top with 4 more tortilla halves. Spoon corn over top. Sprinkle half the cheese and all the green chilies on top. Top with the remaining tortilla halves, then bean mixture. Top with canned tomatoes and the rest of the cheese. Bake 40 minutes at 350. ; name: healthy breakfast burrito ; ingredients: low-carb flour tortillas, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, egg whites, frozen southern style hash brown potatoes, bacon bits, onion, garlic powder, pepper, salt, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Scramble the egg whites with a little pam. Remove. Dice onion and saute with with a little pam till golden brown. Add the hash browns, cover and cook for 10 minutes, stirring once. Add salt, pepper, garlic powder and worcestershire if using. Add the scrambled egg white, cheese and bacon. Divide filling evenly between the tortillas. Roll up and place seam size down in an empty pan and heat on medium till a little brown. Flip over and brown the other side of the tortilla. ; name: quick easy enchilada casserole ; ingredients: corn tortillas, chili with beans, mozzarella cheese, onion ; preparation:In a 10 inch square casserole dish spread one can of the chili. Microwave tortillas until soft. Put 2 tablespoons mozzarella cheese on top of each tortilla and roll up. Place rolled up tortillas on top of chili in casserole. Pour the other can of chili on top of tortillas. Bake in 350 oven for 45 minutes. Serve with chopped onions on top. ; name: lower fat burrito casserole ; ingredients: flour tortillas, refried beans, enchilada sauce, onion ; preparation:

name: broccoli made simple ; ingredients: broccoli, garlic cloves, olive oil, water, soy sauce, salt, chili powder ; preparation:Wash the broccoli. Cook in boiling water for about 10 minutes until barely tender and still brightly colored. Finely chop the garlic. Place olive oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat. Add salt, then garlic to the hot oil. Saute until garlic starts to soften and brown. Add the water, soy sauce, then pepper. Lower heat and simmer for 2 minutes. Place cooked broccoli in a bowl and pour the garlic mixture over it. Mix gently. ; name: chilli garlic broccolini ; ingredients: broccolini, olive oil, garlic cloves, red chile ; preparation:Steam or blanch broccolini for 2-3 minutes until just tender. Drain & refresh. Heat oil in large pan over medium heat. Add garlic & chilli. Cook for 1 -2 minutes until garlic just starts to colour. Add broccolini, season well with s & p, then toss to warm through. ; name: spicy broccoli pasta ; ingredients: broccoli, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, pasta ; preparation:Cook broccoli in boiling water, 3-5 minutes until just tender. Heat oil in skillet over medium heat. Add garlic. Cook over medium heat until just golden, about 2 minutes. Add drained broccoli and red pepper flakes, and cook 5 minutes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Add broccoli mixture to cooked pasta. Toss and serve. ; name: broccoli and sweet peppers ; ingredients: broccoli, sweet red pepper, yellow sweet pepper, vegetable oil, onion, fresh gingerroot, chicken stock, soy sauce ; preparation:Peel tough broccoli stems. Cut stem and florets into bite size pieces. Blanch in large pot of boiling water for 2 to 3 minutes or until bright green and tender crisp, drain, cool under cold running water and dry on paper towels. Seed peppers and cut into thin strips. In a large frypan or wok, heat oil over medium heat. Add onion and ginger, stir fry for 1 minute. Add peppers and stir fry for 2 or 3 minutes, adding chicken stock when necessary to prevent sticking or scorching. Add broccoli, stir fry until heated through, sprinkle with soy sauce. Serve immediately. ; name: broccomoli ; ingredients: broccoli, low-fat yogurt, onions, low-fat mayonnaise, lemon juice, chili powder, garlic clove ; preparation:Place all ingredients in a food processor and blend until very smooth. Chill at least a few hours before tasting. Can serve with chips, crackers, or as a veggie dip. Keeps well in fridge. Cooking time listed is for chilling time. ; name: broccoli and bell peppers ; ingredients: soy sauce, lemon juice, toasted sesame oil, broccoli florets, red sweet peppers ; preparation:For sauce, in a small bowl stir together soy sauce, lemon juice and sesame oil. Set aside. Place a steamer basket in a 12 inch skillet. Add enough water to come just below bottom of basket and bring to a boil. Place broccoli in steamer basket and reduce heat to medium low. Cover and steam for 4 minutes. Add sweet peppers. Cover and steam for 3 to 4 minutes more or until vegetables are crisp-tender. Transfer vegetables to a serving bowl. Drizzle sauce over vegetables and toss gently to coat. ; name: pan fried broccoli ; ingredients: broccoli, olive oil, garlic clove, salt, pepper, red pepper flakes ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large frying pan or wok. Cook chopped garlic in oil at medium-high heat or until light brown. Add broccoli spears to pan. Sprinkle remaining ingredients onto broccoli and toss to combine. Cover and cook for 7-10 minutes or until broccoli heads begin to darken, stirring every minute or so. If necessary, lower the heat. Sometimes i like to add a little parmesan cheese to the pan right before the broccoli goes onto the plate. ; name: chili garlic broccoli ; ingredients: broccoli, red chili pepper, garlic clove, vegetable oil, dark soy sauce ; preparation:

name: sour cream chicken paprika ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, vegetable oil, butter, onion, paprika, salt, chicken stock, sour cream, flour ; preparation:You can leave breats whole or cut them up, whatever your preference. In a large skillet, fry chicken in oil until cooked through and juices run clear. Remove chiken from skillet and set aside. Add butter and onion to skillet. Saute onion until translucent, not brown. Add paprika and salt and stir. Then add stock and bring all to a boil, reduce heat to simmer and add the sour cream mixture add reserved chiken to skillet and simmer in sauce until chiken heated throgh and sauce has thickened. ; name: baked chicken and mushrooms ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, paprika, fresh mushrooms, butter, chicken broth, green onions, garlic clove, salt, pepper, part-skim mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Arrange chicken in a baking dish coated with cooking spray. Sprinkle with paprika. Bake, uncovered, at 350 for 15 minutes. In a skillet, saute mushrooms in butter for 5 minutes. Add the broth, green onions, garlic, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Pour over chicken. Bake 10-15 minutes longer or until chicken juices run clear. Top with cheese. Bake for 3-5 minutes or until cheese is melted. ; name: breast of chicken scala ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, flour, butter, beef consomme, light sour cream, salt ; preparation:Dredge each chicken breast in flour. Melt butter in large saute pan. Add chicken and saute until golden brown on each side. Add consomme. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 45 minutes. Stir in sour cream, salt and pepper. Simmer 10 minutes longer. Serve each breast with a drizzle of the sauce. ; name: saucy baked chicken breasts ; ingredients: sour cream, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, celery seed, paprika, garlic, salt, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, dry breadcrumbs ; preparation:Mix first 8 ingredients in plastic bag. Add chicken and marinate in refrigerator overnight. Remove chicken from bag and coat with crumbs. Heat oven to 350. Place chicken on shallow baking dish. Bake, uncovered for 45 minutes, or until juices run clear. ; name: quick and light chicken paprikash ; ingredients: onion, cooked chicken breasts, fat free sour cream, paprika, salt ; preparation:Spray a large nonstick skillet and heat over medium-high heat. Saute onion for three minutes. Add the chicken and cook until heated through. Reduce heat to medium. Stir in remaining ingredients. Cover and cook for 3 minutes. Do not allow to boil. Serve over rice, pasta or baked potatoes. ; name: scrumptious chicken ; ingredients: skinless chicken breast halves, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, dry onion soup mix, fresh basil ; preparation:Grease the bottom and sides of slow cooker. Place chicken in slow cooker. Combine all the remaining ingredients except fresh herbs. Pour over chicken. Cover. Cook on low for 6 hours. Sprinkle with fresh herbs just before serving. Serve with rice, couscous, or over toast as a sos meal. ; name: south beach chicken paprikash ; ingredients: chicken breasts, salt, ground black pepper, onion, garlic clove, chicken broth, ground paprika, broccoli florets, whole wheat linguine, nonfat sour cream ; preparation:Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Add chicken to a skillet over medium heat with olive oil or cooking spray. Cook for 7-8 minutes until the pieces begin to brown. Then set aside on a plate. Add the garlic, onion and 3 tablespoons of the broth to the skillet and stir for 5 minutes. Stir in paprika and cook for one more minute and then stir in the remaining broth, broccoli and chicken. Bring the mixture to a boil and reduce the heat to simmer for 20 minutes. While simmering make the linguine. Stir the sour cream into the chicken. Cook for 1-2 minutes more. ; name: chicken supreme ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, butter, fresh mushrooms, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, garlic salt, paprika, swiss cheese ; preparation:

name: lemon mousse ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, butter, fresh lemon juice, lemon zest, heavy cream, of fresh mint ; preparation:Beat eggs and sugar until pale, about 5 minutes. Beat butter into sugar mixture in a thin stream. Add lemon juice. Pour into top of double-boiler. Cook over moderate heat, whisking constantly, until mixture thickens, about 15 minutes. Add lemon zest. Transfer custard to a medium bowl, place piece of plastic wrap directly onto surface of custard to prevent skin from forming and refrigerate atleast two hours. Beat cream until soft peaks form. Fold into chilled custard. Serve in stemmed glasses, garnished with mint. ; name: light lemon mousse ; ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, nonfat milk, lemon juice, lemon zest, vanilla extract, light whipped topping, yellow food coloring, whipped topping ; preparation:In a small saucepan, combine the sugar or splenda and cornstarch. Over medium low heat, stir in milk until smooth. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Cook for 1 to 2 minutes or until thick and bubbly. Remove from heat. Stir in the lemon juice, zest and vanilla. Place the pan in a bowl of ice water and stir for 2 minutes to cool. Fold in whipped topping and food coloring if using. Spoon into dessert dishes, cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving. Garnish with additional whipped topping if desired. ; name: lime mousse ; ingredients: whipping cream, sugar, lime juice, lime zest, vanilla extract, lime slice, of fresh mint ; preparation:In a mixing bowl, combine the cream, sugar, lime juice, peel and vanilla. Beat on high speed until soft peaks form, about 4 minutes. Spoon into dessert dishes. Garnish with lime and mint, if desired. Refrigerate until ready to serve. ; name: limoncello raspberry mascarpone mousse ; ingredients: fresh raspberry, fresh lemon zest, lemon curd, limoncello, mascarpone cheese, lemon extract, heavy whipping cream, fresh mint leaves, lemon verbena leaf ; preparation:Rinse and drain raspberries, gently pat dry and set aside. In a small bowl, stir together the lemon zest and the lemon curd. Stir in the limoncello liqueur, whisking briskly until combined. In a separate bowl, whip the cream until soft peaks form. Beat in the lemon extract. Fold in the mascarpone and stir gently. Combine well. In 8 large shot-glasses or ramekins, evenly and attractively layer the lemon curd mixture and the mascarpone mousse. Top with the fresh berries, and garnish with a mint leaf or sprig of lemon verbena. Chill until serving time. ; name: apricot cream mousse ; ingredients: condensed milk, lemon juice, canned apricots, whipping cream, ladyfingers, mint leaf ; preparation:Line a loaf tine with cling wrap. Combine condensed milk and lemon juice. Add apricot puree and lightly fold in the whipped cream. Layer ladyfingers on the bottom of the loaf tin and spread with a layer of mousse. Repeat twice more ending with ladyfingers. Chill for at least 12hrs before serving. Turn out and decorate with cream, mint leaves and apricot halves. ; name: delightful lemon mousse ; ingredients: boiling water, sugar-free lemon jell-o powder, lemons, rind of, apple juice, fat-free whipped topping, frozen raspberries ; preparation:Stir boiling water into gelatin and lemon peel in bowl until completely dissolved. Mix apple juice and ice to measure 1 cup. Stir into gelatin until slightly thickened. Stir in whipped topping with wire whisk. Pour half of the raspberry sauce into dessert dishes, top with mousse, finish with remaining sauce. Refrigerate 4 hours or until firm. ; name: super easy chocolate mousse ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, heavy cream, instant coffee, dark chocolate ; preparation:Melt chocolate and set aside. In a blender combine egg yolks and sugar, mix for 2 minutes. Add chocolate and heavy cream and coffee, blend for 2 minutes. Add egg whites and blend for 4 minutes. Pour into serving dish and refrigerate for at least 3 hours. ; name: easy lemon mousse ; ingredients: double cream, lemon, juice of, lemon, zest of, sugar, low-fat cream cheese ; preparation:

name: scallops with roasted garlic cream ; ingredients: sea scallops, garlic cloves, olive oil, hungarian paprika, cider vinegar, white pepper, salt, heavy cream ; preparation:Prepare the sauce by tossing the garlic cloves with olive oil and place on a square of aluminum foil. Fold the foil to form a package and roast place in a preheated 350f oven for 20 to 30 minutes. Allow the garlic to cool slightly, careful open package and transfer the garlic cloves to a medium saucepan. Stir in cider vinegar and bring to a simmer, mashing the cloves with the back of a spoon. As the vinegar evaporates, a paste will form, to the garlic paste stir in the heavy cream and simmer for about 10 minutes on low heat to blend flavors, adjust salt and pepper to taste. To prepare the scallops, rinse and dry with paper towels. Dust the top side of the scallops with paprika. In a non-stick skillet that has been sprayed lightly with olive oil, place the top side of the scallops down and saut until crispy on top and lightly firm to the touch. Place scallops on serving plate and drizzle garlic sauce over. ; name: savory scallops ; ingredients: scallops, garlic clove, white wine, fresh parsley, butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:Thaw the scallops. Heat your saute pan to medium high with a bit of butter and sear the scallops quickly for perhaps 90 seconds on a side. Remove the cooked scallops and set aside. Turn the heat down to medium and add the minced garlic. When it browns and starts to smell nutty, deglaze the pan with the wine and reduce by half. Remove from heat and salt and pepper to your liking. Add the parsley, and swirl in the butter. Pool the sauce on a plate, set the scallops on top of it, and serve with good crusty bread for soaking it up. ; name: scallops in cream sauce ; ingredients: sea scallops, butter, sliced mushrooms, scallions, dry vermouth, lemon juice, heavy cream, salt and pepper ; preparation:Salt and pepper scallops. Melt butter in large pan, saute scallops on both sides, remove. Add mushrooms and white part of scallions, cook until mushrooms brown, remove. Add vermouth to deglaze pan and reduce. Add lemon juice, and heavy cream, heat to thicken. Return everything to pan, garnish with green part of scallions. ; name: scallops with garlic ; ingredients: bay scallops, all-purpose flour, olive oil, garlic cloves, salt and pepper, lemon wedge, fresh parsley ; preparation:Rinse scallops and pat dry. Put flour in a shallow bowl. Roll scallops in flour. Heat oil over med heat. Add scallops and cook for about 4 minutes, stirring occasionally. Halfway through cooking, stir in minced garlic. Stir in parsley and serve with lemon wedges. Garnish with parsley. ; name: scallops with herbed raw tomato sauce ; ingredients: garlic clove, grape tomatoes, fresh herbs, salt and pepper, sea scallops, extra virgin olive oil, butter, lemon wedges ; preparation:Rub the inside of a large bowl with the garlic. Add the garlic to the bowl along with the tomatoes and herbs. Season with salt and let stand at room temperature for 1 hour. Discard any large garlic pieces. Preheat a grill to medium-high. Thread the scallops on skewers and brush with the olive oil. Season with salt and pepper. Grill, turning once, until firm and slightly charred, about 8 minutes. Remove from the skewers and add to the tomato mixture. Add the butter to the scallops mixture and gently toss until melted. Serve with the lemon wedges. ; name: grilled scallops with yellow pepper sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, yellow peppers, garlic, dried thyme, vegetable stock, whipping cream, sugar, salt & freshly ground black pepper, large scallops ; preparation:Heat 2 tbsps of the oil in a saucepan. Add onion& cook gently until soft, about 5 minutes. Add peppers, garlic& thyme and continue cooking for another 5 minutes. Add the stock, bring to a boil, reduce heat& simmer for 20 minutes or until the peppers are very soft. Puree the pepper mixture, return to a clean pan, add the cream& sugar and bring to a boil. Season to taste, reduce heat& simmer for 5 minutes. Meanwhile, season the scallops. Add remaining oil to a very hoy frying pan& sear the scallops for 2 minutes on the first side. Turn& cook for another minute or until just opaque in the center. Serve with sauce. ; name: sea scallops in sweet pepper sauce ; ingredients: sea scallops, butter, sweet pepper, onion, garlic, dry white wine, chicken broth, milk, fresh parsley ; preparation:In lg skillet, melt butter and cook scallops for about 7 minutes, until golden brown. Remove and keep warm. In same skillet, add pepper, onion and garlic. Cook 2 minutes. Add wine, stir 1 minute. Add broth, milk, and parsley. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until sauce thickens, 1-2 minutes. Add scallops and heat through. ; name: scallops in garlic cream sauce ; ingredients: scallops, butter, garlic cloves, parsley, scallions, white wine, salt, pepper, cream ; preparation:

name: dark creamy chocolate cake ; ingredients: unsalted butter, dark chocolate, brown sugar, eggs, flour, salt ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400 degrees f. Grease and flour a 9 inch cake pan with 2 inch sides. Melt the butter and chocolate in a heavy saucepan over very low heat. Remove from heat and whisk in the sugar and the eggs, one at a time. Stir vigorously 2 or 3 times, then gently whisk in the flour and salt. Pour the batter into the pan and tap the pan against the counter to break any bubbles. Bake about 20 minutes or until a knife inserted into the cake comes out clean. Run the knife around the edge of the pan, cool 10 minutes, then unmold and cool right side up on a rack. ; name: dark chocolate cookies ; ingredients: flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla ; preparation:Mix dry ingredients together in a bowl. Cream butter and sugar in another bowl, add eggs and vanilla. Mix in dry ingredients. Drop by tablespoonsful on ungreased cookies sheets, 2 inches apart, and bake in preheated 375 oven about 12 minutes, til tops are puffed and set. Cool on rack. ; name: cake mix german chocolate cookies ; ingredients: german chocolate cake mix, butter, eggs, water, flaked coconut, nuts, cocoa ; preparation:With mixer on low speed blend, butter, eggs and water. By hand stir in cake mix. Add coconut and nuts. Chill dough for approximately 1 hour before placing on parchment lined baking sheet. Form into large balls, place on baking sheet and press down with hand. Bake 350 degrees for 12 minutes. Let cool before removing from baking sheet. ; name: neiman marcus cake chocolate version ; ingredients: german chocolate cake mix, eggs, butter, powdered sugar, cream cheese ; preparation:Mix together cake mix, eggs and butter until well combined. Pat into greased 9x13 baking pan. Combine powdered sugar, eggs, and cream cheese with electric mixer, and mix well. Pour evenly over cake mixture. Bake at 350 for 35 minutes. Serve warm, with whipped cream or vanilla ice cream. ; name: yummy dark chocolate cookies ; ingredients: flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, coarse salt, chocolate chips, butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c line baking trays with baking paper. Whisk together flour, cocoa powder, baking soda and salt. Set aside. Melt 100 grams of dark chocolate with butter in a small heat proof bowl set on top of a pan of simmering water. Cool slightly. Gradually fold in flour mixture in 2 batches. Fold in chocolate bits. You can add in crushed walnuts as well. Spoon tsp of cookie dough on to trays abt 2 inches apart. Bake for 15 minutes. Cookies will be slightly soft. ; name: nikki s health cookies ; ingredients: bananas, vanilla extract, coconut oil, rolled oats, almond meal, coconut, cinnamon, sea salt, baking powder, dark chocolate bars ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl combine bananas, vanilla and coconut oil. In another bowl wisk oats, almond meal, coconut, cinnamon, salt and baking powder. Add dry ingredients to wet ones. Fold in chocolate chunks. Drop small dollops on parchment or silpat lined baking sheet. Bake 14-18 minutes, as long as possible without burning. ; name: steamed chocolate cake ; ingredients: granulated sugar, milk, butter, sweetened condensed milk, cocoa powder, plain flour, baking powder, baking soda, eggs ; preparation:Over low heat, stir sugar, water, milk powder, butter and condensed milk in a saucepan until sugar and butter dissolved. Pour a little of this hot milk slowly into cocoa powder, stirring to a make a cocoa paste, then add in the rest of the milk. Let cool. Sift flour, baking powder and baking soda, set aside. Beat eggs lightly and add the chocolate milk of step, mix well. Add flour mixture and mix well. Pour into a lined 20cm round tin. Steam for 1 hour, test with a skewer. Frost or fill with your favourite chocolate fudge or frosting if desired. ; name: buddha s ultimately moist chocolate cookies ; ingredients: neufchatel cheese, butter, egg, vanilla extract, chocolate cake mix ; preparation:

name: tomatoes au gratin ; ingredients: tomatoes, butter, garlic cloves, sugar, fresh basil, salt, pepper, cream, dried breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Skin the tomatoes by putting them into a bowl, adding boiling water and leaving them for 20 seconds, drain and plunge them into cold water, the skins should come off easily. Slice the tomatoes thinly. Grease a baking dish well with some butter, arrange a layer of tomato slices evenly on the bottom of the dish and then sprinkle with some of the garlic, sugar, basil, salt and pepper. Add a thin layer of cream and repeat with more tomato sllice layers until all ingredients are used. Mix the parmesan cheese and the breadcrumbs together and srinkle over the top. Drizzle any remaining butter over the top. Bake in the oven at 189 c for 40 minutes until golden brown. Serve hot. ; name: crumb topped tomatoes ; ingredients: tomatoes, salt and pepper, butter, onion, dry breadcrumbs, parsley, thyme ; preparation:Cut tomatoes in half and arrange in shallow pan. Season with salt and pepper. Broil, cut side up 6 inches from heat for 5 minutes. In small skillet, cook onion in butter, until soft. Stir in rest of ing. Spoon onto tomatoes. Broil about 3 minutes longer -- until lightly browned. ; name: parmesan stuffed tomatoes ; ingredients: breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, parsley, chives, tarragon, pepper, onion, tomatoes, unsalted butter ; preparation:Combine bread crumbs with parmesan, parsley, chives, tarragon, and pepper. Mix onion, seasoned bread crumbs, and melted butter. Cut tomatoes in half and seed them. Fill with bread crumbs and bake in buttered baking dish for about ten minutes at 350 degrees. Starting with room temperature tomatoes reduces cooking time and helps assure a firm tomato is served to guests. ; name: cherry tomato crisp ; ingredients: sandwich bread, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, olive oil, garlic, sea salt, fresh pepper, cherry tomatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Put the first 7 ingredients into a food processor bowl. Pulse until bread is very coarsely chopped, 4-6 times. Grease an 8 inch square baking dish and arrange the cherry tomatoes in a single layer. Sprinkle with the bread crumb mixture. Bake until crust is browned and tomatoes are tender, about 20 minutes. ; name: fried tomatoes with seasoned cracker crumbs ; ingredients: tomatoes, eggs, heavy cream, cracker crumb, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, paprika, chives, salt and pepper ; preparation:Beat eggs with cream and dip tomato slices in egg mixture. Combine the remaining ingredients and coat tomato slices on both sides with crumb mixture. In a skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of butter until it is sizzling hot, but not brown. Fry tomato slices for about 3 minutes per side, or until coating is lightly browned. Do this over moderately high heat so that the tomatoes do not get too soft. Serve with steak, roasted meat or chicken. ; name: blue cheese broiled tomatoes ; ingredients: tomatoes, sugar, dried basil, salt, pepper, soft breadcrumbs, butter, blue cheese ; preparation:Cut stems off tomatoes and cut each tomato into 2 think slices. Put on broiler rack. Combine sugar, basil, salt and pepper and sprinkle little of mixture on each tomato slice. Add bread crumbs to melted butter and toss lightly with a fork. Add blue cheese and toss again lightly. Spoon on tomato slices and slip under broiler until crumbs are nicely browned, about 1 minute. Serve immediately. ; name: tomato cheese bread ; ingredients: soft cream cheese, parmesan cheese, fresh garlic, fresh basil, salt and pepper, french bread, plum tomatoes ; preparation:Microwave the the cream cheese in a medium microwave-safe bowl on high for 20 seconds. Add in the parmesan cheese, garlic and basil. Mix well to combine, then season with salt and pepper to taste. Slice the bread in half lengthwise. Evenly divide and spread the mixture over the cut sides of the bread. Top with the sliced tomatoes, then sprinkle a small amount of salt over the tomato slices. Broil about 5-inches away from heat with the oven door partially open for about 5 minutes. Cut into desired size slices. ; name: savory breaded tomatoes ; ingredients: tomatoes, fine breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, chives, dried basil, butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: cameron holiday fruit salad ; ingredients: mandarin oranges, pineapple chunks, miniature marshmallows, sour cream, maraschino cherries, sweetened coconut, banana ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together except the bananas, including a small amount of the reserved pineapple juice. Refrigerate for a good couple of hours. It is not necessary to use the whole jar of marschino cherries. I usually use maybe half. I show the amount of coconut as 1-2 cups as our family is split 50-50 on coconut so we always make 2 batches. One with coconut and one without. So if you are making only half a batch with coconut, use only 1 cup of the coconut. Just before serving, slice bananas and add to the salad. ; name: fruit salad combination of fresh canned and frozen fruits ; ingredients: french vanilla instant pudding, pineapple chunks, mandarin oranges, fruit cocktail, frozen sliced strawberries, bananas ; preparation:Drain the pineapple juice and mandarin orange juice into a large bowl. Mix the pudding mix into the juices. Add pineapple, oranges, drained fruit cocktail, and strawberries. Mix well. Slice peeled bananas into salad right before serving. ; name: super creamy fruit salad ; ingredients: pineapple chunks in juice, fruit cocktail, mandarin oranges, bananas, miniature marshmallows, instant vanilla pudding, cool whip ; preparation:Drain pineapple, reserving juice. Mix pineapple juice and dry instant vanilla pudding together and set in the refrigerator for 30 minutes. Mix the pineapple, fruit cocktail, mandarin oranges, bananas & marshmallows together. Gently fold in pudding mixture. Lastly, fold in cool whip. Cover and refrigerate. ; name: family yummy fruit salad ww core ; ingredients: pineapple chunks in juice, mandarin oranges, cherries, bananas, nuts, fat-free sugar-free instant vanilla pudding mix ; preparation:Drain pineapple, reserving 1 cup juice. Combine fruit and nuts in a large bowl. Toss gently. Combine pudding and reserved pineapple juice in a mixing bowl. Using a mixer, beat on high speed for 1 minute. Pour pudding mixture over fruit and nuts. Toss gently. Chill several hours. ; name: banana split surprise ; ingredients: margarine, graham cracker crumbs, eggs, powdered sugar, vanilla, crushed pineapple, bananas, frozen whipped topping, pecans, maraschino cherry ; preparation:Combine melted margarine and cracker crumbs, mold and pat into bottom of a 13x9x2-inch pan. Beat eggs at high speed until light, about 4 minutes. Add powdered sugar, softened margarine and vanilla. Beat 5 minutes at high speed. Spread mixture over crumbs mixture. Chill 30 minutes. Spread pineapple over cream mixture. Arrange bananas over the pineapple, then spread with whipped topping. Sprinkle with pecans and garnish with cherries. Chill 6 hours or overnight. ; name: instant fruit salad ; ingredients: instant lemon pudding, pineapple chunk, mandarin orange, fruit cocktail ; preparation:Open and drain liquid from all cans except pineapple. Place all fruit in serving container. Pour lemon pudding powder onto fruit and stir. Add can of pineapple with liquid. Refridgerate until ready to serve. ; name: banana split smoothies ; ingredients: bananas, crushed pineapple, milk, fresh strawberries, honey, ice cubes, whipped topping, chocolate syrup, maraschino cherry ; preparation:In a blender, combine the first five ingredients. Cover and process until smooth. Gradually add ice, blending until slushy. Pour into chilled glasses. Garnish with whipped topping, chocolate syrup and cherries. ; name: the realtor s banana split salad ; ingredients: pineapple chunks, mandarin oranges, miniature marshmallows, sour cream, lettuce leaf, bananas, flaked coconut, maraschino cherries ; preparation:

name: chinese long soup ; ingredients: vegetable oil, cabbage, boneless pork, chicken broth, soy sauce, gingerroot, green onions, thin egg noodles ; preparation:Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over medium high. Add pork and cabbage and stir fry until meat is no longer pink, about 5 minutes. Add chicken broth, soy sauce, and ginger. Bring to a boil and reduce heat to low. Simmer 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add noodles and cook until tender, about 2 to 4 minutes. Stir in onions and serve. ; name: pork lo mein soup ; ingredients: water, salt, fresh chinese noodles, sesame oil, pork loin, scallions, chinese cabbage, chicken broth, pepper, soy sauce ; preparation:Bring water and salt to boil. Add noodles and boil for 8 minutes. Drain and set aside. While noodles are cooking, put oil into pan and saute pork, scallion, and cabbage until pork is done. Add pork mixture, noodles, salt, and pepper to chicken broth. Add soy sauce. Serve. ; name: chinese style noodle and pork soup ; ingredients: noodles, cabbage, cooked pork, green onion, low sodium chicken broth, white mushroom, fresh gingerroot, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:Cook noodles according to package directions, or until of desired consistency, drain. Meanwhile, in a large pot combine all remaining ingredients. Stir in the cooked noodles. Bring to a full boil over high heat, stirring occasionally. Boil for about 10 minutes. Sprinkle each serving with chopped green onions if desired. ; name: chinese soup ; ingredients: oil, mushrooms, water, garlic clove, ramen noodles, sherry wine, lemon juice, tabasco sauce, green onion ; preparation:Fry mushrooms, and garlic in oil. Add water and the flavour packs from the instant noodles. Bring to a boil. Add the noodles. Simmer 3 minutes. Add onions and your choice of any garnishes. ; name: chinese noodle mushroom soup ; ingredients: vegetable oil, sliced mushrooms, garlic, chicken stock, chow mein noodles, sherry wine, lemon juice, sesame oil, hot pepper sauce, scallions ; preparation:In large saucepan, heat oil over medium heat. Cook mushrooms and garlic for 2 minutes. Add stock and 2 cups water. Bring to boil. Add noodles, sherry, lemon juice or rice vinegar, sesame oil and hot pepper sauce. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 3 minhtes. Stir in scallions. ; name: oriental vegetable soup ; ingredients: beef broth, dry sherry, celery, scallions, soy sauce, sliced water chestnuts, fresh mushrooms, frozen pea pods, scallion ; preparation:In saucepan, combine first 6 ingredients. Bring to boil. Reduce heat and simmer 3 minutes. Add mushrooms and pea pods. Simmer 2 minutes. Garnish with scallion curl and serve. ; name: oriental vegetable noodle soup ; ingredients: chicken broth, soy sauce, scallions, sugar snap pea, fresh bean sprout, fresh mushrooms, ginger, noodles ; preparation:Combine the chicken broth, soy sauce, scallions, and peas in a large saucepan. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for an additional 5 minutes. Add the bean sprouts, mushrooms, and ginger. Simmer for 5 more minutes. Add the cooked noodles and heat for 2-3 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: cantonese soup ; ingredients: lean pork, oil, soy sauce, pepper, ground ginger, chicken broth, chinese cabbage, chow mein noodles ; preparation:

name: sumptuous spinach ; ingredients: baby spinach, garlic clove, butter, sour cream, lemon juice, salt ; preparation:Steam or microwave the spinach just until wilted, about 3 minutes. Squeeze out the liquid. Saute the garlic clove in the butter for 2 minutes. Stir in the spinach, sour cream, lemon juice and salt. Stir often until just hot. ; name: spinach with rice ; ingredients: vegetable oil cooking spray, cooked rice, fresh spinach, carrot, garlic clove, italian dressing, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Generously spray a wok or non stick deep frypan with veggie spray. Heat to medium. Add cooked rice and grated carrot into wok and mix. Add minced garlic. Stir fry to heat through, about 2 or 3 minutes. Add spinach. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Turn over with a spatula several times to mix the spinach evenly with the rice mixture, heat and turn until the spinach is starting to wilt, about 3 minutes. Pour the italian dressing evenly over and turn several times to mix. Cook about 3 minutes or until the spinach is well wilted and the dressing is heated through. Serve immediately. ; name: saute spinach with garlic ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, fresh spinach, salt & freshly ground black pepper, cooking spray ; preparation:In a large saut pan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add garlic, and cook until golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer garlic to paper towels. Reserve. Discard oil. Spray pan with cooking spray, and heat over medium heat. Coarsely chop spinach and stalks. Working in batches, add damp spinach to the pan. Cover, and cook until spinach just begins to wilt, 4 to 5 minutes. Transfer the cooked spinach to a metal bowl, and cook remaining spinach. Season with salt and pepper. Sprinkle reserved garlic over spinach, and serve warm. ; name: spinach dish ; ingredients: spinach, green onions, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, water, italian seasoning, hot green peppers, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Saut the onion and garlic with oil in a medium pot for 2 minutes. Add 2 tablespoons water, black pepper and salt. Stir for1 minute. Lower the heat, add spinach, quick stir for five minutes. Add the italian seasoning or parsley. Remove from heat before it releases water. Add the peppers, mix and cover it. Serve it cold or hot. ; name: asian sauteed spinach ; ingredients: baby spinach, garlic cloves, vegetable oil, sesame oil, soy sauce ; preparation:Heat vegetable oil and sesame oil in a large pan. Add garlic and cook briefly. Add spinach and cook until the spinach is mostly wilted. Add soy sauce to taste and continue cooking just until the spinach has all wilted. Serve immediately. ; name: spinach and artichoke dip ; ingredients: baby spinach leaves, unsalted butter, onion, garlic cloves, fresh chives, hard-boiled eggs, marinated artichokes, lemon juice, salt & freshly ground black pepper, plain yogurt ; preparation:Plunge the baby spinach leaves into boiling water and leave for a couple of minutes until they have wilted. Drain the spinach thoroughly, and pat dry with a paper kitchen towel to remove all the moisture. Melt the butter in a non-stick pan and saut the onion, garlic and chives until the onion and garlic are soft and the chives have just wilted. Transfer the onion, garlic and chives to a blender or food processor. Add the spinach, eggs, marinated artichokes, lemon juice, salt and pepper to taste, and two tablespoons of plain yoghurt. Process until smooth. Pour the dip into a serving dish and refrigerate until ready to use. Serve with vegetable sticks, crackers, rye bread fingers or pita bread. ; name: spinach with olives and lemon ; ingredients: baby spinach, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, rind of, kalamata olive, sea salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Wash the spinach and place in a large covered pan over low heat. Steam for 1-2 minutes until the spinach wilts. Drain well. Heat the garlic in 1 tablespoon of the olive oil until fragrant. Add the preserved lemon, olives and spinach. Cook for another minute, season with salt and pepper, and stir in the remaining olive oil. Serve immediately or chill and serve cold as a salad. ; name: warm spinach and feta dip ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic clove, baby spinach, feta, creme fraiche, salt & pepper ; preparation:

name: chicken romano ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, seasoned bread crumbs, dried parsley, romano cheese, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine bread crumbs, parsley and cheese. Brush chicken with butter, then roll in crumb mixture. Place meaty side up in ungreased, shallow baking pan. Sprinkle remaining crumb mixture on top. Bake, uncovered, for 40 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink. Cover the chicken with foil if the crumbs begin to get too brown. ; name: oven baked parmesan romano chicken ; ingredients: italian breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, romano cheese, fresh ground black pepper, seasoning salt, fresh flat-leaf parsley, paprika, butter, fresh garlic, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Heat oven to 375 degrees f. Combine breadcrumbs, cheeses, black pepper, salt, parsley and paprika in shallow bowl. Set aside. Combine butter and garlic in a 9-inch pie pan. Dip 1 chicken breast at a time into butter mixture. Place into breadcrumb mixture, turning to coat evenly. Place chicken breasts into ungreased 13x9-inch glass baking dish. Drizzle with any remaining butter mixture. Bake for 25-35 minutes or until chicken is lightly browned and juices run clear when pierced with a fork. ; name: pecorino romano chicken breast ; ingredients: chicken breast, butter, pecorino romano cheese, italian style breadcrumbs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Melt butter in bowl in microwave for 1 minute. Mix cheese & breadcrumbs on paper plate. Dip chicken into butter then coat in breadcrumb mixture. Place on foil lined cookie sheet & bake for 20 to 25 minutes turn halfway through for even browning if desired. ; name: parmesan breaded chicken ; ingredients: seasoned bread crumbs, romano cheese, oregano, rosemary, basil, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, buttermilk ; preparation:Combine first 6 ingredients in a shallow bowl. Dip chicken in buttermilk. Roll in bread crumb mixture. Coat a baking pan with cooking spray. Place chicken in pan. Bake, covered, at 350 for 20 minutes. Remove cover and bake additional 10 minutes or until done. ; name: baked italian chicken ; ingredients: fryer, butter, italian breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, parsley, garlic, basil, oregano, salt, pepper ; preparation:Rinse chicken pieces. Pat dry. Place butter in shallow dish. Mix remaining ingredients in shallow dish. Dip pieces in butter, then in breadcrumb mixture. Place on baking sheet. Bake at 350 for 1 hour. ; name: chicken savoy ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, chicken broth, olive oil, garlic, salt and pepper, dried oregano, romano cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Place chicken into 9x13 baking dish. Pour in chicken broth. Cover each breast with olive oil. Then cover each breast with garlic, salt, pepper and oregano. Cover each piece of chicken with the romano cheese. Bake uncovered for 45 mins. Or until juices run clear. ; name: crispy italian chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, low-fat mayonnaise, italian dressing ; preparation:Place chicken in a large glass bowl with dressing. Cover and marinate for 2 hours in the refrigerator. Drain chicken. Brush mayo onto chicken. Then roll each breast in the bread crumbs till all coated. Place in a baking dish and bake in oven for about 40-45 mins on 350. Wait till golden brown, then remove. ; name: oven chicken romano ; ingredients: whole chickens, butter, seasoned dry bread crumbs, romano cheese, parsley ; preparation:

name: broccoli pasta salad ; ingredients: medium pasta shells, mayonnaise, white vinegar, sugar, broccoli florets, red onion, golden raisin, bacon, sunflower seeds ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and rinse under cold running water. Combine mayonnaise, vinegar and sugar in mixing bowl. Mix well. Add pasta, broccoli, onion, raisins, bacon and sunflower seeds. Mix gently. Cover. Refrigerate at least 2 hours to allow flavors to blend. ; name: italian garden salad ; ingredients: rotini noodles, carrot, green bell pepper, broccoli florets, black olives, cherry tomatoes, buttermilk dressing ; preparation:Prepare rotini accourding to the package. Add carrots, pepper, broccoli, olives, and tomatoes. Toss well with salad dressing. Cover. Allow to marinate in refrigerator one hour before serving. ; name: creamy broccoli pasta salad ; ingredients: rotini pasta, light sour cream, parmesan cheese, reduced-calorie mayonnaise, skim milk, garlic, fresh broccoli florets, italian plum tomato, carrot, fresh basil ; preparation:Cook rotini to desired doneness as directed on package. Drain. Rinse with cold water until cool. Meanwhile, in small bowl, combine sour cream, cheese, mayonnaise, milk and garlic. Blend well. In large bowl, combine broccoli, tomatoes, carrot and basil. Add cooked rotini. Mix well. Add sour cream mixture. Toss gently to mix thoroughly. Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate until serving time. ; name: ranch pasta salad ; ingredients: tri-color spiral pasta, fresh broccoli florets, cucumber, tomatoes, ranch salad dressing, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and rinse in cold water. In a large bowl, combine the pasta, broccoli, cucumber and tomato. Drizzle with salad dressing. Toss to coat. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. ; name: so easy pasta salad with crab ; ingredients: tri-color spiral pasta, italian dressing, feta cheese, imitation crabmeat, bell peppers, black olives, onion, green peppers ; preparation:Cook pasta according to directions on box. Drain. Slice the greek peppers and black olives. Place pasta in large serving bowl and add all the ingredients except the dressing. Start to add the dressing, tossing while you pour. Keep adding dressing until all pieces in bowl are lightly coated with dressing. Cover and refrigerate for at least 24 hours before serving. Mix every few hours so the flavors are even. ; name: easy italian pasta salad ; ingredients: pasta, monterey jack cheese, peas, red onion, miracle whip, italian dressing, italian seasoning, red pepper, cucumber, carrot ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain. Mix seasoning, italian dressing and miracle whip in large bowl. Add remaining ingredients. Mix well. Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve. ; name: easy tri color pasta salad ; ingredients: tri-color spiral pasta, green pepper, red onion, tomatoes, chickpeas, black olives, fresh mushrooms, cheddar cheese, good seasons italian dressing, salt & pepper ; preparation:Prepare pasta al dente as directed on package. Meanwhile, prepare above ingredients. Drain pasta & cool. Combine all ingredients by stirring gently. Chill & serve. ; name: colorful pasta salad ; ingredients: broccoli floret, celery, black olives, red onion, ham, cheddar cheese, tri-color spiral pasta, italian dressing ; preparation:

name: cheese toasts ; ingredients: baguette, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, fresh parsley, garlic clove, salt, cayenne ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Spread the bread on a baking sheet. Mix the cheese, mayonnaise, parsley, garlic, salt and cayenne in a small bowl. Spread a heaping tablespoon of the cheese mixture on each slice of bread. Bake until golden brown and bubbly, 6 to 8 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: crunchy french toast ; ingredients: eggs, whole milk, pure vanilla extract, salt, challah, corn flakes, unsalted butter, sugar, real maple syrup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325. Butter a baking sheet. In a shallow pie plate or shallow bowl, whisk the eggs, milk, vanilla, and salt together. Dunk the bread slices into the egg mixture and soak them for a few minutes on each side, turning as needed to coat evenly but not fully saturated. Place the cornflakes on a plate. Press each slice of bread lightly into the cornflakes, coating both sides. Warm 2 tablespoons butter on a griddle or in a large heavy skillet over medium heat. Briefly cook the french toast in batches until golden brown and lightly crisp, turning once. If you wish, sprinkle each slice with sugar. Place the first slices on the baking sheet and keep them warm in the oven. Continue cooking the remaining slices, adding more butter as needed. When all french toast is ready, serve with maple syrup. ; name: french onion toasts ; ingredients: butter, onions, fresh rosemary, salt, fresh ground black pepper, french baguettes, swiss cheese ; preparation:Melt one tablespoon butter in a nonstick frying pan over low heat. Add the onion and cook stirring occasionally until tender and a golden brown. Stir rosemary, salt and pepper into the onions and remove from heat. Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Lightly butter one side of each slice of french bread. Place the bread, butter side down, on a baking sheet. Divide the onion evenly over the top of the french bread, coving as most of the surface as possible. Top the bread as evenly as possible with the grated cheese. Bake for about 10 minutes until cheese is well melted. ; name: egg and cheese toast ; ingredients: eggs, salt, pepper, milk, butter, toast, ketchup, cheese ; preparation:Combine eggs, salt, pepper and milk. Melt butter in a skillet, pour in egg mixture and cook over low heat stirring constantly. Spread toast with ketchup, heap with scrambled eggs and sprinkle with cheese. Place in broiler to brown and melt cheese. Serve at once. ; name: cinnamon sugar toast strips ; ingredients: sugar, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, butter, bread ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a small bowl combine the sugars, cinnamon and nutmeg. Place melted butter in another shallow bowl. Cut each slice of bread into 4 strips. Dip both sides of bread strip in butter, then sprinkle with sugar mixture. Place on an ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 350f for 5-7 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: parmesan toasts ; ingredients: italian bread, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, onion, garlic powder, paprika ; preparation:Leave the sliced italian bread on a baking sheet in a single layer for about an hour or so. Mix the parmesan, mayo, onion and garlic powder. Spread in a thin layer on bread. Place on a foil lined baking sheet and bake in a 350 oven until brown and bubbly. Serve hot -- enjoy. ; name: german french toast ; ingredients: eggs, white bread, muenster cheese, milk, butter, salt ; preparation:Melt butter in a skillet on medium heat. In a small bowl, beat together eggs, milk and salt. Dip bread slices one at a time in egg mixture, and fry in butter until bolden brown. After turning once, top each slice of bread with a slice of muenster cheese. Cover skillet until the cheese is melted. Serve and enjoy. ; name: savory toast strips ; ingredients: white bread, butter, margarine, onion salt, garlic salt, corn flakes, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: maple pecan custard ; ingredients: pecans, golden raisin, eggs, skim milk, heavy cream, maple syrup, brown sugar, vanilla, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. Break up pecans & scatter on the bottom of an 8x8 or 9x9 baking dish. Sprinkle raisins on top. Combine remaining ingredients very well with a whisk & pour slowly over pecans & raisins. Bake 1 hour - 1 hour 15 minutes until just set. Cool & refrigerate. ; name: rum custard ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, milk, rum, salt, nutmeg ; preparation:Combine everything except nutmeg. Pour into 4 individual custard cups. Top with a sprinkle of nutmeg. Set in a pan with 1 inch of water. Bake at 325f for 30 minutes until knife inserted in center comes out clean. Do not over bake. Serve warm or cold with little crispy cookies. ; name: filled custard with fresh fruit ; ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, nutmeg, milk, half-and-half, egg yolks, vanilla, fresh fruit ; preparation:Combine sugar, cornstarch and nutmeg in top of double boiler. Gradually whisk in milk, half and half, yolks and vanilla until smooth. Set over simmering water. Stir until thick. Cover and continue cooking 10 minutes. Spoon custard into two 1-cup molds. Refrigerate until firm, about 4 hours. Invert custard onto plates. Top with fresh fruit. ; name: caramel custard ; ingredients: sugar, milk, cinnamon stick, eggs, vanilla ; preparation:Place 1 cup of sugar in a heavy pan. Stir sugar at low heat until it is liquid and light golden brown. Pour caramelized sugar evenly into six warm custard cups. Set cups aside. Place milk and cinnamon stick in a medium sized saucepan. Scald milk at medium heat and allow to cool. Beat eggs until foamy. Gradually add remaining sugar to eggs and beat well. Gradually add scalded milk to egg mixture, stirring until sugar dissolves. Add vanilla. Pour mixture into caramel lined cups. Place cups in a pan of hot water and baked in a 350 degrees f oven for 1 hour and 10 minutes. ; name: old fashion southern boiled custard ; ingredients: whole milk, eggs, sugar, pure vanilla extract ; preparation:Rinse top of double boiler with hot water to keep milk from scorching. Scald whole milk. Blend eggs and sugar in blender. Slowly add to scalded milk in top of double boiler stirring constantly. Cook until mixture thickens and coats spoon well. Remove from heat. Add pure vanilla. Let cool a little then strain into containers. The straining is important to make sure there are no lumps in the custard. ; name: comfort food baked custard ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, salt, vanilla, milk, nutmeg ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. In large bowl, combine eggs, sugar, salt and vanilla. Blend well. Gradually stir in milk. Pour into 6 ungreased 6-oz. Custard cups. Sprinkle with nutmeg. Place custard cups in 13x9 inch pan. Pour boiling water into pan around custard cups to a depth of 1 inch. Bake at 350 for 45 to 55 minutes or until knife inserted near center comes out clean. Serve warm or cold. Store in refrigerator. ; name: vanilla custard ice cream ; ingredients: whole milk, sugar, salt, egg yolks, heavy cream, vanilla extract ; preparation:Place milk in a small pan and heat over low heat until bubbles form, and milk becomes hot. Add sugar and salt, stirring to dissolve. Remove from heat and add 1-2 tbsp of the hot milk to the egg yolks, mixing well. Add more milk to eggs and bring it up to temperature. Pour egg mixture back into pan and continue to cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until it starts to thicken and reaches 160 degrees, about 10-12 minutes. Place the pan in a sink or basin full of ice water to cool down, continuing to stir. When custard is just barely warm, stir in the cream and vanilla. Refrigerate mixture until ready to use. Just prior to making, pour through strainer into the ice cream maker and follow your appliances instructions for operating. ; name: maple custard ; ingredients: eggs, maple syrup, whole milk, salt, nutmeg ; preparation:

name: taverns ; ingredients: water, onion, ground beef, ketchup, chili powder, yellow mustard, hamburger buns ; preparation:Add onions to water in medium saucepan. Boil on medium heat until onions are transparent. Add ground beef and ketchup. Continue cooking on medium heat for 15 minutes. Add mustard and chili powder. Serve on hamburger bun. ; name: beefy burger dogs ; ingredients: ground beef, hot dog buns, barbecue sauce, salt, pepper, butter, mustard ; preparation:Mix the ground beef with a light dusting of salt and pepper, and divide it into 6 parts. Roll each part into a hot dog shape. Cook outside on the grill or inside in a frying pan. Brush with barbecue sauce while cooking. Butter the hot dog buns and put a burger dog into each one. Serve with the hamburger and hot dog fixins of your choice. ; name: hot dog tag alongs ; ingredients: hot dogs, cheddar cheese, onion, pickle relish, prepared mustard, ketchup, chili, hot dog buns ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, stir together all ingredients except buns. Have 12 pieces of aluminum foil ready. Partially hollow out centers of buns. Fill each bun with hot dog mixture. Wrap in aluminium foil, sealing securely. Place on a cookie sheet and bake in a preheated 375 degree fahrenheit oven for 20 minutes or place on top rack of outdoor grill. Cover grill and grill for 15 to 20 minutes. ; name: burger bundles ; ingredients: ground beef, milk, seasoned bread crumbs, condensed cream of mushroom soup, worcestershire sauce, ketchup ; preparation:Mix the beef with the milk. Divide into 10 patties. On wax paper, flatten each patty to form a 6-inch circle. Put equal amounts of stuffing in the center of each. Draw the edges over the center of stuffing and seal. Place in 3-quart casserole. Combine the soup, worcestershire sauce, and ketchup. Heat gently until smooth and bubbly. Pour over the meat and bake 350f for 45 to 50 minutes. ; name: beef steamburgers ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, tomato soup, catsup, yellow mustard, worcestershire sauce, white vinegar, smoked paprika, cayenne pepper, salt and pepper ; preparation:Over medium high heat brown ground beef and onion until beef is no longer pink and onions are translucent. Drain mixture to remove fat. Add remaining ingredients except salt and pepper. Cook over medium to medium low heat for 20-30 minutes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve on hamburger buns. ; name: dressed up burger patties ; ingredients: ground beef, dry breadcrumbs, salt, pepper, egg, onion, beef broth, fresh mushrooms, water, cornstarch ; preparation:Mix first 5 ingredients. Shape into patties. Cook and brown patties, add onion, broth and mushrooms. Cover and simmer 10 minutes. Heat onion to boiling. Remove patties. Mix water and cornstarch. Add to skillet and stir until thickened. ; name: schroom burgers ; ingredients: ground beef, fresh mushrooms, butter, onion, dry mustard, sour cream, parsley flakes ; preparation:Saut mushrooms and onions in butter till onion is soft but not brown. Stir in dry mustard, sour cream and parsley flakes. Cook till thoroughly heated. Make 6 hamburger patties. Broil or cook as you prefer. Serve topped with mushroom sauce. ; name: stuffers ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, green pepper, mushrooms, ketchup, relish, cheese, prepared mustard, hot dog buns ; preparation:

name: fried chicken dumplings ; ingredients: ground chicken, ginger, garlic, sweet chili sauce, cornflour, water chestnuts, wonton wrappers, oil ; preparation:Place the minced chicken, ginger, garlic, water chestnut, corn flour and sweet chilli sauce in a bowl and stir till it is combined. Lay a wonton wrapper on a flat surface and brush a little water around the edge of the wrapper. Place 2 teaspoons of the chicken mixture in the middle of the wrapper. Bring the corners together and pinch the edges together to seal. Repeat with the remaining mixture and wonton wrappers. Heat a pan of hot oil, and deep fry them till they are golden brown. ; name: pork and sauerkraut with dumplings ; ingredients: pork, onion, salt and pepper, sauerkraut, flour, baking powder, salt, butter, milk ; preparation:Rub pork with salt and pepper. Place in a pot and cover with water, adding onion cut into pieces. Boil meat until tender, remove excess fat. Add sauerkraut and simmer about 20 minutess. Mix dry dumpling ingredients together. Add milk gradually mixing well then add the melted butter. Drop by spoonsful into boiling pork and kraut. Cook 15 minutes covered. ; name: tomato dumplings ; ingredients: tomatoes, onions, salt, pepper, butter, flour, milk ; preparation:Combine first 5 ingredients together. Let boil for about 5 minutes. Then turn down heat, cover, and let simmer while making dumplings. Combine the flour and milk to make dumplings. It will be sticky. Drop into tomato pot, by teaspoon. Cover and let stand, on low heat, for about 30 minutes or more. Do not open lid until time is up. ; name: liver dumplings calf pork beef or lamb ; ingredients: liver, onion, butter, soft breadcrumbs, eggs, flour, salt and pepper, parsley ; preparation:Simmer liver in water for a few minutes before grinding and force meat through a food chopper. Fry onion in butter. Add bread crumbs. Combine liver and eggs. Mix well. Add bread crumb mixture. Season to taste. Stir in flour to make a batter stiff enough to drop from the spoon. Drop into a kettle of hot broth or soup. Cover tightly and cook for 30 minutes. Shake pan frequently to prevent dumplings from sticking to each other. ; name: fruit dumplings ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, small curd cottage cheese, flour, fruit, milk ; preparation:Cream butter with sugar. Add eggs, stirring hard. Add cottage cheese and flour. Stir well and gradually add enough milk to make a soft dough. Roll out on floured board, and cut in squares. Into each square put a blue plum, apricot or sweet cherries. Pinch corners together and roll into a ball. Boil dumplings in a large pot filled with rapidly boiling, salted water for 10-12 minutes.
