Toss with hot pasta to serve. ; name: mushroom alfredo ; ingredients: cream of mushroom soup, milk, red pepper, parmesan cheese, garlic, parsley, linguine ; preparation:In saucepan, combine soup, milk, red pepper, cheese, garlic and parsley. Bring to boil at medium heat, stirring often. Reduce heat and simmer for 5 mins. Pour sauce over noodles and sprinkle with pepper and additional cheese if desired. I usually increase the garlic to 2 plus cloves. ; name: ziti alfredo ; ingredients: ziti pasta, butter, cream cheese, garlic powder, milk, parmesan cheese, ground black pepper, parsley flakes ; preparation:

name: creamy corn soup ; ingredients: butter, onion, celery, flour, frozen whole kernel corn, whipping cream, half-and-half, fresh parsley, kosher salt, cracked black pepper ; preparation:On medium-high heat, add butter to a large saucepan and saute onion, celery and flour until onion is translucent. Add the corn and saute for an additional 4 minutes. At this point, the mixture can be covered and refrigerated and finished at a later date. When ready to serve, add the cream and half and half, and return to the stovetop over a medium-high heat, stirring constantly. Add the parsley, and salt and pepper according to taste. Transfer the soup mixture to a blender or food processor and puree until smooth. Strain the soup mixture to remove all the corn husks, return to the saucepan and heat gently on the stovetop stirring constantly until heated through. Serve with a garnish of fresh parsley. ; name: creamy corn and turkey soup ; ingredients: onion, butter, cream cheese, cream-style corn, chicken broth, milk, cooked turkey, roasted red pepper, salt and pepper, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Cook onion in butter in large saucepan over medium heat until tender, stirring frequently. Reduce heat to low. Add cream cheese and cook until melted, stirring constantly. Add corn, broth, milk, turkey and red pepper and mix well. Add spices to taste. Cook until soup is heated through, stirring occasionally. ; name: pumpkin corn soup ; ingredients: chicken broth, sweet corn, onion, pumpkin, half-and-half, salt, pepper ; preparation:In saucepan, combine broth, corn & onion. Bring to boil, then reduce heat, cover & simmer 20-25 minutes until onion is tender. Stir in pumpkin & blend well. Cover & simmer 5-10 minutes until thoroughly heated. Add half-and-half, salt & pepper. Cook & stir until thoroughly heated, but do not boil. ; name: tomato rice soup ; ingredients: butter, celery ribs, onion, tomatoes, boiling water, long grain rice, savory, salt and pepper, milk ; preparation:Heat butter in a saucepan. Cook celery and onion 5 to 8 minutes, at low heat, without letting them take colors. Add tomatoes, water and rice. Season with savory. Add salt and pepper. Let simmer 20 to 25 minutes. Add milk and keep cooking 2 to 3 minutes, just to reheat. ; name: oven roasted corn soup with lump crabmeat ; ingredients: frozen corn kernels, olive oil, garlic cloves, carrot, onion, jalapeno pepper, chicken stock, heavy cream, lump crabmeat ; preparation:Toss corn kernels with olive oil, salt and pepper to taste. Oven roast corn in a preheated 450 degree oven for 5 minutes. Combine the corn with the garlic, carrots, onions, celery, jalapeo, and chicken stock in a heavy pan and simmer for 30 minutes. Add the cream and boil the mixture for 5 minutes. Puree the soup in a blender, in batches if necessary, for about a minute and a half. Strain soup, top with lump crab meat and serve hot. ; name: corn and red pepper soup ; ingredients: butter, red bell peppers, onion, chicken broth, kernel corn, ground cumin, sour cream, salt, pepper, pine nuts ; preparation:In a 3-qt. Saucepan, cook bell pepper and onion in butter until tender. Add chicken broth, corn, and cumin, heating until mixture comes to a boil. Cover pan and simmer 20 minutes. Carefully puree soup in a blender or food processor and pour through a sieve into pan, pressing with a spoon or spatula to get all the soup. Discard any pulp. Stir in sour cream until smooth. Add salt and pepper. Check to taste. Reheat if necessary and serve in bowls garnished with toasted pine nuts. ; name: cowboy soup ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, green pepper, enchilada sauce, vegetable soup, ranch style beans, whole kernel corn ; preparation:Combine ground beef, onion, and green pepper in large saucepan. Cook till onion and pepper are tender. Drain off fat. Add enchilada sauce, soup, beans, and corn to ground beef and onion mixture. Stir to combine. Simmer for 15 minutes. ; name: roasted corn soup ; ingredients: corn on the cob, water, chipotle chiles, salt, feta cheese ; preparation:

name: cheesy macho nachos ; ingredients: green onions, tomatoes, jalapenos, tortilla chips, refried beans, monterey jack cheese, cheddar cheese, sour cream, chili with beans ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Lay chips on oven safe platter. You will be layering this so split them. Warm beans and chili on stove or in microwave. Stir beans until smooth. Spread beans over tortillas. Top with onion, cheese, jalepenos, chili and cheddar cheese. Repeat by layering tortilla chips and toppings until gone. Place in oven and bake until cheese is melted. Dollop with sour cream. Add tomatoes and green onions on top. ; name: bean and cheese nachos ; ingredients: corn tortilla chips, refried beans, monterey jack cheese, salsa ; preparation:Preheat broiler. Spread refried beans over each tortilla chip. Top with a mound of cheese, and lay the chips in a single layer on a baking sheet. Heat under the broiler until the cheese is melted and bubbly, about1 minute. Top each chip with a dollop of salsa. Serve at once. ; name: chili o nachos ; ingredients: lean ground beef, chili seasoning mix, tomato sauce, black beans, colby-monterey jack cheese, shredded cheddar cheese, tortilla chips ; preparation:Brown ground beef in a large skillet. Drain. Add seasonings, tomato sauce and beans. Stir frequently until mixture comes to a boil. Place chips on a large flat baking pan. Spoon chili mixture over chips and sprinkle with cheese. Broil for 2 to 3 minutes or until cheese is melted. Garnish with chopped green onions, and sour cream. Serve immediately. ; name: nachos ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, taco sauce, refried beans, cream of mushroom soup, taco seasoning, salt, velveeta cheese, tortilla chips, sour cream ; preparation:Brown beef and onions in saucepan. Drain. Combine all ingredients except tortilla chips and sour cream in slow cooker. Cover and cook on high 1 hour stirring occasionally until cheese if fully melted. Serve warm with chips and sour cream. ; name: nachos with chicken and black beans ; ingredients: tortilla chips, black beans, cooked chicken, monterey jack cheese, red onion, limes, juice of, light sour cream, salsa ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 425 degrees. Arrange the chips in a single layer on a large baking sheet. Spoon the beans evenly over the chips then top with chicken, cheese and onion. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes, until the cheese is melted and bubbly. Remove from oven. Combine lime juice and sour cream. Spoon over the nachos and top with salsa. ; name: breakfast nachos ; ingredients: tortilla chips, refried beans, eggs, salsa, monterey jack pepper cheese, scallions ; preparation:Cover the bottom of a large oven-safe platter with tortilla chips. Microwave refried beans for 1 minute, then spread over the tortilla chips. Crumble scrambled eggs evenly over beans. Evenly pour warmed salsa over eggs. Top with grated cheese. Broil entire platter in oven until cheese is melted. Serve immediately, garnishing with scallions. ; name: nacho skillet dinner ; ingredients: ground beef, kidney beans, tomato sauce, mexican-style corn, chili powder, tortilla chips, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium heat, brown ground beef until thoroughly cooked. Drain. Stir in kidney beans, tomato sauce, mexi-corn and chili powder. Reduce heat to low. Simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Sprinkle tortilla chips evenly over beef mixture. Top with cheese. Cover and simmer for 2 minutes or until cheese is melted. ; name: macho nachos courtesy of paula deen ; ingredients: refried beans, white corn tortilla chips, onion, monterey jack pepper cheese, jalapeno, chili, cheddar cheese, sour cream, green onion, tomatoes ; preparation:

name: savory pork ; ingredients: boneless pork loin chops, olive oil, butter, fresh mushrooms, fresh green beans, garlic cloves, condensed cream of mushroom soup, water, pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet brown pork chops in oil and butter on each side. Remove the chops and keep warm. In the same skillet, saute the mushrooms, beans and garlic until vegetables are tender. Stir in the soup, water and pepper. Bring to a boil. Top with pork chops. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes until pork juices run clear, stirring occasionally. Serve sauce over chops. ; name: pork and bacon skewers ; ingredients: pork schnitzels, bacon, red pepper, green pepper, wooden skewers ; preparation:Cut schnitzels lengthways down the centre. The strips should be about 4 cm wide. Lay a slice of bacon on top of each piece of pork. Weave both the pork and bacon onto a skewer, interspersing with pepper pieces. Barbeque on a medium heat for 6- 8 minutes, turning frequently. ; name: roasted pork loin with mustard garlic and herbs ; ingredients: boneless pork loin, garlic cloves, dijon mustard, herbes de provence, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Slice small slits all over the pork loin. Insert the garlic slivers into the holes. Spread the dijon mustard evenly over the entire loin, using your hands or a spatula. Sprinkle loin with the herbes de provence, the salt and the pepper. Place on a roasting rack set in a roasting pan and bake for about 1 hour, or until meat thermometer reaches 155 degrees. Remove from the oven, and let rest for 5-10 minutes before slicing. ; name: pork roast with herbed pepper rub ; ingredients: boneless pork loin roast, cracked black pepper, parmesan cheese, dried basil, dried rosemary, dried thyme, garlic powder, salt ; preparation:Pat pork dry with paper towel. In a small bowl, combine all rub ingredients well and apply to all surfaces of the pork roast. Place roast in a shallow pan and roast at 350 degrees f for 1 hour to 1 hour and 15 minutes, until internal temperature registers 155 degrees f with a meat thermometer. Remove roast from oven and let rest for 5-10 minutes before slicing to serve. Serves 6-8, with leftovers. ; name: fresh herbed pork tenderloin ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, olive oil, ground red pepper, garlic powder, coarse sea salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, fresh parsley, fresh rosemary ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f. Rub pork with oil and sprinkle evenly with red pepper, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper. Press parsley and rosemary evenly over roast so they stick. Transfer pork to small nonstick baking pan. Tuck tapered end of tenderloin under itself for even cooking. Roast 18 to 22 minutes or until barely pink inside. Let stand 10 minutes before slicing. ; name: savory mustard rubbed pork ; ingredients: boneless pork loin, dijon mustard, parsley, thyme, rosemary, garlic, olive oil, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 450 degree fahrenheit. Season pork loin with salt and pepper. In bowl, combine remaining ingredients. Rub herb-mustard-mixture evenly over pork. Place pork in roasting pan and roast for 10 minutes. Reduce oven temperature to 250 degree fahrenheit. Roast for 1 hour more or until inserted thermometer reads 160 degrees fahrenheit. Transfer pork loin to platter, cover loosely with foil. Let sit 15 minutes before slicing. ; name: simple wiener schnitzel ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, salt, lemon-pepper seasoning, flour, eggs, dried breadcrumbs, cooking oil, lemon wedge ; preparation:Pound meat between waxed paper until extremely thin. Add salt & lemon-pepper to flour. Dredge meat in flour. Dip in egg & then bread crumbs. Fry on both sides quickly in oil. Serve with lemon wedges to be squeezed over meat. ; name: german schweinepfeffer peppered pork ; ingredients: vegetable oil, pork loin, mushroom, onion, cracked black pepper, salt, red wine, parsley ; preparation:

name: creole okra ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, green bell pepper, tomatoes, dried thyme, fresh parsley, cayenne pepper, salt and pepper, frozen cut okra ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Saute the onion and garlic until limp. Add the green pepper. Cook and stir until tender. Drain the tomatoes, reserving juice, and pour them into the skillet. Season with thyme, parsley, cayenne, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 5 minutes over medium heat. Add the frozen okra, and pour in enough of the reserved juice from the tomatoes to cover the bottom of the pan. Cover, and cook for 15 minutes, or until okra is tender. ; name: spicy okra ; ingredients: frozen cut okra, canola oil, onion, diced tomatoes, habanero pepper, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Rinse okra in a colander under hot water. Heat oil in a 10-inch heavy skillet over moderately high heat until hot but not smoking, then saut onion, stirring until golden, about 3 minutes. Add tomatoes and chile and boil, stirring until tomatoes are softened and liquid is reduced by half, 5 to 10 minutes. Add okra and cook, gently stirring, until okra is tender, about 5 minutes. Stir in salt and pepper and discard chile. ; name: corn okra and tomatoes ; ingredients: onion, green bell pepper, garlic cloves, butter, plum tomatoes, fresh corn, fresh okra, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cook first 3 ingredients in butter in a skillet over medium-high heat, stirring constantly until tender. Add the tomatoes. Bring to boil, then reduce the heat and simmer uncovered 15 minutes. Add remaining ingredients and bring to boil again. Reduce heat and simmer 9 minutes or until the corn is tender. ; name: vegetarian okra curry ; ingredients: fresh okra, canola oil, yellow onion, garlic, tomatoes, red pepper powder, coriander powder, cumin, turmeric, salt ; preparation:Prepare okras for cooking by removing ends and cutting into 1-2-inch pieces. In a skillet, heat oil over medium heat and add okra. Saut until all of the sticky juices become dry. Remove from skillet and set aside. In the same skillet with the remaining oil, add tomatoes and spices. Cook over low heat until paste-like. Add onions and sauted okra. Stir, cover and let simmer over low heat for 10-15 minutes. Transfer to a serving dish and garnish with garam masala or black pepper. ; name: okra pilau ; ingredients: bacon, fresh okra, onion, green bell pepper, long-grain rice, salt, pepper, chicken stock ; preparation:Fry bacon in a large non-stick skillet until it is crisp. Transfer bacon to a paper-towel lined plate to drain. Discard all but 2 tablespoons bacon drippings from skillet. Cook okra, onion, and bell pepper in hot bacon drippings over medium-high heat for 5 minutes or until tender, stir frequently. Add in rice and remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Cover, lower heat, and simmer 20 minutes or until water is absorbed and rice is tender. Take skillet off burner. Add in bacon, stir to combine. Let sit 5 minutes. ; name: okra and tomatoes ; ingredients: sweet onions, okra, tomatoes, salt & freshly ground black pepper, hot sauce ; preparation:Place all ingredients in a dutch oven and cook over over medium heat until onion and okra is just crisp tender or done to your liking. Taste and add salt and pepper as desired. The salt seems to add to the slime. Also, stir only as much as you need the more you stir the slimier it can get. Serve with hot sauce if desired. Oamc. Simply reheat when needed. ; name: roasted okra ; ingredients: okra pods, red bell pepper, ginger, turmeric powder, cumin seed, dried red chili, oil, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees celcius. Spray an oven tray with nonstick pan spray. Add all ingredients to tray and mix well. Roast okra in oven for approx 30 mins, stirring occasionally. Some may prefer to roast the vegetables a little longer. Serve with roti and tomato chutney. ; name: okra with green chilli ; ingredients: okra, onion, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, green chilies, ground cumin, ground coriander, water, oil, lemon, juice of ; preparation:

name: easy creamy key lime pie ; ingredients: cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, frozen whipped topping, key lime juice, graham cracker pie crust, key lime zest ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk and whipped topping. Stir in the lime juice until well blended. Immediately pour filling into pie shell. Chill for at least 2 hours. Garnish with key lime zest. ; name: the best key lime pie ; ingredients: graham crackers, sugar, butter, egg yolks, sweetened condensed milk, key lime juice, powdered sugar, lime rind, whipping cream ; preparation:Combine graham crackers crumbs, sugar and butter and press into pie plate. Combine egg yolks, condensed milk, lime juice, powdered sugar and rind and spoon into pie crust. Bake at 325 for 30 minutes. Cool completely on a wire rack and chill for 2 hours. Whip cream and powdered sugar and spoon on top of chilled pie. ; name: easy key lime pie ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, key lime juice, cool whip, graham cracker pie crust ; preparation:Beat cream cheese, sugar and lime juice until fluffy. Fold in 6 oz of the thawed cool whip. Pour into prepared graham cracker crust. Top with remaining cool whip. Cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour before serving. ; name: easy key west key lime pie ; ingredients: condensed milk, key lime juice, cream cheese, cool whip, graham cracker pie crust ; preparation:Blend condensed milk and cream cheese until smooth. Add lime juice and mix thoroughly. Fold in thawed cool whip. Pour into two pie shells. Garnish with grated lime rind. Refrigerate 6 hours. ; name: mom s key lime pie ; ingredients: egg yolks, sweetened condensed milk, key lime juice, graham cracker crust, egg whites, granulated sugar, pure vanilla extract ; preparation:Beat egg yolks with mixer until light in color. Slowly add condensed milk mixing well. Stir while adding lime juice. Pour into prepared pie shell. Set aside and prepare meringue. For meringue, beat egg whites until stiff. Add sugar and vanilla just at the last minute. Top pie with meringue. Brown in 325 degree preheated oven just until peaks brown and the rest is golden in color. Serve cool. ; name: nummy easy key lime pie ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, egg yolks, lime zest, key lime juice, food coloring, graham cracker crust ; preparation:Beat egg yolks with food coloring. Then mix in sweetened condensed milk. Then mix in key lime juice and zest. Pour into graham cracker crust and bake at 325 for about 20 minutes or center is jiggly when shaken slightly, or when knife inserted in center leaves mark. Chill in freezer for 10-15 minutes. ; name: pirate s house key lime pie ; ingredients: graham cracker pie crusts, egg yolks, sweetened condensed milk, lime, rind of, fresh lime juice, whipping cream, powdered sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Whisk egg yolks, milk, lime peel, and juice. Pour into pie crust. Bake for 7-8 minutes. Cool on wire rack 15 minutes. Refrigerate until completely cooled. Whip cream with sugar and serve on top of pie. Garnish with lime slices. ; name: key lime pie ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, egg yolks, key lime juice, graham cracker pie crust, whipped cream, lime ; preparation:

name: simple rhubarb cake ; ingredients: sugar, brown sugar, shortening, egg, baking soda, vanilla, sour milk, flour, rhubarb, cinnamon-sugar mixture ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease 9x13 inch pan. Cream together both sugars and shortening. Add egg and mix together. Mix in all remaining ingredients and pour into prepared pan. Sprinkle with a little cinnamon and sugar. Bake for 35 minutes or until toothpic comes out clean. ; name: special rhubarb cake ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, buttermilk, rhubarb ; preparation:In a mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Beat in egg. Combine flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt. Add to creamed mixture alternatively with buttermilk, beating just until moistened. Fold in rhubarb. Pour into greased bundt pan. Combine topping ingeredients, sprinkle over batter. Bake at 350 degrees for 40-45 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack. ; name: rhubarb or other fruit muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, white sugar, brown sugar, egg, milk, oil, almond extract, rhubarb ; preparation:Mix dry ingredients. Beat egg, add milk, oil and almond extract. Pour egg mixture into dry ingredients and stir to moisten. Fold in rhubarb. Pour into muffin tins and sprinkle tops with sugar. Bake at 375 f for 20 to 25 minutes until nicely brown. ; name: green tea pound cake ; ingredients: eggs, flour, sugar, butter, green tea powder, baking powder ; preparation:Cream butter in a bowl. Add sugar in the butter and mix well. Gradually add beaten eggs and stir well. Sift flour, baking powder, and green tea powder together and add the flour to the egg mixture. Pour the batter into a buttered loaf pan. Bake in preheated 340 degrees f oven for about 30-40 minutes. ; name: rhubarb ginger muffins ; ingredients: self-rising flour, whole wheat flour, ground ginger, rhubarb, glace ginger, grapeseed oil, apple juice concentrate, low-fat milk, egg whites ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Lightly grease muffin tray or line with paper muffin cases. Sift the flours and spices together in a large bowl. Add the rhubarb and ginger. In another bowl, lightly beat the eggs, then beat in the oil, followed by the apple juice concentrate or honey and the milk. Add the liquid mix to the dry ingredients and stir well. Spoon into muffin tray and bake for 20-25 minutes or until golden. Remove muffins from tray immediately and cool on wire rack, covered with tea towel. ; name: rhubarb dessert ; ingredients: white cake mix, rhubarb, sugar, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert ; preparation:Mix cake mix according to package directions. Put into a greased 9 x 13 inch pan. Mix the rhubarb, sugar, & jello together. Spoon onto cake mix. Bake according package directions. ; name: dump it in rhubarb cake ; ingredients: rhubarb, strawberry gelatin, sugar, cinnamon, yellow cake mix, water, whipped topping, flour ; preparation:Spread rhubarb in an 9x13 pan. Sprinkle with sugar and dry jello powder. Sprinkle dry cake mix over sugar. Pour a cup of water evenly over mixture. Cover tightly with foil. Bake 350 f for 30 minutes or so until cake is done. ; name: rosas rhubarb cake ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, eggs, vegetable oil, white sugar, rhubarb, brown sugar, quick-cooking oats, cinnamon ; preparation:

name: pumpkin spice sugar cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, butter, powdered sugar, pumpkin pie spice, vanilla extract, egg ; preparation:In a mixing bowl, add four and baking soda. Stir gently to mix. Set aside. In another mixing bowl, blend butter and powdered sugar together. Add in pumpkin pie spice, vanilla, and egg. Stir to combine. Mix in the flour mixture. Blend well. Cover dough and refrigerate for at least 2 hours. Roll dough out on a lightly floured surface. Cut into desired shapes with cookie cutters. Bake in a 350 oven on ungreased cookie sheets for about 8 minutes or until golden. ; name: egg free pumpkin chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: white sugar, shortening, pumpkin puree, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking soda, ground cinnamon, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Cream the sugar, shortening, pumpkin, and vanilla together. Mix until light and well combined. Mix the flour, baking soda, and ground cinnamon. Stir the flour mixture into the creamed mixture. Mix until combined. Stir in the chocolate chips. Drop by rounded teaspoons onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 375 for 12-15 minutes or until set. Let cookies cool on a rack. ; name: cornmeal cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, pure vanilla extract, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, flour ; preparation:Mix softened butter and sugar until creamy. Add the egg and vanilla and beat well. In a separate mixing bowl, mix together the cornmeal, baking powder, salt and flour. Add to the creamed mixture. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake in a preheated 350 degree oven about 15 minutes or until lightly brown. ; name: cookie press cookies ; ingredients: unsalted butter, sugar, egg yolks, all-purpose flour, salt, pure vanilla extract ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f in a large bowl, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add egg yolks, flour, salt, and vanilla. Mix thoroughly. Fill a cookie press with the dough, and turn out cookies 1 to 2 inches apart onto an unbuttered baking sheet. Sprinkle cookies with colored sanding sugars. Bake until the cookies are lightly browned, 7 to 10 minutes. To ensure even baking, rotate sheet halfway through the baking process. Transfer to a wire rack, and let cool. ; name: eggless crisp sugar cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, sour cream, butter, milk, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat the oven to325f. Sift together the flour, sugar, baking powder and soda. Set aside. Cream together the sour cream, butter, milk and vanilla. Mix well. Stir in the flour mixture. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto greased cookie sheets, flatten with fork. Sprinkle with sugar. Bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, until firm and golden coloured. Cool for 2 minutes in the oven and remove to a wire rack to cool completely. ; name: golden sugar cookies ; ingredients: flour, vanilla, baking soda, lemon flavoring, cream of tartar, sugar, salt, egg yolks, butter ; preparation:Sift the first 4 ingredients together. Cream butter and extracts together until butter is softened. Add sugar gradually, creaming until fluffy after each addition. Add yolks one at a time, beating well after each addition. Add dry ingredients in 4ths, beating until just blended. Make balls, about 2-inches apart on ungreased sheets. Bake at 350 for 10 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: white chocolate pumpkin cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, pumpkin pie spice, baking soda, butter, brown sugar, pumpkin puree, eggs, vanilla extract, white chocolate chips, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 300f. In a small bowl whisk together the flour, pumpkin pie spice and the baking soda. In a medium bowl cream the butter and sugar. Beat in pumpkin pie puree until combined. Then beat in the eggs and vanilla. When the mixture is combined slowly beat in the flour mixture. Then stir in the white chocolate and the pecans. Drop dough by rounded tablespoon 2 inches apart on a ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 300f for 20 to 22 minutes until just set. ; name: eggnog cookies ; ingredients: white sugar, butter, eggnog, vanilla extract, egg yolks, ground nutmeg, all-purpose flour, baking powder, ground cinnamon ; preparation:

name: macaroni cheese ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, milk, velveeta cheese, elbow macaroni ; preparation:Bring 6 cups water to boil in large pot. Add macaroni and boil 6-8 minutes. Drain. In annother pot, over medium heat, slowly melt the butter. Remove from heat. Stir flour and salt into melted butter until mixture is smooth. Slowly add milk, stirring to avoid lumps. Return pan to heat. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly until thick and bubbly. Add cheese. Cook until cheese melts. Add macaroni and stir. ; name: macaroni cheese ; ingredients: small elbow macaroni, salt water, butter, milk, sharp cheddar cheese, paprika, salt and pepper ; preparation:Following package directions, cook macaroni in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente. Drain thoroughly. Melt butter in pot over medium-high heat, add milk, drained macaroni, cheese and paprika. Cook, stirring until cheese is melted. Season to taste with salt and pepper. ; name: basic macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, butter, flour, milk, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Boil and drain macaroni per box instructions. Melt the butter in a skillet. Sprinkle in flour and stir until pasty. Whisk in warmed milk and let cook until thickened. Add cheese to sauce. Add sauce to pasta. ; name: kfc macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, velveeta cheese, cheddar cheese, whole milk, salt ; preparation:In a pot bring water to a boil with salt to taste, once the water comes to a boil add the macaroni and cook for 12 to 15 minutes. When the noodles are cooked drain but do not rinse. To make the cheese sauce in a pan over low heat combine the velveeta cheese, shredded cheddar and the milk. Cook the cheeses till they are melted and then add the salt. Add the noodles and mix through. Place in a casserole dish and bake at 400 degrees for 10 to 15 minutes. You may want to broil the top to make a brown top. ; name: four cheese macaroni ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, milk, butter, white pepper, salt, american cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, ricotta cheese, crackers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degree f. In a large pot cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain. Return to pot. Add milk, melted butter, pepper, and salt. Stir in cheeses. Transfer to a greased 2-quart casserole. Bake, uncovered, for 15 minutes. Carefully stir mixture. Sprinkle with crushed crackers. Bake 5 minutes more or until crackers are browned and mixture is just heated through. Let stand 10 minutes before serving. ; name: crusty macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: butter, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, american cheese, elbow macaroni, cayenne, salt, whole milk ; preparation:Heat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Use one tablespoon butter to thickly grease a 9-by-13-inch baking dish. Combine grated cheeses and set aside two heaping cups for topping. In a large bowl, toss together the cooked pasta, cheeses, cayenne and salt to taste. Place mixture in prepared pan and evenly pour milk over surface. Sprinkle reserved cheese on top. Dot with remaining butter. Bake, uncovered, for 45 minutes. Raise heat to 400 degrees fahrenheit and bake 15 to 20 minutes more, until crusty on top and bottom. ; name: real deal macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, butter, flour, pepper, paprika, milk, cheese ; preparation:Melt butter and blend in flour and pepper, blending well. Add milk and stir constantly over medium heat until thickened. Add 1 cup of the grated cheese and stir until melted. Combine macaroni with sauce and pour into a lightly greased 2-quart casserole dish. Top with remaining cheese and sprinkle paprika on top. Bake uncovered at 375 for 25 minutes. ; name: home made macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, butter, evaporated milk, milk, sharp cheddar cheese, monterey jack cheese, velveeta cheese, ground cayenne pepper, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: ginger marinade for chicken ; ingredients: black pepper, salt, ginger, garlic cloves, olive oil, lemon juice, skinless chicken ; preparation:Blend salt, ginger, pepper, garlic, oil, & lemon juice in a bowl. Take a skewer or sharp knife & poke several holes into the chicken. Rub the mixture into the chicken so that all sides are covered. Place chicken into a glass bowl & cover with the remaining mixture. Let it marinate for at least 2 hours. Cook the chicken either baked, broiled, or grilled. All are good. ; name: chicken with ginger ; ingredients: fresh ginger, canola oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, onion, garlic cloves, soy sauce, white vinegar, sugar, scallion ; preparation:Soak ginger in cold water 10 minutes. Drain. Heat oil in a skillet over high heat. Brown chicken in two batches, 6 to 8 minutes. Set aside. In same skillet over medium heat, cook ginger, onion, and garlic, stirring until browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Add soy sauce, vinegar, and sugar. Cook over high heat until thick, 3 to 4 minutes. Add chicken. Stir to warm. Remove from heat. Stir in scallions. ; name: grilled ginger chicken ; ingredients: soy sauce, lime juice, liquid honey, fresh ginger, garlic, tabasco sauce, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:In a small bowl, stir soy sauce, lime juice, honey, ginger, garlic and tobasco. If you want this as a marinade, make this several hours in advance, pour into a ziploc bag, add chicken and marinate in fridge for several hours shaking often. Alternatively, you can brush both sides of the chicken after making the sauce for a quick meal. Lightly oil grill and then heat bbq to medium. Bbq with lid closed, turning and basting halfway through with remaining marinade. Remember not to baste chicken before taking off grill since raw chicken was in it. Make sure the baste is fully cooked before removing from grill. Grill for 12- 16 minutes until juices run clear. ; name: citrus ginger chicken ; ingredients: fresh lemon juice, lime juice, orange juice, gingerroot, whole grain mustard, honey, low sodium soy sauce, ground coriander, green onion, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Combine ingredients for marinade. Remove all visible fat from chicken. Place in shallow bowl and pour marinade over. Cover and marinate for at least 2 hours. Remove chicken from marinade and reserve marinade. Saute chicken breasts in a nonstick skillet coated with nonstick cooking spray. Turn and saute until done. Remove from skillet and keep warm. Add reserved marinade to skillet and bring to a boil for 5 minutes. Spoon sauce over chicken and serve. ; name: chicken in creamy ginger sauce ; ingredients: chicken breasts, flour, paprika, butter, cream of chicken soup, milk, ground ginger ; preparation:Pre-heat oven 400 degrees. Mix flour and paprika in bowl or plastic bag. Coat chicken breasts in flour mixture and place in lightly greased baking dish. Pour melted butter over chicken and bake 20 minutes, turn chicken pieces over and bake another 20 minutes. While chicken is baking, mix together cream of chicken soup, milk, and ginger in a small sauce pan and heat on med-low, stirring until blended and heated through. Do not boil. Pour soup mixture over chicken and return to oven for another 20 minutes. The top will be slightly browned. ; name: soy sauce and honey marinated chicken ; ingredients: chicken breasts, soy sauce, honey, spring onions, garlic, fresh ginger, five-spice powder, vegetable oil, walnut oil, port wine ; preparation:Combine all the ingredients except for the chicken. Mix well. Marinate the chicken pieces in this and refrigerate for at least 4 hours. Preheat oven to 350f. Remove chicken from marinade and discard marinade. Bake chicken for about 25 minutes, until lightly browned, but not dried out. ; name: sauteed orange chicken with ginger ; ingredients: chicken legs, salt and pepper, vegetable oil, garlic cloves, orange juice, navel oranges, fresh ginger, white vinegar, dried basil ; preparation:Season chicken with salt and pepper. In a large frying pan, heat oil over medium heat. Add chicken and cook, turning, until brown all over, about 10 minutes. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute. Pour orange juice over chicken. Add orange sections, ginger, vinegar, and basil. Stir well. Cover and simmer for about 30 minutes, until chicken is tender. ; name: marinated ginger chicken ; ingredients: frying chickens, lemon juice, vegetable oil, soy sauce, gingerroot, onion salt, garlic powder ; preparation:

name: red rice sausage ; ingredients: vegetable oil, hot smoked sausage, onion, green pepper, celery, water, tomato sauce, salt, black pepper, parboiled rice ; preparation:Heat the oil in a heavy pan over medium heat. Add the sausage pieces and cook until brown, about 5 minutes. Add the onions, green peppers, and celery. Cook for 3 minutes. Add the water, tomato sauce, salt and pepper. Heat to boiling. Stir in the rice. Reduce heat to simmer. Cook covered, until rice is tender, about 30 minutes. Remove from heat and keep covered until time to serve. ; name: easy sausage and rice ; ingredients: breakfast sausage, green pepper, onion, celery, water, long grain rice, salt, pepper ; preparation:Brown sausage, green pepper, onion and celery. Drain well. Add water, rice, salt and pepper and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer 15-20 minutes until rice is tender. Remove from heat and allow to rest 10 minutes. Enjoy. ; name: baked rice with sausage ; ingredients: bulk italian sausage, celery ribs, onion, green pepper, water, chicken noodle soup mix, condensed cream of chicken soup, long grain rice, dry breadcrumbs, butter ; preparation:In a skillet, cook the sausage, celery, onion and green pepper over medium heat and drain. In a saucepan, bring water to a boil and add dry soup mix. Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes or until the noodles are tender. Stir in canned soup, rice and sausage mixture and mix well. Transfer to a greased 13-in. X 9-in. X 2-in. Baking dish. Cover and bake at 350 for 40 minutes. Toss bread crumbs and butter and sprinkle over rice mixture. Bake, uncovered, for 10-15 minutes or until rice is tender. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving. ; name: wild rice and sausage ; ingredients: wild rice, onion, celery, mushrooms, sausage, flour, milk, buttered bread crumb, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Fry sausage until brown and drain off grease. Saut mushrooms, celery and onions in butter until tender. Add flour and stir until smooth. Gradually add milk, stirring constantly and keep stirring until sauce is thick and smooth. Add worcestershire sauce, rice and sausage to mushroom sauce and place mixture in a greased casserole dish. Top with buttered bread crumbs and bake at 375f for 30 minutes. ; name: sausage and wild rice casserole ; ingredients: wild rice, sausage links, onion, celery salt, mushrooms, water, cream of mushroom soup, salt and pepper ; preparation:Grease a 2-quart casserole dish. Soften your wild rice the night before. If using some white grain rice cook that the day you make this. Cut sausage links into bite size pieces and fry until done. Salt and pepper to taste. Mix all ingredients together and put into the casserole dish. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. ; name: fried rice with pork ; ingredients: long-grain rice, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, pork, eggs, fish sauce, soy sauce, sugar ; preparation:Cook the rice in boiling salted water for 11 minutes. Heat the oil in a wok or frying pan. Add the onion and garlic. Cook the onion and garlic for 2 minutes, then add the pork and stir-fry until it is cooked. Add the eggs and cook until scrambled into small lumps. Add the rice and continue to stir and toss, to coat it with the oil and prevent it from sticking. Stir in the fish sauce, soy sauce, and sugar and mix well. Continue to fry until the rice is thoroughly heated. Serve. ; name: pork chops rice ; ingredients: pork chops, oil, cream of mushroom soup, milk, water, white rice, pepper ; preparation:Brown pork chops in oil then place in large baking dish or roaster. While browning, mix soup, milk and water in large bowl. Pour rice over chops, then pour soup mixture over all. Sprinkle with pepper according to taste. Cover with foil and bake at 350 degrees fahrenheit for 1 hr or until tender. ; name: baby kay s dirty rice ; ingredients: pork sausage, ground beef, cayenne pepper, black pepper, salt, onion, celery, green bell pepper, long grain rice ; preparation:

name: lingonberry cake norway ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, unsalted butter, egg, lingonberry preserves, oatmeal, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400 degrees f. Combine flour, sugar, and baking powder, then cut in the butter with pastry blender. Add the egg and mix well. Fold in the lingonberry preserves. Spread into a greased 8x12 inch pan. Combine the streusel ingredients, and. Spread it over the batter. Bake 25-30 minutes, until golden. Cool in the pan. Lift out a quarter or half of the cake, and cut into slices. Continue with portions in this way. ; name: danish dessert cake mignon s recipe sarah ; ingredients: white cake mix, water, egg whites, oil, cream cheese, powdered sugar, whipping cream, junket danish dessert mix, frozen strawberries ; preparation:Use a little more than half of the cake mix, add water, egg whites and oil. Bake as directed in a 9x13 inch pan. Let cake cool. Mix the powered sugar with the cream cheese together till smooth. Whip the whipping cream and fold into powered sugar and cream cheese mixture. Pour on cooled cake and put in fridge. Cook danish dessert according to package directions. When danish dessert has cooled add fruit and put on top of cream cheese mixture. ; name: pancakes with lingonberries sweden ; ingredients: sifted flour, granulated sugar, salt, eggs, milk, butter, lingonberry preserves ; preparation:Sift flour, sugar and salt together. Add eggs and milk gradually. Stir until thoroughly mixed. Let stand 1 to 2 hours. Heat a griddle, skillet or tempered swedish pancake pan. Brush well with butter. Spread hot cake batter thin. Brown on each side. Roll hot cakes. Serve with lingonberry preserves. ; name: norwegian apple cake ; ingredients: sugar, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, vanilla, apples, walnuts, cinnamon sugar ; preparation:Combine dry ingredients and add sugar. Add egg and vanilla, then stir in apples and walnuts. Liberally butter a bundt pan and pour batter in. Bake 375 degrees for approx. 50 minutes. Remove from pan when semi-cool and sprinkle liberally with cinnamon sugar. ; name: lingonberry bars ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, pecans, egg, butter, lingonberry preserves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 9x9 baking pan or line with parchment. Combine all ingredients together, except for lingonberry preserves. Mix on low speed until crumbly. Set aside one cup of crumb mixture. Press remaining crumb mixture onto bottom of prepared pan. Spread the preserves evenly. Crumble rest of mixture over the preserves. Bake approximately 45 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool and cut into desired servings. ; name: norwegian gold cake ; ingredients: butter, all-purpose flour, eggs, sugar, baking powder, salt, vanilla ; preparation:Place butter and flour in a mixing bowl. Mix 5 minutes at low speed. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Sift together sugar, baking powder and salt. Add gradually to creamed mixture. Add vanilla and mix additionaly 2 minutes. Turn into greased and floured 10 inch tube or bundt pan. Bake at 325 degrees for 1 hour. ; name: fresh strawberry cream cake ; ingredients: white cake mix, water, oil, eggs, powdered sugar, cream cheese, heavy cream, fresh strawberries, strawberry glaze ; preparation:Beat together cake layer ingredients until well-mixed. Pour into a greased and floured sheet pan and bake at 350 for about 20-25 minutes. Allow cake to cool to room temperature. Cream together powdered sugar and cream cheese. Fold in whipped cream. Spread cream mixture over the baked and cooled cake. Slice fresh strawberries in half and arrange prettily cut side up over the cream layer. Pour glaze over the cut strawberries so that no white cream layer shows though. This cake is best served cold, so i always refrigerate for a couple hours before serving. Slice in squares and serve. ; name: norwegian lingonberry cake with streusel topping ; ingredients: flour, sugar, cardamom, baking powder, unsalted butter, egg, lingonberry preserves, oatmeal, butter, vanilla extract ; preparation:

name: pickled garlic ; ingredients: garlic cloves, white vinegar, water, salt, sugar, dill, mustard seeds, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:Bring vinegar, water and spices to a boil. Add garlic and bring back to a boil. Pour into clean, sterilized jars. Seal tight and store in cool place. Keep sealed for 3 weeks before using to get best flavor. Separating garlic into cloves and soaking them for 2 or 3 hours makes the outer skin easier to remove. ; name: persian sugar pickled garlic ; ingredients: garlic, dried hot peppers, sugar, red wine vinegar, water, cloves, black peppercorns ; preparation:Separate garlic cloves, but do not peel. Place all ingredients in a large heavy-bottom saucepan. Bring to a boil. Cook for 10 minutes, stirring from time to time. Reduce heat to medium and cook 5 minutes. Cool to room temperature. Transfer to a large glass or ceramic jar large enough to hold garlic and the liquid. Tightly seal. Refrigerate at least 1 month before serving. The garlic improves with age for as long as 15 years. ; name: quick sweet pickles ; ingredients: white wine vinegar, sugar, salt, pickling cucumbers, red onions, dill sprigs, peppercorn, olive oil ; preparation:In a medium bowl, mix vinegar, sugar, and salt, stirring occasionally, until sugar dissolves. Set aside. In a nonreactive bowl, combine cucumbers, onions, dill, and peppercorns. Add olive oil to reserved vinegar mixture and stir well. Pour over vegetables and toss to combine. Cover bowl and refrigerate for at least 8 hours before serving. Store pickles, refrigerated, for up to 5 days. ; name: nana mae s garlic dill pickles ; ingredients: white vinegar, water, kosher salt, garlic cloves, dill flowers, cucumbers ; preparation:Boil together vinegar, water and salt. Wash cukes and cut into spears. Pack in five clean and hot right from the oven, 1-quart canning jars. To each jar add 1-3 cloves of garlic, and 2-3 flowers of dill. Add boiling liquid. Seal with a hot lid. Allow to cool, then store on a shelf in your cupboard. ; name: microwave sweet pickles ; ingredients: salt, turmeric, mustard seeds, celery seed, white vinegar, sugar, cucumbers, onion ; preparation:In small bowl mix salt, tumeric, mustard seed, celery seed, vinegar and sugar. In microwavable bowl, mix cucumbers and onion. Pour vinegar mixture over cucumbers and onion. Microwave, uncovered, on high for 5 minutes. Stir well, return to microwave for 5 minutes more. Cool. Pour into quart jar and refrigerate. Pickles are ready to eat when thoroughly chilled. ; name: pickled cabbage and peppers ; ingredients: cabbage, bell peppers, pickling salt, sugar, white wine vinegar, hot pepper flakes, mustard seeds, garlic cloves ; preparation:In a large bowl or cork, toss the cabbage and peppers with the salt. Cover and let stand in a cool place for 8-12 hours. In a non-reactive saucepan, combine the sugar and vinegar. Bring to a boil, then let it cool. Rinse the cabbage, and drain it well. Toss with the pepper flakes, mustard seeds and garlic. Pack the vegetable mixture firmly into pint mason jars. Pour the vinegar mixture over the vegetables. Close the jars with hot two-piece caps. Process the jars for 20 minutes in a boiling water bath. Store the cooled jars in a cool, dry, dark place for at least 3 weeks before eating the cabbage. ; name: pickled hot peppers ; ingredients: white vinegar, water, olive oil, kosher salt, pickling spices, hot pepper, garlic, yellow onions ; preparation:Combine vinegar, water, oil, salt and spices in a stainless steel pan. Bring to a boil, turn off heat, cover and and let flavors develop while you do the rest. Wash and dry peppers, trim stems but leave some on. Put 2 cloves of garlic in each canning jar. Alternate peppers and sliced onions. Pack tight with 1 inch headspace. Bring liquid back to a boil, and pour over peppers leaving one inch for air space. Top with lids, screw on bands, and process in waterbath canner for 10 minutes. ; name: joanne s sweet and hot pickles ; ingredients: kosher dill pickles, sugar, tabasco sauce, garlic ; preparation:

name: scandinavian potato lefse ; ingredients: mashed potatoes, flour, cream, butter, salt, sugar ; preparation:Mix all but the flour while hot. Cool. Add 1 cup flour at a time, enough to roll out. Divide dough into balls about the size of tennis balls. Roll balls out on floured board. Fry the lefse in a grill or in an iron skillet at very high heat. Serve with a little butter, or anything else you might want to wrap up in it. ; name: badische schupfnudeln spaetzle ; ingredients: potatoes, flour, salt, egg, nutmeg, parsley, lard ; preparation:Boil the potatoes in their jackets for 25-30 minutes. Peel the potatoes and put them on a lightly floured board. Mash them with a rolling pin. Add flour, egg, parsley, salt and nutmeg. Knead well to form a smooth dough. Roll out the dough to about 1 cm thick or to the thickness of your thumb. Cut flattened dough into thin strips of 5 cm long. Gently roll out the strips or stretch them until the ends taper. Leave aside for 15 minutes. Heat lard in a pan and fry the noodles till golden brown. Serve with roast pork, racks of lamb, sauerkraut or any cabbage dish. ; name: swedish creamed potatoes with dill ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, flour, cream, kosher salt, white pepper, fresh dill ; preparation:Boil whole, unpeeled potatoes in unsalted water until fork-tender. Remove and allow to sit until cool enough to touch. Peel potatoes, then chop into 1 dice. In a saucepan over medium-high heat, stir together butter and flour to make a light roux, but do not allow to darken. Add cream, salt, and pepper and whisk steadily until incorporated and thickened into a cream sauce, about 5 minutes. Stir in potatoes, turn heat to medium-low, and allow potatoes to stew just until warmed. Garnish with chopped dill and serve. ; name: southern sweet potato bread ; ingredients: self-rising flour, nutmeg, cinnamon, sugar, eggs, vegetable oil, milk, sweet potato, pecans, golden raisin ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. Grease bottom only of an 8x4x2-inch loaf pan. Stir together flour and spices in mixing bowl. With a spoon, stir in sugar, eggs, oil and milk. Blend well. Stir in sweet potatoes, pecans and raisins. Pour batter into prepared pan. Bake 1 hour and 10 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool in pan 15 minutes. Remove from pan and cool on wire rack. For easier slicing, wrap loaf and store overnight in a cool place. Bread mellows over time and will keep for several days. ; name: basil butter sweet potato patties ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, fresh basil, pine nuts, garlic cloves, parmesan cheese, whole wheat breadcrumbs, olive oil ; preparation:Boil, steam or microwave the sweet potato until it is tender. Drain. Mash the sweet potato with butter in a medium bowl. Stir in the basil, nuts, garlic, cheese and breadcrumbs. When cool enough to handle, shape the sweet potato mixture into 8 patties. Heat the oil in a large pan, preferably non-stick, and cook the patties in 2 batches, until browned on both sides and heated through. Serve with your choice of meats and salad greens. ; name: candied sweet potatoes southern traditional ; ingredients: butter, sweet potatoes, white sugar, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, salt ; preparation:Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-low heat. While butter is melting, in a small bowl combine sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg and salt. Add sliced potatoes to melted butter and turn to coat. Sprinkle sugar mixture over potatoes, stir to coat. Cover skillet, reduce heat to low. Stirring occasionally, cook for 50-60 minutes, or until potatoes are tender. ; name: potato pancakes kartoffelpletter ; ingredients: potatoes, salt, rye flour, white flour, egg whites ; preparation:Cook the potatoes in their jackets, in a pot of boiling water, until just tender. Drain and cool slightly. Peel potatoes, add salt and mash while warm. Work the flours into the mashed potatoes, a little at a time with egg whites. Knead the dough well. Divide dough into eight pieces and roll each piece on a lightly floured board into a thin round cake. Cook on both sides on a greased griddle over medium-low heat until done. Watch them closely to keep them from burning. Serve with toppings of your choice. ; name: gramma grampa fjerstad s lefse ; ingredients: potatoes, heavy cream, butter, salt, flour ; preparation:

name: sugar free pumpkin custard ; ingredients: egg, egg white, equal sugar substitute, canned pumpkin, evaporated milk, cinnamon ; preparation:Put pumpkin and evaporated milk in mixing bowl. Break an egg and egg white into the mixture. With mixer or wooden spoon, beat mixture until smooth. Add the cinnamon. Mix well. Pour into custard cups. Place water inside casserole pan and put custard cups inches. Bake 15 minutes at 425f. Lower temperature to 350f and bake for another 40 to 45 minutes or until knife inserted comes out clean. ; name: festal golden pumpkin pie ; ingredients: canned pumpkin, deep dish pie shells, eggs, granulated sugar, salt, cinnamon, clove, nutmeg, ginger, carnation evaporated milk ; preparation:Prepare 1 pie crust. Combine eggs, sugar, salt, and spices and beat well. Blend in pumpkin. Add milk and beat well. Turn into pastry lined pie pan. Bake in a hot oven for 10 minutes, then reduce heat and bake at 350 degrees for 40 to 45 minutes. Pie is done when knife, inserted in center, comes out clean. Cool on rack for 2 hours, then serve immediately or refrigerate. ; name: good ol pumpkin pie ; ingredients: sugar, cinnamon, ginger, nutmeg, salt, flour, pumpkin, evaporated milk, eggs, margarine ; preparation:Combine sugar, spices and flour. Add all other ingredients and beat until smooth. Pour into unbaked pie shell. Bake at 400 for 15 minutes. Reduce oven temperature to 350 and bake another 45 minutes or until knife blade comes out clean when inserted in center of pie. ; name: pumpkins spice muffins ; ingredients: canned pumpkin, milk, egg, biscuit mix, sugar, ground nutmeg, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. In a mixing bowl, combine pumpkin, milk and egg with a fork. Combine dry ingredients. Add to mixing bowl and stir just until moistened. Spoon into 12 well-greased muffin cups. Combine streusel ingredients. Sprinkle over muffins. Bake at 400f for 15 minutes or until golden brown. Serve warm. ; name: pumpkin butter no cook ; ingredients: butter, powdered sugar, canned pumpkin, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg ; preparation:Beat butter at medium speed of an electric mixer until creamy. Gradually add sugar, beating well. Add pumpkin, cinnamon and nutmeg. Mix well. Cover and chill at least 3 hours. Let butter stand at room temperature to soften before serving. ; name: pumpkin pie and dairy free too ; ingredients: unbaked 9-inch pie shell, eggs, brown sugar, cinnamon, powdered ginger, ground nutmeg, salt, cooked pumpkin, soymilk ; preparation:Whip eggs until frothy. Beat in sugar, then spices and salt. Add pumpkin and soy milk and beat until well blended and smooth. Pour mixture into pie shell. Bake at 450f for 10 minutes. Reduce heat to 350f and bake for 30 to 35 more minutes. ; name: spiced pumpkin fudge ; ingredients: sugar, butter, evaporated milk, canned pumpkin, pumpkin pie spice, butterscotch chips, marshmallow creme, almonds, vanilla ; preparation:In a heavy saucepan, combine sugar, butter, milk, pumpkin and spice. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly until mixture reaches 234 degrees on a candy thermometer, about 10 minutes. Emove from heat and stir in butterscotch morsels. Add marshmallow cream, nuts and vanilla, mixing until well blended. Quickly pour into a greased 13x9 baking pan, spreading until even. Let cool at room temperature and cut into squares. Wrap tightly and store in refrigerator. ; name: microwave pumpkin custard ; ingredients: canned pumpkin, evaporated skim milk, light-brown sugar, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, ground nutmeg, salt, egg, egg white ; preparation:

name: easy creamy baked chicken breasts ; ingredients: chicken pieces, condensed cream of chicken soup, condensed cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, half-and-half, parmesan cheese, chives, seasoning salt, pepper, paprika ; preparation:Set oven to 350 degrees. Grease a 13x9 baking pan. Place chicken in greased baking dish. In a bowl, combine the soups, sour cream, milk, chives, salt and pepper. Spoon over chicken. Sprinkle with paprika. Bake, uncovered for 50 mins-1 hour, or until chicken is done. ; name: chicken breasts elegant ; ingredients: cream of mushroom soup, cream of chicken soup, sauterne white wine, green pepper, water chestnuts, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Butter a shallow flat casserole dish and lay chicken in the bottom. Combine remaining ingredients and pour over chicken. Cover dish with foil and bake 1 hour. Remove foil and bake for 10 minutes more or until done. ; name: chicken breasts in sour cream gravy ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt, garlic powder, pepper, cajun seasoning, butter, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, onion rings ; preparation:Place chicken in 9x13 pan. Season each piece and top with butter pats. Bake at 350 degrees for 35 minutes. Remove chicken from pan. Pour drippings into a small mixing bowl and add soup and sour cream, stirring well. Replace chicken in pan and pour gravy mixture over it. Bake for 20 minutes. Top with onion rings and bake for 5 more minutes. Serve with wild rice. ; name: creamed chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, vegetable oil, cream of chicken soup, water, salt, black pepper, sour cream, english muffins, cayenne pepper, paprika ; preparation:In a large skillet, saute the chicken in oil until no longer pink. Stir in the soup, water, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Remove from heat and stin in sour cream. Serve over toasted english muffins. Can also serve over cooked noodles. Sprinkle with cayenne pepper or paprika. ; name: that chicken stuff ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cream of mushroom soup, cream of chicken soup, swanson chicken broth, extra virgin olive oil, salt, pepper, accent seasoning, season salt ; preparation:Preheat oil in a pan. Cut chicken in bite size pieces. Put chicken in preheated oil. Season with salt, pepper, accent and season salt to your liking. Cook chicken until fully cooked. Add chicken broth, cream of chicken soup and cream of mushroom soup. Simmer for 10 minutes. Serve over mashed potatoes or noodles. ; name: creamy baked chicken breasts ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, swiss cheese, cream of chicken soup, dry white wine, herb seasoned stuffing mix, butter ; preparation:Arrange chicken in lightly greased 13x9x2 inch pan top with cheese slices. Combine soup& wine stirring well. Spoon sauce over chicken and sprinkle prepared stuffing mix over top. Drizzle butter over crumbs. Bake at 350 for 45-50 minutes. May be made ahead and stored in fridge. ; name: baked chicken breast ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, water, cheese, seasoned stuffing mix, butter ; preparation:Lightly spray 9 x 13 baking dish. Arrange chicken breasts in baking dish. Combine soup and water. Pour over chicken. Sprinkle cheese on top of soup mixture. Sprinkle stuffing mix on top of cheese. Drizzle melted butter on top. Bake at 350 degrees for approximately 1 hour. ; name: chicken breasts royal ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, condensed cream of mushroom soup, fat free sour cream, all-purpose flour, green onions, white wine, seasoning salt, paprika, liquid gravy browner ; preparation:

name: mediterranean cod ; ingredients: cod, olive oil, red onion, plum tomatoes, black olives, dried thyme, dried basil ; preparation:Rinse fish, pat dry with paper towels. Season fish with salt and pepper to taste. In a large skillet heat 4 tsp of the oil over medium high heat. Add fish and onion. Cook 1 minute, turning once. Top fish with tomatoes, olives and thyme. Reduce heat. Cover and cook 2 minutes. Drizzle with remaining 4tsp oil, sprinkle with basil. Cover and cook 2-3 minutes more or until fish flakes easily with a fork. ; name: roasted cod with potatoes and olives ; ingredients: new potatoes, garlic cloves, dried rosemary, olive oil, salt and pepper, cod fish fillets, cherry tomatoes, kalamata olive ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 450f. On a large rimmed baking sheet, toss the potatoes with the garlic, rosemary, and 1 tbs oil. Season generously with salt and pepper. Arrange potatoes in a single layer, cut side down. Bake, tossing potatoes once, until beginning to brown, about 20 minute. Meanwhile, rub fillets with remaining tsp oil and season all sides with salt and pepper. Remove baking sheet from the oven. Add the tomatoes and olives to the potatoes. Stir to combine. Push the vegetable mixture to one side of the baking sheet and place the fillets flat on the baking sheet next to the vegetables. Return the baking sheet to the oven and roast until the fish is cooked through and potatoes are brown and tender, about 15-20 minute. Transfer the fish and vegetables to a serving platter and serve immediately. ; name: cod portuguese ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic clove, green pepper, chopped tomatoes, paprika, orange, juice of, cod fish fillets, salt and pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat the oil in a heavy fry pan and saute the onion, garlic and pepper for about 5-7 minutes until softened. Add the tomatoes, paprika and orange juice. Season, stir well and simmer for a further 5 minutes. Lay the fish fillets on top, cutting them to fit the pan if necessary. Season lightly, cover and simmer gently for 12-15 minutes or until the fish is cooked but still firm. Transfer to serving dishes and sprinkle with parsley. Serve. ; name: cod chickpea olive stew ; ingredients: cod fish fillets, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, white wine, bay leaves, chopped tomatoes, chickpeas, black olives, water ; preparation:Fry the onions in the olive oil until softened. Add the garlic, white wine, and the bay leaves, simmer until reduced slightly. Add the tomatoes, chickpeas, olives, salt & pepper and the water. Simmer for 15 minutes. Add the cod and simmer for 6 to 8 minutes. ; name: easy oven baked cod ; ingredients: plain breadcrumbs, fresh parsley, garlic cloves, lemon, zest of, coarse salt, cod fish fillets, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f line your pan with aluminum foil and lightly brush with olive oil, or use a bit of cooking spray. Combine parsley, garlic, lemon zest, and coarse salt on the cutting board. Finely chop, then combine with the breadcrumbs in a shallow plate. Brush top of each fillet with olive oil. Press fillet into the crumb mixture. Place fillets in baking dish, crust-side up. Bake until firm, about 12-15 minutes, depending on the thickness of the fish. Serve with lemon wedges. ; name: cod with tomatoes and olives ; ingredients: cod, light olive oil, garlic, roma tomatoes, pimento stuffed olives, dry white wine, mandarin orange, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Rinse fish and pat dry. Sprinkle with salt& pepper. Heat oven-proof skillet on med-hi heat. Add oil and saute garlic. Add fish, sear 1 minute on each side. Sprinkle tomatoes with salt and pepper. Add tomatoes and olives to skillet. Pour wine over ingredients. Cover with lid and place in oven 5- 7 minutes. Uncover and bake 2 more minutes. Add mandarin oranges and allow to warm slightly. ; name: cod with garlic ; ingredients: scrod fish, garlic cloves, margarine, vegetable oil, lemon juice, salt, cilantro ; preparation:Fillets should be cut to make 8 servings. Place the fish fillets on a rack in a broiler pan. In a small pan cook and stir the garlic in the margarine and oil until golden brown,. Remove garlic and set aside. Drizzle the margarine mixture and lemon juice over the fillets then sprinkle with the salt. Set oven control to broil. Broil the fish with the tops of the fillets about 3-inches from the heat until the fillets flake easily with a fork, about 10 to 12 minutes. Sprinkle with the reserved garlic and cilantro. Serve with lemon wedges, if desired. ; name: mediterranean skillet cod south beach diet phase 1 ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, zucchini, onion, garlic cloves, salt, fresh ground black pepper, diced tomatoes, roasted red pepper, cod, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: s mores bars ; ingredients: graham crackers, flour, brown sugar, butter, egg, heavy cream, milk chocolate chips, mini marshmallows ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees farenheit. Line an 8x8 pan with foil. To make crust, crumble crackers in a food processor, add the flour, brown sugar and butter, process until it resembles fine meal. Add the egg and mix only until moist. Transfer to pan and press into the bottom. Bake for 20 minutes and let cool completely. To make toppingplace cream in a saucepan and bring to a simmer. Remove from heat and add the chocolate, stir until smooth and completely melted. Mix in the marshmallows and pour on top of the crust and spread evenly. Chill for 2 hours and remove from pan and foil. Cut into 2 inch squares. Keep refrigerated. ; name: s mores marshmallow treat bars ; ingredients: mini marshmallows, butter, vanilla extract, golden grahams cereal, milk chocolate chips, nonstick cooking spray ; preparation:Spray 9x13 pan with non-stick cooking spray. Combine all but 1 cup marshmallows and butter in microwave safe bowl. Microwave on high 2 minutes or till melted and combined. Cook in 30 second intervals till combined. Add vanilla, mixing throughly. Then add cereal till combined. Add chocolate chips and reserved marshmallows. Pour into prepared pan, pressing with oiled fingers to make even. Cool on counter till sets up firm, approximately 1 hour. ; name: s mores treats ; ingredients: margarine, miniature marshmallows, cocoa krispies cereal, graham cracker, miniature marshmallow, miniature semisweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Microwave margarine and marshmallows at high 2 minutes in microwave-safe mixing bowl. Stir to combine. Microwave at high 1 minute longer. Stir until smooth. Add cocoa krispies cereal and graham cracker pieces. Stir until well coated. Gently stir the 1 cup marshmallows into the cereal mixture. Using buttered spatula or waxed paper, press mixture evenly into 13 x 9 x 2-inch pan. Sprinkle top with marshmallows and chocolate chips. Cut into 2-inch squares when cool. Best if served the same day. ; name: diet and have your s mores too ; ingredients: marshmallows, fat free chocolate syrup, low-fat graham crackers, fat-free caramel topping ; preparation:Using a long-handled fork, toast marshmallows 6 inches from medium-hot heat until golden brown, turning occasionally. Drizzle chocolate syrup over four graham crackers. Top each with two toasted marshmallows. Drizzle with caramel topping. Cover with remaining graham crackers. ; name: easy s mores pie ; ingredients: graham cracker crust, marshmallow cream, chocolate instant pudding, milk, cool whip ; preparation:Spread the marshmello cream in the bottom of the pie crust. Make the choc. Pudding and spread on top of the marshmello cream. Cover the pudding with cool whip and garnish with choc. Chips and crumbled graham crackers. ; name: raspberry s mores ; ingredients: graham crackers, marshmallows, chocolate candy bars, fresh raspberry ; preparation:Adjust rack to middle position and heat broiler. You may also use a toaster oven. Break the crackers in half to form squares and place on a baking sheet. Arrange 4 marshmallow halves on top of each square. Broil for 30-60 seconds or until golden brown. Remove from oven. Break chocolate bar into 12 pieces. Arrange the chocolate and raspberries on one half of the crackers. Invert remaining marshmallow topped crackers onto the raspberry and chocolate topped crackers, pressing gently to for a cookies sandwich. ; name: chocolate raspberry s mores ; ingredients: chocolate graham crackers, marshmallows, chocolate candy bars, raspberries ; preparation:Break graham crackers crosswise into squares. Toast marshmallows until lightly browned and melted. Divide chocolate bar into 4 pieces and place 1 piece each on 4 graham cracker squares. Top chocolate with marshmallow. Place raspberries on top of marshmallow. Top with remaining graham crackers and press lightly. Serve warm. ; name: s mores ice cream homemade ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, heavy cream, milk, vanilla, honey graham crackers, hershey bar, miniature marshmallow ; preparation:

name: so simple oyster stew ; ingredients: oyster, milk, margarine, fresh ground white pepper, salt, paprika, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat oysters in their liquid in medium saucepan over high heat until oyster edges begin to curl, about 2 to 3 minutes. Heat milk and margarine together in large saucepan over medium high heat just to boiling. Add the salt and pepper. Stir in the oysters and their liquid. Do not bring back to a boil or oysters will get tough. Pour stew in a large serving soup bowl. Dust with paprika and sprinkle with parsley. ; name: grilled oysters ; ingredients: onion, hoisin sauce, garlic, hot pepper flakes, oysters, cilantro, wooden skewers ; preparation:Stir together onion, hoisin, garlic& pepper flakes. Add oysters and marinate for 15 minutes. Thread 2 oysters onto each skewer. Place on greased grill over high heat. Brush with reserved marinade. Cook, turning once, for 2 minutes or until firm. Sprinkle with cilantro. ; name: golden fried oysters ; ingredients: flour, yellow cornmeal, chili powder, salt, pepper, peanut oil, oysters, mayonnaise, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Combine flour, cornmeal, chili powder, salt and pepper. Set aside. Heat oil in cast iron skillet until it reaches 350 or flour bubbles immediately upon being sprinkled in it. Dredge oysters in flour mixture, shake off excess flour and fry in oil until golden brown, about 2 minutes. Transfer to paper towels. ; name: oysters with soy and sesame dressing ; ingredients: light soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, sesame oil, oysters, green onions ; preparation:Place the soy sauce, vinegar and oil in a screw-top jar and shake until well combined. Place the oysters on a large serving platter. Drizzle over the soy and sesame dressing. Sprinkle with the green shallots. Serve immediately. ; name: big john s cajun fried oysters ; ingredients: oyster, butter, eggs, milk, habanero sauce, cornmeal, cajun seasoning, cayenne pepper, baking powder, hot pepper oil ; preparation:Drain oysters, reserving the liquid. Mix oyster liquid, eggs, hot sauce and milk. Mix cornmeal, cajun seasoning, cayenne and baking powder. Saute oysters in butter until edges curl. Remove from heat and let cool. Dip oysters first in liquid, then dredge in cornmeal mixture. Fry oysters in hot pepper oil for three minutes over medium heat, turning once, they are done when golden brown. Remove, drain on paper towels. Serve immediately. ; name: stir fried oysters with garlic ; ingredients: oyster, cornstarch, oyster sauce, soy sauce, oil, white wine, garlic, green onions, ginger ; preparation:Boil 4 cups water in pot and add oysters for 10-15 seconds. Remove with slotten spoon to paper towels to drain. Blend cornstarch with 4 tbs water and add oyster and soy sauce. Heat oil in wok, add wine, oysters, green onion& ginger. Stir fry 15 seconds. Add cornstarch mixture and stir fry 1 minute. Enjoy. ; name: grilled barbecued oysters ; ingredients: hot sauce, worcestershire sauce, fresh lemon juice, olive oil, salt, black pepper, garlic cloves, oysters, fresh parsley, lemon wedges ; preparation:Combine the hot sauce, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, pepper, and garlic in a small saucepan, and stir well. Prepare grill. Place saucepan containing sauce on grill rack. Place the oysters on grill rack, and grill 5 min or so until a few oysters begin to open. Remove oysters from heat. Carefully open oysters, leaving on the half shell. Sprinkle oysters with parsley, and drizzle with sauce. Serve with lemon wedges. ; name: quick light oyster stew ; ingredients: water, butter, worcestershire sauce, canned oysters, salt, russet potato, low-fat milk, white pepper, ground nutmeg ; preparation:

name: yellow squash with basil ; ingredients: olive oil, yellow squash, garlic, water, salt, black pepper, basil ; preparation:Heat oil in skillet over medium-high heat. Saute squash until browned, about 5 minutes. Add garlic. Saute 1 minute. Add water, salt and pepper. Simmer until squash is tender, 6-7 minutes. Stir in basil. ; name: roasted yellow squash ; ingredients: water, olive oil, garlic clove, yellow squash, salt, pepper, baby spinach ; preparation:Combine water, oil, and garlic in a roasting pan. Add squash and season with salt and pepper. Using your hands, turn the squash in the oil mixture to make sure it is well coated. Bake at 220c for 20-30 minutes, until just starting to brown, stirring halfway through cooking. Divide baby spinach between palte. Top with squash, and drizzle with a small amount of the pan juices. ; name: butternut squash with garlic and olive oil ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, butternut squash, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Peel and cube squash. In a large bowl mix minced garlic and olive oil. Add cubed squash and coat with the oil mixture. Dump all ingredients out of bowl and in to a glass casserole dish. Any size will do really but it will cook faster if it is more spread out. Cook 40-45 minutes, stirring once or twice. Squash is done when it is tender. ; name: squash snackers ; ingredients: yellow squash, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh garlic, fresh basil, celery salt, asiago cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Coat the bottom of a casserole dish with olive oil. Line the bottom of the dish with the squash making sure that they are laid out evenly and sprinkle with vinegar. Top with even amounts of garlic, basil and celery salt. Bake uncovered at 350 for 20 minutes. Remove from oven and add about one cube of cheese per slice. Cook for another 15 minutes remove and let cool for five minutes and serve on crackers or eat by themselves. ; name: yellow squash and corn saute ; ingredients: corn, yellow squash, water, butter, fresh parsley, salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:Place corn into large pot and cover with salted water, bring to boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, 10 to 15 minutes. Drain and cool corn. Cut corn off the cobs. Place squash into a skillet and add water. Cook suash over medium heat until tender, 5- to 10 minutes. Drain any excess water fromskillet. Stir corn butter parsley salt and pepper into squash. Cook, stirring occasionally, until heated through, about 5 minutes. ; name: squash and pepper saute ; ingredients: yellow squash, zucchini, sweet red pepper, olive oil, italian salad dressing mix, red wine vinegar ; preparation:In a large skillet or wok, stir fry the vegetables in oil until crisp-tender. Sprinkle with salad dressing mix. Toss to coat. Stir in vinegar. Mix well. ; name: squashed cabbage ; ingredients: cabbage, zucchini, onion, garlic cloves, butter, salt, pepper ; preparation:Shred cabbage. Shred onion, i used my cheese grater. Shred squash. Dice garlic. In medium pot melt butter. Add the cabbage, onion, squash and garlic. Stir often. Cook until the veggies are still a little crisp. Salt and pepper to taste. ; name: smothered yellow squash with basil ; ingredients: olive oil, yellow squash, garlic cloves, water, salt, pepper, fresh basil ; preparation:

name: green beans with mushroom cream ; ingredients: fresh green beans, butter, mushrooms, garlic, heavy cream, salt & freshly ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley ; preparation:Place a large covered pot of lightly salted water on the stove and bring it to a boil. In the meantime, melt butter in a small skillet, increase heat to high, add mushrooms and stir fry until golden brown. Reduce heat to low, add garlic and cook 1 minute. Add cream, salt and pepper and heat through on low. Add beans to boiling water and cook until just tender, drain. Place beans on a serving plate, spoon the mushroom cream across the middle of the beans, sprinkle with parmesan and parsley and serve. ; name: roasted string beans ; ingredients: string bean, shallots, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, bacon, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook bacon. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Wash and trim string beans. Slice shallot and garlic. Combine all ingredients, except bacon, in a baking dish and toss well. Make sure everything is evenly coated evenly. Place in oven and cook for about 20 minutes, if you like a more tender bean cook for 25 minutes. When beans are done place in serving dish and toss with crumbled bacon. Serve hot. ; name: roasted green beans with mushrooms ; ingredients: fresh green beans, button mushrooms, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, sesame oil, soy sauce, red chili pepper flakes, salt ; preparation:Cook green beans in boiling water to cover 1 minute. Drain. Plunge into ice water to stop cooking process. Drain and spread evenly in 13x9x2 inch baking dish. Combine mushrooms and next 6 ingredients in a medium bowl. Pour over green beans. Bake at 450f for 20 to 25 minutes or until beans are tender, stirring occasionally. ; name: green beans with mushrooms ; ingredients: onion, canola oil, frozen green beans, pimiento, fresh parsley, mushroom pieces, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in skillet. Saut onions till transparent. Stir in remaining ingredients. Cover& cook over medium heat about 15 minutes til thoroughly heated. Simple& delicious. Add a green salad& either a baked chicken breast or lean beef patty. ; name: sauted green beans with mushrooms ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, cremini mushrooms, dried oregano, salt, black pepper, vegetable broth, white wine, green beans ; preparation:In a large nonstick pan over medium heat saut the garlic in the olive oil for about 2 minutes, stirring frequently. Add mushrooms, oregano, salt, salt and pepper, and saut until the mushrooms begin to release moisture, about 2 minutes. Add the vegetable broth and turn the heat up a bit, bringing to a low boil. Simmer for about a minute. Add the white wine and green beans. Cover and simmer for about 2 minutes. Uncover and cook for about 3 more minutes or until desired tenderness is reached. ; name: green beans and mushroom ; ingredients: green beans, fresh mushrooms, chicken broth, salt, pepper ; preparation:Drained green beans put in pot. Add mushrooms. Add chicken broth until green beans are halfway covered. Salt and pepper to taste. Heat until warm on stove top. ; name: sherried green beans with portobello mushrooms ; ingredients: green beans, coarse salt, extra virgin olive oil, butter, onion, garlic clove, portabella mushroom caps, fresh ground black pepper, dry sherry, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Simmer green beans in a skillet in salted boiling water, 5 minutes. Drain and set aside. Return skillet to medium heat. Add oil and 1 tablespoon of butter to pan. Add onions and saut 2-3 minutes. Add garlic and mushrooms, season with salt and pepper. Saut for 3-5 minutes. Return green beans to pan. Heat through while adding sherry and worcestershire sauce. Reduce sherry for 3-4 minutes then add final tablespoon of butter. Transfer vegetables to a serving plate. ; name: creamy string beans and mushrooms ; ingredients: string beans, granulated sugar, salt, butter, button mushrooms, seasoning salt, garlic powder, black pepper, whipping cream ; preparation:

name: perfect iced tea ; ingredients: tea bags, water, sugar, lemon juice ; preparation:In a 4-cup measuring cup, heat 4 cups water in microwave to boiling. Place tea bags in water and let steep for 5- 10 minutes. Pour sugar into 2 quart pitcher and pour hot tea over it. Squeeze tea bags to get out any remaining tea. Add tea to pitcher and discard bags. Stir hot tea until sugar is dissolved. Add 4 cups cold water and lemon juice. Stir well.
