Chill until very cold and serve over ice with lemon. ; name: make perfect ice tea ; ingredients: tea bags, baking soda, boiling water, cold water, sugar, lemon ; preparation:Place tea bags and baking soda in a large heat resistant glass measuring cup. Add 2 cups of boiling water. Cover and steep for 15 minutes. Remove tea bags and pour tea into a 2 quart pitcher. Add 6 cups of cold water. If you have hard water, use filtered water or bottled water. For sweetened tea, put approximately 1 cup of sugar in 2 quart pitcher. Then pour tea concentrate from step 2, and after sugar has dissolved, add 6 cups of cold water. To avoid cloudiness, cool to room temperature before refrigerating. Garnish with lemon or mint and serve over ice. Store in refrigerator for up to 2 days. ; name: lemonade iced tea ; ingredients: water, tea bags, sugar, frozen lemonade concentrate ; preparation:In dutch oven, bring water to a boil. Remove from the heat. Add tea bags. Cover and steep for 5 minutes. Discard tea bags. Stir in sugar and lemonade concentrate. Cover and refrigerate until chilled. Serve over ice. ; name: coffee pot brewed tea ; ingredients: family-size tea bags, sugar, water, ice cube ; preparation:Put coffee filter in filter holder. Add two family size tea bags in laying them flat with the tea of bottom of pouches and with the bottoms touching. Next fill the coffee pot full & fill resevior. Brew the tea. When done brewing pour into gallon jug & pour in sugar to melt the sugar. Pour in ice and stir to melt and make cold, if any ice cubes are left scoop them out and then add a little more water to make a full gallon. ; name: southern sweet tea ; ingredients: water, tea bags, sugar, baking soda ; preparation:Bring 4 cups water to a boil over high heat in 2-quart saucepan. Remove from heat. Add tea bags and brew 15 minutes, dunking tea bags several times. Remove tea bags and squeeze. Stir in sugar and baking soda until completely dissolved. Stir in remaining 12 cups water. ; name: rhubarb iced tea ; ingredients: rhubarb, tea bags, water, sugar ; preparation:Place rhubarb into 3 quarts of water bring to boil reduce heat to a simmer. Simmer for 1 hour. Place tea bags in water the last 6 minutes. Strain. Place into a 2-quart pitcher and add sugar. Chill in refrigrator. Serve over ice. ; name: smooth sweet tea ; ingredients: baking soda, boiling water, tea bags, white sugar, water ; preparation:Sprinkle a pinch of baking soda into a 64 ounce, heat proof, glass pitcher. Pour in the boiling water and add tea bags. Cover and allow to steep for 15 minutes. Remove tea bags, and discard. Stir in sugar until dissolved. Pour in cold water and refrigerate until cold. ; name: failproof iced tea ; ingredients: family-size tea bags, water, baking soda, sugar ; preparation:

name: no meat tater tot casserole vegetarian ; ingredients: onion, celery, olive oil, condensed cream of celery soup, garlic powder, black pepper, half-and-half, frozen tater tots, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Saute onion and celery in oil until tender. Set aside to cool slightly. Scrape into mixing bowl. Add soup, garlic powder, pepper, and half and half. Mix well. Add frozen tater tots and toss well. Spray a casserole dish with pam. Pour mixture into dish. Arrange reserved tots over top. Cover with cheese. Bake at 350 for 45 to 50 minutes until cheese is melted and just barely starting to brown. Cool slightly before serving. ; name: excellent vegetarian chili ; ingredients: onion, celery, green bell pepper, garlic clove, zucchini, stewed tomatoes, whole tomatoes, tomato sauce, mccormick mild chili seasoning, chili beans ; preparation:Cover bottom of dutch oven with 3 - 4 tablespoons of water. Add onions, celery, green peppers and garlic. Saut until wilted. Add zucchini and cook until tender. Stirring occasionally. Add remaining ingredients. Simmer one hour. ; name: delicious vegetarian gravy ; ingredients: butter, onion, carrots, celery, peppercorns, bay leaves, flour, vegetable broth ; preparation:In a medium sauce pan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the onion, carrots, celery, celery leafs, peppercorns, and bay leafs. Cook until very dark but not burned. 40-50 minutes. Stir in the flour and cook for 2-3 minutes. Slowly pour in the broth while stirring constantly. Bring to a boil, and then drop the heat to low, cover, and cook for 20 minutes. Strain through a cheesecloth and serve immediately. Enjoy. ; name: vegetarian sandwich ; ingredients: whole grain bread, low-fat mayonnaise, italian salad dressing, butter lettuce, cucumbers, tomatoes, red onions, avocados, cheese, bean sprouts ; preparation:Toast breads. Mix together mayonnaise and italian dressing. Spread mayonnaise mixture on toast. Add lettuce, cucumbers, tomatoes, red onion, avocado slices, and cheese,. Top with bean sprouts, serve with a pickle. ; name: buckwheat bake vegetarian ; ingredients: onion, tomatoes, olive oil, buckwheat flour, long grain rice, water, dried basil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Chop the onion and the tomatoes. Heat the oil in a sauce pan and fry the onion until transparent. Add the tomatoes and stir until softened. Stir in the buckwheat and rice and cook for 2minute. Add the remaining ingredients. Bring to the boil, reduce the heat, cover and simmer until the liquid has been absorbed about 20 minutes. Adjust seasoning, then turn the mixture into a greased 7 inch square shallow cake tin. Bake in the oven at 190c 375f for 30 minutes. Serve hot or cold. ; name: vegetarian egg casserole ; ingredients: eggs, milk, bread, salt and pepper, gimmie lean sausage flavor, coriander, cumin, mustard, cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grease 9x13 pan. Brown soy meat if using. Place cubed bread in pan, add soy meat. Beat eggs and milk, salt, pepper, mustard and spices until well blended. Pour egg mixture over bread, sprinkle on cheese if desired. Let stand 10 minutes so bread can absorb egg. Place in oven and bake about 45 min - 1 hour or until top is golden brown. ; name: carrot spaghetti vegan ; ingredients: carrots, garlic cloves, onion, olive oil, salt, fresh ground pepper, marinara sauce ; preparation:Wash carrots very well and thoroughly. With a vegetable peeler, peel carrot into long thin strips. Sprinkle with salt and set aside. Dice onion and chop garlic. Coat the bottom of the pan with olive oil over medium-high heat. When hot, add carrots and toss frequently with tongs. When carrots start to soften, add garlic, pepper, and onion and keep tossing until some of the carrots get brown on the edges. Serve with your favorite marinara sauce. ; name: cabbage apple cinnamon casserole vegetarian too ; ingredients: cabbage, butter, apples, cinnamon, breadcrumbs, canola oil cooking spray, brown sugar ; preparation:

name: scrambled eggs hotel style very simple ; ingredients: eggs, tap water, margarine, salt, pepper ; preparation:In a medium mixing bowl crack 6 large eggs into the bowl and then add 6 tablespoons of cold tap water. Beat together, then add to a non stick pan with 2 tablespoons of margarine or whipped butter. Cook over medium heat and be vigilant by constantly stirring. When done, sprinkle with your desired amount of salt and pepper. The key is to always add one tablespoon of water per egg and one teaspoon of margarine or whipped butter per egg. ; name: creamy scrambled eggs with fines herbes ; ingredients: eggs, mixed herbs, kosher salt, butter, baguette, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:In a small bowl, whisk together the eggs, herbs, and salt. Stir in 1 tablespoon of the butter. Heat a small skillet over medium low heat. Add egg mixture and cook, while stirring, so that the eggs do not set too fast. The eggs will begin to set and form a creamy sauce. Add in the remaining butter, one piece at a time, continuing to stir. Arrange the toasts on serving plates. Once the eggs set spoon them over the toast, season with pepper and the remaining herbs, and serve immediately. ; name: fluffy scrambled eggs lightened up a bit ; ingredients: eggs, evaporated milk, baking powder, kosher salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Whisk ingredients until well incorporated. Let sit 5 minutes. Meanwhile, heat heavy non-stick pan over medium-high heat, then spray with butter-flavored cooking oil. Pour eggs into heated pan and cook, stirring and lifting with non-stick spatula throughout. Turn heat off before eggs reach desired consistency and transfer to heated plates. Eggs will continue to cook a little after removed from pan. ; name: scrambled eggs in a bowl ; ingredients: eggs, nonstick cooking spray, salt and pepper, butter ; preparation:Spray a serving bowl with cooking spray. Crack the eggs into the bowl, and stir up with a fork, making sure the yolks are broken. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cover the bowl with a paper towel and microwave for 1 minute. Remove from the microwave and cut the cooked parts of the eggs with a knife and fork. Return to the microwave, cover, and cook for 1 more minute. Remove from the microwave, cut the eggs up and top with a pat of butter if you wish. As an option, put chunked ham or bacon in the eggs while cooking. Great as well with a small spoon of cheez whiz mixed in after it is done cooking. ; name: super easy scrambled eggs ; ingredients: eggs, reduced-fat mayonnaise, salt, unsalted butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a small mixing bowl, thoroughly whisk together eggs, reduced-fat mayonnaise, and salt. Heat a skillet over low-medium heat. Melt butter. Then add egg mixture. As eggs cook, slowly but constantly move them around skillet. Cook only until eggs are set, yet still soft and moist--avoid overcooking. Transfer scrambled eggs to a plate and season to taste with salt and pepper. Serve hot. ; name: best darned scrambled eggs ever ; ingredients: eggs, milk, water, whipped cream cheese, salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper ; preparation:Salt & pepper to taste, start small, you can always add more. Beat all ingredients until blended, the mixture will be a bit lumpy because of the cream cheese but it all works out. Pour into hot skillet & let sit until the bottom just turns opaque. Stir it all up & continue to stir, cooking until fluffy, remove from heat while still moist but not runny. Mound onto buttered toast. Devour. ; name: cottage scrambled eggs ; ingredients: eggs, cottage cheese, salt and pepper, butter ; preparation:Put eggs, cottage cheese, salt and pepper into blender. Blend until smooth. In a small fry pan, melt enough butter to coat bottom. Pour eggs into fry pan. Without stirring, gently push cooked portion to center and continue until all eggs are fully cooked but not dry. ; name: foolproof scrambled eggs ; ingredients: eggs, light cream, salt, pepper, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:

name: halibut alyeska ; ingredients: halibut, mayonnaise, sour cream, flour, lemon juice, onion, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Rinse halibut and pat dry. Arrange halibut side by side in greased 8 x 12-inch baking dish. In small bowl, stir together mayonnaise, sour cream and flour. Stir in lemon juice, onion and pepper. Spoon mixture over fish to coat completely. Bake uncovered for 14 minutes or until fish is opaque in center of thickest piece. Add cheese, bake until melted. ; name: baked halibut ; ingredients: halibut steaks, salt and pepper, lemon, juice of, onions, bacon, butter ; preparation:Rinse halibut and place in a well-greased baking pan. Sprinkle fish with lemon juice and seasonings. Place onion slices on top of fish and top with bacon slices. Dot with butter and bake in a preheated 400f oven for about 30 minutes or until fish flakes easily, basting frequently. Serve garnished with lemon quarters and parsley. ; name: broiled halibut ; ingredients: halibut steaks, soy sauce, sherry wine, garlic clove, ground ginger, honey ; preparation:Combine the above marinade ingredients in a non metallic container. Marinate halibut steaks in this mixture for an hour, turning the halibut steaks after 30 minutes to ensure they are marinated equally on both sides. Remove from the marinade and let excess marinade drain off of steaks. Place the halibut steaks on a broiler pan, making sure they are not touching each other. Place the pan about 4 inches underneath the broiler element. Broil about 10 minutes per inch of thickness measured at the thickest part, or until the fish flakes when tested with a fork. This dish may be garnished with lemon wedges and a small parsley sprig. ; name: parmesan baked halibut ; ingredients: halibut steaks, parmesan cheese, salt, pepper, egg, oil, flour, paprika, milk ; preparation:Coat baking dish with oil. Rinse and dry fish. Combine parmesan cheese, flour, salt, pepper and paprika in a bowl. In a seperate bowl, beat egg and milk together. Dip halibut into egg mixture, then coat with parmesan cheese mixture. Bake at 500 degrees until halibut is opaque. Be careful not to overbake. ; name: spicy halibut ; ingredients: paprika, dried oregano, dried thyme, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, ground black pepper, cayenne pepper, butter, halibut steaks ; preparation:Mix together paprika, oregano, thyme, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, black pepper and cayenne pepper in a small bowl. Stir until well combined. Place halibut on a nonstick or vegetable spray-coated broiler pan. Brush melted butter onto top surfaces of halibut and sprinkle teaspoon of seasoning mixture over the surface of each steak. Broil 10 minutes per inch of thickness, or until fish flakes easily with a fork. Store remaining spice mixture in an airtight container for future use. ; name: grilled halibut with cilantro cream ; ingredients: halibut fillets, mayonnaise, cilantro, garlic cloves, lime zest, lime juice, cumin ; preparation:Thoroughly blend all ingredients in a medium sized mixing bowl. Reserve 2 tablespoons of the baste for garnish. Preheat grill to medium high. When grill is ready, baste halibut thoroughly before and during cooking. Grill approximately 4 to 6 minutes per side. Garnish with remaining cilantro cream. ; name: baked halibut with parmesan ; ingredients: halibut fillet, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, worcestershire sauce, yellow onions, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a baking sheet with foil. Mist lightly with cooking spray. Pat fish fillets dry and arrange on baking sheet. In a small bowl, combine next 4 ingredients. Spread evenly over fish. Sprinkle fish with grated parmesan cheese. Bake on rack in upper third of oven for 25-30 minutes or until browned & fish flakes easily with a fork. ; name: sour cream halibut ; ingredients: white wine, salt, halibut fillet, fine breadcrumbs, mayonnaise, sour cream, onion, paprika ; preparation:

name: garlic shrimp with chilies ; ingredients: olive oil, raw shrimp, fresh chili peppers, garlic, coarse salt ; preparation:Heat a cast-iron skillet or other heavy pan over high heat until hot. Add olive oil. When oil is hot, add shrimp and briefly cook one side. Turn, then add chilies, and garlic. Season with salt to taste. Serve directly in skillet along with crusty bread to soak up the spicy oil. ; name: pasta shrimp ; ingredients: olive oil, shrimp, mushroom, chili peppers, garlic pepper seasoning, tomatoes, heavy cream, salt, linguine, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat 2 tsp olive oil in skillet, add chile peppers and cook over medium heat for 4- 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add mushrooms and shrimp, and season with garlic pepper. Continue cooking until shrimp is no longer pink. Meanwhile, cook linguine according to package directions. Add the tomatoes, heavy cream and salt to mixture in skillet, and cook until it thickens slightly, 4-5 minutes. Drain linguine. Serve shrimp mixture over pasta, and sprinkle with parmesan cheese. ; name: salt and pepper shrimp ; ingredients: black peppercorns, green peppercorn, red peppercorns, white peppercorns, shrimp, salt, vegetable oil, garlic cloves, cilantro leaf ; preparation:Put peppercorns in a mortar and crush roughly with a pestle. Or put peppercorns in a large resealable plastic bag, spread out on a hard, flat surface, and crush with the bottom of a heavy frying pan or rolling pin. Put shrimp, half of the crushed peppercorns, and 1 teaspoons salt in a large bowl and toss to coat shrimp evenly. Set aside. Heat a wok or large pot over high heat. Add oil, garlic, remaining crushed peppercorns, and remaining 1 teaspoons salt and cook, stirring constantly, until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add shrimp and cook, stirring constantly, until pink and cooked through, 3 to 4 minutes. Add cilantro, turn off heat, and toss to combine. Serve immediately. ; name: shrimp with garlic sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, red pepper, medium shrimp, lemon juice, dry sherry, crushed red pepper flakes, salt, parsley ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the garlic, pepper and shrimp. Cook for about 2 minutes, stirring constantly, just until the shrimp turn pink. Increase the heat to high. Add the lemon juice, sherry, hot red pepper and salt to taste and bring to a boil. Serve immediately, sprinkled with parsley. ; name: tasmanian shrimp with red chilies ; ingredients: shrimp, garlic cloves, serrano chilies, walnut oil, rice wine, tamari, greens, meyer lemon ; preparation:Saut the garlic and minced chilies in peanut or walnut oil over medium-high heat until garlic turns slightly brown. Add the rice wine and cook for 1 minute to evaporate the alcohol. Then add tamari and lemon aspen juice. Let cook for 1 minute. Stir, add the shrimp, and raise the heat to high. Cook, stirring often, until the shrimp become pink between one and two minutes. Then remove from the stove immediately, garnish with chopped scallions, and serve the shrimp, along with the sauce. ; name: curried shrimp with cilantro ; ingredients: olive oil, shallots, garlic cloves, curry powder, reduced-sodium vegetable broth, shrimp, fresh lime juice, low-fat sour cream, fresh cilantro, salt and pepper ; preparation:Over medium heat, heat oil in skillet. Add shallots and garlic. Cook and stir about 2 minutes until tender. Add curry powder. Cook and stir about 1 minute until the mixture becomes fragrant. Add the broth and bring to simmer. Add the lime juice and shrimp. Simmer until the shrimp are cooked through, about 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in sour cream and cilantro. Season with salt and pepper, serve immediately. ; name: shrimp stuffed green peppers ; ingredients: green bell peppers, cooked white rice, cooked shrimp, salsa, low-fat sour cream, green onion, ground cumin, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly oil a shalllow baking dish, about 9 x 9 inches. Cut the tops off the bell peppers and reserve. Wash peppers and clean out the seeds and membranes. Bring a large saucepan of water to boil and add the bell peppers. Boil for 2 minutes, then remove and drain. Combine rice thru salt. Gently stuff the mixture into the peppers, then stand them in the baking dish. Put the tops back on the peppers. Bake for 40 minutes until tender. ; name: shrimp with green chili pesto ; ingredients: parmesan cheese, garlic cloves, mild green chilies, pine nuts, fresh parsley leaves, fresh cilantro leaves, olive oil, shrimp ; preparation:

name: snow peas with cashews ; ingredients: canola oil, dried orange peel, snow peas, salt & freshly ground black pepper, cashew nuts ; preparation:In nonstick skillet, heat oil. Add orange peel and cook over low heat for 2 minutes. Add snow peas and salt and pepper, to taste. Turn heat to medium. Stirring constantly, cook 3 to 4 minutes or until snow peas are bright green and crunchy. Sprinkle with cashews and serve. ; name: scallop and snow pea stir fry ; ingredients: vegetable oil, garlic, fresh ginger, large scallop, snow peas, reduced-sodium chicken broth, reduced sodium soy sauce, green onions, eggs ; preparation:In a large wok or nonstick frying pan, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add garlic and ginger and cook, stirring, until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add scallops and stir to coat with garlic mixture, then cook 1 minute. Mix in snow peas and cook 1 minute. Stir in broth and soy sauce and cook just until simmering. Sprinkle with green onions and mix with noodles. ; name: stir fried cashew chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, soy sauce, dry sherry, garlic granules, cornstarch, peanuts, fresh snow peas, carrot, cashews, rice noodles ; preparation:Thoroughly combine soy sauce, sherry, garlic and cornstarch, and set aside. Heat oil in a hot wok or large skillet until just smoking. Add chicken and stir-fry over high heat until browned on all sides. Add vegetables, and continue cooking until vegetables are just cooked and still crisp. Reduce heat, add soy sauce mixture, and continue cooking until sauce is thickened. Stir in cashews, and serve over hot rice noodles or rice. ; name: cashew curry ; ingredients: olive oil, cashews, onions, curry powder, garlic, ginger, water, firm tofu, red peppers, frozen peas ; preparation:Heat oil in skillet over medium heat. Add cashews and onion a saute 5 minutes. Reduce heat and add curry, garlic ginger, water, tofu and peppers. Cover and cook 5 minutes. Add peas and cook 5 minutes more. ; name: chicken and snow pea stir fry ; ingredients: chicken breast fillets, chinese five spice powder, fresh ginger, sesame seeds, shallots, soy sauce, honey, hoisin sauce, snow peas ; preparation:Roll chicken in five-spice powder, coat a pan with cooking spray and cook chicken until browned, remove from pan. Recoat the pan and add ginger, sesame seeds and shallots. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, add the combined soy, honey and hoisin sauces, then add the snow peas cook until peas are bright green and tender-crisp. Return the chicken to the pan and cook until heated through. Serve with noodles or rice. ; name: cashew and green peas curry ; ingredients: cashew nuts, green peas, mustard seeds, turmeric powder, onion, oil, curry leaves, salt ; preparation:Heat oil in a pan. Add mustard seeds and allow to crackle. Add curry leaves and saute for a few brief seconds. Add all the remaining ingredients. Cook for 15 minutes. Serve hot with plain white basmati rice or ghee rice and papaddams. ; name: spicy cashews ; ingredients: butter, vegetable oil, roasted cashews, salt, cayenne pepper, chili powder ; preparation:Melt butter with oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add cashews, and cook 3-5 minutes or until browned. Remove cashews, and drain on paper towels. Place in a bowl. Combine salt, cayenne, and chili powder in a small bowl. Sprinkle over warm cashews, tossing to coat. ; name: cashew snow pea stir fry ; ingredients: reduced sodium soy sauce, rice vinegar, chili sauce, toasted sesame oil, fresh ginger, snow peas, radish, scallions, unsalted cashews ; preparation:

name: crumb covered salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillet, plain breadcrumbs, garlic, fresh italian parsley, onions, cayenne pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a small bowl, combine breadcrumbs, garlic, parsley, minced onion, cayenne pepper, and a little olive oil. Drizzle a little olive oil in a shallow, metal baking dish and place the salmon fillet on top. Sprinkle breadcrumb mix over the salmon. You do not have to use all of it. Any extra mix should keep in the refrigerator for a few weeks. Bake for about 15 minutes depending on thickness of the fish. Salmon should break apart easily when fully cooked. ; name: maple thyme mustard salmon ; ingredients: pure maple syrup, dijon mustard, fresh thyme, garlic clove, fresh ground black pepper, boneless atlantic salmon fillet, baby spinach, extra virgin olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a shallow glass dish, whisk maple syrup, mustard, thyme, garlic and pepper together. Place salmon fillets in dish and turn to coat. Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes or up to 8 hours. Place salmon on parchment paper lined baking sheet and spoon some of remaining marinade over top. Roast in 425f oven for about 15 minutes or until fish flakes when tested with fork. In large bowl, toss spinach with oil, salt & pepper, and divide among 4 plates. Top with salmon and serve. ; name: baked salmon with herbs ; ingredients: fresh breadcrumbs, garlic cloves, parmesan cheese, parsley, thyme, rosemary, salt, pepper, butter, salmon fillets ; preparation:In a bowl mix first 8 ingredients. Add 4 tbsp butter and and toss lightly to coat. Pat salmon dry. Place skin side down in a greased baking pan. Brush with 2 tbsp butter. Cover with crumb mixture. Bake at 350f for 25 minutes. ; name: lime salmon fillets ; ingredients: salmon fillets, dried thyme, salt, ground black pepper, butter, green onions, lime zest, lime ; preparation:Sprinkle the side of salmon fillets without skin with thyme, salt and pepper. In a skillet, melt butter at medium-high heat. Add salmon fillets, skin side up, and cook for about 4 minutes or until the bottom of fillets is lightly golden. Flip the salmon fillets and sprinkle with green onions and lime zest. Keep on cooking for 3 to 6 minutes or until the fish flakes easily with a fork. Serve with quarters of lime. ; name: lemon herbed salmon ; ingredients: fresh breadcrumbs, garlic, fresh parsley, parmesan cheese, fresh thyme, lemons, rind of, salt, butter, salmon fillet ; preparation:In a bowl, combine bread crumbs, garlic, parsley, parmesan cheese, thyme, lemon peel and salt. Mix well. Add 4 tbsp butter and toss lightly to coat. Set aside. Pat salmon dry. Place skin side down in a greased baking dish. Brush with remaining butter. Cover with crumb mixture. Bake at 350f for 20-25 minutes or until salmon flakes easily with a fork. ; name: baked herbed salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillets, fresh parsley, garlic cloves, dried oregano, lemon juice, butter, tomatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all ingredients, except salmon, together. Pour a small amount of the mix into the bottom of a baking pan - just enough to lightly cover the bottom. Add the salmon, and pour the remaining mix over top. Bake for about 20 minutes, or until salmon flakes easily with a fork. ; name: herb roasted salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillets, salt, pepper, fresh thyme, fresh oregano, fresh tarragon, lemons ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Line baking sheet with foil, coat it with cooking spray and set the salmon, skin-side down, on the foil. Sprinkle the salmon with spices and herbs. Arrange the lemon slices down center of the fillet. Cover the salmon loosely with a piece of foil and roast in the center of the oven for about 20 minutes, depending on the thickness of the fillet. ; name: cranberry thyme salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillets, panko breadcrumbs, dried cranberries, green onion, butter, fresh thyme, lemon peel ; preparation:

name: classic waldorf salad ; ingredients: mayonnaise, sugar, lemon juice, salt, red apples, celery, walnuts ; preparation:In medium bowl, combine mayonnaise, sugar, lemon juice and salt. Add apples and celery. Toss to coat. Cover and chill to blend flavors. Just before serving sprinkle with walnuts. ; name: waldorf salad ; ingredients: red apples, brown sugar, lemon juice, celery, pecans, mayonnaise ; preparation:Wash, core and dice unpeeled apples. Sprinkle lemon juice over them and toss together gently to coat, then sprinkle brown sugar over the apples and toss again. Chill for at least 20 minutes. Add celery and nuts then stir in mayonnaise, adding only enough for desired consistency. Serve on a bed of greens. ; name: northwest waldorf salad ; ingredients: celery, dried cherries, hazelnuts, plain fat-free yogurt, reduced-fat sour cream, fresh lemon juice, salt, bartlett pears ; preparation:Combine first 3 ingredients in a large bowl. Combine yogurt, sour cream, juice, and salt in a bowl, stirring well with a whisk. Drizzle yogurt mixture over celery mixture. Toss gently. Peel, core, and chop pears. Add pears to salad, and toss gently. Cover and chill 1 hour. ; name: waldorf chicken salad ; ingredients: rotisserie-cooked chicken, apple, celery, seedless grapes, walnut pieces, mayonnaise, lemon juice, salt, pepper ; preparation:Mix all the fruits and vegetables together. Toss lightly with the lemon juice. Stir in walnuts, chicken and mayonnaise. Add salt and pepper to taste. Cover and refrigerate at least two hours to allow flavors to meld. ; name: holiday waldorf salad ; ingredients: lemon jell-o gelatin, boiling water, lemon juice, cold water, ice cube, miracle whip, salt, red apples, celery, nuts ; preparation:Dissolve jello in boiling water. Add lemon juice and salt. Combine cold water and ice to make 1 cup. Add to jello, stirring until slightly thickened. Whisk in salad dressing. Chill until thickened. Fold in apples, celery and nuts. Chill until firm. ; name: sweet waldorf salad ; ingredients: lemon juice, apples, golden raisin, pecan pieces, coconut flakes, miniature marshmallow, pineapple chunk, honey, fat-free whipped topping ; preparation:Place lemon juice in large bowl. Remove cores from apples and discard. Chop apples and coat in lemon juice to prevent oxidation. Stir in raisins, pecans, and coconut. Drizzle honey over mixture and blend well. Add marshmallows and stir. Fold in whipped topping, and chill. ; name: tuna waldorf salad ; ingredients: red delicious apple, lemon juice, tuna, celery, walnuts, mayonnaise ; preparation:Sprinkle lemon juice over apples right after chopping. Mix together rest of ingredients. Use more mayonnaise if you want a creamier filling. Use as a filling for sandwiches or puffs. For puffs use shells as for cream puffs. Serve either at room temperature or chilled. ; name: updated waldorf classic ; ingredients: mayonnaise, lemon, rind of, fresh lemon juice, fuji apples, celery, radishes, red onion, dried cranberries, roasted cashews ; preparation:

name: poppy seed filling ; ingredients: poppy seed, sugar, honey, eggs, vanilla extract, cinnamon, flour ; preparation:Scald poppyseed in boiling water and strain in cheese cloth. Grind poppyseeds in a blender until smooth. Add sugar, honey, eggyolks, vanilla extract, and cinnamon, blending constantly. Beat egg whites till stiff. Fold in poppyseed mixture. Sprinkle with flour and mix well. ; name: poppy seed bundt cake ; ingredients: butter recipe cake mix, sour cream, sugar, oil, eggs, poppy seeds ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together. Pour into greased bundt pan. Bake at 335 degrees between 40 - 50 minutes. This is how this cake turns out best in my oven. Start looking at the cake at 35-40 minutes to see if it finished. It should be light to medium brown and mostly set when jiggled. ; name: rich buttery poppy seed muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, poppy seeds, salt, baking soda, granulated sugar, sweet unsalted butter, eggs, plain yogurt, vanilla extract ; preparation:Line 12 muffin cups with paper liners or grease tins well. Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Mix together flour, poppy seeds, salt, baking soda. In another bowl, using a mixer, cream together sugar and butter. Beat in eggs to the butter mixture one at a time, then beat in yogurt and vanilla. Hand stir together the dry mixture and the butter mixture just enough to moisten ingredients- there should still be some lumps. Spoon into prepared muffin tins and bake 15-20 miutes or until a toothpick comes out clean. Let cool on wire racks. ; name: poppy seed almond cookies ; ingredients: sugar, margarine, light corn syrup, almond extract, egg, egg white, all-purpose flour, poppy seeds, baking soda, vegetable oil cooking spray ; preparation:Cream sugar and margarine at medium speed of a mixer until fluffy. Add corn syrup, extract, egg, and egg white. Beat well. Combine flour, poppy seeds, and baking soda. Stir. Add to creamed mixture, beating well. Drop dough by rounded tablespoons onto baking sheets coated with cooking spray. Bake at 350 for 10 minutes or until lightly browned. Let cool on pans 1 minute. Remove from pans, and let cool completely on wire racks. ; name: almond poppy seed cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, vanilla instant pudding mix, eggs, cooking oil, hot water, poppy seed, almond extract, butter, cinnamon, sugar ; preparation:Heavily butter a 10-inch bundt pan. Mix the cinnamon and sugar together and sprinkle a liberal amount in the pan so it sticks to the butter. Combine all cake ingredients and mix well. Pour into bundt pan and bake at 350f for about 50 minutes. Invert pan on a funnel or bottle and let it cool about five minutes. Remove the cake from the pan and cool on a wire rack. ; name: onion poppy seed biscuit loaf ; ingredients: butter, dried onion, poppy seed, refrigerated biscuits ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 9x5 loaf pan, or use a non-stick loaf pan& set aside. Melt butter or margarine in a medium-sized bowl. Stir in the minced dried onion& poppy seeds. Open the cans of biscuits& separate them. Dip each biscuit quickly into the butter mixture, turning to coat both sides. Line up the biscuits in the loaf pan, standing them on edge, forming two long rows. Drizzle any remaining butter mixture on top of completed loaf. Bake in preheated oven for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: magic marshmallow crescent puffs ; ingredients: sugar, all-purpose flour, ground cinnamon, marshmallows, pillsbury refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, margarine ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Combine sugar, flour and ground cinnamon. Dip marshmallow in to melted margarine. Roll in sugar-cinnamon mixture. Wrap a crescent triangle around marshmallow, completely covering it. Squeeze edges of dough tightly to seal. Dip in margarine and place in muffin tin. Repeat for all marshmallows and crescent triangles. Place muffin pans on aluminum foil. Bake at 375f for 10-15 minutes or until golden brown. Immediately remove from muffin tins and drizzle with a powdered sugar glaze and nuts if desired. ; name: poppy seed currant kisses ; ingredients: marzipan, flour, sugar, egg, salt, butter, poppy seeds, red currant jam ; preparation:

name: candied sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, brown sugar, orange zest, vanilla, cinnamon, salt, nutmeg ; preparation:Peel potatoes and cut into chunks. Place potatoes in 13x9 baking pan. In lg saucepan combine remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Boil for 2 minutes. Pour over potatoes. Cover and bake for 45 minutes. ; name: candied sweet potatoes southern traditional ; ingredients: butter, sweet potatoes, white sugar, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, salt ; preparation:Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-low heat. While butter is melting, in a small bowl combine sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg and salt. Add sliced potatoes to melted butter and turn to coat. Sprinkle sugar mixture over potatoes, stir to coat. Cover skillet, reduce heat to low. Stirring occasionally, cook for 50-60 minutes, or until potatoes are tender. ; name: sweet potato latkes ; ingredients: sweet potato, potato, onion, flour, baking powder, eggs, salt and pepper, fresh parsley, fresh chives ; preparation:Coarsely grate potatoes and drain well. Place potatoes in a mixing bowl with all remaining ingredients and mix together. Cover and leave to stand for 1 hour. Heat oil for shallow frying in a frying pan and drop large spoonfuls of the mixture as for small pancakes and fry until golden brown on both sides and cooked in the middle, about 5 minutes. Drain well on paper towels and keep hot until ready to serve. Eat immediately. ; name: sweet potato buttermilk cornbread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, salt, butter, egg, buttermilk, sweet potatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. In a large bowl, combine flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder and salt. Cut in butter with two forks, a pastry cutter or your fingers until mixture is crumbly. In a medium mixing bowl beat egg until frothy. Stir in buttermilk and sweet potatoes. Pour mixture into flour mixture stirring just until blended. Pour batter into greased 9x9x2 inch baking dish. Bake 20 minutes or until center springs back when pressed. Cool in pan on wire rack. Cut into squares and serve. ; name: corn mashed potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, sweet potatoes, frozen whole kernel corn, light coconut milk, olive oil, butter, curry powder, salt, ground turmeric ; preparation:Place potatoes in a saucepan. Cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer 10 minutes or until potatoes are almost tender. Add corn to pan. Cook 5 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Drain well. Place potato mixture in a large bowl, and mash potato mixture with a potato masher. Combine coconut milk, oil, and butter in a small saucepan. Bring to a boil. Stir milk mixture, curry, salt, and turmeric into potato mixture. ; name: sweet potato and corn chowder ; ingredients: onion, butter, sweet potato, water, frozen corn kernels, salt, cracked black pepper ; preparation:Sweat onion with butter over medium heat. Add sweet potato. Cook for a few minutes. Add salt and pepper to draw out the moisture for sweating. Add water. Cover and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes. Add corn, cover and simmer until the potatoes are cooked and tender. Blitz the mixture with the aid of a hand blender. Strain the mixture through a fine chinois. Ladle up the soup and serve to your adoring family. ; name: vanilla mashed sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, half-and-half, pure vanilla extract, orange zest, butter, kosher salt, white pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f put potatoes on baking sheet and bake until fork tender, approximately 1 hour. Remove from oven and let cool until just cool enough to handle. Peel and discard skins. Set aside in a covered bowl. Pour half and half into a 2 quart pot. Add vanilla and orange zest. Bring to a simmer and cook for 5 minutes. Mash sweet potatoes and butter with a potato masher or mixer on low. Slowly add vanilla milk mixture until potatoes reach desired consistency. Season with kosher salt and white pepper to taste. Serve warm. ; name: sweet potato and corn fritters ; ingredients: cream-style corn, fresh ginger, fresh thyme, self raising flour, milk, egg, sweet potato, butter ; preparation:

name: artichoke and fennel salad ; ingredients: fennel bulbs, artichoke hearts, tomatoes, brine-cured black olives, anchovy fillet, olive oil, fresh lemon juice, dried oregano, dried thyme, pepper ; preparation:Trim the feathery tops from the fennel bulbs, reserving several for garnish, and trim the stalks to the point where they meet the bulb, reserving them for another use. Quarter the bulbs, discarding the core, and slice the quarters thin crosswise. In a large. Bowl combine the fennel, the artichoke hearts, the tomatoes, and the olives. In a bowl whisk together the anchovy paste, the oil, the lemon juice, the organo, and the thyme. Toss the fennel mixture with the dressing, season it with the pepper and salt, and. Garnish the salad with the reserved fennel tops. Serves 6. ; name: chicken and pepper pasta ; ingredients: fettuccine pasta, chicken, carrot, chicken stock, red capsicums, dried garlic, olive oil, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Shred chicken and apply salt and pepper to it. Shred capsicum and carrot thinly. Peel and crush garlic to a paste. Heat oil in a non-stick pan and saute chicken till it browns. Remove from pan. In the same pan, saute capsicum and carrot on low heat for 5 minutes. Add crushed garlic and saute for a minute. Add chicken and chicken stock and cook till chicken is tender. Meanwhile cook the pasta in boiling salted water until al dente. Drain well and toss with chicken and pepper. Season to taste and serve hot. ; name: smoked trout lemon fennel pasta ; ingredients: orecchiette, fennel bulbs, olive oil, capers, lemon, trout fillets, fresh parsley ; preparation:Cook pasta in boiling water according to pack instructions, drain. Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in a frying pan over medium-low heat, add the fennel and cook for 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally until softened. Add capers and the zest and juice from the lemon half. Flake the smoked trout and add to the pan. Add most of the parsley to the pan and the fronds from the fennel. Stir to combine, heat through and season to taste. Gently toss the trout mixture through the pasta and sprinkle with remaining parsley. ; name: fresh fennel medley ; ingredients: fennel bulb, olive oil, sweet onion, plum tomatoes, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Trim long stalks from fennel down to the bulb. Chop and reserve 2 tablespoons of feathery greens from stalks. Slice bulb into thin strips. Prepare a medium skillet with cooking spray. Heat oil in skillet. Saute fennel strips and onion until fennel is crisp-tender, about 8 to 10 minutes. Stir in tomatoes, salt and pepper. Garnish with chopped fennel greens. ; name: german style pasta ; ingredients: rotini pasta, canola oil, red cabbage, brown sugar, white vinegar, caraway seed, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Cook and drain pasta as directed on package. While pasta is cooking, heat oil in 10-inch skillet over medium heat. Cook cabbage in oil 2 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in brown sugar, vinegar and caraway seed. Cover and cook about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until crisp-tender. Stir pasta into cabbage mixture. Heat until hot. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. ; name: country pasta ; ingredients: yellow onion, garlic, olive oil, fresh mushrooms, tomato sauce, black olives, crushed red pepper flakes, penne pasta, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In large skillet, saute the onion and garlic in the olive oil until soft. Add the mushrooms and tomato sauce, stirring to combine. Cook about 10 minutes, or until heated thoroughly and mushrooms are softened. Add the olives and crushed red pepper, cooking for a few more minutes. In serving bowl, toss the cooked pasta with the sauce, and sprinkle with the parmesan cheese. ; name: fennel fontina cheese sandwich ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, onion, fennel bulbs, salt & freshly ground black pepper, saffron thread, fontina, whole wheat bread ; preparation:Prepare vegetables. In a frypan over low heat, warm the olive oil. Add the onion and fennel, saute for 5 minutes. Add 2 tablespoons of water, cover, and cook for another 10 minutes, or until the fennel and onions are tender. Season with salt and pepper and stir in the saffron. Cook until the liquid evaporates, about 3 minutes. Set aside. To assemble the sandwich. Top the 4 slices of bread with the sliced fontina. Spoon the vegetable mixture over the cheese, top with remaining bread slices. Cut each sandwich diagonally, arrange on serving plate and garnish with fennel fronds. ; name: pasta with olive oil anchovies and fennel ; ingredients: fennel bulbs, bucatini pasta, olive oil, garlic, wild fennel, anchovy fillets, red pepper flakes, fresh ground black pepper, sea salt ; preparation:

name: bacon pimento cheese ; ingredients: bacon, smoked cheddar cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, diced pimentos, sugar, salt, pepper ; preparation:Fry bacon in a skillet until crisp. Remove bacon and drain on a paper-towel lined plate. Crumble bacon. In a mixing bowl, stir the bacon, cheeses, and remaining ingredients together. Serve immediately. ; name: world s best pimento cheese ; ingredients: mayonnaise, cream cheese, garlic, fresh parsley, pickapeppa sauce, tabasco sauce, pecans, diced pimentos, extra-sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Puree till smooth in processor the mayo, cream cheese, garlic, parsley and sauces. Turn into bowl. Now, in food processor, process just till coursely chopped, 1 cup pecans. Add pecans and pimentos, with juice, to mayo mixture. Now grate cheese in food processor put into bowl with remaining ingredients. Stir well to combine. Let stand, refrigerated, at least 1 hour. Even better the next day. ; name: grilled pimento cheese and bacon sandwiches ; ingredients: mild cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, diced pimento, bacon, white bread, butter ; preparation:Mix the cheese, mayonnaise, and pimentos. Divide the mix and spread onto two of the bread slices. Top with the bacon and add the other bread slices. Melt the butter in a large skillet. Add the sandwiches and lightly brown on both sides. Serve warm. ; name: vivian s pimento cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: sharp cheddar cheese, pimientos, mayonnaise, prepared mustard, tabasco sauce ; preparation:Allow cheese to get to room temperature before making. Drain pimentoes well and finely chop. Blend cheese, mayonnaise, prepared mustard and hot sauce. Fold in pimentoes. Keep refrigerated. ; name: sesame cheddar olive poppers ; ingredients: sharp cheddar cheese, unsalted butter, all-purpose flour, cayenne pepper, pimento-stuffed green olives, sesame seeds ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f beat grated cheese and butter together in a mixer or food processor, then stir in the flour and cayenne. Shape dough into a log shape, and slice into exactly how many olives you have. After a making a few, you will get a feel for how much dough you need for each olive. Use the thumb of one hand to press each piece of dough into a flat pancake, then press the dough around an olive, covering it well and rolling the dough into a ball with your palms. Place sesame seeds in a small bowl. Roll each ball in the seeds, then place on an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 15 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: pimento cream cheese spread ; ingredients: diced pimentos, cream cheese, walnuts, milk ; preparation:Let cream cheese soften slightly. Cream with the milk till smooth. Drain pimentos and add with nuts to cream cheese. Mix well. Add tiny bit more milk if necessary to make a spreadable consistency. Serve with rye bread, wheat crackers, triscuit, or melba toast. Store in fridge. ; name: southern pimento cheese from harold cohen s ultimate burger ; ingredients: extra-sharp cheddar cheese, monterey jack cheese, mayonnaise, cream cheese, diced pimentos, bread and butter pickle juice, horseradish sauce, yellow mustard ; preparation:In a medium mixing bowl, combine cheddar and jack cheeses, mayonnaise, cream cheese, pimento peppers, pickle juice, horseradish sauce, and mustard. Mix until well combined. Store in refrigerator until needed. It can be frozen. Bring to room temperature for serving for best taste and easy melting on hamburgers. ; name: pimento cheese and crackers ; ingredients: cheddar cheese, cream cheese, mayonnaise, fresh garlic, pimento pepper, onion powder, tabasco sauce, butter flavored cracker, pimento stuffed olive ; preparation:

name: smoked turkey and tomato wraps ; ingredients: cream cheese, basil pesto, burrito-size flour tortillas, smoked turkey breast, romaine lettuce, chopped tomato, red onions ; preparation:Combine cream cheese and pesto in small bowl. Stir well. Spread evenly over each tortilla. Place turkey slices, lettuce, tomatoes and red onion or alfalfa sprouts over bottom third of tortillas, making sure ingredients dont touch edges. Fold the bottom edge of tortilla toward the center and gently roll until tortilla is completely wrapped around the filling. Wrap tightly in plastic wrap. Refrigerate for 15 minutes. Cut in half and serve. ; name: leftover turkey or chicken casserole ; ingredients: cooked turkey, celery, onion, cream of chicken soup, mayonnaise, salt, pepper, pimientos, potato chips, paprika ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together and place them in a casserole dish. Cover with crushed potato chips and sprinkle with paprika. Bake uncovered at 350f. For about 30 minutes or until heated through and chips are lighty brown. Serve with noodles and a salad. ; name: turkey chile casserole ; ingredients: cooked turkey, diced green chilies, onion, cream of chicken soup, corn tortillas, butter, sharp cheddar cheese, chicken broth ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine turkey meat, chilies, onion, and soup. If desired, spread tortillas with butter. Cut each tortilla in half and arrange 6 halves over bottom of a 13- x 9-inch baking dish. Spread a third of the turkey mixture over tortillas, top with a third of the cheese. Reapeat layers of tortillas, turkey, and cheese two more times. Carefully pour the chicken broth over all. Cover and bake for 25-30 minutes or until heated throughout and bubbly. Remove from oven and let stand 5 minutes. Cut in squares with sharp knife and use a spatula to remove each serving. ; name: asian turkey lettuce wraps ; ingredients: peanut oil, ground turkey, fresh ginger, fresh garlic, hoisin sauce, carrot, red bell pepper, cucumber, green onion, iceberg lettuce leaves ; preparation:In a large skillet, heat oil over medium heat. Add ground turkey and ginger and cook 3 to 5 minutes or until turkey is no longer pink. Add garlic and cook 30 seconds. Stir in hoisin sauce and stir while cooking. Add carrots and bell pepper and saut about 2 minutes. Spoon hot turkey mixture onto each lettuce leaf, sprinkle with cucumber and scallions. Wrap lettuce around filling and serve. ; name: bacon avocado wraps ; ingredients: mayonnaise, chipotle chili sauce, sour cream, cooked bacon, flour tortillas, lettuce leaves, tomatoes, avocados ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine the mayonnaise, chipotle sauce and sour cream until smooth. Heat bacon according to package directions. Spread chipotle mayonnaise over tortillas. Layer tortillas with lettuce, tomato, bacon and avocados. Roll up tightly. ; name: turkey and mandarin orange rolls ; ingredients: 10-inch flour tortillas, fat free cream cheese, mandarin orange, red pepper, green onion, deli turkey, spinach leaves ; preparation:In bowl, mix cream cheese, oranges and red pepper. Layer each of the tortillas with a quarter of all the ingredients, leaving a 1-2 inch strip around edges without toppings. First spread cream cheese mix on tortillas, sprinkle with green onions, then layer with turkey and spinach leaves. Roll tightly. Slice ends off and discard, and then slice each tortilla in 6 pieces. Refrigerate for up to 8 hours before eating. ; name: leftover turkey or chicken enchiladas ; ingredients: cooked turkey, vegetables, cheddar cheese, mexican blend cheese, salsa, cumin, chili powder, hot sauce, tortillas ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a bowl toss turkey, vegetables, cheese, salsa, hot sauce, chili powder, and cumin. Spoon filling into tortilla shells. You may need to use more than four if your shells are small. Roll the tortilla up and place seam side down into a lightly greased baking pan. Top with extra cheese and salsa if desired. Baked until heated through, about 15-20 minutes. ; name: turkey wraps with chipotle mayonnaise ; ingredients: mayonnaise, fresh cilantro, green onion, chipotle chile in adobo, fresh lime juice, flour tortillas, smoked turkey, romaine lettuce leaves ; preparation:

name: tuna veggie pasta salad ; ingredients: tuna in water, miracle whip, nonfat plain yogurt, italian dressing, pasta, frozen vegetables, parmesan cheese, herbes de provence, celery salt, dill ; preparation:Cook the pasta in water with a dash of salt. Combine all other ingredients in a large bowl with a lid. When pasta is cooked through, drain and rinse in cold water. Add pasta to other ingredients & mix thoroughly. Let sit in fridge for several hours before serving. May be served over a garden salad, baked potato, with crackers. This recipe is versatile & can be tweaked to your taste. Could be made gluten free if use gluten free pasta. ; name: savory tuna salad ; ingredients: tuna, pickle relish, red onion, dried tarragon, dried oregano, mayonnaise, lettuce leaf, bread, salt, pepper ; preparation:Open and drain the canned tuna. Toast the bread. Lightly spread some mayonnaise on the inside of the toast. Artfully place the lettuce leaves on the the mayonnaise side of the toast. Mix together the drained tuna and remaining ingredients. Spread half of the tuna mixture on one sandwich and half on the other. Assemble the sandwiches and serve. ; name: tuna salad with fresh herbs ; ingredients: tuna in water, celery, fresh dill, fresh parsley, sweet onions, lemon juice, mayonnaise, extra virgin olive oil, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Chop the celery and the herbs. Mix all ingredients together in a small bowl. Serve as wraps, sandwiches, or with crackers. I suggest using multi-grain bread and lettuce. If you like creamier tuna salad feel free to double the mayo. ; name: creamy tuna pasta salad ; ingredients: vegetable oil, red wine vinegar, dijon mustard, mayonnaise, medium pasta shells, fresh basil, green onion, zucchini, tuna in water, sliced ripe olives ; preparation:Beat oil, vinegar, mustard, and mayonnaise together with a wire whisk. Cook and drain pasta as directed on package. Rinse with cold water. Drain. Mix pasta and remaining ingredients in medium bowl. Toss with dressing mixture. Cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour to blend flavors. ; name: tuna noodle salad ; ingredients: macaroni, celery, red pepper, roasted red peppers, solid white tuna, mayonnaise, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook elbows. Break-up tuna with a fork into small bits. Mix tuna and all other ingredients into the pasta. Refrigerate for several hours. Is much better on the second day. ; name: tuna riffic pasta salad ; ingredients: pasta shells, frozen peas, tuna in water, green onions, low-fat mayonnaise, plain nonfat yogurt, dijon mustard, garlic, salt & pepper ; preparation:Cook pasta shells according to package directions. Drain and set aside. In a small saucepan, cook the peas according to package directions. Drain and set aside. In a large bowl, combine tuna, green onions, mayonnaise, yogurt, mustard, garlic, salt and pepper. Mix lightly. Add the cooked pasta and peas and toss all ingredients together. Cover and refrigerate until serving time. ; name: german tuna salad ; ingredients: canned tuna, tomatoes, bell peppers, cucumber, canned corn, parsley, olive oil, white vinegar, salt, pepper ; preparation:Thinly slice the tomatoes and the cucumber. Dice the bell peppers. Chop the parsley. Add these, and all other ingredients together in a large bowl and toss repeatedly. Salt and pepper to taste. ; name: farfalle tuna salad ; ingredients: light chunk tuna in water, farfalle pasta, frozen peas, cucumber, onion, roasted red pepper, mayonnaise, red wine vinegar, fresh parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: sauteed green beans and red onion ; ingredients: water, olive oil, coarse salt, ground pepper, green beans, red onion, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:In a large skillet, bring 1 cup water, oil, salt, and pepper to a simmer over medium heat. Add the green beans and onion. Cover, and cook until the beans are crisp-tender, 8 to 10 minutes. Uncover, and continue cooking, stirring frequently, until water has evaporated, beans are tender, and onions are beginning to brown, 5 to 8 minutes more. Stir in vinegar and serve. ; name: tropical green beans ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh green beans, yellow onion, garlic cloves, salt, balsamic vinegar, hearts of palm, sun-dried tomato, pine nuts, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature. ; name: herbed green beans ; ingredients: green beans, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, dried rosemary leaves, dried thyme leaves, sea salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:Add beans to medium saucepan with water to cover and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Simmer 4 to 6 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain. Return beans to pan. Add vinegar, oil, and spices to pan, tossing with beans. Cook and stir over medium heat 1 to 2 minutes or until heated through. ; name: sunflower green beans ; ingredients: fresh green beans, sunflower seeds, olive oil, prepared mustard, garlic cloves, wine vinegar, salt, pepper ; preparation:Steam the green beans until soft. Toast the sunflower seeds in a pan with a tiny bit of oil. Mix oil, mustard, garlic, vinegar, salt and pepper. Pour mixture over green beans and add sunflower seeds. May be served warm or cold. We prefer warm. ; name: gingered green beans ; ingredients: green beans, olive oil, pickled ginger, garlic, hot chili peppers, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Pour 2 cups water into heavy-bottomed pot, bring to boil over high heat. Boil until crisp tender, approximatly 6 minutes. Drain beans and cool slightly. Pour oil into heavy skillet and heat over medium-high heat, add ginger, garlic, salt and chili peppers, saute 1 minute, add beans and saute 2 minutes, stirring. Remove chili peppers, taste and adjust salt and pepper, serve. ; name: mustardy green beans ; ingredients: green beans, olive oil, dijon mustard, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Bring water to a boil. Cook beans until crisp-tender, about 5 to 7 minutes. Drain. Heat oil in the same pan. Stir in mustard and salt and pepper to taste. Add beans. Toss to coat and serve warm. ; name: lemon sauteed green beans with parsley ; ingredients: margarine, green beans, fresh parsley, lemon juice, water ; preparation:Heat margarine in skillet over med heat. Add beans,. Saute stirring frequently 3 minutes until beans are bright green. Add parsley, cook stirring frequently 3 more minutes. Add juice and water, mix well. Reduce heat, simmer covered 2 - 3 minutes. Uncover, cook, stirring frequently 2 - 3 minutes longer until beans are tender-crisp. ; name: green bean saute ; ingredients: fresh green beans, canola oil, yellow onion, salt, black pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: chicken salad ; ingredients: chicken breasts, celery, green onions, mayonnaise, salt and pepper ; preparation:Boil chicken for 40 minutes. Cool. Shred cooled chicken with two forks. Add mayo to desired consistency. Add celery and green onions. Add salt and pepper to taste. Chill. Enjoy. ; name: chicken salad for company ; ingredients: chicken breasts, sweet red pepper, head of broccoli, thick slab bacon, sour cream, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, raspberry vinegar, fresh dill, salt and pepper ; preparation:Combine chicken and red pepper in a large bowl. Steam broccoli under just tender and add to the chicken and mix it in gently, add bacon. In a small bowl, whisk together sour cream, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, raspberry vinegar and dill. Pour over chicken and vegetables and mix well. Chill the salad for at least 2 hours before serving. ; name: different but delicious chicken salad for parties ; ingredients: pineapple juice, lemon pepper seasoning, boneless skinless chicken breasts, almonds, garlic powder, mayonnaise ; preparation:Poach chicken breasts in pineapple juice with plenty of lemon pepper seasoning until cooked through and the poaching liquid has thickened into a partial glaze. Discard the poaching liquid and allow the chicken to cool. Run the chicken breasts through a food processor until crumbly and then pour into a large bowl. Run almonds through the food processor until coarsely or finely chopped. Add almonds to chicken. Now add garlic powder to the mix -- the more the better. Do not be afraid that you will overpower the chicken salad as the garlic powder is what makes the dish so addictive. Add mayo to desired consistency. Serve chicken salad with croissants, toasted french bread slices or a bread of your choice. ; name: easy homemade chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, celery, green onion, lemon juice, pepper, mayonnaise, sweet pickle relish, prepared mustard, hard-boiled eggs ; preparation:In medium mixing bowl combine first three ingredients. Stir in the lemon juice and pepper. Combine the mayo, pickle relish and prepared mustard. Add this sauce to chicken and gently stir in the eggs. Cover and chill until ready to serve. ; name: chicken salad with broccoli ; ingredients: whole chicken breasts, broccoli, dried dill, lemon, juice of, red onion, sour cream, mayonnaise, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook the chicken breasts by your preferred method. I usually poach them. Also, cook the broccoli flowers as you wish but keep them bright green with a bit of crunch. Mix cooked cubed chicken and broccoli together with remaining ingredients. Best served chilled. ; name: chicken salad in the tropics ; ingredients: chicken breasts, celery, light mayonnaise, pepper, pineapple chunks in juice, firm bananas, mandarin oranges, flaked coconut, salted cashews, salad greens ; preparation:Place cooked chicken and celery in a large bowl. Combine mayonnaise with the pepper and add to the chicken mixture and mix well. Cover and chill for at least 30 minutes. Before serving, add the pineapple, bananas, oranges, and coconut. Toss gently. Serve on salad greens and sprinkle with nuts on top. ; name: chicken salad for sandwiches ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, celery, onion, mayonnaise, lemon juice, salt and pepper, fresh parsley, dill seed ; preparation:Place chicken, celery stalk and onion in saucepan with water to cover. Bring to a boil and simmer 20 minutes or until chicken is done. Drain and discard onion and celery. Let chicken cool. In a food processor chop chicken. In a medium sized bowl combine chicken with mayonnaise, salt& pepper, parsley, dill seed, chopped celery and lemon juice. Cover and refrigerate until chilled. ; name: holiday chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken breasts, fat-free mayonnaise, paprika, dried cranberries, celery, green onions, green bell pepper, pecans, seasoning salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: my omas lentil soup ; ingredients: brown lentils, potatoes, carrots, chicken broth, bacon, bratwursts ; preparation:Add first 3 ingredients to a large pot. Add 3 cups of broth. Cook over medium heat stirring occasionally until everything is tender. You may need to add some more broth or water as it is absorbed. 30 minutes before you want to serve it add the wurst or hot dogs if you wish and let them cook through. Serve with hearty bread and a salad. ; name: hearty tomato and lentil soup ; ingredients: onions, celery ribs, olive oil flavored cooking spray, brown lentils, vegetable broth, water, tomatoes, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Saute onions and celery in olive oil cooking spray until onions are translucent. Add 1 lb brown lentils, vegetable broth, water and. The cans of tomatoes. Cover and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer until lentils are soft and celery is tender. If you desire a thinner soup, you may want to add an extra 2 cups of broth if desired. ; name: brown lentil and vegetable soup ; ingredients: olive oil, carrots, zucchini, celery, brown onion, diced tomatoes, vegetable stock, brown lentils, flat leaf parsley, lemon ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add carrots, celery and onion. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes or until vegetables begin to soften. Add tomatoes, zucchini and stock to pan. Cover and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium-low. Simmer, partially covered, for 15 minutes or until vegetables are soft. Add lentils to soup. Cook for 5 minutes or until heated through. Sprinkle with parsley and squeeze lemon juice. Season with freshly ground black pepper. ; name: lentil soup with italian sausage ; ingredients: olive oil, hot italian sausage, onion, carrots, parsnips, celery ribs, italian seasoning, brown lentils, chicken broth, spinach leaves ; preparation:Heat oil in a large pot over medium high heat. Add sausage and cook until browned, stirring occasionally. Using a slotted spoon, transfer sausage to a bowl. Stir in vegetables and italian seasoning. Cook stirring until vegetables soften. Stir in lentils and the broth. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and simmer until lentils are tender. Stir in sausage and simmer for 10-15 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Season to taste with salt and pepper and stir in spinach, cooking until spinach is wilted. ; name: lentil soup with bacon ; ingredients: bacon, onion, carrots, dry green lentils, chicken broth, bay leaf, cumin, fresh parsley ; preparation:In a saucepan, brown the bacon. Remove the bacon and set aside. Add onion and carrots, cook 5 minutes. Add lentils, chicken broth and bay leaf. Let simmer 25 to 30 minutes. Add the bacon, cumin and parsley. ; name: lentil vegetable and spinach soup ; ingredients: french lentils, vegetable stock, onion, garlic cloves, ground cumin, light coconut cream, dark soy sauce, salt & freshly ground black pepper, baby spinach leaves ; preparation:Rinse the puy lentils and place in a large pot with enough cold water just to cover. Bring to the boil and keep boiling for 10 minutes. Add the onion, garlic, cumin, coconut milk and soy sauce and season with salt and freshly ground pepper to taste. Bring back to the boil. Reduce the heat and simmer gently for 20-30 minutes, or until the lentils are cooked. Add spinach in the last few minutes until wilted. Serve. ; name: coconut lentil soup ; ingredients: red lentils, fresh ginger, onion, garlic clove, oil, turmeric, chicken stock, crushed tomatoes, coconut milk ; preparation:Rinse and drain lentils. Finely chop ginger, onion and garlic clove. Heat oil in a pot and saut chopped ginger, onion and garlic until softened. Add turmeric, hot chicken stock, crushed tomatoes and the lentils. Bring to boil and allow to simmer for 20 minutes. Puree the soup in a blender until smooth and return to the pot. Add coconut milk and heat gently. ; name: my mom s lentil soup ; ingredients: lentils, celery ribs, onion, garlic, fresh pork hocks, brown sugar ; preparation:

name: cheesy potato casserole bread ; ingredients: active dry yeast, milk, vegetable shortening, egg, salt, black pepper, all-purpose flour, mashed potatoes, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Grease a deep round or oval 2-quart casserole and set aside. In a large mixing bowl, sprinkle the yeast over the milk and let dissolve. Add the shortening, egg, salt, pepper, and 1 cup of the flour and beat till smooth, about 2 minutes stir in the remaining 2 cups flour, the potatoes, and cheddar till well blended, scrape the dough in the prepared casserole, cover with plastic wrap, and let rise in a warm area till doubled in bulk, about 40 minutes. Preheat the oven to 375f. Sprinkle the parmesan evenly, over the top of the dough and bake till golden brown, about 45 minutes. Transfer the bread to a wire rack to cool, then cut into slices. ; name: cheesy potato and ham casserole ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, black pepper, milk, water, velveeta cheese, potatoes, ham, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Melt 6 tablespoons butter and remove from heat. Stir in flour, salt and pepper. Gradually stir in milk and water and cook over medium heat until thick. Add cheese and stir until melted. Combine potatoes and ham and add cheese sauce, stir gently, then place in greased casserole dish and set aside. Melt butter in a skillet. Add and brown bread crumbs. Sprinkle crumbs on top of potato casserole and bake at 350 for 30 to 45 minutes. ; name: cheesy chicken and rice casserole ; ingredients: cream of chicken soup, water, long-grain white rice, onion powder, ground black pepper, frozen mixed vegetables, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Stir soup, water, rice, onion powder, black pepper, and vegetables in shallow baking dish. Add chicken. Season as desired. Cover. Bake for 50 minutes. Top with cheese and let stand. ; name: tomato cheesy cabbage and mushroom casserole ; ingredients: butter, sweet onion, garlic cloves, green cabbage, white mushroom, salt, pepper, condensed tomato soup, milk, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large skillet over med-high heat, melt butter. Add onions, garlic, cabbage, mushrooms, salt and pepper and cover. Stirring occasionally until cabbage is wilted. Reduce heat to medium. Add tomato soup and milk and stir well. Add half of the shredded cheese. Mix well. Pour into a casserole or baking dish and sprinkle with remaining half of cheese. Bake uncovered at 350 for about 20-25 minutes or until cheese starts to brown. ; name: cheesy potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, velveeta cheese, onions, bacon, mayonnaise ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Boil potatoes for 20-30 minutes, or until softened. Peel and dice them, placing them in a large baking dish. Add velveeta, onion, crumbled bacon, and mayonnaise. Mix well. Bake for 45 min to 1 hour. ; name: potato carrot casserole ; ingredients: potatoes, carrots, green onion, light sour cream, milk, plain yogurt, pepper, sharp cheddar cheese, nutmeg, fresh parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Lightly spray a 28 x 16-cm shallow baking dish with spray oil. Peel and coarsely grate potatoes and carrots. Place in a mixing bowl and add onions, sour cream, milk yoghurt, pepper and 1 cup of cheese. Place the mixture in the prepared dish. Sprinkle with remaining cheese and nutmeg. Cook for 40 minutes, until cooked and bubbling hot. Sprinkle with chopped parsley and serve. ; name: cheesy carrot and rice casserole ; ingredients: carrots, cooked white rice, onion, cheddar cheese, egg, salt, pepper, butter ; preparation:Beat the egg. Mix egg with carrots, rice, onion, salt and pepper. Mix in 1 cup of chedder cheese with other ingredients. Pour into a greased casserole dish. Dot the top with the butter. Bake in a 375 degree oven for 35 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle the rest of the cheese over the top and cover with foil long enough for cheese to melt. Prep time includes cookin rice and carrots. ; name: cheesy potato and onion casserole ; ingredients: potato, tomatoes, onions, herbs, margarine, salt & freshly ground black pepper, milk, plain flour, cheese ; preparation:

name: marshmallow sauce ; ingredients: sugar, corn syrup, milk, butter, marshmallows, water, vanilla ; preparation:Place the sugar, corn syrup and milk in a saucepan and stir over low heat until the sugar dissolves. Bring to a boil, then simmer for 5 minutes. In the top of a double boiler dissolve the marshmallows and butter in the 2 tablespoons of water. Once the marshmallows are completely melted stir in the hot syrup beating well. Add the vanilla. The sauce may be reheated in the top of a double boiler. Beat well before serving. ; name: strawberry dessert sauce ; ingredients: fresh strawberries, sugar, cornstarch, water, lemon juice ; preparation:Mash strawberries. Set aside. In a saucepan, combine the sugar, cornstarch and water until smooth. Bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Stir in strawberries. Remove from the heat. Stir in lemon juice. Transfer to a small bowl. Cover and refrigerate until chilled. ; name: dessert citrus sauce ; ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, water, butter, orange juice, orange peel, lemon juice ; preparation:In 1 quart saucepan, combine sugar and cornstarch. Gradually stir in water until smooth. Cook over medium heat, stirring often until boiling. Boil 1 minute, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Stir in butter, juice, and peel until butter is melted. Serve warm. ; name: lemon dessert sauce ; ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, boiling water, fresh lemon juice, butter, lemon, rind of, salt ; preparation:Mix sugar and cornstarch in a small saucepan. Stir in boiling water and lemon juice. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Boil 3 minutes until clear and thick. Remove from heat and stir in butter, lemon rind and salt. ; name: vanilla sauce for bread pudding ; ingredients: water, sugar, cornstarch, butter, vanilla extract, salt ; preparation:Bring water to a boil, in a small saucepan. Combine sugar and cornstarch. Stir well. Add sugar mixture to boiling water. Reduce heat to medium, stirring constantly, or until mixture thickens. Remove from heat. Add butter, vanilla and salt, stirring until butter melts. ; name: raspberry orange sauce ; ingredients: fresh raspberries, orange juice, granulated sugar, cornstarch, water ; preparation:Combine raspberries, orange juice and sugar in saucepan. Bring to boil, stirring constantly. Dissolve constarach in water. Add to pan and cook stirring for 2 minutes. Chill sauce until cold, about 15 minutes. ; name: peachy dessert sauce ; ingredients: cornstarch, sugar, cinnamon, water, juice, lemon juice, peach slices in heavy syrup, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:In a small saucepan mix cornstarch, sugar, & cinnamon. Add water, peach juice, & lemon juice. Bring to a boil. Stirring constantly for 1-2 minutes. Add peaches and heat through. Serve over ice cream or on pancakes for breakfast. ; name: fruit plate with marshmallow sauce ; ingredients: sugar, hot water, light corn syrup, egg whites, vanilla, salt, mayonnaise, orange rind ; preparation:

name: olive and cream cheese dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, green olives, sharp cheddar cheese, bacon ; preparation:Soften cream cheese in the microwave for 1 and a half minutes. Mix all of the ingredients together in a medium sized mixing bowl. Spread the mixture into any size baking dish. Bake the mixture until the top begins to brown a little, usually about 25-30 minutes, depending on the size of the dish. Serve immediatley. ; name: mediterranean layered dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, miracle whip, chopped tomato, cucumber, black olives, feta, pita bread ; preparation:Combine cream cheese and miracle whip. Spread on bottom of 9 inch pie plate. Top with tomatoes cucumbers and olives. Sprinkle with cheese. Serve with wedges of pita bread. ; name: cream cheese salsa dip w cheddar olives ; ingredients: cream cheese, salsa, cheddar cheese, black olives ; preparation:Spread cream cheese evenly in the bottom of a casserole dish with a butter knife. Pour salsa over cream cheese. Sprinkle cheese over salsa. Layer olives over cheese. Serve with tortilla chips. ; name: black bean dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, black beans, rotel, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spread softened cream cheese on bottom of 8x8 oven safe dish. In a small bowl, mix black beans and rotel. Pour on top of cream cheese. Top with shredded cheeses. Bake in 350 degree oven until cheese is bubbly. Let stand for about 15-30 minutes before serving. Serve with tostito chips or fritos. ; name: cream cheese garlic dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, fresh garlic, milk, chives ; preparation:Open packages of cream cheese and place in large mixing bowl. Let soften at room temperature for several hours. Crush garlic and add to blocks of softened cream cheese. With electric mixer, slowly add milk or half& half thinning mixture and mixing all ingredients together until a desired dipping consistency is reached. Stir in chives, if desired. Refrigerate covered. Let dip sit out about 5 minutes before serving. Not to worry, if you get it a little too thin, just add another package of cream cheese. ; name: green pepper dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, green pepper, onion, egg, vinegar, sugar, salt ; preparation:Mix cream cheese, pepper, and onion. In saucepan, combine next four ingredients. Stir over medium heat until thick. Cool. Mix into cheese mixture with blender or mixer. ; name: cream cheese dip for the lazy ; ingredients: cream cheese, tomatoes, garlic, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Slice tomato in half and scoop out inside pulp. Combine tomato pulp with cream cheese and garlic. Mix with a mixer for several minutes until smooth. Place mixture in a small bowl and sprinkle with fresh ground pepper. Refrigerate until ready to serve. ; name: black olive dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, lemon juice, garlic salt, milk, black olives ; preparation:

name: 7 up biscuits ; ingredients: bisquick, 7-up soda, sour cream, butter ; preparation:Mix first 3 ingredients. Place half of butter in a pan. Drop dough by spoonfuls on top. Bake at 450 degrees for 15-20 minutes. When biscuits start to brown, pour remaining butter over top and allow them to finish browning. ; name: cheddar garlic biscuits ; ingredients: bisquick baking mix, milk, cheddar cheese, margarine, garlic powder ; preparation:Heat oven to 450f. Stir baking mix, milk and cheese until soft dough forms. Drop by 9 spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 8-10 minutes or until golden brown. Stir together margarine and garlic powder. Brush over warm biscuits. ; name: savory biscuit bites ; ingredients: butter, parmesan cheese, dried onion flakes, dried parsley flakes, refrigerated biscuits ; preparation:In a bowl, combine butter, cheese, onion and parsley. Cut bisuits in quarters. Roll in butter mixture. Place in a greased 15x10x1 inch baking pan. Let stand for 25 minute. Bake at 400 degree oven for 8 minute or until lightly browned. ; name: butter dip biscuits ; ingredients: unsalted butter, all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, kosher salt, buttermilk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f degrees. Spray an 8-inch square baking dish with nonstick cooking spray. In a microwave-safe bowl, melt butter in the microwave. In a medium bowl, mix together the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Pour in the buttermilk. Stir until a loose dough forms. Batter will be a bit sticky. Press biscuit dough into baking dish. Take a sharp knife and cut the biscuit dough into 9 squares before baking. Bake for about 20-25 minutes, rotating dish once during baking. ; name: garlic cheese biscuits ; ingredients: bisquick, milk, cheddar cheese, butter, garlic salt ; preparation:Mix bisquick, milk and cheddar cheese until a soft ball forms. Beat vigorously for 30 seconds. Drob by balls onto ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 450 degrees for 8-10 munutes. Melt butter. Mix butter and garlic salt. Brush garlic butter on rolls while still hot on the pan. ; name: 1 2 3 biscuits ; ingredients: salt, flour, baking powder, oil, milk ; preparation:Mix the first 3 ingredients together in a bowl. Mix oil and milk and then add to dry ingredients. Mix until combined. Put on ungreased baking sheet and bake at 375 degrees for 10-12 minutes until golden brown. Serve warm. ; name: easy garlic cheese biscuits ; ingredients: bisquick baking mix, milk, cheese, butter, garlic powder ; preparation:Heat oven to 450f. Mix the baking mix, milk, and cheese to make a soft dough. Beat vigorously 30 seconds. Drop the dough by 10-12 spoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 8-10 minutes or until golden brown. Mix butter and garlic powder. Brush on warm biscuits before removing from pan. Serve warm. ; name: breakfast biscuits brekkie bix ; ingredients: orange marmalade, butter, bisquick baking mix, cold water ; preparation:

name: oatmeal no bakes ; ingredients: milk, sugar, cocoa, butter, quick-cooking oats, vanilla ; preparation:Cook the milk, sugar, cocoa and butter to a boil. Boil for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Add oats and vanilla. Mix well. Pour into a 9x12-inch buttered cake pan. Refrigerate till firm. Cut into squares. Store in a tightly covered container or zip lock bag. ; name: oatmeal shortbread ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, vanilla, baking soda, rolled oats, flour ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar, add vanilla and beat until fluffy. Blend flour, baking soda, and rolled oats and then add to butter mixture. Mix well. Chill dough for 1 hour. Roll dough into balls and flatten with a fork. Bake on ungreased cookie sheet at 350 dgrees for 13 to 15 minutes until lightly browned. ; name: family favorite oatmeal pancakes ; ingredients: milk, rolled oats, eggs, oil, flour, sugar, baking powder, salt ; preparation:Pour milk over oats and let stand 2-5 minutes.
