Grill the breasts over high heat, turning once, until browned and cooked through, about 3 minutes per side. Let rest for 5 minutes. Grill the tenders, turning once, until browned and cooked through, about 2 minutes per side. Cut the tenders in half lengthwise. Slice the breasts diagonally inch thick. Spread the caesar mayonnaise on the top and bottom half of each roll. Arrange a sliced chicken breast and tender on the bottom half of the roll, cover with arugula and close. ; name: grilled gruyere and sweet onion sandwiches ; ingredients: unsalted butter, extra virgin olive oil, onion, salt & freshly ground black pepper, whole grain bread, dijon mustard, gruyere cheese, pickles ; preparation:In a deep skillet, melt 1 tablespoon of the butter with the olive oil. Add the onion, cover and cook over high heat, stirring once of twice until softened, about 5 minutes. Uncover and cook over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally, until the onion is tender and caramelized, about 25 minutes. Add water to the skillet as necessary to prevent onion from scorching. Season with salt and pepper. Spread bread with remain butter and arrange, buttered side down, on work surface. Spread a thin layer of mustard on each slice. Top half of the slices with onion, gruyere and pickles. Preheat skillet or panini press. Grill sandwiches over low heat until bread is toasted and cheese is melted. Cut in half and serve. ; name: chive egg dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, milk, mayonnaise, prepared mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, hard-boiled eggs, chives, sweet peppers ; preparation:In a small bowl, beat the cream cheese until smooth. Gradually beat in milk and mayonnaise until blended. Add the mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper. Stir in eggs and chives. Mix well. Serve with peppers or crackers. Refrigerate leftovers. ; name: baked onion and cheese dip ; ingredients: cheddar cheese, cheese, cream cheese, mayonnaise, dried thyme, vidalia onions ; preparation:In a food processor, combine the cheddar cheese, pepper jack cheese, cream cheese, mayonnaise, thyme, and 1 cup of the onions. Cover and process until blended. Stir in remaining onion. Transfer to a greased baking dish. Bake, uncovered, at 375 degrees fahrenheit for 20-25 minutes or until bubbly. Serve with crackers, day old baguette or french bread. ; name: sourdough sandwiches ; ingredients: chive & onion cream cheese, lemon juice, dijon-style mustard, garlic pepper seasoning, sourdough bread, smoked turkey breast, provolone cheese, roasted sweet peppers, spinach leaves ; preparation:

name: crumb top apple pie ; ingredients: sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, water, lemon juice, butter, tart apples, brown sugar, flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Combine sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg in a large bowl. Add apple slices. Sprinkle water and lemon juice over apple slices and toss until coated with sugar. Spoon into a deep dish pie pan. Dot with butter. Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add flour and stir until smooth. Dab on top of apples. Bake for 50- 60 minutes. Serve warm. ; name: rustic crunchy apple pie ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, sugar, flour, walnuts, salt, cinnamon, apples, unbaked pie shell, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a large bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs, sugar, flour, walnuts, salt, and cinnamon. Roll apple slices in the crumb mixture. Arrange apples in unbaked pie shell. Sprinkle remaining crumb mixture over top of apples. Pour melted butter evenly over the top of the apples. Bake for 1 hour. Serve with whipped cream or vanilla ice-cream. ; name: tasty applesauce pie ; ingredients: unbaked 9-inch pie crust, unsweetened applesauce, brown sugar, eggs, crisco, lemon juice, lemon, rind of, salt, nutmeg, cinnamon ; preparation:Heat oven to 450. Combine applesauce, brown sugar, eggs, crisco, lemon juice, lemon peel, salt, nutmeg and cinnamon. Mix well. Pour filling into pie shell. Bake for 15 mins. Reduce heat to 300. Continue baking for 45-55 mins or until knife inserted in the middle comes out clean. Coool thoroughly on wire rack before cutting. ; name: cran apple pie ; ingredients: 9-inch double-crust pie shells, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, tart apples, butter, sugar, cinnamon, fresh cranberries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Combine sugars, flour and cinnamon in large bowl. Add fruit. Mix well. Turn into pastry-lined pan. Dot with butter. Cover and cut slits in top crust. Seal edges. Bake 40 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: crustless apple pie ; ingredients: apples, white sugar, flour, brown sugar, butter, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Butter pie tin. Put apples in pie tin. Cover with white sugar. Mix flour, brown sugar, butter and salt. Put this mixture over apples. Bake for 30 minute or until apples are tender and topping is brown. ; name: the best apple pie ; ingredients: apples, butter, sugar, flour, cinnamon, ground nutmeg, unbaked pie shells, brown sugar, pecans ; preparation:Pour melted butter over sliced apples and soak a few minutes. Combine sugar, flour, and spices. Remove apples from butter. Coat apples with sugar mixture, pour into pastry shell. Combine topping ingredients and crumble over apples. Bake at 400f for 40 to 45 minutes. ; name: mini fried apple pies ; ingredients: self rising flour, crisco, milk, apples, butter, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar ; preparation:Combine flour, crisco and milk and mix well. Roll into balls the size of a walnut. Flatten each with a rolling pin. Peel and dice apples. Cook apples, butter, spices and brown sugar together until tender. Cool slightly. Place one tablespoon of apple mixture in the center of each flattened ball of dough. Fold over and press edges with a fork. Fry in oil that has been preheated to 350 until golden brown on each side. Before serving, sprinkle with powdered sugar. ; name: streusel crumb topped apple pie ; ingredients: unbaked 9-inch pie shell, granny smith apples, sugar, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, flour, light brown sugar, butter ; preparation:

name: japanese style potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, carrots, onion, oil, vegetable stock cube, rice vinegar, sugar, salt, eggs, cucumber ; preparation:Heat the oil in a deep fry pan or saucepan. Stir fry the potatoes, carrots and onion 2 minutes. Dissolve the stock cube in 7fl oz boiling water and pour into the pan. Add the vinegar, sugar and salt. Cover and simmer 5 minutes. Uncover and cook over a moderate heat until all the liquid has evaporated. Shake the pan gently occasionally to prevent the vegetables sticking to the pan as the liquid dries up. Remove from the heat and allow to cool for 30 seconds then add the beaten egg, stirring quickly until the egg sets. Transfer to a dish, leave to cool, then chill. Add the drained cucumber to the potato mixture, check seasoning and serve. ; name: indian style chilled carrot salad ; ingredients: carrot, vegetable oil, black mustard seeds, dried red chili, salt, sugar, lemon juice, raisins ; preparation:Place the grated carrots in a serving bowl. In a small frying pan put the oil, black mustard seeds and broken red chili pieces. Heat over high heat until the mustard seeds pop for about 10 seconds. Pour the mixture over the carrots and stir to blend. Add the salt, sugar and lemon juice and mix again. If desired, add the raisins. Chill until serving time. ; name: indian style carrot salad ; ingredients: carrot, salt, vegetable oil, black mustard seeds, lemon juice, sultanas ; preparation:Soak the sultanas in water for 2-3 hours. Grate the carrots and put them in a bowl. Mix in the salt. Heat the oil and when hot, put in the mustard seeds. When the mustard seeds begin to pop, pour the oil and seeds over the carrots. Add lemon juice and sultanas and toss. ; name: low carb oriental cabbage salad ; ingredients: green cabbage, red cabbage, soy sauce, oil, white vinegar, sugar substitute, scallion, almonds, sesame seeds, sesame oil ; preparation:Place the green and red cabbage in a large bowl and set aside. In a small sauce pan, heat the soy sauce, oil and vinegar on medium high heat just until the mixture comes to a light boil. Whisk in the splenda and set aside. In a small saute pan, heat the sesame oil, almonds and sesame seeds on medium high. Toast the almonds and seeds stirring constantly until the sesame seeds start turning golden brown. Immediately pour the nuts and seeds into the soy sauce mix and stir. Add in the scallions, and then pour the dressing over the salad. Toss the salad until the dressing is completely incorporated. Allow the salad to sit at room temperature for at least 30 minutes before serving up to 4 hours. ; name: layered vegetable salad ; ingredients: iceberg lettuce, belgian endive, carrots, red pepper, green onions, radish, frozen tiny peas, mayonnaise, chili sauce ; preparation:Put half of the lettuce in the bottom of a clear glass salad bowl. Layer the ingredients alternately with the peas. Use complimenting colors as you layer the veggies. Mix the mayo & chili sauce. Top the salad with the last half of the iceberg lettuce. Spread dressing over the top of the salad. Cover and refrigerate for 24 hours. ; name: asian carrots ; ingredients: toasted sesame oil, carrots, light soy sauce, hoisin sauce, orange juice, gingerroot, honey, sesame seeds, pepper, salt ; preparation:Heat sesame oil in skillet on medium-high heat. Add carrots, soy sauce, hoisin sauce, juice and ginger root. Reduce heat, cover and cook at a simmer and stir until carrots are crisp-tender. Stir in the honey. Stir in well and cook until heated through. Top with the sesame seeds. Season with pepper and salt, if needed. ; name: sauted carrots with toasted almonds ; ingredients: butter, oil, fresh carrot, apple juice, garlic chives, slivered almonds, salt, white pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet heat the pan on medium heat. Add the butter and melt. Be careful not to burn the butter. Next add the oil. Saute the carrots, stirring frequently until they start to turn golden and are crisp-tender about 10-12 minutes. Do not allow the skillet to turn dry- adding a little apple juice if necessary. When the carrots are crisp-tender add the remaining apple juice and saute mixture until liquid is absorbed. Finally, stir in the lemon juice, chives, toasted almonds, salt and white pepper. ; name: light oriental style vegetables ; ingredients: slivered almonds, frozen mixed vegetables, celery, sliced mushrooms, reduced sodium soy sauce, water ; preparation:

name: mushroom barley casserole ; ingredients: onion, butter, fresh mushrooms, garlic cloves, water, barley, onion and mushroom soup mix, dried thyme, salt ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook onion in hot, melted butter over med heat until tender. Add in mushrooms and garlic. Cook about 5 minutes or until mushrooms are tender, stirring occasionally. Transfer mixture to a greased 3-quart baking dish. Stir in the water, barley, dry soup mix, thyme, and salt. Bake, covered, at 350 for about 1 hour and 15 minutes or until barley is tender and most of the liquid is absorbed, stirring once or twice. Let stand, covered, for 15 minutes before serving. ; name: grainy casserole ; ingredients: carrots, corn, onion, quick-cooking barley, bulgur, salt, pepper, vegetable broth, black beans, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Combine all ingredients into a 13 x 9 baking dish coated with cooking spray. Cover and bake at 350 for 50-55 minutes or until grains are tender, stirring once. Top with cheese. Bake an additional 3-5 minutes or until cheese is melted. ; name: barley bake ; ingredients: celery, sliced mushrooms, green onion, garlic clove, butter, barley, fresh cilantro, chicken broth, salt and pepper ; preparation:Saute celery, mushrooms, onions and garlic in butter until soft. Add barley and cook until light brown. In a 2 quart buttered casserole combine barley mixture, parsley or cilantro and chicken broth. Cover and bake at 350 for 30 minutes and then uncover and bake for 45 minutes more or until barley is tender and liquid is absorbed. If necessary, add more broth. Season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: rice and mushroom casserole ; ingredients: long-grain rice, butter, mushroom, onion, celery, water, beef bouillon cube, salt, thyme leaves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a skillet over medium heat, cook rice, stirring constantly, until rice is golden, about 5 minutes. Pour rice into a 1-quart casserole dish. In same skillet, in 2 tablespoons hot butter, cook mushrooms, onion and celery until tender, about 5 minutes. Add remaining ingredients and heat to boiling. Pour mixture from skillet over rice in casserole. Cover and bake 35 minutes or until all liquid is absorbed. With a fork, lightly toss 2 tablespoons butter into rice mixture until butter is melted and mixture is fluffy. ; name: vegetable barley bake ; ingredients: sweet red peppers, mushrooms, onions, butter, vegetable broth, pearl barley, pepper ; preparation:In a large non-stick skillet, saute the peppers, mushrooms, and onions in butter until tender. Transfer to a 13-inch by 9-inch by 2-inch baking dish coated with cooking spray. Stir in the broth, barley, and pepper. Cover and bake at 350f for 50 minutes. Uncover and bake for another 5-10 minutes or until barley is tender and liquid is absorbed. ; name: comfort casserole ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, celery, garlic, pepper, fresh mushrooms, beef bouillon powder, boiling water, soy sauce, long grain white rice ; preparation:Scrambly-fry the beef, onion, celery, garlic, and pepper in a non-stick skillet until the beef is no longer pink. Drain. Add the mushrooms, saute for 5 minutes. Dissolve the bouillon powder in the boiling water. Add to the beef mixture. Mix well. Stir in the soy sauce and rice. Simmer, covered, for 30-40 minutes or until the rice is tender. ; name: toasted barley with mixed veggies ; ingredients: pearl barley, chicken broth, red onion, mushroom, carrot, green bell pepper, dried dill weed, salt, pepper, green onion ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Spray 10-inch skillet and 2-quart casserole with nonstick cooking spray. Cook barley in skillet over medium heat about 8 minutes, stirring constantly, until light brown. Stir in remaining ingredients except green onions. Heat to boiling. Transfer mixture to casserole. Cover and bake about 50 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Sprinkle with green onions. ; name: delicious barley casserole ; ingredients: butter, onions, garlic, fresh mushrooms, pearl barley, chicken broth, fresh ground black pepper, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: apple dumpling bake ; ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, granny smith apples, sugar, butter, mountain dew soda, ground cinnamon, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Seperate crescent rolls into 16 triangles. Cut each apple into eight wedges. Wrap a triangle around each apple wedge. Place in a greased 13-in. X 9-in. X 2-in. Baking dish. In a bowl, combine sugar and butter and sprinkle over rolls. Slowly pour the soda around the rolls. Sprinkle with cinnamon. Bake, uncovered, at 350 for 35-40 minutes or until golden brown. Serve warm with ice cream. ; name: wade s apple dumplings ; ingredients: granny smith apple, crescent rolls, sugar, sprite, vanilla, butter, cinnamon ; preparation:Grease a small casserole dish and preheat oven to 350. Cut the granny smith into eights. Unroll the crescent rolls, and place one slice of the granny smith into each crescent roll and roll back up. Place in casserole dish. Mix the sugar, sprite and vanilla and pour on top of crescent rolls. Dot butter around the top, and sprinkle with cinnamon. Bake for around 30 min or until tops of dumplings are golden brown. ; name: pioneer woman apple dumplings ; ingredients: granny smith apples, butter, vanilla, cinnamon, crescent roll dough, mountain dew soda ; preparation:Core, peel and dice the apples. Butter a 13x9 inch baking pan. Unroll dough and roll each apple slice in one square. Lay each on the buttered baking pan. Melt 2 sticks butter in a saucepan. Dump in sugar. Barely stir but add vanilla. You want the mix grainy and lumpy. Pour to coat over dumplings. Pour mountain dew around pan. Sprinkle with cinnamon and bake 350 degreses fr 40 minutes. ; name: quick and easy apple dumplings ; ingredients: granny smith apples, orange juice, sugar, butter, cinnamon, refrigerated crescent dinner rolls ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 f. Wrap each apple piece with a piece of crescent roll. Place in a baking dish that has been greased. Bring orange juice, sugar, butter and cinnamon to a boil and pour over apples. Bake until brown, approximately 35 minutes. Spoon juice over apples occasionally while baking. ; name: the easiest apple dumplings ; ingredients: granny smith apples, crescent roll, butter, sugar, apple juice concentrate, apple pie spice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Put butter, sugar, apple pie spice, and apple juice concentrate into glass pyrex baking dish. Microwave until all is melted. Mix well. Unroll each roll and place a slice of apple in each roll, starting with the largest end. Place rolls in the baking dish. Spoon juice over top of dumplings. Bake 20-25 minutes, until apples are tender. Spoon sauce over dumplings occasionally as they bake. Serve warm with vanilla ice cream or cool whip. ; name: apple dumpling cobbler ; ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, granny smith apples, orange juice, sugar, butter, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Unroll cresent rolls and separate. Wrap each apple quarter with cresent roll dough, and place in a lightly greased 13 x 9 baking dish. Bring orange juice, sugar and butter to a boil in a saucepan. Pour over the apple dumplings. Stir together 2 t sugar and 1 t cinnamon. Sprinkle over dumplings. Bake at 350 for 25 minutes until golden and bubbly. ; name: apple crescents ; ingredients: crescent rolls, apples, orange juice, white sugar, butter, cornstarch, brown sugar, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Peel and core apples and cut each apple into 8 pieces. Separate crescent rolls into 8 triangles. Put 2 pieces of apple onto each triangle and roll up wide end first. Place in a 9x13 pyrex baking dish. Mix white sugar, orange juice and corn starch together and pour over apple crescents. Melt butter and pour over the apple crescents. Bake for 30 minutes and remove from oven. Baste apple crescents with the orange juice from the pan to wet the tops. Mix brown sugar and cinnamon together and sprinkle over the crescents. Bake for 15 minutes more. ; name: mountain dew apple dumplings ; ingredients: crescent rolls, tart apples, sugar, butter, cinnamon, mountain dew soda ; preparation:

name: winter squash pumpkin pie ; ingredients: squash, evaporated milk, eggs, rum, vanilla, sugar, cinnamon, ground ginger, salt, pie shell ; preparation:Wash-peel and cube fresh pumpkin or squash. Steam for one hour. Drain in a colander for a long time mashing the pumpkin periodically. This mixture freezes well in zip bags. In a large bowl combine the squash, milk, eggs, rum and vanilla, mix well. Stir in the rest of the ingredients. Pour the batter into the pie shell. Bake at 300f for one hour. ; name: my real pumpkin pie ; ingredients: pie crusts, eggs, pumpkin, sugar, salt, cinnamon, ginger, ground cloves, sweetened condensed milk, evaporated milk ; preparation:Combine the eggs, pumpkin, sugar, salt, cinnamon, ginger, cloves and milk. Mix well and pour into prepared pie crusts. Bake in a 425f oven for 15 minutes. Reduce temperature to 350f and bake an additional 50-60 minutes or until the center of the pie is no longer wobbly or liquid. Cool and serve with whipped topping or vanilla ice cream. ; name: dark pumpkin pie ; ingredients: eggs, pumpkin puree, sugar, cinnamon, clove, milk, unbaked pie shell ; preparation:Break eggs into a small bowl and mix, so that the yolks and whites are well combined. Mix together the pumpkin, sugar, cinnamon and cloves in a separate, larger bowl. Scald milk, and stir the hot milk, and then the eggs, into the pumpkin mixture. Pour into a pie pan lined with the unbaked pie shell. Bake for 40 to 50 minutes at 350f, until a table knife inserted at a point between the center and the edge of the pie, comes out clean. Please begin checking slightly before the 40 minute point. ; name: simple pumpkin pie ; ingredients: pumpkin puree, sweetened condensed milk, egg, pumpkin pie spice, 9-inch deep dish pie crust ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325. Combine first four ingredients in a medium bowl, mixing well. Pour into pie shell. Place pie on cookie sheet and bake for 1 hour. Cool. Top with cool whip or real whipped cream. ; name: great pumpkin dessert ; ingredients: pumpkin, evaporated milk, pumpkin pie spice, yellow cake mix, butter, eggs, sugar, walnuts ; preparation:Mix pumpkin, milk, eggs and sugar. Add spice. Transfer to a greased 9 x 13 baking dish. Sprinkle with dry cake mix and drizzle with melted butter. Top with walnuts. Bake at 350 for 1 hour or until knife inserted near center comes out clean. Serve with ice cream or whipped cream. ; name: instant pumpkin pie ; ingredients: instant vanilla pudding, milk, pumpkin, pumpkin pie spice, whipped topping, pie crust ; preparation:Add pudding mix to milk and beat on lowest speed just until blended. About 30 seconds. Blend in pumpkin, spice, and 2 cups of whipped topping. Pour into pie shell. Chill until set. At least 4 hours. Garnish with remaining whipped topping. ; name: sugar free pumpkin pie ; ingredients: eggs, pumpkin, splenda granular, salt, cinnamon, ginger, clove, evaporated milk, unbaked pie shell ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 425 degrees. Combine ingredients. Pour into pie crust. Bake 15 minute at 425. Reduce heat to 350 degrees and bake 45 minutes. Cool and garnish with whipped cream. ; name: kahlua pumpkin pie ; ingredients: pie crust, evaporated milk, light brown sugar, kahlua, light corn syrup, pumpkin pie spice, salt, canned pumpkin, eggs ; preparation:

name: kraft one dish italian fish ; ingredients: minute rice, water, white fish fillet, diced tomatoes, italian dressing, italian cheese blend ; preparation:Mix rice and water in shallow microwaveable dish. Arrange fish fillets in single layer over rice and pour tomatoes with the liquid and the dressing over fish. Cover loosely with plastic wrap, turn back one corner of plastic wrap to vent. Microwave on high 8 minute remove plastic wrap and sprinkle with cheese. Cover loosely with plastic wrap, venting at one corner. Microwave an additional 4 minute or til fish flakes easily with fork and rice is tender. ; name: greek fish ; ingredients: white fish fillet, stewed tomatoes, fresh garlic, dried oregano, feta cheese ; preparation:Spray a baking dish with vegetable spray. Place fish fillets in one layer in dish in a small bowl, slightly crush or mash tomatoes. Add oregano and garlic to taste. Spread tomato mixture over fish. Top with crumbled feta cheese. Bake in 350 oven for about 30 minutes. Check for doneness by inserting a fork in the thickest part of the fish, pull fork back slightly and check to see that fish flakes easily and is opaque all the way through. ; name: mediterranean catfish ; ingredients: catfish fillets, olive oil, bell pepper, onion, garlic, chicken broth, diced tomatoes, dried oregano, dried basil, black pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add bell pepper, onion and garlic, and saute for 2-3 minutes, or until vegetables are tender. Add chicken broth, tomatoes, oregano, basil and black pepper. Bring to a boil and cook for 2 minutes. Reduce heat to medium-low. Place catfish fillets in the sauce, cover, and simmer for 7-9 minutes, or until the fish flakes easily with a fork. Individual fillets with sauce may be served over a bed of cooked rice. ; name: spanish baked fish ; ingredients: perch fillets, tomato sauce, onion, garlic powder, chili powder, oregano flakes, ground cumin ; preparation:Thaw frozen fish according to package directions. Preheat oven to 350f. Separate fish into four fillets or pieces. Place fish in ungreased 13x9x2-inch baking pan. Combine paprika, garlic and onion powder, pepper, oregano, and thyme in small bowl. Sprinkle seasoning mixture and lemon juice evenly over fish. Drizzle margarine evenly over fish. Bake until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: tuna italian ; ingredients: onion, condensed cream of mushroom soup, evaporated milk, cheddar cheese, tuna, sliced mushrooms, parsley, lemon juice, noodles ; preparation:Cook onion until tender but not brown. Add soup, milk, and cheese. Heat and stir. Break tuna in chunks and add to remaining ingredients. Pour into 2 quart casserole dish. Bake at 350 degrees for 25-30 minutes. ; name: fish fillets with feta and tomatoes ; ingredients: flounder fillets, onion, chopped tomatoes, butter, feta cheese, salt and pepper, cooking spray, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Preheat broiler. Spray oil large broiler baking dish. Arrange fish fillets in a single layer in baking dish. Scatter onion over fish fillets and season with salt and pepper to taste. Scatter tomato over onion and fish. Drizzle melted butter over top. Broil for 5-7 minutes. Sprinkle with feta and continue to broil for 3-5 minutes more or until fish flakes easily and is cooked through. Sprinkle with fresh chopped cilantro to serve. ; name: one pan white fish tomato alfredo ; ingredients: butter, onion, garlic cloves, condensed cream of mushroom soup, milk, diced tomatoes, fish fillet, cooked linguine ; preparation:Heat the butter or olive oil in a 10-inch skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook until its tender. Stir in the soup, milk and tomatoes. Heat to a boil. Add the fish to the skillet and reduce the heat to low. Cover and cook for 10 minutes or until the fish flakes easily when tested with a fork. Spoon over hot linguine. ; name: italian fish ; ingredients: flounder fillets, dried oregano, salt, pepper, spaghetti sauce, fresh parsley, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:

name: creamy cauliflower soup ww friendly ; ingredients: olive oil, leeks, celery, chicken broth, cauliflower, half-and-half, nutmeg, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Clean and chop the leeks and celery. Heat oil in a large nonstick sauce pan, over medium heat. Add the leeks and celery, stir frequently, cook until softened, not browned, about 4 minutes. Add the broth and cauliflower, bring to boil. Cover and simmer until the cauliflower is tender, about 10-15 minutes. Remove from heat. In batches or with a blender stick, puree to desired texture. You may want to spoon out and reserve some cauliflower pieces for added texture. Stir in half & half and nutmeg and blend. Top with grated cheddar cheese. ; name: cauliflower and bacon soup ; ingredients: butter, leek, bacon, cauliflower, water, chicken stock cubes, cream, fresh parsley ; preparation:Melt butter in a large pot, add leek and bacon, cook stirring until soft. Add cauliflower, cook, stirring 2 minutes. Stir in water and crunbled stock cubes. Simmer covered about 15 minutes or until soft. Blend cauliflower until smooth using either a stick mixer or a food processor. Return to pan, stir in cream. Heat extra butter in a pan, add extra bacon, cook, stirring until crisp, drain on paper. Serve soup in bowls sprinkled with extra bacon and chopped parsley. ; name: cauliflower and nutmeg soup ; ingredients: olive oil, brown onion, cauliflower, chicken stock, water, ground nutmeg, cream ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Cook onion 3-4 minutes until soft. Add the cauliflower, stock, water and nutmeg. Bring the temperature to high and bring the mix to the boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer, partially covered, 20-25 minutes or until cauliflower is tender and mixture reduces slightly. Remove the mix from the heat. Process with a stab mixer until smooth. Add cream and season with salt and pepper. Place soup over medium heat for 5 minutes or until heated through. ; name: creamy cauliflower soup ; ingredients: water, vegetable broth, cauliflower, carrots, onion, parsley, salt, white pepper ; preparation:In a 5-quart saucepan, add all ingredients except salt and white pepper. Cover and simmer until vegetables are tender. Strain off and reserve most of the liquid. Place vegetables in a food processor and puree. Add pureed vegetables and reserved liquid back into the pot, add salt and white pepper, and reheat. ; name: leek cream soup ; ingredients: leeks, cauliflower, onion, vegetable bouillon granules, cream, salt and pepper, parsley ; preparation:Cut the leek in small pieces. Cut the center out of the cauliflower and separate the flowerets. Cook the leek, onion and cauliflower in the vegetable bouillon until soft. With the mixer, mix the soup until smooth. Heat again, stirring the cream in. Serve with the parsley sprinkled on top. ; name: creamy leek soup ; ingredients: leeks, garlic cloves, butter, vegetable broth, heavy cream, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Saute leeks and garlic in melted butter over medium heat until tender but not colored. Reduce heat, add broth, cover and simmer for 20 minutes. Puree using blender, food processor, or immersion blender. Add cream and season to taste with salt and pepper. Serve hot. ; name: cauliflower and parmesan soup ; ingredients: cauliflower, potato, water, leeks, butter, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese, nutmeg, parsley, chives ; preparation:Cut the cauliflower into small florets. Peel and dice the potato. Bring the water or stock to the boil, salt it well and cook the potato and cauliflower for 15 minutes. Trim the leeks and finely slice them. Melt the butter in a frying pan and gently cook the leeks until softened. Use a potato masher to crush the vegetables in the pan, or pure half the soup in a blender and return to the pan. Simmer gently for 5 minutes. Add the parmesan and nutmeg, stirring gently. Taste for salt and pepper, scatter with parsley and chives, and serve. ; name: creamy cauliflower leek soup ; ingredients: cauliflower, leek, chicken stock, nutmeg, salt and pepper, olive oil ; preparation:

name: crock pot golden chicken and noodles ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, broccoli cheese soup, milk, onion, salt, dried basil, pepper, cooked noodles ; preparation:Place chicken in crock pot. Combine the soup, milk, onion, salt, basil and pepper and pour over chicken. Cover and cook on high for 1 hour. Reduce heat to low and continue to cook 5-6 hours longer or until the meat juices run clear. Serve over noodles. ; name: crock pot chicken noodle soup ; ingredients: condensed chicken broth, baby carrots, boneless skinless chicken breasts, onion powder, garlic powder, italian seasoning, hot water, half-and-half cream, medium egg noodles, salt & pepper ; preparation:Pour the broth into a large crock pot then add the carrots & spices. Place the breasts in the broth then cover with the lid & cook on low for 6 hours. Uncover, shred the chicken then place back into the broth. Add in the noodles and half & half along with enough hot water to cover the noodles. Cook on high for another 30 minutes. It is done once the noodles are tender, make sure not to overcook them. Salt & pepper to taste then serve. ; name: crock pot chicken and noodles ; ingredients: whole chicken, water, salt, pepper, wide egg noodles ; preparation:Place the washed chicken in the crock pot. Cover with 1 cup of water, salt, and pepper. Cook on low for 8-10 hours or on high for 6-8 hours. Let cool and debone the chicken. Separate the chicken into bite-sized pieces. Set aside. Prepare the egg noodles according to the package. Mix the drained noodles and the chicken together. Add about 1 cup of the reserved liquid leftover from the crock pot. You can add more if you like them extra moist. This freezes quite well too. It makes a lot at once. ; name: creamy crockpot chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, good seasonings italian salad dressing mix, cream of mushroom soup, cream cheese, milk ; preparation:Place frozen chicken in the crockpot and sprinkle with packet of dry italian dressing mix. Cover and set on low if you need to for 6 hrs, but if you want it done faster, 4 hours. After cook time, open lid and shred chicken using two forks. Add cream of mushroom soup and cream cheese and mix adding milk as needed to get the right texture. Cover and let sit for another 20-30 min or until warm. Serve over rice or noodles. ; name: tasty chicken and egg noodles ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken, egg noodles, cream of chicken soup, milk, frozen green peas, olive oil, canned mushrooms, onion, garlic, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:In a large pot, heat water to a boil. In a large skillet, cook chicken thoroughly using 1 tablespoon of heated oil and remove. In the same skillet, heat olive oil on medium high heat then add mushrooms, onion, and garlic and cook until onions are transparent and drain. Cut cooked chicken into bite sized pieces and add chicken, soup, milk, peas, and black pepper to the mushroom mixture and simmer for 15 minutes. Cook noodles according to package then drain and rinse. Add noodles to chicken mixture and serve with biscuits or rolls. ; name: crock pot broccoli cheese chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, broccoli cheese soup, milk, onion, salt, pepper, dried basil, noodles ; preparation:Place the chicken in the crock pot. Mix together the remaining ingredients and pour over the chicken. Cook on high for 1 hour. Reduce to low and cook for another 5-6 hours. Serve over noodles or rice. ; name: crockpot chicken and dumplings ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, chicken broth, cream of chicken soup, onion, peas, carrots, biscuits ; preparation:Slice the chicken breast into chunks. Combine all ingredients except biscuits in crock pot. Season to taste with salt, pepper, seasoning salt and onion powder. Cook until chicken is tender, approximately 5 to 6 hours. Cut biscuits into fourths and add to chicken mixture. Cover and cook 30 minutes and stir mixture gently, this will thickened chicken broth. Cover and cook until dumplings are done. ; name: crockpot chicken noodles ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, chicken broth, butter, egg noodles ; preparation:

name: baked eggs and cheese ; ingredients: eggs, milk, sugar, monterey jack cheese, cream cheese, small curd cottage cheese, butter, all-purpose flour, baking powder ; preparation:Beat together the eggs, milk and sugar. Add the cheeses and butter. Mix well then add the flour and baking powder. Pour into a greased 9x13 glass baking dish. Bake in a 325 degree oven for 45 minutes or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. This may be made ahead of time and refrigerated. If the pan goes from the refrigerator to the oven, bake 60 minutes. ; name: cheddar pan biscuits ; ingredients: butter, all-purpose flour, cheddar cheese, baking powder, sugar, dried basil leaves, salt, milk ; preparation:Heat oven to 400f melt butter in 8-inch square baking pan in oven. Meanwhile, combine all remaining ingredients except milk in medium bowl. Stir in milk just until moistened. Turn dough onto lightly floured surface. Knead until smooth. Pat or roll dough into 12x6-inch rectangle. Cut into 12 strips. Dip each strip into melted butter in pan. Fold each strip in half. Place folded strips in 2 rows in same pan. Bake for 23 to 28 minutes or until lightly browned. Serve warm. ; name: cheddar cheese loaf ; ingredients: biscuit mix, sharp cheddar cheese, milk, egg, ground red pepper ; preparation:Combine cheese and biscuit mix. Add the egg, milk and pepper. Mix until it is blended well. Then spoon mixture into a greased 9x5 inch loaf pan. Bake in the oven at 350f for 45 minutes. ; name: cream cheese cheddar biscuits ; ingredients: unbleached all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, sharp cheddar cheese, butter, cream cheese, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Measure dry ingredients into food processor and pulse until well combined. Add cheese and cut butter and cream cheese into small chunks and distribute throughout processor bowl. Hit pulse about 10 times for 1-2 seconds each pulse until course crumbs develop. Pour milk through feed tube in a slow stream while pulsing until cohesive but crumbly dough forms. Turn dough onto floured surface and gently squeeze it into a ball. Flatten and gently shape into an 8 by 8 inch square. Cut into 16 even squares. Place on ungreased baking sheet and bake 15-18 minutes until lightly browned. ; name: savory cheddar bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, sugar, onion salt, oregano, dry mustard, sharp cheddar cheese, egg, milk, butter ; preparation:Mix together first seven ingredients. Set aside. Mix together egg, milk, and butter. Add to dry ingredients. Stir until just moistened. Pour batter into a greased 8x4 inch loaf pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes. ; name: bacon egg and cheese biscuit casserole ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, butter, milk, eggs, bacon, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Start frying bacon or sausage. Combine first 5 ingredients, then cut in butter. Make a well in the center and pour in milk. Stir until well combined and moist. Turn dough out onto floured surface and knead until dough holds together well and is pliable. Press into bottom of a greased 9 x 13 pan. Beat the eggs with a splash of milk and pour over biscuit crust. Sprinkle crumbled bacon or sausage over the egg mixture and top with cheese. Bake for 16 - 20 minutes, or until egg is cooked through. ; name: cheesy chicken dippers ; ingredients: white bread, cheddar cheese, egg whites, plain flour, chicken fillets ; preparation:Preheat oven to 190c. Line a large baking tray with baking parchment. Place bread in a blender or food processor and blend to make fine breadcrumbs. Mix the breadcrumbs with the grated cheese and. Place the egg white and flour in 2 separate shallow bowls. Dip the chicken pieces in the flour first to lightly dust then dip into the egg whites and finally into the cheesy breadcrumbs, turning to evenly coat. Place on prepared baking tray. Bake for 25-30 minutes, until the chicken is thoroughly cooked, there is no pink meat and the juices run clear when pierced with a sharp knife. Serve the chicken dippers with tomato sauce or mayonnaise. ; name: cheddar baked bagels and eggs ; ingredients: bagels, butter, eggs, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: cinnamon apple oatmeal ; ingredients: old fashioned oats, water, apple juice, dried apples, ground cinnamon, salt, pure maple syrup, flax seed oil, walnuts ; preparation:Place all the ingreients except the maple syrup, flaxseed oil, and nuts in a medium saucepan and stir to combine. Bring to a boil. Cover and reduce heat to low. Simmer for 5 minutes, stirring once or twice. Remove from heat and let sit, covered, for 2 to 5 minutes. Stir in maple syrup and flaxseed oil, if using. Sprinkle one tablespoon nuts over each serving, if desired. ; name: apple walnut oatmeal ; ingredients: apple, apple juice, quick-cooking oats, ground cinnamon, salt, walnuts, honey, vanilla extract ; preparation:In a saucepan, combine apple, apple juice, oats, cinnamon and salt. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Boil for 1 minute, stirring occasionally. Remove from the heat. Stir in walnuts, honey and vanilla. Cover and let stand for 5 minutes. ; name: baked sliced apples ; ingredients: apples, butter, cinnamon, maple syrup, nutmeg, rolled oats, salt, raisins, apple juice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a large baking pan with cooking spray. In a large bowl combine all ingredients, mixing well. Transfer to baking pan and bake 45 minutes or til a golden crust forms. Serve warm. ; name: caramel oatmeal baked apple ; ingredients: baking apples, cinnamon, nutmeg, oats, raisins, butter, sugar-free caramel topping, nonstick cooking spray ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees. Spray an 8x8 inch baking pan with no-stick spray. Core apples and cut a thin slice off bottom to stabilize in prepared pan, if needed. Combine cinnamon, nutmeg, oats, raisins and butter in a small bowl and mix well. Stuff apples with mixture and cover the pan with foil. Bake for 45-50 minutes or until apples are tender. Drizzle apple with caramel topping. Serve warm. ; name: apple oatsie bran ; ingredients: rolled oats, low-fat milk, wheat bran, apple, applesauce, cinnamon, vanilla, water ; preparation:Mix oats, milk, applesauce, and water. Microwave for 1 minute. Stir in bran, grated apple, cinnamon, and extra water. Cook, stirring each minute, for 3-4 minutes. Stir in vanilla. Serve. ; name: instant oatmeal apple crisp ; ingredients: apples, butter, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, instant maple and brown sugar oatmeal, salt, walnuts, maple syrup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Place apples in a 9x13 inch baking dish. In a bowl, cream together butter and sugar. Stir in flour, instant oatmeal and salt. Fold in walnuts. Sprinkle oatmeal mixture evenly over apples. Drizzle with maple syrup. Bake in preheated oven 50 to 70 minutes, until apples are tender and topping is golden. ; name: oatmeal n apples breakfast cookies ; ingredients: quick-cooking oats, whole wheat flour, baking soda, eggs, butter, dried apricots, chunky applesauce, cinnamon, sugar, brown sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Cream butter and sugars together. Continuing to beat, add eggs one at a time. Add flour, baking soda and cinnamon and mix until combined. Stir in oats, dried fruit and applesauce. Dough should be fairly wet. Using small scoop or tablespoon, drop batter onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake for 8-10 minutes until lightly browned. ; name: baked apple oatmeal ; ingredients: apples, old fashioned oats, raisins, ground cinnamon, salt, soymilk, real maple syrup, walnuts ; preparation:

name: moms gg s chicken ; ingredients: chicken parts, flour, salt, pepper, vegetable oil, green pepper, tomatoes, onion ; preparation:Place oil in fry pan large enough to hold chicken parts and vegetables. Heat to medium-high. Meanwhile, combine flour, salt and pepper in a large bowl or ziploc bag. Shake off excess. Place chicken parts in fry pan and turn until golden on all sides, about 8-10 minutes. Add all vegetables stirring to coat and mix with residual oil. Place chicken pieces on top of vegetables. Lower heat to medium. Cover and cook for an additional 30-45 minutes. Do not lift the lid. You can shake the pan to redistribute the contents, if desired. Serve with rice or mashed potatoes. ; name: kentucky fried chicken seasoning mix ; ingredients: salt, flour, pepper, paprika, garlic salt, mustard, french thyme, sweet basil, oregano, jamaica ginger ; preparation:Mix all together. Take pieces of chicken and dip in slightly beaten raw egg. Roll in spices. Fry chicken in oil. Bake in foil, metal or glass pan in a 350f degrees oven for 45 minutes. ; name: s more chicken ; ingredients: chicken, butter, onion, garlic, water, soy sauce, salt, pepper, nutmeg ; preparation:Brown meaty chicken pieces in butter with sliced onion and minced garlic. Place browned chicken and onions in pressure cooker. Dump remaining ingredients over chicken. Heat on high until pressure cooker top starts to rock, then reduce heat to medium-high. Cook for 15 minutes. Serve over rice with sauce. ; name: north african spiced chicken ; ingredients: ground cumin, kosher salt, ground cinnamon, ground allspice, fresh ground black pepper, ground turmeric, cayenne powder, boneless skinless chicken breasts, canola oil ; preparation:Preheat the grill to medium-high. Combine all the spices in a small bowl. Brush both sides of fish fillets or chicken breasts with oil. Rub 1 side of the chicken breasts with the rub and grill, rub side down, until golden brown and a crust has formed, about 4 minutes. Flip over and continue cooking for 3 to 5 minutes. ; name: betty s derby fried chicken ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, pepper, salt, paprika, poultry seasoning, garlic powder, egg, milk, fryer, vegetable oil ; preparation:Combine first 6 ingredients in plastic bag. Shake it to mix and set aside. In a bowl, combine egg and milk. Mix well. Skin chicken, if desired. Put 2 or 3 pieces of chicken in bag with flour. Shake well. Dip chicken in egg mixture, return to bag and shake again. Repeat with remaining chicken. Heat 1 inch of oil in a large skillet. Add chicken and fry 15 minutes or until golden brown, turning to brown both sides. Drain chicken on paper towels. ; name: stock chicken ; ingredients: chicken, carrots, leeks, cold water, salt, ground pepper ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a large pot. Bring to a boil, skimming off any foam. Reduce heat to low, cover partially, and simmer for two hours. Cool in an ice bath to room temperature. Strain into a large bowl. Discard vegetables. Remove white chicken meat and save for another use, if desired. Refrigerate stock overnight or until fat congeals. Skim off and discard fat. Use the entire batch to make soup or freeze in ice-cube trays for up to three months. ; name: chicken with spiced yogurt ; ingredients: yogurt, ground cardamom, fresh ginger, onion, olive oil, chicken, salt and pepper, blanched almond ; preparation:Mix the yogurt, cardamon and ginger together in a bowl, and set aside whilst you cook the chicken. Heat the oil in a large skillet, fry the onion until soft. Add the chicken pieces and saute until the onions are golden and the chicken pieces lightly browned. Add the salt, pepper and a cup of water and cook over a low heat-20 minutes for the quarters, less for breasts. The chicken should be tender and the sauce reduced. Keep turning the chicken pieces, and add a little water if the sauce reduces too much. Remove from the heat, stir in the yoghurt mix, and serve sprinkled with the almonds. ; name: farmgirl s funky chicken ; ingredients: chicken, relish, salt, oil, ground black pepper, lemon ; preparation:

name: tomato basil sauce ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, onion, crushed tomatoes, diced tomatoes, salt and pepper, fresh basil leaves, penne rigate ; preparation:Put large pot of water on to boil for penne. Salt boiling water and cook penne to al dente. Heat a medium pot on stove top over medium low to medium heat. Add extra-virgin olive oil, garlic and onion for the tomato basil sauce. Let onions cook with garlic slowly over 15 minutes, be careful not to brown onions. After 15 minutes, stir in tomatoes and raise heat to warm tomatoes. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in basil and wilt it into the sauce. Remove sauce from heat. When ready to serve, place sauce in the bottom of a large serving bowl to toss with hot pasta. ; name: balsamic tomato basil pasta ; ingredients: pasta, fresh basil, fresh tomatoes, extra virgin olive oil, garlic, balsamic vinegar, parmesan cheese, sea salt, fresh ground pepper, oregano ; preparation:Prep the tomatoes, garlic, etc-- before boiling the pasta. Boil pasta while making the rest of the dish. Saute garlic in olive oil. Add tomatoes and cover, simmering for 7-10 minutes with the balsamic vinegar and seasonings until tomatoes fall apart. Cut basil leaves and toss all ingredients together, including parmesan cheese. Serve additional parmesan on the side, if desired. ; name: one pot tomato basil pasta ; ingredients: pasta, diced tomatoes with juice, sweet onion, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, dried oregano leaves, basil sprigs, vegetable broth, extra virgin olive oil, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place pasta, tomatoes, onion, garlic, basil, in a large stock pot. Pour in vegetable broth. Sprinkle on top the pepper flakes and oregano. Drizzle top with oil. Cover pot and bring to a boil. Reduce to a low simmer and keep covered and cook for about 10 minutes, stirring every 2 minutes or so. Cook until almost all liquid has evaporated i left about an inch of liquid in the bottom of the pot but you can reduce as desired. Season to taste with salt and pepper, stirring pasta several times to distribute the liquid in the bottom of the pot. Serve garnished with parmesan cheese. ; name: creamy tomato sauce for pasta ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, tomato sauce, salt, fresh ground pepper, cream cheese, pesto sauce, parmesan cheese, cream, fresh basil ; preparation:Heat olive oil over medium heat. Saut crushed garlic for 1-2 minutes. Stir in tomato sauce. Add salt, pepper, and pesto. Add cream cheese and stir or whisk well until fully melted. Stir parmesan cheese until melted. Add cream and stir well. ; name: baked pasta sauce ; ingredients: diced tomatoes, garlic cloves, onion, salami, dried basil, olive oil, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper, fresh breadcrumb, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 f degrees. Mix tomatoes, garlic, onion, salami, basil, oil and red pepper flakes in an oven proof dish. Mix bread crumbs and cheese and sprinkle over the tomato mixture. Bake, uncovered for 30 minutes. Serve over your favorite pasta without mixing so the crunchy bits stay crunchy. ; name: tomato and basil pasta ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, basil, crushed red pepper flakes, chopped tomatoes, pasta, parmesan cheese, romano cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta as per box instructions. While pasta is cooking, heat oil with copped garlic. Add a handful of chopped fresh basil. Heat five minutes. Slowly stir in chopped tomatoes, juice and all. Add as much crushed red pepper flakes as you like, no more than 1 table. Cook until tomatoes are soft enough to crush, about 20 minutes on med-low. Crush tomatoes in pan with fork or potato masher. Drain pasta and return to cooking pot. Slowly add sauce and mix together. It will look like not enough sauce to cover pasta, but this is a lite sauce and not to overpowering. Add fresh grated parmasiano cheese or fresh romano over individual servings. ; name: spaghetti with fresh tomato and basil sauce ; ingredients: spaghetti, butter, garlic cloves, tomatoes, fresh basil leaf, balsamic vinegar, parmesan cheese, hot pepper flakes, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook pasta according to directions. Melt butter over medium high heat until foamy. Add garlic and cook and stir for 2 minutes. Stir in tomatoes and bring mixture to a boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in basil and vinegar. Add salt and pepper to taste. Drain pasta and return to pot. Pour tomato mixture mixture over pasta. Toss to combine. Sprinkle with parmesan and hot pepper flakes, if desired. Enjoy. ; name: tomato and basil pasta sauce ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes, dried chili pepper flakes, balsamic vinegar, sugar, fresh basil leaf ; preparation:

name: simple brown rice pilaf ; ingredients: instant brown rice, chicken stock, butter, green onion, garlic, onion flakes, garlic salt, salt & fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Mix chicken stock and next 5 ingredients in saucepan and bring to a boil. Add rice, return mixture to boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and let stand 5 minutes. Fluff with fork. Season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: vegetable rice pilaf ; ingredients: green pepper, garlic powder, dried basil leaves, black pepper, long-grain white rice, chicken broth, veg-all ; preparation:Spray skillet with vegetable cooking spray and heat 1 minute. Add green pepper, garlic powder, basil leaves, black pepper, and rice. Cook and stir until rice is browned and green pepper is tender-crisp. Stir in chicken broth. Heat to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cover and cook for 10 minutes. Stir in veg-all. Cover and cook 10 more minutes or until most of liquid is absorbed. ; name: caribbean style rice pilaf ; ingredients: unsalted butter, onion, garlic cloves, long-grain rice, chicken broth, jalapeno pepper, bay leaf, dried thyme, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and garlic and saute until softened, about 4 minutes. Add rice and stir to coat with butter. Add remaining ingredients, cover, and heat to boiling. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until all liquid is absorbed, about 20 minutes. Remove bay leaf. Serve hot or at room temperature. ; name: carrot rice pilaf ; ingredients: butter, carrots, long grain rice, green onions, chicken stock, fresh parsley, salt, pepper ; preparation:In large saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Cook carrots, rice and green onions for 2 minutes. Stir in stock and bring to boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for about 20 to 25 minutes or until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed. Stir in parsley. Season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: basic rice pilaf ; ingredients: butter, onion, rice, salt, black pepper, chicken stock, parsley ; preparation:Melt butter in saucepan and cook onion over medium heat until golden. Stir in rice and cook for 1 minute. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in chicken stock and bring to a boil. Cover and turn heat down to low. Simmer gently for 20 minutes. Fluff rice with a fork and stir in parsley. ; name: white wild rice pilaf ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, carrot, celery, garlic cloves, wild rice, vegetable broth, long-grain white rice, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet. Add onion, carrots, celery and garlic and cook until tender. Add wild rice and broth. Heat to a boil. Cover and cook over low heat for 25 minutes. Add white rice. Cover and cook over low heat for 20 minutes or until done. Stir in parsley. ; name: lemony rice pilaf ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, long grain white rice, chicken stock, lemon, rind of, lemon juice, flat-leaf italian parsley, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:In a heavy saucepan, heat oil over mediumheat and cook onion for 5 minutes, or until softened. Stir in rice, then stock, and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and cover. Let simmer for 20 minutes, or until rice is tender. Stir in lemon zest, lemon juice, and parsley. Taste and add pepper if you wish. ; name: brown rice pilaf ; ingredients: brown rice, onion, garlic cloves, carrot, frozen peas, frozen corn, salt and pepper, basil, oregano, olive oil ; preparation:

name: easy pasta ; ingredients: spaghetti sauce, light sour cream, penne, salt, fresh ground pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Combine spaghetti sauce and sour cream. Cook over low heat. Cook pasta until al dente. Drain well. Toss penne with hot sauce on large serving platter. Add salt& pepper to taste. Sprinkle with parmesan. ; name: easy baked spaghetti ; ingredients: spaghetti, pasta sauce, mozzarella cheese, monterey jack cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cook spaghetti in a large pot with plenty of water, until almost done and drain. Coat the bottom of a 9 x 13 pan with pasta sauce. Layer the spaghetti, remaining sauce, and the shredded cheese in the pan. Bake for 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and lightly browned. Sprinkle with parmesan. Allow to cool slightly before serving. ; name: cheesy beef noodles ; ingredients: ground beef, tomato sauce, taco seasoning, sharp cheddar cheese, egg noodles ; preparation:Brown and drain ground beef. Cook and drain noodles. Mix ground beef, tomato sauce and taco seasoning. Spread noodles in the bottom of a 9x13 pan. Spread beef mixture over noodles. Mix slightly. Cover with cheese. Bake 350 for about 20 minutes until heated though and cheese is melted. ; name: cheesy tuna pasta ; ingredients: pasta, cream cheese, cheddar cheese, milk, granulated garlic, tuna ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, melt cream cheese in milk in med saucepan over low heat. Add cheedar and garlic. Add tuna and mix well. Once pasta is cooked, drain and pour tuna mix on top. Mix well and serve. ; name: cheesy spaghetti squash ; ingredients: spaghetti squash, parmesan cheese, reduced-fat mozzarella cheese, pimientos, fresh parsley, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Pierce the spaghetti squash several times with a fork or sharp knife to allow steam to escape. Place in microwave and cook on high 5 minutes. Turn over and continue cooking for for another 5 minutes or just until soft. Remove squash from microwave and allow to stand for 5 minutes. Cut squash in half. Remove and discard seeds. Using a fork, scrape the insides of the squash to form strands. Reserving one squash shell. Toss squash with remaining ingredients adding salt and pepper to taste. Scoop back into the reserved squash shell and serve. ; name: easy cheesy chicken spaghetti ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, water, extra virgin olive oil, spaghetti, onion, sliced mushrooms, frozen broccoli, rotel tomatoes, velveeta cheese ; preparation:In a large skillet sautee the onions and mushrooms in the olive oil until onions are soft. Add chicken, cook and stir until no longer pink. Stir in water and bring to a boil. Add spaghetti and cook until tender. Add remaining ingredients. Cook until velveeta is completely melted. ; name: baked pasta ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, penne pasta, parmesan cheese, egg, mozzarella cheese, cottage cheese, spaghetti sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cook the pasta al dente according to box. Drain pasta. Fry beef and onion until brown. Mix cheeses, egg, and oregano, rosemary, and thyme to taste. In a 12 x 9 baking dish layer spaghetti sauce, then pasta, then cheese, then beef. Repeat until all ingredients are used. Always end with sauce on top. Bake, covered, for 30-40 minutes until bubbling. ; name: easy cheesy pasta ; ingredients: pasta shells, ground beef, spaghetti sauce, light sour cream, whipping cream, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:

name: macaroni cheese casserole ; ingredients: macaroni, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt, black pepper, cracker crumbs, butter ; preparation:Liberally butter a 2 quart casserole dish. Alternate layering macaroni and cheese slices in the buttered casserole. Beat eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Pour mixture over macaroni and cheese. Mix cracker crumbs with melted butter. Add to top of casserole. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or until a knife comes out clean when inserted. ; name: kiddie mac n cheese ; ingredients: small macaroni noodles, milk, american cheese, shredded cheddar cheese, salt ; preparation:Heat large pot of lightly salted water to boiling. Add pasta and cook 11 minutes, according to package directions. Drain. Add milk to pasta pot and heat over medium heat. Sprinkle in american and cheddar cheeses and the salt and whisk until melted and smooth. Return macaroni to pot with cheese sauce and stir to combine. Serve warm. ; name: macaroni and bacon casserole ; ingredients: macaroni noodles, shredded cheddar cheese, vegetable cocktail, bacon, salt, pepper, milk ; preparation:Cook noodles as directed on package, drain. Add shredded cheese to cooked noodles while still hot and mix together. Add v8. Add enough milk so there is juice on the bottom of casserole dish, enough that it doesnt dry out, so the milk may not be necessary. Add salt and pepper to taste. Cover casserole with uncooked bacon slices. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees fahrenheit for 45 minutes to an hour. Bacon needs to be cooked on top. ; name: macaroni tuna casserole ; ingredients: macaroni and cheese mix, milk, butter, condensed cream of celery soup, canned tuna, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Prepare macaroni and cheese according to package directions. Stir in soup, tuna and milk. Pour into a greased 2-qt. Baking dish. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake, uncovered, for 20 minutes or until cheese is melted. ; name: fried macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: macaroni, water, salt, margarine, eggs, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook macaroni in water and the salt until tender. Drain. In a large skillet, heat the butter or margarine, pour the well drained macaroni into the skillet. Beat the eggs as for scrambled, pour this over the macaroni. Fry on medium heat. Add the shredded cheese over the top and cook until the eggs, macaroni, and cheese are all blended and a golden brown on both sides. ; name: just macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: butter, flour, half-and-half, salt, pepper, nutmeg, cheddar cheese, macaroni, fresh breadcrumb ; preparation:In 2 quart sauce pan melt butter add flour cook stirring til starts to look like cornmeal. Add hot half& half, add seasonings, stirring quickly with whisk. Add cheese stirring til cheese melts. Mix with macaroni in 2qt. Casserole. Toss bread crumbs with melted butter, sprinkle over top. Bake 350f for 30 minutes. ; name: super budget macaroni cheese ; ingredients: macaroni, milk, flour, salt, ground black pepper, cheese, fresh breadcrumb ; preparation:Cook pasta. Drain. Set aside. Warm milk in saucepan. When it is just warm to the touch, whisk in half the flour. Let the milk begin to simmer, whisking all the time. You be the judge of the thickness - we like it really thick. If you want it thicker, add the remaining flour and continue to whisk until smooth and thick. Stir through the cheese and the salt and pepper until the cheese is melted. Take off the heat. Pour into a baking dish and sprinkle the breadcrumbs over the top. Bake for 30 minutes at 180 degrees celcius. ; name: kid s macaroni cheese casserole ; ingredients: macaroni and cheese mix, cheddar cheese, breadcrumbs, tuna fish, potato chips ; preparation:

name: bacon and egg salad ; ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, celery, green onions, bacon, mayonnaise, prepared horseradish, salt, pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Combine first 4 ingredients in a large bowl. Set aside. Combine mayonnaise and next 3 ingredients. Fold into egg mixture sprinkle with parsley and serve. Salad can be chilled up to 24 hours. Bacon will soften slightly. Serve this as a salad or as a sandwich filling. ; name: better for you egg salad ; ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, celery, onion, green pepper, fat-free mayonnaise, spicy brown mustard, table salt, black pepper ; preparation:Peel and rinse eggs. Discard two of the egg yolks. Chop remaining 4 whites and 2 yolks. Mix remaining ingredients. Refrigerate any leftovers, or chill. ; name: tomato egg salad ; ingredients: eggs, roma tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, salt and pepper, watercress ; preparation:Place eggs in a saucepan, cover with water and bring to boil. Remove from heat. Cover and let stand 12 minutes. Meanwhile, have roma tomatoes lengthwise and remove seeds. In mixing bowl combine cucumber, onion, mayonnaise, mustard, salt and pepper. Drain, rinse, peel, and chop cooked eggs. Fold into cucumber mixture. Spoon into tomato halves and serve over watercress. ; name: tofu chicken salad sandwich ; ingredients: firm tofu, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, paprika, turmeric, celery, red onion, whole wheat bread, lettuce ; preparation:Mix mayo, mustard, paprika, and tumerik in a bowl. Add celery, onions, and tofu. Mix and be sure tofu is coated with mayo mixture. Add a dash of pepper to season. Serve on slices of whole wheat bread with lettuce or in pita pockets. ; name: easter egg salad ; ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, mayonnaise, purple onion, capers, frozen peas, curry powder, salt, pepper ; preparation:Of course, mash eggs. Add mayonnaise with curry powder, salt & pepper. Mix well and add more mayo if needed. Add the onions, capers and a handful of frozen peas. Add more capers or peas if needed. Mix well and refrigerate. ; name: traditional egg salad ; ingredients: eggs, water, mayonnaise, salt, white pepper ; preparation:Fill a medium pot with three to four quarts of water and bring to a boil. Gently place each egg one at a time into the pot with a long-handled slotted spoon, resting them on the bottom of the boiling water. Bring back to a full boil and cook for 5 minutes. Turn off the heat and let eggs sit in the hot water for 13 minutes. Drain all the water and then shake the pot with the eggs still inside to break the shells. Under running warm water, peel off shells and set cooked eggs on a paper towel to dry. Roughly chop eggs into a medium bowl and add mayonnaise, salt and pepper. Stir and taste. Add more salt or pepper if needed. Cover bowl and place in the refrigerator until egg salad is below 40 degrees. Serve with crisp lettuce and your favorite bread. ; name: chicken salad for sandwiches ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, celery, onion, mayonnaise, lemon juice, salt and pepper, fresh parsley, dill seed ; preparation:Place chicken, celery stalk and onion in saucepan with water to cover. Bring to a boil and simmer 20 minutes or until chicken is done. Drain and discard onion and celery. Let chicken cool. In a food processor chop chicken. In a medium sized bowl combine chicken with mayonnaise, salt& pepper, parsley, dill seed, chopped celery and lemon juice. Cover and refrigerate until chilled. ; name: eggless salad vegan or vegetarian ; ingredients: extra firm tofu, vegan mayonnaise, celery, onions, dijon mustard, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: garlic lover s shrimp ; ingredients: garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, butter, crushed red pepper flakes, large shrimp, coarse salt, cracked black pepper, toothpick ; preparation:Process garlic in food processor to finely chop. Heat a large skillet over medium high heat and add oil and butter. Add garlic and crushed pepper flakes to oil and butter. Season shrimp with salt and toss to coat. Add shrimp to the pan and cook, stirring frequently, until pink and heads curl to tails. Add black pepper, to your taste. Serve immediately. ; name: easy delicious garlic shrimp ; ingredients: large shrimp, salt, olive oil, butter, garlic, bay leaf, dried chili pepper flakes, dried parsley, black pepper ; preparation:Place the shrimp in a bowl, and toss with salt. Let stand for 20 minutes. Heat olive oil and butter in a medium skillet over high heat. Add in chopped garlic, bay leaf and crushed red pepper. Stir for 1 minute. Add in shrimp and stir just until cooked through. Season with black pepper. Transfer to a serving dish. ; name: shrimp with garlic sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, red pepper, medium shrimp, lemon juice, dry sherry, crushed red pepper flakes, salt, parsley ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the garlic, pepper and shrimp. Cook for about 2 minutes, stirring constantly, just until the shrimp turn pink. Increase the heat to high. Add the lemon juice, sherry, hot red pepper and salt to taste and bring to a boil. Serve immediately, sprinkled with parsley. ; name: garlic shrimp ; ingredients: vegetable oil, butter, garlic, shrimp, salt and pepper, lemons ; preparation:Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. We give this a little squirt with the lemon wedge. ; name: garlic basil shrimp ; ingredients: olive oil, large shrimp, garlic cloves, hot red pepper flakes, dry white wine, fresh basil leaf, grape tomatoes, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large heavy skillet over moderately high heat until hot but not smoking. Add shrimp and saute, turning over once, until just cooked through, about 2 minutes. Transfer with a slotted spoon to a large bowl. Add garlic and red pepper flakes to the oil remaining in skillet and cook until fragrant, 30 seconds. Add wine and cook over high heat, stirring occasionally, for 3 minutes. Stir in basil and tomatoes and season the sauce with salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste. Return the shrimp to pan and cook just until heated through. ; name: incredibly good shrimp ; ingredients: butter, olive oil, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, raw shrimp, white wine, lemon zest, fresh lemon juice, fresh flat-leaf parsley ; preparation:Preheat large nonstick pan on medium high for 2-3 minutes. Add butter, olive oil, garlic, red pepper, shrimp to pan. Cook for 3-4 minutes until just pink. Deglaze pan with white wine. Cook 1-2 minutes longer. Remove from heat. Add lemon zest, lemon juice, parsley. Serve immediately. ; name: another garlic shrimp recipe ; ingredients: medium shrimp, butter, olive oil, dijon mustard, garlic, kosher salt, red chili pepper flakes, lemons, fresh parsley ; preparation:Place shrimp in a large broiler safe pan and pre-heat broiler, set aside. In a large saute pan, melt butter and oil until bubbly. Add garlic and saute 1-2 minutes-- be careful not to burn garlic. Add the dijon mustard, chili flakes and salt and stir until well blended. Pour sauce over shrimp and broil for approximately 5 minutes or until shrimp has turned pink. Remove from broiler and place on large platter, sprinkle with lemon juice and fresh parsley. Serve with fresh bread and extra lemon. ; name: garlic lover s shrimps ; ingredients: olive oil, crushed red pepper flakes, garlic cloves, raw shrimp, salt, dry sherry, fresh parsley, old bay seasoning ; preparation:

name: bread and butter pudding ii ; ingredients: day-old white bread, eggs, milk, sugar, vanilla extract, raisins, maple syrup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees fahrenheit. Butter a deep dish 9 inch pie plate or 9 inch square cake pan. Generously butter bread slices on one side, then cut each slice in half diagonally to make two triangles. Arrange triangles, buttered side up, in the prepared dish. In bowl, beat eggs until well mixed. Add milk, sugar and vanilla. Beat together. Stir in raisins. Slowly pour over bread making sure all bread is well soaked. Bake 45 minutes or until custard has set. Serve with warm maple syrup. ; name: chocolate bread and butter pudding ; ingredients: bread, butter, chocolate chips, eggs, milk, sugar, sherry wine, vanilla ; preparation:Cut crusts from bread. Butter and bread, cut into triangles and layer with chocolate in a ovenproof dish. Beat eggs, milk, sugar, sherry and vanilla together and pour over the bread. Leave to stand for 15 minutes to fully absorb liquid. Heat oven to 160 c. Bake for 30 minutes until golden and set. Dust with icing sugar to serve. Hope it tastes good. ; name: bread and butter pudding ; ingredients: bread, milk, eggs, sugar, sultanas, cinnamon ; preparation:Spread the bread with margarine and cut into small. Squares, then place into an ovenproof dish. Beat eggs and milk together. Add sugar, cinnamon. And sultanas and pour mixture over bread. Bake at 180c for 30 40 minutes until set. ; name: sweet bread bread pudding ; ingredients: sweet bread, raisins, butter, milk, sugar, eggs, apple pie filling, cinnamon, vanilla ; preparation:Grease a 9x12 pan. Scald milk. Add sugar and butter. Mix until butter is melted. Cool. Break sweet bread into pieces. Spread apple pie filling on top of the sweet bread. Sprinkle raisins over the filling. Combine cooled milk mixture with beaten eggs. Pour liquid over the bread. Sprinkle with cinnamon. Bake at 350 degrees for 25 to 30 minutes. ; name: whiskey bread and butter pudding ; ingredients: white bread, butter, brown sugar, raisins, eggs, milk, vanilla sugar, mixed spice, fine sugar, whiskey ; preparation:Grease 4 ovenproof serving bowls. Cut crusts off the bread, spread the butter over the slices and cut each into 4 triangles. Place four triangles into each serving bowl, sprinkle with some brown sugar and the raisins. Place remaining triangles on top and sprinkle with the rest of the sugar. Whisk the eggs, add the warm milk and vanilla sugar, whisk again and pour the mixture over the bread. Sprinkle with mixed spice. Place bowls on a baking tray and bake for 15 - 20 minutes at 220c in preheated oven. To make whisky sauce, beat eggs and sugar until light and fluffy. While still beating add hot butter and whisky. Pour over pudding. ; name: butterscotch bread pudding ; ingredients: bread, milk, brown sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla extract, butterscotch chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Butter a 9x13 inch baking dish. In a large bowl, combine bread, milk, sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla and butterscotch chips. Mixture should be the consistency of oatmeal. Pour into prepared pan. Bake in preheated oven 1 hour, until nearly set. Serve warm or cold. ; name: cinnamon bread pudding ; ingredients: rolls, milk, eggs, sugar, brown sugar, butter, vanilla extract, nutmeg, pecans ; preparation:Place cubed bread or rolls in slow cooker sprayed with vegetable cooking spray. In a mixixng bowl, combine milk, eggs, both sugars, butter, vanilla, and nutmeg and beat until smooth. Stir in pecans. Cover and cook on low for 3 hours. Seerve with lemon sauce or whipped topping. ; name: irish bread and butter pudding ; ingredients: dry white bread, sweet butter, nutmeg, golden raisin, eggs, heavy cream, milk, vanilla, superfine sugar, white sugar ; preparation:

name: sweet potato puff ; ingredients: mashed sweet potatoes, sugar, eggs, milk, salt, butter, vanilla, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Butter a souffle dish generously. Mix all the souffle ingredients well and pour into buttered dish. Combine all topping ingredients in a small bowl and crumble evenly over potato mixture. Bake for 35-45 minutes. ; name: sweet potato marshmallow puffs ; ingredients: mashed sweet potatoes, egg yolks, salt, butter, marshmallows, cereal, crisco shortening ; preparation:In a bowl, combine the mashed sweet potatoes with the egg yolks salt and melted butter. Mix thoroughly. Divide into 12 portions. Mold each portion into a circle, and flatten place 1 marshmallow in the center of each portion. Mold the potato batter around the marshmallow, leaving a small opening on top of the ball. In a bowl, combine the cereal flakes and the melted crisco shortening. Roll the potato balls in the cereal flakes. Place the coated sweet potato balls on a cookie sheet and freeze. When ready to bake, remove the balls from the freezer. Place in a shallow greased baking dish. Bake in a 350 degree oven, for about 20 minutes. Do not defrost the puffs before baking. ; name: yam or sweet potato puff ; ingredients: yams, butter, eggs, sugar, baking powder, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f and butter a casserole dish. Peel potatoes and boil until soft. Mash and add remaining ingredients. Beat well and pour into prepared casserole. Dot with additional butter and bake until brown, 30 to 40 minutes. ; name: spicy sweet potato puff ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, low-fat milk, brown sugar, eggs, butter, nutmeg, cinnamon, chipotle chile in adobo, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, mash the sweet potatoes. Add the remaining ingredients and blend until smooth and creamy. Spread mixture into a greased 9x9 inch casserole. Bake for 20 minutes or until set. While puff is baking, combine ingredients for topping. After 20 minutes, or once puff has set, spread topping over puff and bake for ten more minutes. ; name: banana sweet potato puff casserole ; ingredients: mashed sweet potatoes, banana, curry powder, sour cream, salt, egg ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine all ingredients. Beat with electric mixer until light and very fluffy. Turn into 1 quart casserole dish. Bake at 350 degrees f. In the oven for 20 minutes or until puffed and lightly browned. ; name: potato gruyere puffs ; ingredients: potatoes, salt and pepper, nutmeg, flour, butter, cream, gruyere ; preparation:Cook the potatoes in boiling salted water until soft. Drain. Mash and season with salt, pepper and nutmeg. Mix in the flour. Form into little dumplings using two soup spoons dipped into melted butter before forming each dumpling. Place the puffs into a baking dish. Pour the cream over and sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 10 minutes on the middle rack of a preheated 450f. ; name: magic potato puffs ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, olive oil, cracker crumb, salt, pepper, egg yolks ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Put potatoes in large pot and add enough water to cover them. Bring to a boil over high heat then reduce heat to medium and cook for 12-15 minutes or until fork tender. Drain off water, mash and allow to cool. Coat a baking sheet with pam. In a small saucepan, saut onion in the olive oil over medium heat until tender. Add the onion, cracker crumbs, salt and pepper to the potatoes and remash. With your hands, roll into balls and place onto baking sheet. Brush with the egg yolks. Bake 40-45 minutes or until crispy brown. Makes 24-72 small puffs. ; name: sweet potato puffs ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, milk, salt, brown sugar, pumpkin pie spice, blanched slivered almond ; preparation:

name: turkish braised leeks with olives ; ingredients: olive oil, leeks, chopped tomatoes, vegetable stock, salt, ground black pepper, sugar, pitted black olives, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the leeks and saut in until softened, about 10 minutes. Add the tomatoes, stock, salt, pepper, and sugar. Cover and simmer until the leeks are tender, about 30 minutes. Add the olives and lemon juice and simmer another 10 minutes. Serve at room temperature as an appetizer or warm as a side dish. ; name: leeks braised with parmesan cheese ; ingredients: leeks, canola oil, parmesan cheese, water, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Combine leeks, oil and water in baking dish. Sprinkle with pepper if desired. Cover with foil and bake until tender, about 25 minutes. Drain. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake, uncovered, until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes longer. ; name: stewed leeks with tomatoes ; ingredients: leeks, onion, olive oil, chopped tomatoes, carrots, potatoes, celery, parsley, salt and pepper, lemon juice ; preparation:Cut off the ends and green parts of leeks. Wash them carefully in order to remove any soil, cut them in pieces of 3 cm length. In a large pan heat the olive oil, sautee the onion and the leeks for approx 10 minutes. Add gradually into the saucepan the tomatoes, potatoes, carrots, parsley and the celery. Season with salt and pepper. Add 1 cup of water and simmer until tender and all the water is absorbed remove from heat and stir in the lemon juice, one tablespoon first, taste and add more if you like. ; name: sauteed potatoes and leeks ; ingredients: butter, leeks, potatoes, celery seed, parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat butter in frying pan. Add leeks and cover pan. Cook 8 to 10 minutes over low heat. Peel potatoes and cut into thick slices. Add to frying pan. Season and sprinkle in celery seed. Mix well and cook, uncovered, 7 to 8 minutes over medium heat. Sprinkle with chopped parsley and serve immediately. ; name: braised salmon with leeks dill ; ingredients: olive oil, leeks, garlic cloves, tomatoes, kosher salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, dry white wine, salmon fillets, fresh dill ; preparation:Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add leek. Saut 3 minutes. Add garlic. Saut 2-3 minutes. Add tomato, salt, and pepper. Saut 2-3 minutes. Add wine and salmon. Sprinkle with dill, and bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer 8 minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork. ; name: leeks with mustard dressing ; ingredients: leeks, dijon mustard, white wine vinegar, egg, light olive oil, fresh parsley, salt, pepper ; preparation:Steam leeks over a saucepan of boiling water until they are just tender. Meanwhile, in a bowl, stir together mustard & vinegar. Cut egg in half lengthwise & scoop egg yolk into the bowl & mash it thoroughly into the mustard mixture, using a fork.
