Add in lemon juice, chopped tomato, and sea salt to taste. Stir once or twice then remove the pan from the heat again and set it aside to wait for the pasta. Add the pasta to the boiling water and cook until desired tenderness, following package directions. Drain, then add the cooked pasta to the pan with the garlic & tomato mixture, along with the basil and some freshly ground pepper. Toss well,. Generally they say 2 ounces of pasta is one serving, but for larger appetites this might not be enough. ; name: angel hair with lemon and pine nuts ; ingredients: angel hair pasta, garlic, olive oil, pine nuts, fresh lemon juice, lemons, zest of, flat leaf parsley ; preparation:Bring a large saucepan of salted water to a boil for pasta. In a small saucepan cook garlic in oil over moderately low heat, stirring, until softened and transfer mixture to a large bowl. Add pine nuts, crushing them lightly with the back of a fork, lemon juice, zest, parsley, and salt and pepper to taste. Cook pasta in boiling water until al dente and, reserving 2 tablespoons of the cooking water, drain well. Add pasta with the reserved cooking water to bowl and toss with lemon mixture until it is absorbed. Serve pasta warm or at room temperature. ; name: angel hair pasta with basil tomatoes ; ingredients: angel hair pasta, fresh garlic, roma tomatoes, fresh basil leaf, light butter, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and keep warm. Meanwhile, spray 10-inch nonstick skillet with no-stick cooking spray. Add garlic. Cook over medium heat 1 minute. Add tomatoes and basil. Continue cooking, stirring occasionally, until heated through. Toss together hot pasta, tomato mixture and light butter in large serving bowl. Sprinkle with cheese. ; name: angel hair with garlic spinach and white beans ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, fresh spinach leaves, cannellini beans, vegetable broth, angel hair pasta, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: asparagus quiche ; ingredients: asparagus spears, eggs, sour cream, gruyere cheese, sliced mushrooms, garlic, fresh tarragon, red pepper, salt and pepper, 9-inch deep dish pie crust ; preparation:Blanch asparagus spears in boiling water for 90 seconds. Refresh in cold water and cut in half. Set aside. Blend together eggs, sour cream, cheese, mushrooms, and garlic tarragon. Add asparagus and season with salt and pepper. Pour ingredients into a 9-inch deep dish pie shell. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes. Remove from oven. Top with julienned red pepper and return to oven for 30-40 minutes. ; name: onion bacon mushroom quiche ; ingredients: butter, onion, sliced mushrooms, cooked bacon, monterey jack cheese, eggs, milk, ground nutmeg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 f degrees. Melt the butter in a heavy nonstick skillet over medium high heat. Saute onions and mushrooms for 5 minutes, or until tender, remove from heat and allow to cool slightly. Wisk the eggs, milk and nutmeg in another bowl. Add cheese and stir to combine. Spray a deep dish pie pan with non-stick spray and pour egg and cheese mixture into dish and add diced bacon, onion and mushrooms. Bake for 25-35 minutes or until center is set. ; name: mushroom onion quiche ; ingredients: pie crusts, margarine, onions, mushroom, non-dairy milk substitute, egg, flour, dry wine, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Chop onions and slice mushrooms. Melt margarine in skillet. Saute onions until transparent. Add mushrooms. Cover and cook 10 minutes. Allow to cool. Mix together egg, flour, non-dairy milk and wine. Salt and pepper to taste. Pour into pie crust. Form lattice strips from second crust and place on top of quiche. Bake for 2 minutes. ; name: bacon broccoli quiche ; ingredients: frozen deep dish pie shell, eggs, frozen chopped broccoli, onion, milk, bacon bits, cheddar cheese, nutmeg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush pie crust with some of beaten eggs and prick crust with fork. Bake 12 minutes. Meanwhile, in large bowl, combine eggs and the remaining ingredients, stirring until blended. Remove pie shell from oven. Reduce heat to 350 degrees. Pour broccoli mixture into pie shell. Bake about 40 minutes until firm in center. ; name: low fat crustless mushroom quiche ; ingredients: sliced mushrooms, onion, spinach, plain breadcrumbs, skim milk, egg whites, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, italian seasoning, cracked black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a nonstick skillet, saute onion and mushrooms in 2 -3 tbsp of water until almost tender. Add spinach and cook until all moisture is evaporated. Add bread crumbs, stir and place into a quiche pan which has been sprayed with nonstick cooking spray. Combine remaining ingredients in medium mixing bowl and pour over vegetables in quiche pan. Bake for 35 to 45 minutes or until firm in center. Allow to stand for 5 minutes before cutting and serving. ; name: spinach and bacon quiche ; ingredients: eggs, heavy cream, salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, baby spinach, bacon, swiss cheese, refrigerated pie crusts ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 375f. Combine the eggs, cream, salt and pepper in food processor or blender. Layer the spinach, bacon and cheese in the bottom of the pie crust. The pour egg mixture on top. Bake for 35-40 minutes until the egg mixture is set. Cut into 8 wedges and serve. ; name: cheese shrimp mushroom quiche ; ingredients: bacon, mushroom, onions, gruyere cheese, small shrimp, butter, eggs, heavy cream, white pepper, deep dish pie shells ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Cook bacon in a medium skillet over medium high heat until crisp. Remove bacon and drain on paper towel. Melt butter in a medium skillet, saute mushrooms and onions until tender. Crumble bacon into pie shell, sprinkle mushrooms, onions, shrimp evenly over bacon. Combine eggs, cream, cheese and pepper in a medium bowl and beat well. Pour into pie shell. Bake until knife inserted into center comes out clean, about 35 to 40 minutes. ; name: asparagus mushroom bacon quiche ; ingredients: pie crust, cheddar cheese, cooked bacon, mushroom, onion, asparagus spears, milk, eggs, italian seasoning, garlic ; preparation:

name: roasted turkey drumsticks ; ingredients: chili powder, ground cumin, salt, pepper, turkey drumsticks, barbecue sauce, lime zest ; preparation:In a small bowl, mix together the first 4 ingredients. Sprinkle mixture over the drumsticks. Rub into the drumsticks with your fingers. Place turkey drumsticks in a large roasting pan. Cover and roast at 350 degrees for 50 minutes to 2 hours or until done. Mix together bbq sauce and lime peel. Brush turkey drumsticks with bbq sauce and continue baking for about 15-20 minutes, uncovered, or until heated through. ; name: sweet and sticky grilled drumsticks ; ingredients: dry red wine, dark brown sugar, low sodium soy sauce, ginger, garlic clove, chicken drumsticks, coarse salt ; preparation:Bring wine, sugar, soy sauce, ginger, and garlic to a boil in a saucepan. Reduce heat, and simmer until mixture has thickened to the consistency of honey, 35 to 40 minutes. Let cool. Using a sharp knife, make three diagonal slashes through the skin and flesh on both sides of each drumstick. Preheat grill to medium-low. Place drumsticks on grill, and brush with sauce. Close cover, and grill 4 minutes. Flip chicken, and brush with sauce. Continue to cook, flipping and brushing with sauce every 4 to 5 minutes, until cooked through, about 20 minutes total. Season with salt. ; name: sweet and sour drumsticks ; ingredients: chicken drumsticks, red wine vinegar, tomato paste, soy sauce, honey, worcestershire sauce, garlic, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Slash chicken legs 2-3 times with a sharp knife. Place in glass baking dish side by side to marinade. Mix remaining ingredients together and pour over chicken. Refrigerate 1 hour. Cook on hot grill about 20 minutes, turning and brushing with the marinade. Check to make sure they are done and be careful not to burn them. ; name: crock pot turkey drumsticks ; ingredients: enchilada sauce, green chilies, dried oregano, garlic salt, ground cumin, turkey drumsticks, cornstarch, cold water ; preparation:In a bowl, combine the enchilada sauce, chilies, oregano, garlic salt and cumin. Place the drumsticks in crock pot and top with sauce. Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hours or until a meat thermometer reads 180. Remove turkey and keep warm. Strain sauce into a saucepan. Combine cornstarch and water until smooth and stir into the pan. Bring to a boil and cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Serve with turkey. ; name: glazed chicken drumsticks ; ingredients: soy sauce, peanut oil, white wine vinegar, garlic cloves, honey, cornstarch, pepper, thyme, rosemary, chicken legs ; preparation:Blend together soy sauce, peanut oil, vinegar, garlic, honey and cornstarch. Add pepper, thyme and rosemary. Detach the skin and discard from chickeg legs if desired. Marinate legs in the soy sauce mixture. Place a large pan of water on the lower rack of the oven. Arrange the chicken directly on the middle rack over the pan of water. Bake 30 min at 425. Baste chicken every 8 min with the remaining marinade and turn the legs each time. Serve hot. ; name: grilled turkey breast ; ingredients: cider vinegar, garlic, ground mustard, honey, brown sugar, black pepper, olive oil, turkey cutlets ; preparation:In a medium bowl, combine the cider vinegar, garlic, ground mustard, honey, brown sugar, and black pepper. Slowly whisk in the olive oil to thoroughly combine. Place the turkey cutlets in a shallow dish and pour the liquid over top. Cover and place in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour. Preheat the grill or oven broiler. Place the breasts directly on the grill, or on a roasting rack beneath the broiler. Cook for about 20-25 minutes, or until the turkey is fully done. Turn the breasts frequently to prevent burning. ; name: honey garlic roasted chicken drumsticks ; ingredients: chicken legs, milk, cornstarch, soy sauce, liquid honey, rice vinegar, fresh garlic cloves, green onions, toasted sesame seeds, hot chili sauce ; preparation:Set oven to 425 degrees. Butter a 13x9-in baking pan. Place the chicken legs in baking dish. In a bowl, gradually whisk milk into cornstarch. Whisk in soy sauce, honey, vinegar and garlic. Pour over chicken. Toss to coat. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring twice, until chicken is cooked, and until sauce is bubbling, and starting to thicken. Stir the green onions into dish, and sprinkle with toasted sesame seeds. Bake 10 minutes longer, or until the chicken is cooked. ; name: baked bbq turkey drumsticks ; ingredients: turkey legs, sea salt, black pepper, unsulphured molasses, red wine vinegar, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, red onion, coconut oil ; preparation:

name: strawberry romaine salad ; ingredients: butter, sugar, sliced almonds, romaine lettuce, fresh strawberries, red onion, mayonnaise, milk, poppy seeds, raspberry vinegar ; preparation:In a saucepan, over medium heat, melt 2 tablespoons butter, stir in sugar and almonds and cook until golden brown. Remove from heat and allow to cool slightly. Combine lettuce, strawberries, onion and the sugared almonds. Mix dressing ingredients together and toss with salad. Chill for a short time and then serve. ; name: baby greens salad with cranberry balsamic vinaigrette ; ingredients: balsamic vinegar, whole berry cranberry sauce, shallot, extra virgin olive oil, salt & freshly ground black pepper, walnuts, baby greens, goat cheese, dried cranberries ; preparation:In a small bowl, mix the vinegar, cranberry sauce and shallot. Slowly whisk in the olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees f. Place the walnuts on a baking sheet and toast for 5 to 7 minutes. Set walnuts aside. To serve the salad, toss the greens with enough of the vinaigrette to moisten and arrange on plates. Sprinkle each salad with goat cheese, dried cranberries and toasted walnuts. ; name: cucumber strawberry salad ; ingredients: fresh lime juice, green pepper, cucumber, fresh strawberries ; preparation:Mix the lime juice and green pepper. Combine the cucumbers and strawberries in a serving bowl. Drizzle the lime juice and peppers in the bowl. Toss all ingredients to combine. Chill before serving. ; name: sunflower strawberry salad ; ingredients: fresh strawberries, apple, green seedless grape, celery, raisins, strawberry yogurt, sunflower seeds, lettuce ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the strawberries, apple, grapes, celery, and raisins. Stir in the yogurt. Cover and refrigerate at least one hour. Add the sunflower seeds and toss. Serve atop a bed of lettuce, if desired. ; name: cool summer veggie salad ; ingredients: cilantro, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, white onion, red pepper, lemon, lime ; preparation:Chop cilantro, cucumber, onion, pepper. Cut grape tomatoes in half. Combine everything in bowl. Squeeze half the lemon in bowl. Squeeze the whole lime in bowl. Mix everything together. ; name: strawberry cucumber and basil salad ; ingredients: strawberries, fresh basil, balsamic vinegar, sugar, cucumbers, lemon juice, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Peel and seed cucumbers. Halve lengthwise, and slice thin. Combine strawberries, basil, vinegar, and sugar. Toss to coat and chill for 1 hour. Combine cucumbers and lemon juice. Toss to coat. After chilling, add cucumber mixture, salt, and pepper to strawberry mixture. Gently toss to combine, and serve immediately. ; name: fruity green salad ; ingredients: salad greens, mandarin oranges, green grape, onion, sliced almonds, orange juice, vegetable oil, vinegar, celery seeds ; preparation:In a large serving bowl, toss the salad greens, oranges, grapes, onion, and almonds. In a krudit jar with a tight fitting lid, add orange juice, vegetable oil, vinegar, and celery seed. Shake well to mix. Pour over salad and toss to coat. Serve immediately. ; name: strawberry and greens salad ; ingredients: mixed salad green, radishes, strawberry, spring onions, red pepper, coriander, vinaigrette ; preparation:

name: red zinger cake ; ingredients: golden vanilla cake mix, water, vegetable oil, eggs, raspberry gelatin powder, sweetened condensed milk, seedless raspberry jam, cool whip, shredded coconut, chambord raspberry liquor ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f grease bottom only of 13x9 pan. Prepare cake batter by beating cake mix, water, oil and eggs in large bowl on low speed 30 seconds, then on medium speed 2 minutes. Stir in the raspberry jello powder. Pour into prepared pan. Bake aproximately 30 minutes or until golden brown. Remove cake from oven and immediately poke holes all over the cake with a fork and then pour the condensed milk all over the top. Spread raspberry preserves over that and let the cake cool completely. Top with cool whip and then sprinkle with coconut. ; name: jello poke cake ; ingredients: white cake mix, egg, raspberry jell-o gelatin, boiling water, cold water, cool whip ; preparation:Bake cake according to package directions. Cool completely. Poke cake with a fork. Mix jello with boiling water until dissolved. Mix in cold water. Pour over cake. Top with cool whip. Keep in refrigerator. ; name: weight watcher sunshine cake 2pts ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, unsweetened applesauce, crushed pineapple, egg whites, fat-free cool whip ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a bowl, mix yellow cake mix with egg whites, pineapple and applesauce. Spray a 9x13 cake pan with non-stick cooking spray. Pour mix into pan and bake for approx 35 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean when inserted. After cake is cool, spread cool whip over and serve. ; name: strawberry jello pound cake ; ingredients: poundcake mix, eggs, oil, vanilla extract, strawberry-banana nectar, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine all ingredients in a large bowl and mix about 3 minutes. Spray the pan of your choice with non-stick cooking spray. Pour batter into pan. Bake at 350 until sticking a toothpick or wooden skewer in the center comes out clean. Length of time will vary according to the type of pan you are using, but mini cupcakes will typically require a minimum of 10 minutes, regular cupcakes a minimum of 20 minutes, and larger pans ranging from 30-45 minutes. ; name: strawberry icebox cake ; ingredients: strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, frozen strawberries, boiling water, sugar, mini marshmallows, cool whip, nuts, vanilla wafers ; preparation:Dissolve jello in boiling water. Add sugar and marshmallows. Make sure water is boiling hot or marshmallows will not dissolve. Let stand till thick. Beat with mixer, add cool whip and thawed berries. Line bottom of oblong cake pan with crushed wafers. Put half of berry mixture on top then add another layer of wafers and another of berry mixture ending with wafers. Put in the fridge and chill. Serve when well chilled and set. ; name: rhubarb dessert ; ingredients: white cake mix, rhubarb, sugar, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert ; preparation:Mix cake mix according to package directions. Put into a greased 9 x 13 inch pan. Mix the rhubarb, sugar, & jello together. Spoon onto cake mix. Bake according package directions. ; name: weight watchers ww strawberry mousse ; ingredients: strawberries, low-fat cream cheese, sugar-free strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, egg whites ; preparation:Mix the strawberries with the cream cheese until the berries are slightly broken up and the cheese in pinky in hue. Make up the jello according to the packet and pour over the strawberry mix. Stir well and leave until just starting to set. Whisk the egg whites until stiff peaks and fold into the strawberry mix. Spoon the mix into glasses and chill for one hour. ; name: weight watchers raspberry zinger cake ; ingredients: white cake mix, diet sprite, egg whites, raspberry jell-o gelatin, boiling water, cool whip, flaked coconut ; preparation:

name: oven ranch chicken low fat ; ingredients: plain breadcrumbs, buttermilk ranch salad dressing mix, light sour cream, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Heat oven to 375 degrees f. Spray cookie sheet with non-stick spray. In shallow dish combine bread crumbe & dressing mix. Dip chicken in sounr cream, then crumb mixture. Place on cookie sheet, spray chicken with cooking spray. Discard any remaining bread crumbs & sour cream. Bake at 375 for 30-35 minutes or until chicken is fork tender and juices run clear. ; name: breaded ranch chicken ; ingredients: breadcrumbs, boneless skinless chicken breasts, parmesan cheese, ranch dressing mix, nonstick cooking spray ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Rinse chicken with water. Take breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, and ranch seasoning and mix them together in shallow bowl. Dip chicken in mixture, covering evenly on both sides. Place chicken in pan coated with pam. Spray chicken evenly with a coat of pam so that it fries it in the oven. Bake at 400f for 60 minutes. Special. ; name: ranch oven fried chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, bisquick, pepper, ranch dressing, butter ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Spray 13 x 9 inch pan with cooking spray. In shallow dish, mix bisquick mix and pepper. In another shallow dish, pour ranch dressing. Coat chicken with dressing and then coat with bisquick mixture, pressing so coating sticks to chicken. Place in pan and drizzle with butter. Bake uncovered about 30 minutes or until juice of chicken is clear when center of thickest part is cut. ; name: ranch chicken ; ingredients: chicken breasts, ranch dressing, breadcrumbs, olive oil ; preparation:Remove fat from chicken. Pour the dressing into a shallow bowl or pie pan. Place the bread crumbs on waxed paper or a plate. Dip chicken, one piece at a time, into dressing, coating all sides. Then coat all sides with crumbs. Heat oil in 10- or 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat. Cook chicken in oil 12 to 15 minutes, turning once until golden brown and juice is no longer pink when the centers of the thickest pieces are cut. ; name: easy ranch chicken ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, ranch dressing mix, dry breadcrumbs, eggs, salt, pepper, butter, cracker ; preparation:Mix ranch dressing, salt, pepper and dry bread crumbs in 1 quart storage bag. Beat 2 eggs in bowl. Rinse and dredge chicken through egg then place in bag and shake until completely covered. Place in buttered 13x9-inch glass baking dish. Place a pat of butter on top of chicken. Cook at 375f for 1 hour. Omit eggs and dredge through dressing and then trough dry bread crumbs or crackers. Also can put crackers in dry bread crumbs to make crispier coating. Time may vary depending on the size of the breasts. ; name: creamy ranch chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, sour cream, mayonnaise, cream, hidden valley ranch dressing mix, mushroom, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Lay chicken in baking pan cover chicken with mushrooms. Mix sour cream, mayo, cream and dressing mix together. Pour over chicken, covering all pieces. Top with grated cheese. Bake at 375 for 45-60 minutes. ; name: creamy ranch chicken with noodles ; ingredients: bacon, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, all-purpose flour, dry ranch dressing mix, whole milk, medium noodles, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cut bacon into narrow strips. In large skillet, cook bacon over medium heat until crisp. Drain bacon on paper towels, discard all but 2 t drippings. In same skillet, cook chicken in reserved drippings until tender and no longer pink, turning to brown evenly. Sprinkle flour and salad dressing mix over the chicken in the skillet. Stir well. Stir in milk. Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly. Cook and stir for 1 minute more. Stir in bacon. Meanwhile, cook noodles according to package directions. Serve chicken with noodles, sprinkle with parmesan. ; name: oven ranch chicken ; ingredients: plain breadcrumbs, ranch dressing mix, low-fat sour cream, boneless skinless chicken breast ; preparation:

name: creamy herbed scrambled eggs ; ingredients: butter, diced onions, eggs, milk, cheese, fresh parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:Melt the butter in a small non-stick pan over medium heat, and saute onions until soft and translucent. Whisk together the eggs and milk and add to the pan, lowering the heat to medium-low. As the eggs cook, give them an occasional stir to shift the uncooked portions to the bottom. Cut the cheese wedges into small cubes. Once the eggs are a little more than half-way cooked through, add the parsley and cheese and season with salt and pepper. Keep a close eye on the eggs, gently stirring til cooked through. They should be solid, light and fluffy, but not dry. ; name: luxury scrambled eggs ; ingredients: garlic clove, eggs, salt and black pepper, fresh nutmeg, butter, cream, flat leaf parsley ; preparation:Peel and crush garlic. Break the eggs into a large bowl, whisk until light and frothy. Season well with salt and pepper. Stir in the nutmeg. Melt the butter over a low heat in a small heavy saucepan. Add the garlic and cook gently for about 1 minute, or until softened but not browned. Add the eggs to the pan, stir rapidly with a fork for 3 - 4 minutes or until almost scrambled. Stir in the cream and parsley. Remove from heat and continue to stir until eggs are just set. Allow to stand for about 1 minute,. Serve on toast if desired. Enjoy. ; name: ranch style eggs ; ingredients: eggs, 6-inch tortillas, onion, cooking oil, garlic, tomatoes, green chilies, salt, cheese ; preparation:Heat 2 tbs oil in small skillet, hold tortilia with tongs, dip one at a time in oil, for ten seconds, or until limp. Line a 10x6x2 inch baking dish with the tortilias. Keep warm. In same skillet add 2tbs oil and cook onion and garlic till tender. Stir in tomatoes, green chillies, and salt. Simmer 10 min. Pour over tortilias. Beat eggs and cook in skillet till set, put on top, and grate cheese on top. Put in oven just long enough for cheese to melt. Serve warm. ; name: scrambled egg and tomato ; ingredients: plum tomato, fresh basil, eggs, water, garlic, olive oil, paprika, pepper, seasoning ; preparation:Combine the tomato and basil and set aside. Beat the egg, water and garlic together. Heat oil, add the egg mixture. Cook and stir gently until the egg is nearly set. Sprinkle with paprika. Add the tomato mixture and the pepper. Cook and stir until the egg is completely set and the tomatoes are heated through. Serve with toast or english muffin. ; name: southern egg scrambled breakfast ; ingredients: eggs, sour cream, cheddar cheese, ham, onion, fresh mushrooms, green bell pepper, salt and pepper, butter ; preparation:In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add mushrooms, bell peppers, and onions. Saute until onions are translucent and tender. Add diced ham and stir until steaming. In the meantime, in large mixing bowl, crack and add the dozen eggs, salt and pepper to taste, one heaping tablespoon of sour cream. Beat with wire whisk until smooth. Pour over the ham and vegetable mixture in the skillet. Sprinkle the top with the cheese. Stir as it cooks until the eggs are no longer shiny. ; name: creamy cheesy scrambled eggs with basil ; ingredients: eggs, sour cream, mozzarella cheese, salt and pepper, butter, fresh basil ; preparation:Whisk eggs and sour cream in a bowl until creamy and smooth. Mix in cheese. Season with salt and pepper. Melt butter in skillet over medium heat. Pour in egg mixture. Cook, stirring constantly, until eggs reach the desired consistency. Mix in basil during the final minutes of cooking. ; name: scrambled egg with shrimp ; ingredients: raw shrimp, salt & freshly ground black pepper, peanut oil, eggs, soy sauce, sesame oil, scallion, fresh cilantro leaves ; preparation:Devein shrimp if you like. If large, cut into bite-size pieces. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Put oil or butter in a large skillet, preferably nonstick or cast iron, and turn heat to medium. When hot, add shrimp. Cook, stirring, until shrimp is somewhat pink. Beat eggs in a bowl with soy sauce and sesame oil. Turn heat to medium high and add eggs and scallions. Cook, scraping pan with a rubber spatula. Fold eggs over themselves, breaking up curds. If mixture clumps, remove it from heat and stir, then return to heat. When eggs are creamy, adjust seasoning, garnish if you like and serve immediately. ; name: seasoned scrambled eggs ; ingredients: egg whites, eggs, ranch salad dressing, spicy brown mustard, fresh parsley, garlic powder, canola oil, part-skim mozzarella cheese ; preparation:

name: sam s carrot cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, miracle whip, eggs, cold water, cinnamon, carrots, cream cheese, vanilla extract, powdered sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. With an elecgric mixer, mix together cake mix, salad dressing, eggs, water and cinnamon. Slowly stir in carrots. Pour into 2 cake pans and bake 30-35 minutes. For icing blend together cream cheese, vanilla and powdered sugar. ; name: lightly spiced citrus wonder cake ; ingredients: granulated sugar, margarine, self raising flour, eggs, baking powder, ground ginger, orange zest, lime marmalade, chocolate sprinkles ; preparation:Beat the eggs, sugar, zest & ground ginger into the margarine. Add the flour & mix, then add the water, mixing again. Pour into a well greased microwave safe dish. Cook on full power for 5 minutes. Brush the cake with the melted marmalade & return to the microwave to cook on full power for another minute. Decorate with the chocolate sprinkles or the preserved ginger & cut into slices or squares & serve. If you wish to save any cake, cover it with plastic wrap or place in an airtight container for upto 3 days - it will stay soft & moist like this. ; name: phenomenal carrot cake ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, vegetable oil, vanilla extract, carrots, crushed pineapple in juice, sweetened coconut, flour, baking soda, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Spray a 9 x 13 pan with nonstick spray. In large bowl, beat eggs and gradually add sugar. Continue beating and add oil and vanilla. Add carrots, pineapple, and coconut. Sift flour, baking soda, and salt together. Add flour mixture to wet ingredients and mix well. Pour batter into prepared pan. Bake for 45 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and a cake tester comes out clean. Let cool before frosting. ; name: cinnamon carrot pie ; ingredients: carrots, evaporated milk, sugar, eggs, salt, ground ginger, cinnamon, unbaked pie shells ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine first seven ingredients in a medium mixing bowl. Beat for two minutes. Pour into unbaked pie crust. Bake for 15 minutes. Lower heat to 350 degrees and bake 45 minutes longer or until the filling is set. ; name: golden potato cakes ; ingredients: potatoes, cheddar cheese, fresh breadcrumbs, green bell pepper, onion, dried sage, dried oregano, salt, pepper, egg ; preparation:Shred peeled potatoes with grater. Put shredded potatoes in colander, then rinse and squeeze potatoes under running cold water in sink for a minute or two. Squeeze out excess water until potatoes are fairly dry, then dump them into a large mixing bowl. Add remaining ingredients and mix with hands until incorporated. Pat into patties the size of your hand. Fry with a few tablespoons butter in a non-stick frying pan until golden, turning once. Serve as-is or with ketchup or a dollop of sour cream. ; name: tu tu s carrot cake ; ingredients: self raising flour, bicarbonate of soda, cinnamon, clove, ginger, brown sugar, carrots, sultana, olive oil, eggs ; preparation:Mix step one well. Beat step two. Add two steps together. Bake 180 degrees 40 - 50 minutes. Top with a cream cheese topping. ; name: just plain carrot cake ; ingredients: eggs, vegetable oil, sugar, vanilla, flour, ground cinnamon, baking soda, salt, baking powder, carrots ; preparation:Combine eggs, oil, sugar, and vanilla. Mix well. In a separate bowl, combine and mix dry ingredients. Add to wet mixture, mixing well. Stir in finely crated carrot. Pour batter into 13x9 cake pan that has been sprayed with nonstick cooking spray. Bake at 350 degrees for 50-60 minutes. Allow to cool before frosting with your favorite cream cheese frosting. ; name: the cake of wisdom ; ingredients: carrots, ginger, lemon peel, eggs, honey, cinnamon, dry breadcrumbs, ground hazelnuts, cream cheese ; preparation:

name: sweet pea guacamole ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh lime juice, cilantro, jalapenos, frozen peas, cumin, salt, red onion ; preparation:In a food processor, process onion until finely diced. Remove and set aside. Add oil, lime juice, cilantro and pepper until roughly pureed. Add peas, cumin and salt. Blend until smooth, there will still be a few lumps, leave them. Remove mixture to bowl and stir in onion. ; name: guacamole at the cottage ; ingredients: avocados, lime, onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes, jalapeno peppers, salt and pepper, cilantro ; preparation:Halve avocados, remove pits and scoop flesh into a large bowl. Squeeze juice of lime over immediately to prevent browning. Roughly mash the avocado with the back of a large spoon. Add remaining ingredients, stirring to combine. The mixture should be a little rough with chunks of avocado remaining. Serve with tortilla chips or vegetables. ; name: fresh made guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, red onion, jalapeno pepper, roma tomato, lime, cumin, salt, pepper, garlic powder ; preparation:Cut lime in half, juice lime into the large bowl. Add salt, pepper, cumin, and garlic. Combine seasonings with juice. Set aside. Cut avocados in half, remove pits, spoon out avocados into a large bowl. Use forks to cut avocados down to small bite sizes and combine with lime juice in bottom of bowl. Add tomato, onion, and jalapeno to mix. Please pits in bowl with guacamole to keep guacamole from turning brown. Remove pits before serving. ; name: basic guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, cilantro leaf, white onion, tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, salt, lime, garlic cloves ; preparation:In a medium bowl, scoop the flesh of the avocados and mash lightly. Add the remaining ingredients and stir gently. The mixture should be a mix of chunky and smooth. Taste and adjust seasoning as necessary. Serve with tortilla chips. ; name: guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, lime, juice of, tomatoes, onion, pepper, salt, garlic cloves, ground cumin, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Halve avocados. Remove fruit by running spoon next to skin. Discard seed or save for other uses. Place avocado in bowl and mash with fork. Immediately mix in lime juice, incorporating well. Mix in remaining ingredients. Serve immediately. ; name: chickpea guacamole ; ingredients: fresh lemon juice, garlic clove, onion, tomatoes, scallions, avocado, green chili, chickpeas ; preparation:Place the chickpeas in a food processor or blender. Add the lemon juice and garlic, and process briefly, until the chickpeas are slightly chopped. Add the onion and avocado, and process again until the mixture is chunky. Place the mixture in a bowl and add the remaining ingredients. Mix well. Cover and chill before serving. ; name: really good guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, garlic cloves, salt, lime juice, tomatoes, red onion, jalapeno, cilantro, hot sauce ; preparation:Open each avocado by running a knife around the long end until the blade hits the seed. Twist the halves and pull apart. Insert the knife blade firmly into the seed and twist to pull out. Scoop out the avocado flesh and place in a medium bowl. Gently mash together the garlic cloves and the salt with the side of a knife until it forms a paste. Add this to the avocado. Add the lime juice. Gently fold in the tomatoes, onion, jalapeo, cilantro leaves, and hot sauce. Refrigerate until using. Serve with tortilla chips. ; name: spring green guacamole ; ingredients: peas, avocado, nonfat sour cream, green onion, cilantro, lime juice, green chili, garlic clove, salt, black pepper ; preparation:

name: easy orange chicken with rice ; ingredients: chicken parts, orange juice concentrate, butter, ground ginger, cooked rice, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Sprinkle salt and pepper to taste over the chicken. Place the cut up chicken in a foil lined baking dish, skin side up. Bake in preheated oven for 35 minutes. In a medium saucepan combine the orange juice, butter and ginger, heat through. Spoon the orange sauce over the chicken and bake for 20 minutes longer or until the chicken is tender and no longer pink. Meanwhile, cook rice according to package directions. Serve the chicken and sauce with the rice. ; name: sauteed orange chicken with ginger ; ingredients: chicken legs, salt and pepper, vegetable oil, garlic cloves, orange juice, navel oranges, fresh ginger, white vinegar, dried basil ; preparation:Season chicken with salt and pepper. In a large frying pan, heat oil over medium heat. Add chicken and cook, turning, until brown all over, about 10 minutes. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute. Pour orange juice over chicken. Add orange sections, ginger, vinegar, and basil. Stir well. Cover and simmer for about 30 minutes, until chicken is tender. ; name: citrus ginger chicken ; ingredients: fresh lemon juice, lime juice, orange juice, gingerroot, whole grain mustard, honey, low sodium soy sauce, ground coriander, green onion, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Combine ingredients for marinade. Remove all visible fat from chicken. Place in shallow bowl and pour marinade over. Cover and marinate for at least 2 hours. Remove chicken from marinade and reserve marinade. Saute chicken breasts in a nonstick skillet coated with nonstick cooking spray. Turn and saute until done. Remove from skillet and keep warm. Add reserved marinade to skillet and bring to a boil for 5 minutes. Spoon sauce over chicken and serve. ; name: grilled citrus ginger chicken in orange sauce ; ingredients: orange marmalade, honey mustard, ground ginger, cayenne pepper, skinless chicken breast halves, cooking spray, chicken broth, couscous, grapeseed oil, orange zest ; preparation:In a small bowl, whisk together the first 4 ingredients. Brush half of mixture over chicken. Coat a grill rack with cooking spray. Place chicken on grill over medium-hot coals. Grill, covered, until chicken is done, basting occasionally with marmalade mixture. Cook couscous according to package, but substitute chicken broth for water. Combine all ingredients listed under sauce. Mix well. Arrange chicken over prepared couscous. Drizzle with sauce. Sprinkle grated orange peel over the top, and serve. ; name: spicy ginger orange chicken ; ingredients: orange marmalade, orange juice, fresh ginger, dijon mustard, tabasco sauce, salt & pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Blend together all the ingredients except the chicken. Brush the breasts all over with the marmalade mixture. Place in a baking dish lined with foil. Bake for 20-25 minutes until done, basting every 8 minutes. If there is any sauce left, heat, and serve along side the chicken. Serve. ; name: orange cinnamon chicken ; ingredients: chicken pieces, chicken broth, raisins, flour, butter, orange juice, cinnamon, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat butter in a large skillet, and brown chicken. Remove chicken to the crockpot as they brown. Combine all other ingredients, except flour, in skillet. Mix well and pour over chicken. Cover pot, turn on low and cook 4-6 hours, or until chicken is tender. Remove one cup of sauce from pot and combine with flour, mixing well. Return flour mixture to the pot. Turn pot on high and cook and additional 30 minutes. ; name: chicken with ginger ; ingredients: fresh ginger, canola oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, onion, garlic cloves, soy sauce, white vinegar, sugar, scallion ; preparation:Soak ginger in cold water 10 minutes. Drain. Heat oil in a skillet over high heat. Brown chicken in two batches, 6 to 8 minutes. Set aside. In same skillet over medium heat, cook ginger, onion, and garlic, stirring until browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Add soy sauce, vinegar, and sugar. Cook over high heat until thick, 3 to 4 minutes. Add chicken. Stir to warm. Remove from heat. Stir in scallions. ; name: orange ginger chicken and rice recipe ; ingredients: orange juice, onion, cooked brown rice, fresh ginger, dried parsley, dried thyme, boneless skinless chicken breasts, cinnamon ; preparation:

name: honey dijon pork chops ; ingredients: center-cut pork chops, salt and pepper, olive oil, honey, dijon mustard, white wine ; preparation:Heat oil in a large nonstick pan over med high heat. Add a light coating of salt and pepper to pork chops. Add pork chops to pan, cook until browned on each side. Remove pork chops from pan and set aside. Add honey, mustard and wine to pan. Bring to a low boil for 2 minutes. Put pork chops back into pan with sauce. Reduce heat, simmer for 5 minutes. Turn pork, simmer another 5 minutes, or until pork is cooked and no longer pink. Serve pork chops with sauce drizzled on top. ; name: honey mustard bbq pork chops ; ingredients: honey, onion powder, orange juice, dried tarragon, cider vinegar, dijon mustard, white wine, worcestershire sauce, pork chops ; preparation:Place all but chops in a large resealable plastic bag. If the chops have any fat on the edges, slash them three times without cutting into the meat. This will prevent them from curling up while cooking. Add chops to plastic bag, and marinate for a minimum of 24 hours. Preheat grill to high heat. Oil grate, and place meat on grill over high heat. Cook for 6- 8 minutes, turning once, or until done. ; name: pork chops with cherry mustard sauce ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, pork chops, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, dry white wine, dijon mustard, fresh cherries, unsalted butter ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Lightly season pork chops with salt and pepper, then, two to four at a time, depending on the size of your skillet, brown well on each side, removing to warm oven. Deglaze the skillet with the wine, scraping up brown bits, reduce heat to medium and stir in the mustard, then add the cherries. Season to taste with salt and pepper. When the sauce begins to bubble, add all the pork chops back into the skillet, spooning sauce over them to coat, cover and reduce heat to medium low. Cook over medium low about 5 minutes, then rearrange chops so those on the bottom are now on the top, and spoon sauce over. Cover and cook an additional 5 minutes or more, until chops are cooked through, but still very slightly pink inside. Remove chops to serving platter or individual plates. Melt butter into remaining sauce in skillet, heat and spoon over chops. ; name: swiss pork chops with mustard sauce ; ingredients: pork loin chops, flour, salt, pepper, butter, white wine, lemon juice, light cream, dijon mustard, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Dry chops and cover with the flour, salt and pepper. Brown in hot butter on both sides, about 20 minutes. Add wine and lemon juice and simmer for about 45 or 50 minutes, or until tender. Remove to warm serving platter. Make mustard sauce. Stir flour into drippings in skillet until smooth. Stir in cream, mustard and cayenne. Boil, stirring 1 minute. Serve chops with sauce. ; name: hoisin and honey glazed pork chops ; ingredients: scallions, oyster sauce, dijon mustard, hoisin sauce, ginger, honey, soy sauce, pork chops ; preparation:Preheat oven to 4oo degrees. Cut scallions diagonally into 2-inch pieces. Whisk remaining ingredients except pork in a large bowl add scallions and pork, turning pork to coat. Arrange pork in 1 layer in shallow baking dish. Spoon remaining sauce with scallions over pork and roast 15-20 minutes. Turn on broiler and broil pork 5-6 inches from heat until top is slightly caramelized, 2-5 minutes. Let stand, uncovered, 5 minutes. Serve pork topped with pan juices. ; name: honey mustard pork tenderloin ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, honey, dijon mustard, olive oil, garlic, dried oregano leaves ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Line baking sheet with foil. Place pork in pan. In small bowl, mix remaining ingredients. Brush over pork tenderloin. Bake 25 to 30 minutes or until pork has slight blush of pink in center and meat thermometer inserted reads 160. Let stand 5 minutes. Cut diagonally into slices. ; name: pork chops with mustard sauce capers ; ingredients: pork chops, olive oil, shallot, dijon mustard, cream, fresh lemon juice, capers, salt and pepper, water ; preparation:Pan fry pork chops in olive oil. In separate skillet, heat shallot in olive oil until softened. Add mustard, cream, capers, lemon juice, salt, pepper and flour mixture. Cook until heated through. Spoon sauce over pork chops. ; name: pork chops in honey mustard sauce ; ingredients: center-cut pork chops, salt and pepper, olive oil, dry white wine, honey, dijon mustard ; preparation:

name: mustard crusted tilapia ; ingredients: spicy brown mustard, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, garlic powder, oregano, parmesan cheese, rice flour, tilapia fillet ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Bake fish 10 minutes on oiled glass sheet and pull from oven. Mix mustard, worcestershire, lemon juice, garlic powder, oregano, and cheese and baste one side of fish. Sprinkle rice flour over fish till thinly covered. Bake for another 10 minutes until crust is brown and bubbly. ; name: sarah s tilapia ; ingredients: dijonnaise mustard, panko breadcrumbs, salt, black pepper, fresh parsley, tilapia fillets, lemon wedges, vegetable oil ; preparation:Heat oil in large non-stick skillet over med. Heat. Combine mayo and mustard in small dish. Combine next 4 ingred. On a plate and mix well. Brush thin coating of mustard mayo combo on to both sides of each fish fillet. Press each coated fillet into panko crumb mixture, coating well. Press more crumbs into any bare areas. Saute fillets in hot oil until lightly browned, turn and saute other side until lightly browned and fish is opaque. Serve with lemon wedges. ; name: parmesan coated tilapia ; ingredients: parmesan cheese, butter, mayonnaise, fresh lemon juice, dried basil, ground black pepper, onion powder, celery salt, tilapia fillets ; preparation:Preheat broiler. Grease a broiling pan. In a small bowl, mix together the parmesan cheese, butter, mayonnaise and lemon juice. Season with basil, pepper, onion powder and celery salt. Mix well and set aside. Arrange fillets in a single layer on the prepared pan. Broil a few inches from the heat for 2 to 3 minutes. Flip the fillets over and broil for 2 more minutes. Remove the fillets from the oven and cover them with the parmesan cheese mixture on the top side. Broil for 2 more minutes or until the topping is browned and the fish flakes easily with a fork. ; name: broiled tilapia parmesean ; ingredients: parmesan cheese, tilapia fillets, margarine, mayonnaise, lemon juice, dried basil, black pepper, salt, onion powder, celery salt ; preparation:Preheat broiler. Combine all ingredients except fish. Mix thoroughly. Set aside for flavors to meld. Line cookie pan with foil and lightly spray the foil with olive oil spray or pam. Arrange fish in single layer. Broil 2 minutes. Flip fish and broil 2-3 minutes. Top each piece of fish with mixture. Broil 2 -3 more minutes until cheese is brown and fish is flaky. Serve immediately. ; name: baked tilapia with fresh herbs ; ingredients: tilapia fillets, salt and pepper, light mayonnaise, parsley, fresh dill, lemon wedge ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Place fillets on a baking sheet, flat side down. Season generously with salt and pepper. Spread mayonnaise evenly over top of fillets. Sprinkle fish with parsley and dill. Bake until opaque throughout, about 15 minutes. Serve with lemon wedges. ; name: tilapia with creamy lemon sauce ; ingredients: tilapia fillets, flour, light italian dressing, chicken broth, lemon juice, fat free cream cheese, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat the dressing in a medium skillet on medium heat. Coat the fish with flour and then add to the pan. Cook 4-5 minutes on each side or until fish flakes easily with a fork. Remove from skillet, cover and keep warm. Add broth and lemon juice to the pan. Cook 3 minutes, until it is reduced by half, stirring frequently witha whisk. Add cream cheese and cook until melted, stirring constantly. Pour over fish, sprinkle with parsley. ; name: steamed whole tilapia ; ingredients: tilapia fillet, soy sauce, minced ginger, sesame oil, fresh garlic, red pepper flakes, napa cabbage, scallions, toasted sesame seeds, ground pepper ; preparation:Scale and gut the tilapia. Make 3 or 4 shallow slashes on each side of the fish, to absorb the marinate. Mix soy sauce, ginger, sesame oil, garlic and peppers. Rub a small portion of this sauce into the fish, including into the slashes. Add shredded cabbage and scallion to the remainder of the sauce, and mix. Layer cabbage onto a heat-resistant plate which will fit into your steamer, and place the fish atop the cabbage. Put the plate into the top portion of the steamer. In the bottom of the steamer, pour three inches of water. Set steamer over range on high, and allow water to boil. When the water is at boiling, put the steamer basket over the lower portion, and cover. Steam fish until it has just turned opaque, approximately 15-20 minutes. Serve, and sprinkle sesame seeds atop. ; name: honey mustard tilapia ; ingredients: butter, dijon-style mustard, honey, seasoned dry bread crumb, pecans, fresh parsley, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: ginger lime tilapia ; ingredients: tilapia fillets, olive oil, lime zest, fresh ginger, paprika, crushed red pepper flakes, garlic powder, lime juice, salt, pepper ; preparation:Mix together the lime zest, ginger, paprika, garlic powder, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper. Sprinkle mixture on both sides of each tilapia filet. Heat olive oil in a pan. Add the fish filets to the pan and cook on medium-high for 4 minutes on each side. Sprinkle finished filets with lime juice. ; name: tilapia and ginger sesame roasted vegetables ; ingredients: tilapia fillets, red potatoes, yellow bell pepper, red onion, olive oil, lime juice, sesame oil, red pepper flakes, salt, minced ginger ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine olive oil, sesame oil, lime juice, pepper flakes, salt and ginger. Place potatoes, pepper, and onion in a pyrex-type dish. The dish should be just long enough to fit both fillets and about 2 inches deep. Place the vegetables in the baking dish and toss with the oil-spice sauce. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring once. Remove from oven and push the vegetables to one side of the cooking dish. Place first fillet in dish and cover with the vegetables. Push vegetables aside to place other fillet in dish and cover it with the remaining vegetables. Bake for another 20 minutes or until tilapia is thoroughly cooked. It should flake and still be very moist. ; name: ginger miso glazed tilapia ; ingredients: tilapia fillets, sesame oil, fresh ginger, miso, soy sauce, rice vinegar, lime juice ; preparation:Whisk together everything except for the fish filets. Submerge fish in sauce to marinate for at least 30 minutes. In nonstick or lightly oiled skillet, sear fish over medium high heat for 4-5 minutes or until fish is white and fully cooked. Remove fish from pan and plate filets. Pour leftover marinate into skillet and stir for 5 minutes while sauce thickens. Drizzle over filets. ; name: steamed whole tilapia ; ingredients: tilapia fillet, soy sauce, minced ginger, sesame oil, fresh garlic, red pepper flakes, napa cabbage, scallions, toasted sesame seeds, ground pepper ; preparation:Scale and gut the tilapia. Make 3 or 4 shallow slashes on each side of the fish, to absorb the marinate. Mix soy sauce, ginger, sesame oil, garlic and peppers. Rub a small portion of this sauce into the fish, including into the slashes. Add shredded cabbage and scallion to the remainder of the sauce, and mix. Layer cabbage onto a heat-resistant plate which will fit into your steamer, and place the fish atop the cabbage. Put the plate into the top portion of the steamer. In the bottom of the steamer, pour three inches of water. Set steamer over range on high, and allow water to boil. When the water is at boiling, put the steamer basket over the lower portion, and cover. Steam fish until it has just turned opaque, approximately 15-20 minutes. Serve, and sprinkle sesame seeds atop. ; name: fragrant citrus tilapia ; ingredients: tilapia fillet, orange juice, butter, orange zest, tarragon, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f rinse fish and pat dry. Place in a 7 x 11 inch baking dish. Combine juice, butter, zest and tarragon in a microwave-safe dish. Cook on high for 1 minute or until butter is melted. Pour over fish. Season with salt and pepper and bake for 10 minutes or until fish reaches 150f on a meat thermometer and flakes easily when tested with a fork. ; name: zesty grilled tilapia ; ingredients: tilapia fillets, olive oil, orange zest, orange juice, fresh ginger, hot sauce, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Place the fish in a large nonmetal dish. Whisk together the 6 tablespoons oil, the orange zest, orange juice, ginger, hot sauce, salt, and pepper, to taste. Pour over the fish. Cover and marinate in the refrigerator for 30 to 60 minutes. Meanwhile, prepare grill. Brush the fish with additional oil. Grill until fish just flakes when tested with a fork, about 5 minutes per side for each inch of thickness. ; name: lemon pepper tilapia ; ingredients: butter, oil, tilapia fillets, lemon pepper seasoning, salt ; preparation:In a large frying pan, melt butter on a med heat. Add oil. Put fish in pan. Season with lemon pepper and salt. Turn in 3 minutes and season other side, cook for 4 more minutes. Serve. ; name: ginger orange tilapia ; ingredients: orange juice, orange peel, garlic, ginger, vegetable oil, tilapia fillets, flour, salt and pepper, green onion ; preparation:

name: coffee liqueur with vanilla cinnamon cream ; ingredients: thickened cream, powdered sugar icing, vanilla bean paste, coffee liqueur, espresso coffee, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Use an electric beater to beat the cream in a medium bowl until soft peaks form. Use a large metal spoon to fold in the icing sugar mixture and vanilla bean paste. Pour the coffee liqueur evenly among serving glasses. Add the coffee and top with the cream mixture. Sprinkle with cinnamon and serve immediately. The spanish love their coffee sweet and strong - make yours special with a splash of kahlua. Prepare this recipe to the end of step 1 up to 1 day ahead. Cover and store in the fridge. Continue from step 2 just before serving. ; name: delicious iced coffee ; ingredients: coffee, milk, cocoa powder, granulated sugar, caramel syrup ; preparation:Brew coffee strong. Transfer to heat proof container or cleaned milk jug. Store in freezer or refrigerator until cool. Add milk, cocoa powder, and sugar to coffee. Shake well. Serve over ice. Store in refrigerator for up to 3 days. Instant cocoa mix can be subsituted for cocoa powder. For frozen coffee drink, add ice and whip in blender. ; name: chocolate iced coffee ; ingredients: water, ground coffee, sugar, ground cinnamon, half-and-half, chocolate syrup ; preparation:Bring water and coffee to a boil in a saucepan. Remove from heat and let stand 10 minutes. Pour mixture through a fine wire-mesh strainer into a bowl, discarding coffee grounds. Stir sugar and cinnamon into coffee until sugar dissolves. Let cool. Stir in half and half and chocolate syrup. Chill 2 hours. Serve over ice. ; name: spiced iced coffee ; ingredients: hot coffee, sugar, cinnamon sticks, cloves, allspice, black peppercorns, half-and-half ; preparation:Combine first 6 ingredients. Stir well. Let stand at room temperature 1 hour. Strain and serve over cracked ice. Serve with half-and-half and sugar. ; name: lots of cinnamon coffee cake ; ingredients: sugar, flour, salt, baking powder, cinnamon, egg, milk, sour cream, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Mix first 5 dry ingredients together. Beat egg, add milk, sour cream, melted butter and vanilla. Combine with dry ingredients only until blended. Pour into a greased, floured 8 or 9 inch round or square pan. Sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon. Bake in a 400 degree oven for 25 minutes. ; name: spiced rum breakfast coffee ; ingredients: ground coffee, cinnamon stick, cardamom seeds, rum extract, water, milk, sugar ; preparation:In basket of drip coffee make place coffee grounds, cinnamon stick, and the 3 cardamom seed pods broken open. Add 10 cups of water and brew. When done brewing add 1 teaspoon rum extract to brewed coffee. Serve. Can add milk and sweetener if you like. ; name: espresso rum and walnut ice cream ; ingredients: water, sugar, instant espresso powder, cream, milk, rum, vanilla extract, walnuts ; preparation:Place water, sugar and coffee powder in pan. Stir over low heat without boiling until sugar and coffee are both dissolved. Remove from heat and cool. Combine cooled mixture, cream, milk, rum and vanilla extract. Mix well. Pour into an ice cream maker and follow manufacturers instructions. When ice cream is starting to thicken, add walnuts and continue churning until done. ; name: modern morocco coffee cinnamon ice cream ; ingredients: heavy cream, instant espresso powder, fat-free sweetened condensed milk, plain fat-free yogurt, ground cinnamon, figs ; preparation:

name: purist s guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, white onion, fresh cilantro, kosher salt ; preparation:Cut onion into small dice. In a mortar and pestle or molcajete, pound onion and salt to a rough paste. Add cilantro and pound until well incorporated. Peel and seed avocados, add to mortar, and mash until mixture is a lumpy puree. Place one avocado pit in the center of the mixture and serve from the mortar or molcajete with tortilla chips. Makes about 2 cups. ; name: basic guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, cilantro leaf, white onion, tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, salt, lime, garlic cloves ; preparation:In a medium bowl, scoop the flesh of the avocados and mash lightly. Add the remaining ingredients and stir gently. The mixture should be a mix of chunky and smooth. Taste and adjust seasoning as necessary. Serve with tortilla chips. ; name: fresh made guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, red onion, jalapeno pepper, roma tomato, lime, cumin, salt, pepper, garlic powder ; preparation:Cut lime in half, juice lime into the large bowl. Add salt, pepper, cumin, and garlic. Combine seasonings with juice. Set aside. Cut avocados in half, remove pits, spoon out avocados into a large bowl. Use forks to cut avocados down to small bite sizes and combine with lime juice in bottom of bowl. Add tomato, onion, and jalapeno to mix. Please pits in bowl with guacamole to keep guacamole from turning brown. Remove pits before serving. ; name: guacamole at the cottage ; ingredients: avocados, lime, onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes, jalapeno peppers, salt and pepper, cilantro ; preparation:Halve avocados, remove pits and scoop flesh into a large bowl. Squeeze juice of lime over immediately to prevent browning. Roughly mash the avocado with the back of a large spoon. Add remaining ingredients, stirring to combine. The mixture should be a little rough with chunks of avocado remaining. Serve with tortilla chips or vegetables. ; name: easy fresh guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, red onions, grape tomatoes, jalapeno, hot sauce, garlic salt, lime ; preparation:In a medium-sized bowl, coarsely mash avocado. If you prefer, mash completely for a smoother dip. Stir in onion, tomatoes, jalapeno, hot sauce, and garlic salt according to your taste. Roll lime on counter top to release juices and cut in half. Squeeze fresh lime juice into guacamole and mix. Serve with tortilla chips. Lime juice and leaving the avocado pit in the bowl sometimes helps keep the guacamole from getting too brown after sitting out. ; name: healthy guacamole ; ingredients: avocado, soft tofu, garlic, olive oil, lemon juice, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cut the avocado in half, remove pit and scrape the pulp from the skin into food processor. Add lemon juice. Process till smooth. Squeeze the water from the tofu using paper towels. Break up the tofu and add to the avocado mixture. Add remaining ingredients. Process again till smooth. ; name: guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, lime, juice of, tomatoes, onion, pepper, salt, garlic cloves, ground cumin, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Halve avocados. Remove fruit by running spoon next to skin. Discard seed or save for other uses. Place avocado in bowl and mash with fork. Immediately mix in lime juice, incorporating well. Mix in remaining ingredients. Serve immediately. ; name: la casita s guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, onion, salt, water ; preparation:

name: cool whip ; ingredients: gelatin, water, boiling water, ice water, nonfat dry milk powder, sugar, oil ; preparation:Chill small mixing bowl. Soften gelatin with 2 teaspoons cold water,. Than add boiling water, stirring until gelatin is completely dissolved. Cool until tepid. Place ice water and nonfat milk in the chilled bowl. Beat at high speed until mixture forms soft stiff peaks. Add sugar, still beating, then oil and gelatin. Place in freezer about 15 minutes then transfer to refrigerator until ready to use. Stir before using to retain creamy texture. Makes 2 cups. ; name: just like cool whip copycat ; ingredients: gelatin, cold water, boiling water, ice water, nonfat dry milk powder, sugar, oil, vanilla ; preparation:Chill a small bowl. Soften gelatin with 2 tsp cold water, then add the boiling water, stirring until gelatin is completely dissolved. Cool until tepid. Place ice water and dry milk powder in the chilled bowl. Beat at high speed, until mixture forms stiff peaks. Add sugar and vanilla, still beating, then oil and gelatin. Place in freezer for about 15 minutes, then transfer to refrigerator until ready to use. Stir just before using, to retain creamy texture. Also, 1 tsp pure vanilla may be added if desired. ; name: raspberry cherry jello with cream cheese cool whip topping ; ingredients: raspberry jell-o gelatin, boiling water, cherry pie filling, lemon jell-o gelatin, cream cheese, cool whip ; preparation:Mix jello & boiling water together until dissolved, add cherry pie filling and chill until set. Prepare lemon jello according to box directions and chill until partially set. Beat lemon jello in mixer until foamy and add cream cheese, mix well. Fold in cool whip by hand and spread mixture over layer 1. Chill until ready to serve. ; name: whipped dessert topping ; ingredients: unflavored gelatin, water, boiling water, ice water, nonfat dry milk powder, sugar, vegetable oil ; preparation:Thoroughly chill a small mixing bowl in the refrigerator. In another small bowl, soften gelatin with 2 teaspoons of cold water, then add boiling water, stirring until gelatin is completely dissolved. Set aside and cool until tepid. In a chilled mixing bowl, beat ice water and nonfat dry milk at high speed until mixture forms stiff peaks. Add sugar, still beating, then oil and gelatin. Cover and freeze for about 15 minutes, then transfer to refrigerator until ready for use. Stir before using to retain a creamy texture. ; name: topping low fat whipped ; ingredients: evaporated skim milk, unflavored gelatin, water, sugar, vanilla extract, lemon juice ; preparation:Chill evaporated milk. Sprinkle gelatin over cold water in small saucepan, then stir over low heat until dissolved. Add to milk and beat until stiff. Add sugar, vanilla and lemon juice. Use immediately, or beat again before serving. ; name: berry cream dessert ; ingredients: strawberry gelatin, raspberry gelatin powder, boiling water, cold water, strawberry yogurt, raspberry yogurt, fresh strawberries, cool whip ; preparation:In a large bowl, dissolve strawberry and raspberry gelatin in boiling water. Stir in cold water and both yogurts. Stir until well blended. Chill until mixture is syrupy, about 1 hour. Fold in strawberries and whipped topping. Spoon into individual dishes. Chill until firm, about 4 hours. Garnish with fresh berries if desired. ; name: limeade jello ; ingredients: lime jell-o gelatin, boiling water, frozen limeade concentrate, cool whip ; preparation:Put 2 6-oz. Packages of lime jello into large mixing bowl. Add 5 cups of boiling water and stir until jello is melted. Stir in the 12-oz. Can of frozen limeade concentrate. Mix until the limeade is thoroughly melted. Put bowl of jello into the frig until slightly thickened. After slightly thickened, add container of thawed cool whip. Blend with a mixer until creamy. Return to the refrigerator until set. ; name: raspberry whip ; ingredients: sugar-free raspberry gelatin, boiling water, cold water, sugar-free cool whip ; preparation:

name: creamy skillet chicken and noodles ; ingredients: chicken breast, onion, chicken broth, condensed cream of celery soup, frozen mixed vegetables, mafalda pasta, lemon-pepper seasoning, parsley ; preparation:Spray 12-inch skillet or dutch oven with nonstick cooking spray. Add chicken and onion, cooking and stiring over medium heat for 4 to 6 minutes. Chicken should be browned and onion tendered. Add all remaining ingredients, except parsely, and mix well. Bring mixture to a boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 15 to 18 minutes, or until vegetables and noodles are tender. Sprinkle with parsely if desired. ; name: day after thanksgiving noodles ; ingredients: butter, celery, onion, chicken broth, reames frozen noodles, cooked turkey, fresh parsley, flour, cold water ; preparation:Melt butter in dutch oven, add celery and onion. Cook until tender. Add broth, bring to a boil. Stir in noodles. Add salt and pepper. Return to boil, reduce heat, and simmer until noodles are tender. Add turkey and parsley. To thicken, mix flour and water. Stir into mixture and cook about 2 more minutes. ; name: german noodle salad ; ingredients: pasta noodles, mayonnaise, green onions, gherkins, eggs, fresh parsley ; preparation:Mix all other ingredients in a salad bowl. If you prefer, add some vinegar from the gherkins to taste. You can also add more mayo. Refrigerate for at least 1 hour and up to 24 hours. Garnish with optional egg slices. ; name: spaetzle german noodles ; ingredients: eggs, flour, water, butter, salt, celery salt, onion powder ; preparation:Beat eggs. Add flour and just a little water to make a very stiff but smooth batter. Push batter through spaetzle press. Or small colander into boiling water. Boil gently for a few minutes. Lift out of boiling water and place into a pan to fry for just a few minutes serve warm with topping of your choice. ; name: onion noodle burger skillet ; ingredients: ground beef, chili sauce, fine egg noodles, onion, onion soup, water ; preparation:In a skillet, brown beef and onion until tender. Drain fat. Add remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Cover and cook on low heat for 5-7 minutes or until noodles are done, stirring occasionally. ; name: buttered herb noodles ; ingredients: egg noodles, water, salt, butter, fresh parsley, fresh chives, fresh rosemary, pepper ; preparation:Cook noodles in boiling water and salt in dutch oven for 10-12 min, stirring occasionally, until tender but firm. Drain well. Turn into large bowl. Add remaining 6 ingredients. Toss until well coated. ; name: dutch oven one pan chicken and noodles ; ingredients: onion, celery, butter, chicken, noodles, cream of chicken soup, chicken broth, lemon juice, pepper, mushrooms ; preparation:In a dutch oven saute the onion and celery in butter until tender. Add the chicken and top with the noodles. In a bowl combine the soup, broth, lemon juice, and pepper. Pour over the noodles, moistening all. Scatter the mushrooms on top. Cover and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to simmer and cook for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally. ; name: skillet franks n noodles ; ingredients: frankfurter, onion, dried basil, butter, cream of celery soup, milk, canned tomato, wide egg noodles, dried parsley ; preparation:

name: blt egg wrap ; ingredients: chicken bacon, egg, onion powder, salt and pepper, low-fat tortilla, low-fat mayonnaise, lettuce, tomatoes ; preparation:Cook bacon in non-stick skillet over medium heat, or in microwave until crisp. Fold in half and set aside. Wipe skillet clean. Whisk together egg, onion powder, salt and pepper, in small bowl. Pour mixture into skillet. Cook stirring slightly over medium heat. As mxture begins to set, gently move spatula across bottom and sides of skillet to form large, soft curds. Cook until eggs are thickened and no visible liquid egg remains but are still moist. Spread tortilla with mayonnaise. Place lettuce on top. Add bacon, egg and tomato. Fold wrap and serve. ; name: blt s extraordinaire ; ingredients: sandwich buns, garlic cloves, spinach leaves, lettuce leaves, tomatoes, light mayonnaise, cooked bacon, feta cheese ; preparation:Toast buns in oven till crispy. Spread roasted garlic over both insides of buns, then spread on the mayonnaise. Put on spinach leaves and lettuce leaves, four each per bun. Next add the tomato slices, salt and pepper to taste. Sprinkle the feta cheese over tomatoes, top with the bacon. Close up the sandwich, press it down a little to keep everything in, cut in half, and enjoy. ; name: blt quesadillas ; ingredients: bacon, cheese, tomatoes, lettuce, flour tortillas ; preparation:Fry bacon and discard fat. Lay bacon strips on a paper towel to drain. Rinse the excess fat from pan, and coat the pan with cooking spray. Over medium heat, lay 1 trtilla in pan, and top with 2 tomato slices, 2 strips of bacon, 1 slice cheese, shredded lettuce, & 1 slice cheese. Lay 2nd tortilla on top. Cook for 2 minutes on each side, pressing tortilla with a spatula. Serve with salsa and sour cream, if desired. You may also leave the lettuce out and serve it on the side, as it can get a little wilted if it gets hot in the pan. ; name: caesar blt wraps ; ingredients: romaine lettuce leaves, tomatoes, bacon, caesar salad dressing, parmesan cheese, flour tortillas ; preparation:Combine lettuce, tomato, bacon and salad dressing in large bowl. Add cheese. Toss. Spoon mixture evenly onto tortillas. Roll up tortillas burrito-style. Wrap sandwiches in plastic wrap and refrigerate until serving time. ; name: inside out blt s ; ingredients: bacon, romaine lettuce, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, olive oil, plum tomatoes, ground black pepper, light mayonnaise ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f in a large skillet cook bacon over medium heat until crisp. Drain on paper towel. Chop. In medium bowl, combine the bacon, lettuce, crumbs, cheese and olive oil, mix well. Halve the plumb tomatoes lengthwise. Scoop out the inside leaving pulp and shell. Sprinkle the inside of each with black pepper. Brush with some mayo and mound the bacon mixture in the tomatoes. Transfer to a baking pan. Roast the tomatoes, uncovered for 10 to 12 minutes. Serves 2. ; name: blt bites ; ingredients: cherry tomatoes, bacon, mayonnaise, green onion, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley ; preparation:Cut slice off tops of tomatoes. Use a small metal measuring spoon to scoop out pulp and discard. Invert tomatoes on paper towels to drain. Combine remaining ingredients. Spoon mixture into tomatoes. Refrigetate several hours. Watch them disappear. ; name: blt club sandwich ; ingredients: bread, mayonnaise, american cheese, tomatoes, lettuce, crisp bacon ; preparation:Spread mayonnaise on one side of a piece of toast. Add layer of american cheese, blt, two slices of tomato, one leaves of lettuce, and three pieces of bacon. Spread mayonnaise on second piece of toast and place on top, mayo side down. Spread mayonnaise on top of that second piece of toast. Layer american cheese, the rest of the tomatoes, lettuce, and bacon on top. Spread mayonnaise on third piece of toast and place on the stack mayo side down. Place toothpicks in 4 corners of sandwich to hold together. Slice the sandwich in quarters diagonally. ; name: blt pinwheels ; ingredients: mayonnaise, cream cheese, chunky salsa, dry mustard, bacon, flour tortillas, tomatoes, romaine lettuce ; preparation:

name: tuscan rigatoni white beans ; ingredients: rigatoni pasta, onion, smoked sausage, cannellini beans, sun-dried tomato, chicken broth, fresh rosemary leaves, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook& drain pasta. Cook onion and sausage over med-high heat 2-3 minutes until onion is tender. Gently stir in pasta and remaining ingredients except cheese. Cook 3-5 minutes or until hot. Sprinkle each serving with cheese. ; name: baked rigatoni with sausage ; ingredients: rigatoni pasta, broccoli florets, hot italian sausage, onion, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta by following the package directions, adding broccoli during the last 2 minutes of cooking. Drain, then return to pan. In a large skillet, cook sausage and onion over medium heat until meat is brown and onion is tender. Drain. Stir in marinara sauce. Heat through. Stir meat sauce and cheeses into the cooked pasta. Transfer to a lightly greased 3-quart rectangular casserole dish. Bake, covered, at 375 for 20-25 degrees or until mixture is heated through. ; name: italian bean sausage pasta ; ingredients: rotini pasta, smoked sausage, italian cut green beans, stewed tomatoes, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to box and drain. Cooked slices sausage in large skillet over medium-high heat until browned. Stir in beans and undrained tomatoes. Bring to boil and then reduce to low. Simmer uncovered 3-5 minutes. Stir in pasta and cook until heated through 2-3 minutes. Top with cheese after plated. ; name: italian sausage rigatoni and peppers ; ingredients: hot italian sausage link, rigatoni pasta, olive oil, garlic cloves, red pepper, green pepper, pasta sauce, fresh parsley, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook rigatoni according to package directions. Drain, keep warm and set aside. Heat olive oil in large skillet. Remove casing from sausage links and cut in coin-like slices. Add to skillet and cook until no longer pink. Add garlic and saute lightly for about 30 seconds. Add peppers and cook until crisp-tender. Add pasta sauce with peppers and heat until warm. Add the rigatoni or serve separately. Top with fresh parsley and parmesan cheese. ; name: sausage and tomato rigatoni ; ingredients: rigatoni pasta, italian sausage, red onion, tomato paste, sun-dried tomato vinaigrette dressing, fresh parsley, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, brown sausage in large nonstick skillet. Drain. Stir in onions and tomato paste. Cover and cook 15 minute or until onions are tender and sausage is cooked through, stirring occasionally. Stir in dressing. Toss sausage mixture with pasta. Sprinkle with parsley and cheese. ; name: italian sausage tomato and white bean soup ; ingredients: sweet italian turkey sausage, onion, reduced-sodium chicken broth, cannellini beans, diced tomatoes with basil oregano and garlic ; preparation:In stock pot over medium heat, crumble sausage and cook until no longer pink. If necessary, drain all but 1 tablespoon fat. Add onion and saute until softened. Add chicken broth, cannellini beans and tomatoes. Stir to combine. Cover and simmer for 10 to 15 minutes or longer if you need to. Enjoy a quick and easy but really delightful meal. Serve with crusty bread and fruit salad. I had apples and grapes sprinkled with fresh lemon juice in refrigerator. ; name: country style rigatoni ; ingredients: cooking oil, mild sausage, garlic cloves, low sodium chicken broth, escarole, cannellini beans, parmesan cheese, salt, fresh ground black pepper, rigatoni pasta ; preparation:In a large deep frying pan, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the sausage and cooki, turning, until brown and cooked through, about 10 minutes. Remove. When sausage is cooled, cut into slices. Simmer garlic and broth in pan. Add escarole, cover, and simmer for 5 minutes. Gently stir in the sausage, beans, paremsan, salt and pepper and let simmer 1 minute longer. Meanwhile, cook the pasta in a large pot of salted, boiling water until al dente, about 14 minutes. Drain and toss with the sauce. Serve with additional parmesan. ; name: white bean sausage rigatoni ; ingredients: rigatoni pasta, white kidney beans, italian-style stewed tomatoes, smoked turkey sausage, fresh basil, asiago cheese ; preparation:

name: lemony fresh asparagus with thyme ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic clove, asparagus spear, lemon thyme leaves, dijon mustard, lemon zest, lemon, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, lemon juice ; preparation:Warm the olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the garlic and saute for 3 minutes. Add the asparagus, thyme, dijon mustard, lemon zest, lemon slices, and salt & pepper. Stir to combine. Cover and cook until tender-crisp, about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Do not over cook. Arrange on serving platter and squeeze with fresh lemon juice. Serve hot, cold, or at room temperature. ; name: asparagus with lemon and mint ; ingredients: asparagus, extra virgin olive oil, lemon zest, salt, fresh ground pepper, mint leaves, lemon juice ; preparation:In large pot of boiling salted water, cook asparagus 3 to 5 minutes, until crisp-tender. Drain in colander. Dry on paper towel. In serving bowl, combine olive oil, lemon zest, salt and pepper. Add hot aspargus. Toss mixture to bring to room temperature. Just before serving, stir in mint and lemon juice. Serve at room temperature. ; name: asparagus with lemon broth low sodium ; ingredients: asparagus spears, vegetable oil, shallot, garlic clove, low sodium chicken broth, lemon, juice of, sugar, pepper ; preparation:Wash asparagus and break off the tough, woody ends. Heat oil over medium heat in saute pan large enough to hold all the ingredients. Add shallot and garlic and cook 5 minutes. Add chicken broth, lemon juice and sugar. Stir to blend. Drop in the asparagus, turn up the heat and bring to a boil. Once at a boil, decrease heat to low and simmer uncovered until asparagus is just tender. Remove asparagus to a platter and pour the juice over it just before serving and top with black pepper. ; name: roasted asparagus with lemon ; ingredients: asparagus, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, lemon, zest of, salt & freshly ground black pepper, lemon ; preparation:Position a rack in the upper third of an oven and preheat to 450f. Snap off the tough stem ends from the asparagus spears and arrange the spears on a baking sheet. In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, garlic and lemon zest. Brush the asparagus evenly with the oil, turning the spears to coat well, and season generously with salt and pepper. Arrange the lemon wedges around the asparagus. Bake until the asparagus is tender and just turning golden, 6 to 8 minutes. Transfer the asparagus to a warmed serving platter and drizzle with the pan juices. ; name: asparagus with lemon butter ; ingredients: salt, fresh asparagus, butter, seasoned rice vinegar, lemon, zest of ; preparation:Heat salted water to a boil in a large saucepa. Add asparagus. Cook just until tender, about 5 minutes, depending on size. Drain well, shaking to remove all water. Transfer to a serving bowl. Lightly toss with butter, vinegar, lemon zest, and salt to taste. ; name: asparagus sauteed in butter and mustard ; ingredients: asparagus, butter, dijon mustard, fresh lemon juice, pepper ; preparation:Heat a large skillet over high heat. Add asparagus and cook for 1 minutes. Reduce heat to medium. Add the butter. Cook, stirring, until butter begins to brown, about 1 minute more. Combine mustard, lemon juice and pepper, and add to skillet. Cook, stirring occasionally, until asparagus is tender but still firm, 5-7 minutes. ; name: asparagus with lemon curd ; ingredients: asparagus spears, olive oil, lemon curd, garlic clove, gingerroot, coarse salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place cleaned asparagus spears in pan sprinkle with oil. Randomly place lemon curd on asparagus. Sprinkle garlic and ginger over the spear and season with salt and pepper. Roast for 20 minutes, tossing half way through. Give or take depends on the thickness of the spears. Be sure to serve with all the goodness from the pan. ; name: lemon asparagus 3 weight watchers points ; ingredients: fresh lemon juice, dijon mustard, olive oil, kosher salt, black pepper, asparagus, shallot ; preparation:

name: slow cooker garlic chicken with rosemary ; ingredients: roasting chickens, lemons, rosemary sprigs, paprika, salt, ground black pepper, garlic cloves, onions, celery ribs ; preparation:Place rosemary springs, 1 lemon half, celery, onion wedges, and 6 garlic cloves in cavity of chicken and tie legs together. Place chicken breast side up in 4-6 quart slow cooker. Squeeze remaining 3 lemon halves over chicken and sprinkle with salt, pepper, and paprika. Cover with lid and cook on high heat setting for 1 hour. Reduce heat to low, and cook six hours or until chicken is tender. Discard the rosemary and lemon half. Serve chicken with celery and onion. ; name: roast chicken with rosemary lemon salt ; ingredients: chicken, extra virgin olive oil, fresh rosemary, lemon, fresh lemon rind, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Rinse chicken inside and out and dry well. In a bowl, combine lemon zest, 1 tablespoon minced rosemary, salt and pepper and mix well.
