Marinate in refrigerator, turning the bag occasionally, for 2 hours. Remove pork and discard marinade. Sprinkle pork evenly with salt. Grill pork over indirect heat for about 20 minutes, or until internal temperature reaches 155. Let stand 10 minutes. Slice crosswise. For salsa, combine all ingredients in a medium bowl and toss gently. Serve immediately with the sliced pork. ; name: tasty baked chops and easy too ; ingredients: pork chops, eggs, barbecue sauce, italian breadcrumbs, garlic powder, fresh ground pepper, onion salt ; preparation:In a bowl, combine eggs and barbecue sauce until thoroughly mixed. Combine breadcrumbs, garlic powder, pepper and onion salt. Dip chops in egg mixture, turning to coat. Dredge in breadcrumb mixture to coat both sides. Place in a greased baking dish. Bake, uncovered at 325 degrees for one hour. Or, after baking, spray tops of chops with cooking spray and broil until crispy and golden brown. ; name: pan roasted pork chops ; ingredients: garlic powder, onion powder, black pepper, paprika, dry mustard, celery seeds, brown sugar, salt, pork rib chops, oil ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees. In a small bowl stir together all rub ingredients. Pat rub onto both sides of pork chops, using a total of 2 tbsp of rub. Heat large ovenproof skillet over medium-high heat until hot. Add oil, heat until hot. Add pork. Cook 2 minutes or until golden brown on one side. Turn pork chops. Place skillet in oven. Bake 6 to 8 minutes or until no longer pink in center. You can keep all purpose rub in a dry, dark place up to 3 months. ; name: grilled pork cutlets with maple chipotle glaze ; ingredients: maple syrup, chicken stock, dried chipotle powder, fresh thyme, cornstarch, water, pork cutlets, salt, pepper, canola oil ; preparation:Preheat your grill. In a small saucepan, bring the first four glaze ingredients to a boil. In a small jar, mix together the cornstarch and water. Put the lid on and shake vigorously. Pour the cornstarch slurry into the boiling glaze mixture and reduce to a simmer. Cook about 2 minutes until it becomes clear and thickens. Season the cutlets with salt and pepper and brush with a little oil. Grill cutlets 3 to 5 minutes per side, brushing glaze on while cooking. ; name: chipotle crusted pork tenderloins can sub chops ; ingredients: onion powder, garlic powder, dried chipotle powder, salt, brown sugar, pork tenderloin ; preparation:

name: bratwurst and onions ; ingredients: bratwurst, onion, minced garlic clove, butter, beer, salt, pepper ; preparation:In a skillet over medium heat saute the garlic and butter for approx one minute. Add in the onions, salt, pepper, and enough beer to cover the bottom of the pan. Cook the onions over medium heat until tender and caremelized. Remove the onions from the pan and place the bratwurst in the pan. Brown the bratwurst and cook. Once the bratwurst are cooked add the onions and remaining beer to the pan. Cook over medium heat until the beer has reduced to a thicker sauce with the onions. ; name: beer brats with onions and peppers ; ingredients: bratwursts, beer, onion, hot pepper, olive oil, hot dog bun, mustard ; preparation:Pour beer in large pot and bring to strong simmer. Pierce brats mul. Place in simmering beer. Simmer uncovered for 15 minutes. Meanwhile heat olive oil in skillet and saute onions until done. Stir in peppers. Remove brats from simmering pot and add to skillet with onions. Brown slightly, about 2-3 minutes. Can add some beer if needed for moisture. Serve brats, onions, peppers on rolls with mustard. ; name: midwestern style beer brats ; ingredients: bratwursts, lager beer, onions, olive oil, green pepper, red pepper, salt & freshly ground black pepper, hoagie rolls, mustard ; preparation:Begin by pricking the brats all over with a fork. Using a medium pot add the bratwurst, beer, and half the onions. Bring this to a simmer over a medium high heat for 15 minutes or until brats are firm and cooked through. Place brats on a plate and save some of the cooking liquid. In a large skillet heat oil over medium high heat. Add the rest of the onion and bell peppers and cook for about 15 minutes or until vegetables are soft, tossing pan occasionally. During the last 5 minutes of cooking add brats and lightly brown. If the vegetables are getting to dark add a few tablespoons of the bratwurst cooking liquid. Season to taste with salt and pepper. To serve place brat in bun spread with mustard and top with sauteed peppers and onions. ; name: bratwurst and sauerkraut skillet ; ingredients: bratwurst, vegetable oil, sauerkraut, onion, sugar, beer, hot dog buns, spicy brown mustard ; preparation:Brown sausages and onion slices in oil in a wide skillet. The sausages do not need to be cooked through at this stage, you just want to get some color on them. Add sauerkraut, sugar, and beer. Stir as best you can around the sausages. Bring to a slow boil, reduce heat, and simmer until sausages are cooked through. Spread buns or rolls with mustard, and add a sausage and a bit of the sauerkraut and onion to each. This is great accompanied by the same beer you cooked with. ; name: sausage peppers and onions ; ingredients: smoked sausage, sweet onion, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, mushrooms, salt & freshly ground black pepper, butter ; preparation:In a skillet over medium-high heat, add onions, mushrooms and sausage. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Saute until the onions are tender, but still firm. Add peppers and continue cooking until peppers are soft, but not mushy. Serve with a little butter mixed in if desired to add a little more richness to the dish. ; name: grilled brats ; ingredients: bratwursts, onions, green pepper, beer, buns ; preparation:Grill brats over hot coals browning on all sides. Remove from grill and place in large kettle or dutch oven,. Cover with beer, onions and pepper. Simmer at least 1 hour not over direct heat. The heat removes the alcohol from the beer. Brats may be simmered for several hours just add more beer if it gets too low. Serve hot on toasted buns, with the peppers and onion or the toppings of your choice. ; name: bratwurst bake ; ingredients: bratwursts, white onion, apple, garlic, coarse black pepper ; preparation:Rub the defrosted brats with the garlic and leave it stuck to the brats. Lay the brats in the bottom of a foil lined pan, leave enough foil on the sides to tent it over the brats later. Quarter the onion and apple and spread the pieces out over the brats. Sprinkle the pepper over the whole thing and seal the foil over the top. Bake in a 350 oven for an hour. ; name: bratwurst skillet ; ingredients: bratwurst, green bell peppers, red bell peppers, onions, paprika, caraway seed ; preparation:

name: soup with mixed pastas ; ingredients: reduced-sodium chicken broth, water, bay leaves, onion, carrot, garlic cloves, boneless chicken breast, olive oil, pasta ; preparation:In a large saucepan bring chicken broth and water to a boil. Add bay leaves, onions, carrot and garlic. Reduce heat and simmer uncovered 10 minutes. In a skillet cook and stir chicken in hot oil for 3 minutes or until cooked through. Add chicken, pastas, and sage to soup. Simmer, uncovered for 8 to 10 minutes or until larger pieces of pasta are tender but slightly firm. Remove the bay leaves. ; name: tomato pasta and spinach soup ; ingredients: minced garlic clove, oil, water, crushed tomatoes, chicken bouillon cubes, dried sage, shell pasta, frozen chopped spinach, white kidney beans, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In a 3-4 quart pot, heat garlic in oil until aromatic. Add water, tomatoes, chicken broth cubes, and sage and bring to a boil. Stir in pasta and cook, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes. Add spinach and cook, breaking up spinach as it thaws, 5 to 7 minutes longer until pasta is tender. Stir in rinsed and drained beans and heat 1 minute longer. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese if desired. ; name: chicken vegetable and bow tie soup ; ingredients: oil, celery, chicken broth, water, frozen broccoli carrots cauliflower mix, cooked chicken, bow tie pasta, poultry seasoning, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium high heat. Add celery and cook stirring 2-3 minutes. Add broth and water and bring to a boil. Add frozen vegetables. Return to boil. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well. Simmer about 30 minutes. ; name: cabbage and tomato chicken soup ; ingredients: chicken, cabbage, onion, tomatoes, carrots, garlic cloves, fresh chives, fresh basil, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cover chicken with water in a large pot. Cook 1 hour and remove chicken. Meanwhile, prepare remaining ingredients, and add to pot after removing chicken, and cook for 1 hour. Meanwhile, place chicken in baking dish and roast it in a 350 f oven for 30 minutes. After roasting, let chicken cool for 10 minutes before removing meat from the carcass and adding the meat to the soup pot. Simmer until the meat is heated through, and serve. ; name: chicken and tomato soup ; ingredients: water, chicken bouillon cubes, diced onion, carrot, celery, diced tomatoes, garlic clove, salt & pepper, chicken breast, noodles ; preparation:8 cups of water. Dice carrot, celery, onion add to water. Then add can of tomatoes, salt & pepper, garlic cloves. Bring to boil and let simmer for an hour, then add noodles and chicken. Simmer till chicken is not longer pink and noodles are done. ; name: peas and pasta soup ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, carrot, chicken stock, small shell pasta, frozen green peas, parmigiano ; preparation:In a large saucepan, heat oil at medium heat. Add onion, garlic and carrot. Cook, stirring often, for about 5 minutes or until onion has softened. Add stock and pasta. Bring to boil. Reduce heat to low and let simmer for 8 minutes. Add small peas and bring to boil again. Reduce the heat to low and let simmer 3 minutes. When ready to serve, sprinkle each serving with parmigiano. ; name: easy chicken and veggie soup ; ingredients: oil, boneless skinless chicken breast, fresh mushrooms, onion, chicken broth, worcestershire sauce, frozen italian-style vegetables with pasta ; preparation:Heat oil in dutch oven over medium-high heat until hot. Add chicken, mushrooms and onion. Cook and stir 4 to 5 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink. Add broth and worcestershire sauce. Mix well. Bring to a boil, reduce heat. Stir in vegetables with pasta. Simmer 8 to 10 minutes or until thoroughly heated. ; name: chicken vegetables and pasta soup ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, olive oil, onion, carrots, cauliflower florets, low-sodium low-fat chicken broth, dried herbs, pasta, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: lentils with onions ; ingredients: vegetable oil, cinnamon stick, bay leaves, cumin seed, onion, lentils, ground turmeric, salt, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in medium sized pan. Add cinnamon stick, bay leaves and cumin seeds and stir until bay leaves darken a little. Add onion, fry 7-8 minutes until browned. Add lentils, 750ml water, turmeric, salt, and cayenne pepper. Stir and bring to a simmer. Cover, turn heat to low and cook 45 minutes to an hour, stirring every so often until lentils are tender. Add water if mixture seems too dry. ; name: lentils with onion and garlic ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, dried red chili, green lentil, water ; preparation:Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onion until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top. ; name: lentils with spinach ; ingredients: spinach, onion, vegetable oil, garlic cloves, lentils, salt, ground cumin, pepper ; preparation:Cut onion in half lengthwise and then cut the halves into fine half rings. Heat oil over medium flame. When hot, put in onion and garlic. Stir and saute for 2 minutes. Put in lentils and 3 cups of water. Bring to a boil. Cover, lower heat, and simmer about 25 minutes or until lentils are just tender. Defrost spinach and add spinach, salt, and cumin to the lentils. Simmer 10 minutes. Add pepper. Serve. ; name: lemony lentils and spinach ; ingredients: french lentils, water, onion, olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh cilantro, frozen chopped spinach, potatoes, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:Bring water & lentils to a boil in a large heavy pot. Reduce heat, cover & simmer 20 minutes. Meanwhile, saute the onion in a large pot in oil. Stir in garlic, cilantro, and spinach and saut 5 minutes, stirring frequently. Add potatoes and lentils with cooking liquid to cover. Season with salt and pepper. Bring to boil, reduce heat to simmer. Cook 20 minutes. Stir in lemon juice. Serve immediately or when cooled or chilled as desired. ; name: braised lentils ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, carrot, celery, green lentils, chicken broth ; preparation:Saute the veggies for 5 minutes. Add lentils and stir one minute. Add stock and bring to a boil. Reduce and cook for 35 minutes. Add salt and pepper for seasoning. ; name: lentils couscous recipe ; ingredients: lentils, couscous, onions, olive oil, water, salt, black pepper, cumin, cayenne ; preparation:Saute onions with olive oil until golden brown. Reserve 4 tablespoons of browned onions for garnish. Meanwhile place lentils, water salt, and black pepper in a different saucepan and cook for around 20 minutes or until lentils are tender. Add couscous, browned onions, cumin, and dash of cayenne to the lentils, stir, cover and simmer for about 5-10 minutes or until water is absorbed. Place lentils and couscous in serving dish and garnish with 4 tablespoons of reserved browned onions. This recipe is best when served with tomatoe salad. See my recipe for tomatoe salad. ; name: lentils with rice and potato ; ingredients: red lentil, basmati rice, potato, oil, cloves, cumin seed, onion, turmeric, salt, water ; preparation:Place lentils in a bowl and cover with cold water, allow to stand for 15 minutes wash the lentils in running water till the water runs clear. Heat the oil in a large pan and fry the cloves and cumin seeds for 2 minutes. Add the onion and potato, stir and fry for 5 minutes. Add the lentils, rice, turmeric and salt and fry for 3 minutes. Add the water, bring to the boil, cover the pan, reduce the heat and simmer for 15 minutes. Turn off the heat, leave the lid on the pan and let it stand for 10 minutes. Serve with any curry dish. ; name: green lentils with garlic onion madhur jaffrey ; ingredients: vegetable oil, whole cumin seed, garlic cloves, onion, green lentil, water, salt, cayenne ; preparation:

name: macaroni ham salad ; ingredients: cooked macaroni, cheddar cheese, salad oil, vinegar, onion, cooked ham, frozen green pea, celery, pepper, mayonnaise ; preparation:After the macaroni is cooked, while it is still hot, and has been drained, drizzle with oil and vinegar. Add onion pepper, and cheese. Toss with peas, ham and celery. Stir in mayo. Serve on lettuce if you prefer. ; name: danish macaroni salad with ham ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, hard-boiled eggs, dry mustard, salt, mayonnaise, sour cream, pimiento, ham, fresh parsley ; preparation:Cook the macaroni al dente as directed on the package. Drain well and set aside to cool. In a salad bowl mash the yolks of two of the eggs, reserving the egg whites for another use. Add the mustard and salt to the yolks. Gradually mix in the mayonnaise, the fold in the sour cream. Add the pimiento, ham and cooled macaroni, toss gently but thoroughly. Taste and adjust the seasoning. Cover and chill at least one hour. Slice the remaining 2 eggs into rounds. Place the eggs rounds decoratively on the top of the salad and sprinkle with the parsley or dill. ; name: apple walnut salad ; ingredients: apples, walnut halves, lemon, juice of, fresh lemon zest, mayonnaise, mint leaf, honey ; preparation:Mix together apples, lemon juice, mint leaves and walnuts. In a separate bowl, mix mayonnaise and honey, then pour over apple mixture and toss. Refrigerate for 1 hour, then remove. Serve cold or at room temperature. Garnish with mint sprigs. ; name: ham and hot fruit salad ; ingredients: ham steaks, pineapple, apricot halves, pear halves in natural juice, peach halves in syrup, butter, curry powder, brown sugar, cornstarch ; preparation:Place ham steaks in a casserole dish. Combine all the drained fruits and pour over the ham steaks. Melt the butter and curry powder together until bubbly and add the brown sugar and corn starch. Drizzle this evenly over the ham and fruit. Cover with foil and bake at 350f for 1 hour. The ham steaks can be omitted and the fruit used as a hot fruit salad on its own. ; name: apple cheese salad ; ingredients: red apples, fresh lemon juice, celery, swiss cheese, mayonnaise, prepared mustard, salt and pepper, lettuce leaf, filberts ; preparation:Put apples in a serving dish. Sprinkle with lemon juice. Add celery and cheese. Mix mayonnaise and mustard. Season with salt and pepper. Add to apple mixture. Refrigerate 1 hour to blend flavors. Serve in lettuce cups sprinkled with nuts. ; name: scandinavian apple salad ; ingredients: half-and-half, lemon juice, honey, cinnamon, tart apples ; preparation:Combine all ingredients. Pour sauce over apples. Toss slightly. Refrigerate to chill. Sprinkle with additional cinnamon before servings, if desired. ; name: broccoli salad with ham ; ingredients: broccoli, ham, cheddar cheese, onion, miracle whip, fresh lemon juice, ground black pepper ; preparation:Clean broccoli and cut into bite-size pieces. Place broccoli in large bowl along with chopped ham, cheese and onion. In small bowl, mix together miracle whip, lemon juice and pepper. Add to broccoli mixture and stir to coat. Refrigerate until ready to use. Stir again before serving. ; name: honeydew ham salad ; ingredients: macaroni, ham, celery, red onion, mayonnaise, lime juice, honey, fresh cilantro, honeydew melon ; preparation:

name: ham broccoli rolls ; ingredients: broccoli stems, deli ham, butter, all-purpose flour, dry mustard, milk, salt, pepper, sharp cheddar cheese, paprika ; preparation:Center 1 broccoli spear a short edge of each ham slice. Roll broccoli spear in ham slice tightly. Place rolls in a 12x8 inch baking dish, seam side down. Melt butter in a heavy saucepan over low heat. Add flour& mustard, stirring until smooth. Cook 1 minute stirring constantly, gradually adding milk. Cook over medium heat, stirring until thickened& bubbly. Add salt, pepper and cheese, stirring until cheese melts. Pour sauce over ham rolls, sprinkle with paprika. Bake at 450 degrees for 10 minutes or until bubbly. ; name: ham and spinach rolls ; ingredients: frozen spinach, cornbread stuffing mix, sour cream, boiled ham, butter, flour, milk, sharp cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine spinach, very well drained, stuffing, sour cream. Spread mixture on ham slices and roll up with seam side down in baking dish. Melt butter in saucepan. Add flour and blend well. Add milk and continue to stir over medium heat until thick. Add cheddar cheese and remove from heat. Stir until cheese is melted. Pour sauce over ham rolls and sprinkle with parmesan cheese and paprika, if desired. Cover with foil. Bake 20 minutes covered and 20 minutes uncovered. ; name: ham and cheese chicken sandwich ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, seasoning salt, dried parsley flakes, teriyaki sauce, honey-roasted ham, swiss cheese, sandwich buns, dijon mustard, lettuce leaf ; preparation:Flatten each piece of chicken slightly, using a meat mallet or rolling pin. Sprinkle the chicken with salt and parsley flakes. Place in a shallow dish. Pour the teriyaki sauce over the chicken, turning to coat. Cover the chicken and chill 1 hour. Drain the chicken. Place a folded ham slice and a folded cheese slice on each chicken breast. Fold the breast in half, and secure with a wooden toothpick. Cook the chicken, covered with the grill lid, over medium-hot coals for 10 to 15 minutes or until the chicken is done, turning once. Remove the wooden toothpicks, and place the chicken on the bottom half of each bun with mustard and lettuce. Cover with the tops of the buns. ; name: breakfast egg roll ; ingredients: oil, egg, salt, shredded cheddar cheese, deli ham ; preparation:Heat oil in a six-inch non-stick skillet over medium heat. While oil is heating, beat egg in a small bowl and add salt or other seasoning. Pour egg mixture in the skillet and let cook until almost set, about 2-3 minutes. Flip and finish cooking the other side - about 1 minute and remove to a plate. Sprinkle with shredded cheese. Heat meat on both sides. Place meat on top of cheese and roll up like a burrito. ; name: mediterranean vegetable and chicken sandwich wrap ; ingredients: tortilla, hummus, deli chicken, baby spinach, marinated artichoke hearts, roasted sweet red peppers ; preparation:Spread hummus over the tortilla. Place the slices of chicken down the middle of the tortilla so that the ends of each slice overlap. Arrange the spinach leaves over the chicken. Top with the artichokes and red peppers. Fold over the sides of the tortilla and roll up as you would any other wrap. Cut in half and serve. ; name: vegetarian spinach cheese and sausage casserole ; ingredients: low fat cottage cheese, frozen spinach, mozzarella cheese, soy sausage, green onion, eggs, salt and pepper ; preparation:Thoroughly mix all ingredients. Pour mixture into a greased 9 inch pie plate. Bake at 350 for about 40 minutes or until center is set. Once out of the oven, i usually let it sit for 5 or 10 minutes. To serve, either cut into wedges, or squares, depending on what type of dish you used. ; name: spinach and cheese casserole ; ingredients: frozen spinach, onion, garlic cloves, butter, eggs, cottage cheese, flour, sharp cheddar cheese, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Drain spinach well. Saute onion and garlic in 2 tbsp of the melted butter until onion is translucent. Mix spinach with the eggs, cottage cheese, cheddar cheese, flour, and the remaining butter. Add the sauteed onions and garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into prepared dish and bake for 1 hour. ; name: chicken rollatini with cheese ham spinach ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, deli ham, baby spinach leaves, goat cheese, dijon mustard, seasoned bread crumbs, extra virgin olive oil, salt, pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: easy elegant chicken and sherry ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, sliced mushrooms, sherry wine, paprika ; preparation:Place chicken breasts in casserole dish. Mix together soup, sour cream, mushrooms and sherry. Pour over chicken. Sprinkle with paprika. Bake 1 hour and 10 minutes at 350 degrees. Serve with rice. ; name: sauteed chicken breasts with lemon and sherry ; ingredients: chicken breasts, butter, fresh mushrooms, scallion, lemon, sherry wine, salt and pepper ; preparation:Season the chicken with salt and pepper to taste. Saute chicken in the butter in a skillet. Remove onto a plate when cooked through on both sides. Saute the mushrooms and scallions in the same pan using the butter that remains. Add the juice from one of the lemon halves and cut the other lemon half into thin slices of lemon and and add those to the pan and stir. Add the sherry and stir and simmer 1-2 minutes. Pour over the chicken and serve. ; name: chicken with orange juice and fresh herbs ; ingredients: chicken breasts, orange juice, honey, dry sherry, lemon juice, fresh herbs, salt ; preparation:Rinse chicken breasts and pat dry. Place on a lightly oiled grill over medium hot coals and cook for about 5 minutes per side or until cooked through. While chicken is cooking, combine all remaining ingredients in a small saucepan. Cook over medium heat until mixture is reduced and slightly thickened. Transfer chicken to a platter and pour sauce over top. ; name: drunken chicken ii ; ingredients: water, chicken breast, ginger, scallion, salt, sherry wine, cilantro ; preparation:Bring water to boil, then add chicken breast, ginger, scallion and salt. Boil 15 minutes. Remove to bowl. Debone chicken while warm. Remove ginger and scallion and discard. Place chicken and its stock in container. Add sherry. Cover and refrigerate 1-5 days. When ready to serve, cut chicken into 1-inch pieces. Arrange on platter. Pour jellied liquid over chicken and decorate with cilantro. Serve cold. ; name: chicken in wine ; ingredients: chicken, onion, garlic cloves, mushrooms, tomatoes, dry white wine, balsamic vinegar, dried thyme, salt, pepper ; preparation:Use some cooking spray in a non-stick skillet, and brown chicken pieces until brown on both sides - about 6 - 8 minutes. Transfer chicken to a 13 x 9 baking pan. Place onion and garlic in the same skillet and cook, stirring, until onion is translucent - about 2 minutes. Add mushrooms, and cook another minute. Stir in the remaining ingredients, and cook another minute. Pour vegetable mixture evenly over the chicken. Cover with foil and bake at 350 f for 25 minutes. Remove foil and bake an additional 15 minutes, or until the chicken is thoroughly cooked. ; name: sherry s chicken ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, swiss cheese, cream of chicken and broccoli soup, sherry wine, herb stuffing mix ; preparation:Place chicken in pan. Sprinkle cheese on top of chicken. Combine soup and sherry, and pour on top of cheese. Sprinkle stuffing mix over top. Cover with tinfoil. Bake 350 degrees for 1 hour, till chicken is tender. Remove tinfoil during the last 15 minutes of baking. ; name: chicken in the limelight ; ingredients: chicken, salt, olive oil, chicken broth, flour, paprika, brown sugar, dry white wine, lime ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Grate lime peel and set it aside. Squeeze lime juice over chicken and shake chicken in flour salt and paprika. Brown chicken in olive oil. Arrange in single layer in baking dish. Combine lime peel and brown sugar and sprinkle mixture over the chicken. Add wine and broth. Cover and bake until tender 40-45 minutes. ; name: tapas chicken with sherry pechuga de pollo con jerez ; ingredients: flour, chicken breast, olive oil, salt and pepper, fresh thyme, green olives, sherry wine ; preparation:

name: gnocchi with red pepper rosemary sauce ; ingredients: red pepper, onion, extra virgin olive oil, garlic clove, rosemary, zucchini, salt & freshly ground black pepper, gnocchi, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Halve pepper, remove core, seeds and white membranes, then chop fresh finely. Put pepper in a medium frying pan with onion and oil. Cook over a low to medium heat for 15 minutes, stirring often, until very tender. Blend in the garlic, rosemary and zucchini and cook for a further 5 minutes, or until tender. Season with salt and pepper. Cook gnocchi in gently boiling water until they bob up to the surface and stay there. Carefully drain them then put them in the pan with the sauce and toss gently. Fold through the grated parmesan cheese. Serve in the pan or transfer to a heated serving bowl. Serve with extra parmesan cheese. ; name: baked gnocchi ; ingredients: gnocchi, olive oil, garlic cloves, frozen spinach, diced tomatoes, italian seasoning, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese, sliced mushrooms ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 grease lagrge casserole dish. Cook gnocchi according to directions. Drain. Heat oil in large skillet. Add garlic, cook 30 sec. Add tomatoes and seasoning. Cook and stir 5 minutes. Add gnocchi to spinach mixture in skillet, stir gently. Transfer gnocchi mixture to prepared casserole dish. Sprinkle with cheeses. Bake 20-30 minutes or until bubbly and sheese is melted. Enjoy. ; name: sauteed gnocchi ; ingredients: gnocchi, butter, garlic cloves, salt, pepper, romano cheese, fresh parsley ; preparation:Cook gnocchi according to directions on package. Drain. Melt butter in saut pan. Add gnocchi and minced garlic. Cook 3-4 minutes or until golden brown, turning constantly. Stir in salt and pepper during last 2 minutes. Toss with romano cheese, top with parsley. ; name: gnocchi with broad beans and tomato ; ingredients: broad beans, olive oil, garlic cloves, diced tomatoes, gnocchi, basil, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook broad beans according to pack. Drain, refresh and slip beans out of their tough outer skin and set aside. Heat oil in pot and fry garlic for a minute or 2. Add tomatoes, cook further 2 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in beans. Cook gnocchi in boiling water according to instructions on pack. Drain and toss with sauce, season well and serve. Top with chopped basil and shaved parmesan. ; name: gnocchi with zucchini ribbons basil brown butter ; ingredients: gnocchi, butter, shallots, zucchini, cherry tomatoes, salt, nutmeg, fresh ground pepper, parmesan cheese, fresh basil ; preparation:Bring a large saucepan of water to a boil. Cook gnocchi according to package instructions until they float, 3 to 5 minutes. Drain. Meanwhile, melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook until the butter is beginning to brown, about 2 minutes. Add shallots and zucchini and cook, stirring often, until softened, 2 to 3 minutes. Add cherry tomatoes, salt, nutmeg and pepper and continue cooking, stirring often, until the tomatoes are just starting to break down, 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in parmesan and parsley. Add gnocchi and toss to coat. Serve immediately. ; name: gnocchi ; ingredients: mashed potatoes, flour, olive oil, salt, pepper, italian seasoning, garlic powder, onion salt ; preparation:In large bowl, combine all ingredients and mix into a soft dough. Turn dough out onto a floured surface and knead 20 times. Divide dough into fourths and roll each quarter into a 12 inch long rope. Cut each rope into inch pieces, and set on a floured surface. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Roll each piece of dough across the tines of a fork to get groves on it and drop it into the pot of water. Cook gnocchi until it floats to the top. Drain and serve. ; name: skillet zucchini with italian cheeses ; ingredients: zucchini, onion, olive oil, garlic salt, dried oregano, red pepper flakes, tomato sauce, parmesan cheese, provolone cheese ; preparation:Cut zucchini in half length-wise. In large skillet, cook onion in hot oil until tender, but not brown. Add zucchini halves, cut side up, sprinkle with salt, oregano and red pepper flakes. Top with tomato sauce, cover and cook just until tender, about 10 minutes. Sprinkle zucchini with parmesan cheese, top with provolone cheese slices cover and cook until the cheese begins to melt. ; name: gnocchi with cheese prosciutto and basil ; ingredients: gnocchi, garlic, fresh basil, fontina cheese, parmesan cheese, prosciutto, olive oil, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: baked pork chops with apples ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, apples, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, butter, salt, pepper, cranberry juice ; preparation:Sear pork chops, 2 minutes per side. Reserve. Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Arrange apple slices in the bottom of a prepared 9x12 baking dish. Sprinkle with brown sugar and cinnamon. Dot with butter. Top apples with seared pork chops. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Pour cranberry juice over all and cover. Bake for 1 hour. Make sure pork reaches an internal temperature of 160 degrees f. ; name: apple pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, apple, butter, brown sugar ; preparation:Season chops with salt and pepper. Bake, covered, at 350 for 25 minutes. Uncover chops and put apple pieces over each one. Dot with butter and sprinkle with brown sugar. Bake, uncovered, another 15-20 minutes more, depending on the size of your pork chops. ; name: cinnamon apple pork chops recipe ; ingredients: boneless pork loin chops, reduced-fat butter, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, salt, tart apples, pecans ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium heat, cook pork chops in 1 tablespoon butter for 4-5 minutes on each side or until a meat thermometer reads 160. Meanwhile, in a small bowl, combine the brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg and salt. Remove chops and keep warm. Add the apples, pecans, brown sugar mixture and remaining butter to the pan. Cook and stir until apples are tender. Serve with chops. ; name: apple onion pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, curry powder, margarine, onions, ground cinnamon, tart apples, apple juice ; preparation:Lay pork chops on platter and season with salt and pepper if desired, than curry powder. In large skillet over medium high heat melt butter spread. Add chops and cook for approximately 8 minutes or until desired doneness, turning occasionally. Remove and set aside. Using same skillet cook onions over medium heat for approximately 7 minutes or until golden brown. Stirring occasionally, add apples and cinnamon. Cook approximately 4 minutes or until apples are tender. Pour in apple juice and scrape brown bits from bottom of the skillet cooking an additional 2 minutes. Pour sauce over pork chops and serve immediately. ; name: pork chops with applesauce ; ingredients: pork chops, garlic powder, salt and pepper, cooking oil, applesauce, white wine, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:Season pork chops with garlic, salt and pepper. In heavy skillet, brown chops in small amount of cooking oil. Mix remaining ingredients while chops are browning. Place chops, single-layer, in shallow baking dish. Spoon half of applesauce mixture evenly over chops. Bake in preheated 350 oven for 20 minutes. Turn chops and evenly spoon remaining applesauce mixture over them. Bake for 20-30 more minutes. ; name: cinnamon baked apples ; ingredients: cooking apples, raisins, honey, ground cinnamon, butter ; preparation:Core the apples and pare a 1-inch strip of skin from around the middle of each to prevent splitting. Place the apples in two 10-oz custard cups. Pack the raisins into the apples. Mix the honey and cinnamon, pour over the raisins and into the apples. Top with butter. Cover tightly and microwave on high until tender when pierced with a fork, 3 to 4 minutes. If you prefer, they can also be baked at 375f for 30 minutes. Serve warm with cream, if desired. ; name: glazed pork chops and apple bake ; ingredients: pork steaks, salt & pepper, apples, water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350. Spray a pan large enough to hold the chops in a single layer with non-stick spray. Season the pork steaks or chops with salt& pepper. Arrange them in single layer in the prepared pan. Cover and bake for 30 minutes. Remove the chops from the pan and pour off the fat. Place the apples in the pan and top with the baked chops. Combine the water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce and lemon juice, and pour over the pork and apples. Bake uncovered, basting occasionally, for 45 minutes or until pork is tender. ; name: apples and cinnamon pork chop bake ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, cinnamon, margarine, apples, brown sugar ; preparation:

name: yummy cilantro rice ; ingredients: fresh cilantro, canola oil, long grain rice, minced garlic cloves, chicken stock, onion, salt ; preparation:Combine the cilantro and stock in a blender and mix to a smooth puree. Heat the oil in a large heavy saucepan. Add the onion and cook voer medium heat for two minutes, stirring with a wooden spoon. Add the garlic and cook until the onion is soft but not brown, stirring occasionally, 2 minutes more. Add the rice and cook until the grains are shiny and aromatic. Add the cilantro stock mixture and salt and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to low. Cover and cook until the rice is tender, 20 minutes. Remove the pan from the heat. Remove the lid, drape with a dish cloth over the rice and replace the lid. Let the rice stand for 5 minutes or until the liquid is absorbed. Fluff the rice with a fork and serve. ; name: greens fried rice ; ingredients: cooked rice, fresh spinach, frozen peas, green onion, carrot, garlic cloves, soy sauce, sesame oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a medium-hot wok, add oil, garlic and carrots. Saute for 1-2 minutes or until carrots are semi-soft. Add soy sauce and rice to wok. As you fry the rice, add first the peas, then spinach and then the green onion at 1-2 minute intervals. Serve immediately. ; name: cilantro and lime rice ; ingredients: olive oil, long grain white rice, low sodium chicken broth, salt, lime, juice and zest of, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat, add rice, stirring to coat. Add broth and salt, increase heat to a boil, stir once. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover and cook 20 minutes. Remove from heat and let stand 10 minutes. Fluff rice with a fork and stir in lime rind and juice and cilantro. ; name: two chile green rice ; ingredients: long-grain rice, olive oil, green onions, serrano pepper, lime, juice of, chili powder, oregano, cilantro, water, salt ; preparation:Saute green onions and serrano peppers 2 minutes in olive oil. Add the rice and saute another 2 to 3 minutes. Add lime juice, chile powder and oregano and continue sauteeing another minute or so. Pour in water, add cilantro, bring to a boil then reduce heat, cover and simmer on very low heat for 15 minutes or until rice is done. Salt to taste. ; name: green poblano rice ; ingredients: vegetable broth, poblano peppers, jalapeno peppers, cilantro, kosher salt, oil, long grain rice, onion, garlic ; preparation:Place chopped peppers and broth into a saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 10-12 minutes, or until peppers are tender. Allow mixture to cool, then puree in a blender along with cilantro and salt. Place onion and rice into a saucepan with the oil, and cook, stirring, until rice is opaque and onions are tender. Add garlic and cook briefly, until it becomes fragrant. Stir in broth mixture from the blender. Bring to a boil, then cover, reduce heat, and cook for 15-20 minutes or until rice is tender and liquid has been absorbed. Allow to sit with the pan lid on away from heat for 12-15 minutes, then fluff with a fork and serve. ; name: garlic rice ; ingredients: unsalted butter, garlic, long grain rice, chicken stock, salt & pepper ; preparation:Heat the butter in a heavy saucepan and add the garlic. Stir then add the rice. Cook, stirring constantly, until all the butter has been absorbed, taking care not to let the rice brown. Add the stock, season to taste, cover, bring to the boil then reduce the heat as low as possible. Cook for 20 to 30 minutes until the rice is tender and all the liquid has been absorbed. ; name: cilantro garlic lime rice ; ingredients: minute rice, chicken broth, limeade, garlic, dried cilantro ; preparation:Bring liquids to a boil. Stir in rice, garlic, and cilantro. Cover and remove from heat. Let stand five minutes or until liquids are absorbed. Fluff with fork and serve. ; name: quick green rice ww ; ingredients: canola oil, fresh snow peas, garlic clove, cooked brown rice, fresh cilantro ; preparation:

name: granny erma s chocolate gravy ; ingredients: water, whole milk, sugar, self-rising flour, cocoa, vanilla, butter ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine sugar, self-rising flour, and cocoa. Mix well, until all lumps are gone. Set aside. In a saucepan, combine water and milk. On medium-high heat, bring to a boil. Slightly reduce heat. With a wire whisk, stir in sugar-flour-cocoa mixture. Stir until thickened. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla and butter. Serve immediately over hot biscuits. ; name: mom s chocolate cupcakes ; ingredients: flour, granulated sugar, baking soda, salt, cocoa powder, oil, water, vanilla extract, vinegar ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together until moist and well blended. Put in cupcake cups and bake for 20-25 minutes at 350 degrees f. Frost with your favorite icing. To make a layer cake, double the recipes and put in 2 round cake pans. Increase baking time to about 35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. ; name: mama s brownies ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, margarine, cocoa, sugar, eggs, vanilla, nuts ; preparation:Sift the flour and baking powder into a small bowl and set aside. Melt the margarine in a saucepan and add the cocoa. Heat for a minute on very low heat being careful not to burn. Remove from heat add sugar, flour and baking powder. Blend well then add eggs. Mix well add nuts. Pour into a greased 8x8 pan. Bake 350 for 20-30 minutes. ; name: mom s chocolate cake ; ingredients: butter, crisco, water, cocoa, sugar, flour, eggs, vanilla, buttermilk, baking soda ; preparation:Boil butter, crisco, and water in a sauce pan. Pour mixture over sugar, flour, and cocoa. Mix well but do not beat. Stir in remaining ingredients and pour into greased 9x13 pan. Bake for 20 minutes at 400f. ; name: mom s soft chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, baking soda, warm water, salt, flour, chocolate chips ; preparation:Cream together the butter & both sugars. Add the remaining ingredients except chocolate chip. Mix well. Mix in chocolate chips. Drop onto parchment-lined cookie sheets. Bake at 350 for about 10 minutes or until golden. ; name: nana s chocolate frosting ; ingredients: unsweetened chocolate, butter, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla ; preparation:Combine chocolate and butter in large saucepan. Cook over low heat until melted. Stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Cool. Sift sugar. Add to chocolate alternately with milk and vanilla. Beat at high speed until of spreading consistency. ; name: mom s lemon bars ; ingredients: flour, butter, shortening, powdered sugar, sugar, eggs, lemon juice ; preparation:Mix the first 4 ingredients and press into the bottom of a 9x13 pan. Bake at 350f for 20 minutes. Mix the next 4 ingredients, my mom always uses a little more lemon juice than is called for. Remove pan from oven and pour filling over the top. Bake for 25 more minutes or until they start to brown at the edges. Sprinkle with powdered sugar when they come out of the oven, cool. Cut into squares and serve. ; name: mom s chocolate gravy ; ingredients: granulated sugar, butter, milk, flour, unsweetened cocoa powder ; preparation:

name: raspberry granita ; ingredients: fresh raspberry, lemon, sugar, water, mint leaf ; preparation:Combine sugar and water and bring to the boil. Simmer 5 minutes to make a syrup. Allow to cool. Combine berry puree with lemon juice and syrup. Place in a metal bowl or tray. Freeze till set. ; name: banana nut granola ; ingredients: dates, water, bananas, vanilla, salt, rolled oats, nuts ; preparation:Bring water and dates to a boil in a covered saucepan. Remove from heat. Let stand 5 minutes, then blend in blender with all but oats and seeds or coconut. Stir all ingredients together. Spread on two cookie sheets. Bake at 225 degrees for 2 hours, stirring. Put in a air tight container until ready to use. ; name: coconut buttermilk granita ; ingredients: coconut milk, fresh ginger, sugar, buttermilk ; preparation:Heat coconut milk and ginger until hot but not boiling. Take off heat, cover. And let stand 15 minutes. Add sugar and boil, stirring until sugar is dissolved. Take off heat again and add buttermilk. Strain into a casserole dish and freeze about two hours, then fluff with a fork and freeze for another hour. Serve with mango slices and lime wedges. ; name: yogurt fruit and granola parfait ; ingredients: vanilla yogurt, fresh fruit, granola cereal, mint ; preparation:Layer bottom of a clear glass with fruit. Add layer of yogurt. Add another layer of fruit. Add last layer of yogurt. Sprinkle with granola. Garnish with a sprig of mint. ; name: apple mint granita ; ingredients: unsweetened apple juice, mint leaves, unsweetened applesauce, sugar, lemon juice, salt ; preparation:Mix apple juice and mint leaves and allow to combine overnight in refrigerator. Strain mint leaves out of apple juice. Place a shallow metal pan in freezer. In a nonreactive saucepan, combine applesauce, mint flavored apple juice, sugar, lemon juice and salt. Bring to a boil, then simmer uncovered about 20 minutes. Cool to room temperature. Pour apple mixture into chilled pan. Return to freezer. Stir every 20 minutes until it thickens into coarse crystals, about 1 hour. Stir granita and mound into small cups. Serve immediately. ; name: sunshine morning granola ; ingredients: quaker oats, honey, pecans, vegetable oil, orange peel, vanilla, ground cinnamon, salt, dried mixed fruit ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Combine all ingredients except dried fruit in large bowl. Mix well. Spread evenly in 15 x 10-inch jelly roll pan or 13 x 9-inch baking pan. Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until golden brown, stirring once after 10 minutes. Cool completely in pan. Stir in dried fruit. Store tightly covered up to 5 days. ; name: sugar free granola ; ingredients: oats, flax seed meal, almonds, vegetable oil, honey, vanilla extract, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl mix dry ingredients. Combine honey, oil and vanilla extract in separate bowl. Pour honey mixture over oat mixture while stirring. Wet hands and press the mixture onto a greased pan, or use parchment paper. Bake for 10 minute. Remove from oven, break up mixture and stir. Bake for 5 minute. Allow to cool completely, then store in an airtight container. ; name: summertime soy granita ; ingredients: sugar, water, vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, vanilla-flavored soymilk, slivered almonds, mint sprig ; preparation:

name: cornbread ww core ; ingredients: yellow cornmeal, baking powder, baking soda, salt, splenda granular, fat free sugar free yogurt, nonfat sour cream, egg ; preparation:Mix dry ingredients in a medium bowl. Mix liquid ingredients in a small bowl. Gently fold the wet into the dry. Pour into a round cake pan, sprayed with pam. Bake at 375 degrees for 15-20 minutes or until the edges are a golden brown and a toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cut into 6 wedges. ; name: rich cornbread ; ingredients: butter, cornmeal, flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, yogurt, egg, honey ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Grease an 8-in square pan with butter. In a medium bowl combine the dry ingredients. In another bowl combine the wet ingredients. Stir the wet ingredients into the dry, mixing only enough to thoroughly combine. Spread into the prepared pan. Bake for 20 minutes, or until the center is firm to the touch. Serve at any temperature. ; name: homemade cornbread ; ingredients: flour, yellow cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, salt, eggs, milk, canola oil ; preparation:Stir together flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, and salt. Add eggs, milk, and oil. Stir just until smooth. Turn into a greased 9x9 baking pan. Bake for 20-25 minutes in a 425f oven. ; name: low fat cornbread ; ingredients: flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking soda, salt, plain nonfat yogurt, eggs, whole kernel corn, jalapeno pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. In a medium mixing bowl, combine dry ingredients. Stir in yogurt and eggs. If using stir in corn and jalapeno peppers. Pour into 8 inch square pan sprayed with cooking spray. Bake for approximately 20 minutes. Best served warm. ; name: cornbread with corn ; ingredients: cornmeal, all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, baking soda, low-fat milk, eggs, butter, corn ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f coat 9x9 inch baking pan with cooking spray. Combine cornmeal, flour, sugar, baking powder, salt and baking soda in medium bowl. Whisk together milk, egg, and butter in separate bowl. Stir milk mixture into cornmeal mixture, then fold in corn. Spread in prepared pan. Bake 25 to 30 minutes, or until sides begin to brown and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool on rack before slicing and serving. ; name: good eats creamed corn cornbread alton brown ; ingredients: yellow cornmeal, kosher salt, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, buttermilk, eggs, creamed corn, canola oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f place a 10-inch cast iron skillet into the oven. In a bowl, combine the cornmeal, salt, sugar, baking powder, and baking soda. Whisk together to combine well. In a large bowl, combine the buttermilk, eggs, and creamed corn, whisking together to combine thoroughly. Add the dry ingredients to the buttermilk mixture and stir to combine. If the batter will not pour, add more buttermilk to the batter. Add 2 tablespoons canola oil to the cast iron skillet. Pour the batter into the skillet. Bake until the cornbread is golden brown and springs back upon the touch, about 20 minutes. ; name: excellent and healthy cornbread ; ingredients: unbleached flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking soda, salt, nonfat yogurt, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degees. Combine flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking soda, and salt. Stir in yogurt and eggs lightly until well-blended. Pour batter into 8x8 pan. Bake for 20-25 minutes. ; name: iron chef cornbread ; ingredients: yellow cornmeal, baking powder, salt, baking soda, eggs, creamed corn, canola oil, plain fat-free yogurt ; preparation:

name: bunches of bananas bread ; ingredients: bananas, sugar substitute, vanilla, all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon ; preparation:In one bowl, mash the bananas until smooth and add the sugar and vanilla, blending until incorporated. In another bowl, mix the dry ingredients until well blended and add to the bananas. Mix these thoroughly. Pour this into a 9x13 glass baking dish or a regular loaf pan. Bake at 350 for an hour. ; name: banana banana bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, butter, brown sugar, eggs, bananas ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Lightly grease 9 x 5 loaf pan. In large bowl, combine flour, soda and salt. In separate bowl, cream together butter and brown sugar. Stir in eggs and mashed bananas until well blended. Stir banana mixture into flour mixture. Stir just to moisten. Pour batter into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 60-65 minutes until a toothpick inserted into center of loaf comes out clean. Let bread cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack. ; name: low fat banana bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, splenda granular, baking powder, baking soda, ground cinnamon, egg whites, banana, applesauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease an 8x4 inch loaf pan. In a large bowl, stir together flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda and cinnamon. Add egg whites, bananas and applesauce. Stir just until combined. Pour batter into prepared pan. Bake in preheated oven for 50 to 55 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of loaf comes out clean. Turn out onto wire rack and allow to cool before slicing. ; name: naturally sweetened banana bread ; ingredients: bananas, unsweetened applesauce, eggs, water, vanilla extract, whole wheat flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 f. Mash the bananas until they are mostly lump-free. With a hand mixer, beat together the banana, applesauce, eggs, vanilla, and water until creamy. In a separate bowl, sift the flour, baking soda, baking powder, and spices. Gradually add the dry mixture to the wet ingredients, beating well. Pour the batter into a gently oiled and floured 95 inches loaf pan and spread evenly. Bake for 45 minutes or until a toothpick is inserted and comes out clean. Cool completely on wire rack before slicing. ; name: banana applesauce bread ; ingredients: bananas, applesauce, butter, sugar, eggs, flour, baking soda, cinnamon, milk ; preparation:Cream the butter and sugar together. Add the eggs and beat well. Sift anb add the flour. Mash the bananas and fold them in with all the remaining ingredients. Bake in greased loaf pan, 350 degrees, 1 hour. ; name: magnificent moist banana bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, sugar, cinnamon, pecans, eggs, canola oil, mashed bananas, vanilla extract ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine the dry ingredients. In another bowl combine the wet ingredients. Pour the wet ingredints into the dry mixture and mix completely. Pour into two bread pans coated with non-stick spray. Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour to 1 hour and 10 minutes or until you can insert a knife into the center and it comes out clean. ; name: banana bread banana bomb bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, butter, brown sugar, egg, mashed bananas, applesauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl add flour, baking soda and salt. Grease a 9x5 loaf pan. In a separate bowl add butter and brown sugar and mix well. Stir in egg, bananas and apple sauce blend together. Pour into loaf pan, bake for 60 to 65 minutes, stick with a toothpick in the middle of the loaf until it comes out clean. Let cool, then turn on to serving plate. ; name: banana bread ii ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, applesauce, granulated sugar, egg whites, bananas, vanilla extract ; preparation:

name: chocolate bites ; ingredients: unsweetened chocolate squares, butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Microwave chocolate and butter in a large microwavable bowl on high 2 minutes or until butter is melted. Stir until chocolate is completely melted. Stir in sugar. Blend in eggs and vanilla. Add flour, mix well. Chill 15 minutes or until dough is easy to handle. Shape dough into 1-inch balls. Place 2 inches apart on a greased cookie sheet. Bake 8 minutes or until just set. Let stand on baking sheet 1 minute, transfer to wire racks and cool completely. ; name: chocolate chewy cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, unsifted flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a bowl, combine flour, cocoa powder, baking soda and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the flour mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes. Let cookies rest on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing with a spatula to wire racks to cool completely. ; name: soft and chewy chocolate bites ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate baking squares, butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, white chocolate ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Microwave the chocolate and butter for 2 minutes or until butter is melted. Stir until chocolate is completely melted. Stir in sugar. Blaend in eggs and vanilla. Add flour and mix well. Chill for 15 minutes or until dough is easy to handle. Shape dough into 1 inch balls and place 2 inches apart on greased abking sheets. Bake for 8 minutes or until just set. Laet stand on baking sheet for 1 minute abd then transfer to wire racks to cool completely. Drizzle with white chocolate if desired. ; name: chocolate stuff ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, flour, butter, cocoa, vanilla, nuts ; preparation:Beat two eggs with a cup of sugar and a half cup of flour. Melt a stick of butter with two tablespoons of cocoa. Mix the two and add 1 full teaspoon of vanilla. Add nuts if you want. Put in a loaf pan then set loaf pan in bigger pan of water and cook at 300 degrees for 40 to 50 minutes. ; name: chocolate chunked cookies ; ingredients: bittersweet chocolate, unsalted butter, flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking powder, salt, eggs, granulated sugar, vanilla, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325. Melt chocolate and butter, and let cool slightly. In a bowl, whisk flour, cocoa powder and salt. In large mixer bowl, beat eggs, sugar and vanilla until pale yellow and slightly thickened, about 5 minutes with mixer on medium. Turn mixer to low, beat in cooled chocolate mixture, then flour mixture until blended. Stir in chips. Drop cookies onto nonstick baking sheet, about 2 leveled tablespoons per cookie, about 2-inches apart. Bake 14 minutes or until tops are slightly cracked, centers will still be soft. ; name: our favorite chocolate cookies ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate bits, butter, condensed milk, all-purpose flour, nuts, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spray 2 large cookie sheets with cooking spray. Melt chocolate morsels and butter. Cool slightly. In large bowl add condensed milk, flour, nuts and vanilla extract. Stir until well mixed. Drop by rounded teaspoons onto cookie sheets. Bake 12-15 minutes. Remove to wire racks to cool. ; name: chocolate nut bars ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg yolks, flour, baking powder, chocolate shavings, nuts, egg whites ; preparation:Whip butter, sugar and yolks together until creamy. Add flour, baking powder, chocolate and nuts and mix throughly. Whip eggwhites until stif and fold under. Spread on a baking tray and bake at 350f for 25 minutes or until golden. Cut in bars while still hot. ; name: chocolate chews ; ingredients: baking chocolate, butter, eggs, sugar, vanilla, cake flour, nuts ; preparation:

name: choucroute garni ; ingredients: fresh sauerkraut, bacon, garlic, dry white wine, juniper berries, whole black peppercorn, cloves, unsmoked bacon, sausages ; preparation:Soak the sauerkraut in a large bowl filled with cold water, and soak for 15 minutes. While sauerkraut is soaking, saute bacon, in a large oven proof pan, for 1 minute. Turn heat to medium-low, add the garlic and saute for another minute. Pre-heat oven to 325 degrees. Squeeze the sauerkraut dry, reserving 1 cup of the soaking water and add the sauerkraut to the pot. Stir well to blend with bacon. Add the reserved cup of soaking water, the white wine, the juniper berries, the peppercorns and the cloves. Bring to boil on top of stove and boil until the liquid has almost evaporated. Imbed the meats in the sauerkraut, cover the pot and cook in the oven until the meats are hot, about 30 minutes. ; name: quick choucroute garnie ; ingredients: vegetable oil, smoked sausage, onions, caraway seeds, bay leaf, sauerkraut, dry white wine ; preparation:Cut the sausage into 3-inch lengths, then halve lengthwise. Heat oil in heavy large skillet over medium-high heat. Add sausage, cut side down, and cook until browned on bottom, about 3 minutes. Turn over sausage. Add onions, and saut until onions are beginning to soften, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes. Stir in remaining ingredients. Cover and simmer until flavors blend, stirring occasionally, about 10 minutes. Discard bay leaf. Season to taste with salt and pepper and serve. ; name: crock pot pork and sauerkraut ; ingredients: pork loin roast, caraway seed, black pepper, baking apple, sauerkraut, brown sugar, butter, salt ; preparation:Place pork loin in crock pot. Sprinkle with caraway seeds and black pepper. Place diced apple on top of pork. Pour sauerkraut and juice on top. Evenly sprinkle the brown sugar on top of the sauerkraut. Drizzle the top with melted butter. Cook on low for about 8 hours or until pork reaches internal temp of at least 160 degrees f. Stir the sauerkraut around a bit before serving. ; name: crock pot pork with sauerkraut apple potato ; ingredients: apple, potatoes, apple juice, lean pork, wine-cured sauerkraut, honey mustard, caraway seed ; preparation:Place the cut apple and potato on the bottom of the crock pot. Pour in the apple juice. Add pork. Cover with the kraut. Sprinkle in the caraway seeds. Smear mustard on top. Cook on low 5 hours. ; name: mediterranean pork roulade ; ingredients: scallions, herbed goat cheese, roasted red peppers, sun-dried tomatoes, fresh spinach, italian seasoning, boneless pork loin, salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 425f. Layer the first 5 ingredients and 2 teaspoons of the seasoning on pork loin. Roll lengthwise. Tie at 1-inch intervals with cooking twine. Sprinkle with remaining seasoning, salt, and pepper. Place seam side down in pan. Cover with foil and roast for 10 minutes. Reduce the heat to 350f and cook for 1 hour more or until thermometer inserted in meat reads 155f. ; name: crock pot pork roast and sauerkraut ; ingredients: pork roast, sauerkraut, dry onion soup mix, water, brown sugar ; preparation:Place pork roast in crock pot. Pour sauerkraut over pork roast. Sprinkle the onion soup mix and brown sugar over the pork and sauerkraut. Pour the water over everything. Cook on low for 24 hours. Serve over mashed potatoes. ; name: pork sauteed with sauerkraut ; ingredients: bacon, boneless pork chop, yellow onion, garlic, sauerkraut, paprika, sugar, lager beer, salt and pepper ; preparation:Render the fat out of the bacon, then cook until crisp. Removed the bacon from the pan, without draining oil. Saute the onion in the bacon fat until nicely caramelized. Add the pork strips and brown on all sides. Add salt and pepper to taste. Add garlic about 1 minute before the pork is done. Add the sauerkraut and saute about 10 minutes, until the sauerkraut starts to brown and wilt a bit. Sprinkle the sugar over the sauerkraut and mix in. Mix the paprika into the beer, and add to the pan. Cook until most of the beer has evaporated. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve with reserved bacon crumbled on top. ; name: simplified choucroute garni for crock pot pork chops sauerk ; ingredients: dried italian seasoning, salt, pepper, potatoes, boneless pork chops, tart apples, sauerkraut, kielbasa, sweet white wine, frozen peas ; preparation:

name: chocolate chip cheeseball ; ingredients: cream cheese, butter, vanilla, brown sugar, powdered sugar, mini chocolate chip, pecans ; preparation:In a mixing bowl, combine cream cheese, butter and vanilla, beat until fluffy. Gradually add the sugars, beat until just combined. Stir in the chocolate chips. Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours. Form into ball and roll in pecans. Serve with graham crackers. ; name: chocolate toffee cheese ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, butter, vanilla, powdered sugar, brown sugar, mini chocolate chip, english toffee bits, pecans ; preparation:Mix cream cheese, butter and vanilla. Stir in sugars and fold in chips and toffee bits. Refrigerate 2 to 3 hours. Form into a ball and roll in copped pecans. Serve with graham crackers or apple slices. ; name: cream cheese candy ; ingredients: pecans, butter, cream cheese, powdered sugar, vanilla ; preparation:Put pecans & butter in oven and toast about 15 minutes at 300f. Melt cream cheese over low heat until creamy. Add powdered sugar, vanilla and nuts. Mix very well. Put in fridge until set. ; name: southern sweet cream cheese bites ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, butter, cream cheese, powdered sugar, eggs, vanilla, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 300. Mix yellow cake mix, melted butter, 1 egg, and pecans with a spoon. Spread in a greased & floured 9x13 baking dish. Mix all other ingredients together & spread over cake mixture. Bake uncovered for 1 hour 10 minutes. Allow to cool and cut into bite size servings. ; name: fruity cream cheese ball ; ingredients: vanilla instant pudding mix, cream cheese, crushed pineapple, fruit cocktail ; preparation:Mix all ingredients. Shape into two small balls or one large ball. Roll in crushed pecan, shredded cheese or chipped beef. I prefer the pecans. Serve with ritz crackers or graham crackers. ; name: chocolate cheese cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, cream cheese, egg, milk, vanilla, chocolate, plain flour, baking powder, pecan nuts ; preparation:Beat butter, cream cheese and sugar together until light and fluffy. Add egg milk and vanilla and mix in well. Blend in the melted chocolate, flour, baking powder and salt. Stir in the chopped nuts. Drop tespoons of the mixture onto a greased baking tray. Decorate with the extra nuts. Bake in a moderate oven for 12 minutes. Cool on a wire rack. ; name: pineapple cream cheese ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, bell pepper, onions, seasoning salt, pecans, crushed pineapple ; preparation:Combine all ingredients, savings some pecans to roll cheese ball in. Pack mixture into a bowl or mold. Chill until firm. Remove and roll in pecans to coat exterior. Serve with crackers. ; name: sweet cream cheese ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, powdered sugar, mini chocolate chip, vanilla, pecans, graham cracker sticks ; preparation:

name: appled sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, apples, butter, salt, pepper, sugar, nutmeg ; preparation:Slice the sweet potatoes and dice the apples. Grease a 9x13 in baking pan. Arrange a layer of sweet potatoes, salt and pepper, 2 tbsp butter. Add layer of apples, 2 tbsp sugar, nutmeg. Repeat the layers. Bake in 350 oven for about 40 to 45 min, or until tender and to taste. ; name: sweet potato apple casserole ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, apples, maple syrup, butter, salt, pecans ; preparation:Cook sweet potatoes till almost done. Place in a glass baking dish. Layer apple slices on top of potatoes. Mix syrup, butter and salt. Pour over potatoes. Cover with aluminum foil. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes. Remove foil and bake an additional 30 minutes, or until apples are done. Baste frequently. ; name: roasted glazed sweet potatoes with apples ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, apples, vegetable oil, salt, pepper, butter, brown sugar, pumpkin pie spice ; preparation:Heat oven to 375 degrees f. On a baking sheet with sides, toss sweet potatoes and apples with oil, salt and pepper. Spread out into single layer. Roast 30 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Meanwhile, stir together butter, brown sugar and pumpkin pie spices. Spoon over potato mixture and toss to coat. Continue baking for 10 minutes or until sugar has melted. ; name: crock pot orange spiced sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, dark brown sugar, butter, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, orange, juice of, salt, vanilla, pecans ; preparation:Place sweet potatoes in bottom of slow cooker. Mix spices and orange juice together. Stir into sweet potatoes. Cook on high for 2 hours or on low for 4 hours. Check for doneness because each crock pot cooks at a different heat setting. Before serving, stir in toasted pecans. ; name: spiced sweet potatoes in peaches ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, lemon juice, brown sugar, ground cloves, canned peach halves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine potatoes, lemon juice, brown sugar and cloves. Drain peach halves and arrange in baking dish. Fill centers with sweet potatoes. Bake for 20 minutes. ; name: coconut pecan sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, pecans, flaked coconut, sugar, brown sugar, butter, cinnamon, salt, coconut extract, vanilla extract ; preparation:Spray the inside of a slow cooker crock with cooking spray. Place the sweet potato chunks in the slow cooker. Combine pecans, coconut, sugar, brown sugar, butter, cinnamon and salt. Sprinkle over potatoes. Cover and cook on low 4 hoursor until potatoes are tender. Stir in extracts. ; name: sweet potatoes with a pecan topping ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, sugar, milk, eggs, vanilla, salt, brown sugar, pecans, flour, butter ; preparation:Wash potatoes and bake them in a 350 degree oven for 35 to 40 minutes or until fork tender. Slice cooked potatoes in half and scoop out the insides into a large bowl. Add the sugar, milk, eggs, vanilla, and salt. Mash with a potato masher. In a separate bowl, combine brown sugar, pecans, flour, and butter. Mash together with a pastry cutter or fork, until thoroughly combined. Spread the sweet potato mixture in a baking dish. Sprinkle the crumb mixture all over the top. Bake at 400 for 30 minutes, or until golden brown. ; name: apple spiced sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, apple pie filling, golden raisin, butter, apple pie spice, pecans, sugar ; preparation:

name: bread dippin cilantro salsa ; ingredients: fresh cilantro, green onions, red wine vinegar, fresh lemon juice, olive oil, hot pepper sauce, salt, water, french bread ; preparation:Rinse cilantro. Drain, but do not spin dry. In food processor with knife blade attached, pulse cilantro and green onions until coarsely chopped. Transfer mixture to small serving bowl. Stir in vinegar, lemon juice, olive oil, hot pepper sauce, salt, and 2 tablespoons water. Slice bread. Serve with salsa. Salsa can be covered and refrigerated up to 2 days if not being served right away. ; name: chile garden salsa ; ingredients: tomatoes, onion, green onions, jalapeno chiles, habanero peppers, serrano chilies, fresh cilantro, fresh lime juice, salt ; preparation:Chop one of the tomatoes coarsely and place in a blender with one each of the jalapenos, habaneros, serranos, and the lime juice. Pulse until the mixture has broken down into a sauce. Chop the other tomato. Also finely chop the remaining jalapeno, habanero, and serrano, placing all in a small bowl. Mix in onions, cilantro, and mixture from blender. Add salt and adjust to taste. Allow to sit 1-2 hours to blend flavors before serving. ; name: salsa and chiles green beans ; ingredients: canola oil, onion, garlic cloves, frozen green beans, salsa, diced green chilies, salt ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, 1 to 2 minutes. Add green beans, salsa, chilies and salt. Bring to boil. Reduce heat to low. Cover, cook, stirring occasionally, 10 to 12 minutes or until beans are tender. ; name: anaheim chile salsa verde ; ingredients: anaheim chilies, tomatillo, chicken broth, garlic cloves, fresh cilantro stem ; preparation:Roast chiles. Remove husks from fresh tomatillos& rinse tomatillos under warm water to remove stickiness. In saucepan simmer tomatillos, broth, garlic until tomatillos are tender, about 10 minute. Add chiles to mixture. Cool salsa slightly. In blender pulse until coarsely chopped. Salsa may be made up to this point, 2 days ahead& cooled, uncovered, before being chilled, covered. Bring salsa to room temperature or reheat before proceeding. Just before serving, in blender pulse salsa with cilantro until cilantro is finely chopped& season with salt. Makes about 3 cups. ; name: easy cooked salsa ; ingredients: olive oil, jalapenos, sweet peppers, garlic, onion, tomatoes, red wine vinegar, fresh cilantro, salt ; preparation:In a large pot, heat the oil and add the jalapenos, sweet peppers, garlic and onion. Saut until everything is soft but not browned. Add the tomatoes and cook until the tomatoes are quite soft and starting to pack down in the pot, about 5 minutes. Add the remaining ingredients and cook for about 10 minutes more to give the flavours a chance to mix together and the water to boil off. When the salsa is as thick as you like it, add salt to taste if needed and let stand for at least one minute. Stir well before serving. ; name: salsa pronto ; ingredients: mexican-style stewed tomatoes, onion, fresh cilantro, lemon juice, garlic clove, hot pepper sauce, fresh jalapeno pepper ; preparation:Place tomatoes in a blender or food processor. Cover and blend on lowest speed 2 seconds to chop tomatoes. Combine tomatoes with onion, cilantro, lemon juice, garlic, hot pepper sauce, and jalapeno. Taste and adjust seasonings, if desired. Serve with tortilla chips. ; name: tropical salsa ; ingredients: strawberry, kiwi, green onion, yellow sweet peppers, lemon juice, fresh cilantro, sugar, ground red pepper ; preparation:In a medium bowl stir together the strawberries. Kiwi fruit. Green onion. Sweet pepper. Lime or lemon juice. Cilantro, parsley, or basil. Sugar. And pepper. Cover and chill salsa for 6 hours. ; name: chilean cilantro salsa pebre ; ingredients: garlic clove, salt, fresh ground pepper, olive oil, sherry wine vinegar, green onions, jalapenos, fresh cilantro leaves, water ; preparation:

name: cornbread patties ; ingredients: vegetable oil, white cornmeal, flour, salt, sugar, baking powder, egg, milk ; preparation:Heat oil in frying pan, add enough oil to shallowly cover pan. Mix all ingredients and drop by one tablespoon to form small patties in hot oil. Brown on one side, flip and brown on the other side. Continue browning in batches, adding more oil as necessary. Serve immediately with butter. Can reheat any leftovers in toaster oven. ; name: fried potato patties ; ingredients: potatoes, mozzarella cheese, egg, salt, garlic powder, onion powder, black pepper, breadcrumbs, vegetable oil ; preparation:Combine first 7 ingredients. Chill. Shape mixture into 6 patties. Dip each patty into lightly beaten egg then lightly coat with breadcrumbs. Heat vegetable oil and fry over medium heat until lightly browned, turning once. ; name: tofu and vegetable patties ; ingredients: carrot, scallions, garlic clove, ginger, firm tofu, eggs, sesame oil, vegetable oil, salt and pepper, chili sauce ; preparation:Combine all the ingredients except the oils in a large bowl with some salt and pepper and mix well. Heat both the oils in a frying pan. Grease a 4in metal pastry ring or cookie cutter and place in the pan. When hot, pour 5tbs of the batter in and turn the heat down to medium. Cook for 4-5 mins until golden then take off the ring flip the patty and cook the other side. Do this in batches, keeping the finished patties warm in a low oven. Serve with sweet chili sauce and scallions strips if you like. ; name: fried corn nuggets ; ingredients: corn, eggs, all-purpose flour, sugar, salt, pepper, vegetable oil ; preparation:Combine corn, lightly beaten egg yolks, flour, sugar, salt and pepper in a large bowl. Beat egg whites with an electric mixer set at high speed until stiff peaks form, about 2 minutes. Stir egg whites into corn mixture. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Drop heaping tablespoonfuls of corn batter into skillet. Reduce heat to medium. Cook until nuggets are browned, about 3 minutes per side. ; name: indian corn stew ; ingredients: onion, bell pepper, butter, ground beef, whole kernel corn, tomato soup, sugar, salt, worcestershire sauce, fresh cracked pepper ; preparation:Place butter in large sauce pan and begin to melt. Add onions and peppers and cooking until tender. Add ground beef and cook until browned. Add corn, tomato soup, sugar, salt, pepper and worcestershire sauce. Cover and simmer 45 minutes. ; name: fried corn ; ingredients: fresh corn, bacon, green pepper, cream-style corn, cornstarch, salt and pepper ; preparation:Fry bacon until crisp. Drain well, leaving about three tablespoons of the fat in the skillet. Add the corn, green pepper and cornstarch to the fat. Saut everything together for about 20 minutes or until the vegetables are tender. Add the creamed corn to the other vegetables and crumble the cooked bacon over the top. Continue cooking for an additional ten minutes. Serve while hot. ; name: chicken fried corn on the cob ; ingredients: milk, egg, flour, seasoning salt, pepper, corn, oil ; preparation:Combine milk and egg in shallow dish and mix well. Combine flour, seasoned salt and pepper in shallow dish and mix well. Dip each ear of corn into milk and egg mixture, then roll in seasoned flour. Knock off excess flour. In a large skillet, heat oil to 350 degrees. Add corn and fry for 5 minutes or until golden brown. Drain on paper towels. ; name: indonesian corn patties ; ingredients: corn kernels, fish sauce, fresh cracked pepper, crushed red pepper flakes, shallots, egg, cornflour, oil ; preparation:

name: the best goulash ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, garlic, paprika, elbow macaroni, frozen corn, chopped tomato, tomato sauce, sharp cheddar cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Brown ground meat in skillet with onions and garlic. Drain fat from meat. Add salt, pepper, paprika, tomatoes, tomato sauce and frozen corn. While the meat is cooking, boil the macaroni until almost done. Drain water from macaroni and stir into meat mixture lightly grease a casserole dish. Pour enough mixture to cover bottom of dish and then sprinkle with cheese. Add another layer of meat and top with cheese. Bake at 350 degrees until cheese melts and casserole is bubbling. ; name: easy busy night goulash ; ingredients: ground beef, green bell pepper, sweet onion, garlic cloves, stewed tomatoes, kraft macaroni and cheese, mexicorn, water, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook macaroni in water as directed on package until just al dente, drain. Brown beef in large skillet or dutch oven,, drain off fat. Add stewed tomatoes, peppers, onion, garlic, corn and water. Simmer on low heat until veggies are crisp tender. Add powdered cheese packet to mixture. Stir well, then add cooked macaroni. Simmer on low heat for about ten minutes stirring often to prevent sticking. ; name: goulash recipe from my mother ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, ground beef, onion, garlic cloves, diced tomatoes, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook the macaroni according to package directions. In a large skillet, over medium heat, brown ground beef with onion, till there is no pink left in the beef and then add garlic for a few minutes to cook, then drain beef mixture. Return pan to heat and add the can of diced tomatoes, salt and pepper to taste and allow to heat for about 5 minutes. Add completely drained pasta and allow to blend for several minutes. Add cheese and stir until blended and melted. ; name: easy beef goulash in the crock pot ; ingredients: flour, paprika, salt and pepper, beef chuck, olive oil, tomato paste, onion soup mix, cooked egg noodles ; preparation:Combine flour, paprika, salt and pepper in a small bowl. Dredge beef cubes in mixture. Brown meat in hot oil in skillet. Place beef in crock pot. Top with tomato paste and onion soup mix. Add just enough water to cover meat. Stir to blend. Cover and cook on low for 5-6 hours. Serve over hot egg noodles. ; name: savoury noodle goulash ; ingredients: fat, ground beef, onions, celery, noodles, tomatoes, cheddar cheese, salt, pepper ; preparation:Brown meat in fat. Add onions and celery and cook 10 minutes. Gently mix in remaining ingredients. Simmer or place in a buttered 2 qt casserole. Simmer 30 minutes, or bake at 350f for 45. ; name: different goulash ; ingredients: hamburger, onion, tomato soup, tomato sauce, kidney beans, beef bouillon cube, water, corkscrew macaroni, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In skillet, brown beef. Drain fat. Add onion and cook until tender, set aside. In large saucepan, combine soup, tomato sauce, beans, bouillion, and water. Add cooked pasta and beef. Heat through. Sprinkle with cheese if desired. ; name: darrell s goulash ; ingredients: onion, hamburger, mushrooms, spaghetti sauce, tomatoes, macaroni, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese, bacon bits ; preparation:Fry hamburger til browned, and add all ingredients except macaroni, parmesan cheese and bacon bits. In separate pot, boil macaroni 6 minutes in salted water. Add to the above mixture. Heat thoroughly. Serve with a side salad. Top with optional bacon bits and parmesan cheese. ; name: easy for sheezy goulash ; ingredients: ground turkey, olive oil, garlic, spaghetti sauce, sweet corn, onion, italian seasoning, elbow macaroni ; preparation:

name: hot cranberry tea cider ; ingredients: tea bags, boiling water, cranberry juice, apple cider, brown sugar, cinnamon stick, ginger, whole cloves ; preparation:Place tea bags in boiling water and steep for 10 minutes. You want strong tea here. Add the remaining ingredients and heat through. Simmer for 20 minutes.
